story:
Win an iPad mini by sharing your #ideaforHomee
and see what's going on at:
hom.ee




Meet Homee.




The world's simplest remote
for your home.

We are the proud developers of Homee, a clicker for your home. Homee is a cool gadget and a life-style product which is also a smart home solution of high quality.

With Homee you have your home right at your fingertips - every time, from everywhere. Everybody is now able to make living more comfortable, more secure and more energy-efficient! But for many of us life just becomes more playful with Homee.

Look at this picture! Control and connect all your favorite devices with Homee. It is our goal to combine different products from different manufacturers and even different standards; to bring them all together in the easiest way possible!

To have everything in your hand or in your pocket just by utilizing your smartphone. And when you are at work or at a coffee shop you can just use the responsive web application for Homee. Follow the links and test them right now!

  • iOS
  • Android
  • Web

Add your idea and win!

  1. Download the Android App from the PlayStore or the iOS App for your iPhone.
  2. Use the App to add a button on everything you would like to manage with your new Homee. Be creative and tag the world with Homee!
  3. Share this #ideaforHomee with all your friends and the Homee community on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram. We are really curious!

Everybody who shares an #ideaforHomee till the end of this Campaign has the chance to win a brand new iPad mini with a special engraving just for you.

Make life comfortable - even in the morning.

With Homee you may have the most pleasant alarm you have ever had. Even in the winter you can be awakened by the sun!

  • The lights increase slowly while you are still sleeping.
  • Shutters punctually opening.
  • Even have your favorite radio station playing while you are waking up.

Have you ever had a better start of your day?


Take care of your home and your family.

Homee keeps an eye on your home even if you are not there. Let Homee notify you whenever something is going wrong. You are absolutely flexible about what and when Homee is notifying you. And in the future, Homee will make the right decisions for you - but only if you tell Homee to do so.

 

Save money and energy automatically.

We think about your wallet and the environment! But we know that we are all too lazy to do the complicated stuff we could do. Homee is foolproof to install and can help automatically whenever you leave your home.


Enjoy a playful life.

You know what will happen! :) And we know that YOU will have a bunch of creative ideas for Homee that will make your life even more funny and enjoyable. Let all your friends be part of your fun and share your #ideaforHomee with them.

Homee is ...


... easy to use:
Installing and handling is foolproof.

All user interfaces are absolutely simple and intuitive. Everybody gets it in seconds. If on your smartphone or your PC, Homee everywhere has a beautiful look and feel. 




... good looking:
Make your life colorful.

With this innovative and functional design and the small size, Homee finds a warm place to live in every home. 




... flexible:
From dormitory to luxury villa.

Whether you only want to turn on your heating or you want to automate your entire home with lots of devices, Homee is always always fulfills your needs. 




... secure:
What happens at home stays at home.

All data, usernames, passwords and actions are stored securely and encrypted on your Homee. Homee is no cloud solution. So if your internet has some hiccups, Homee keeps working. 




... just the beginning:
Homee is still in its infancy.

We know that there will be many more cool devices and things you want to combine with Homee. Help us to reach and stretch our goals and decide together with us what's next. 

Homee for Nerds

Homee is created for normal customers but also for Nerds like us. We provide everything you need to realize your own amazing ideas with Homee.

There will be ...

  • a RESTful API to develop intuitive user interfaces or control Homee with your own software/services.
  • a comprehensive SDK for the complex processes and applications that must run on the white brain Cube.

Like the rest of Homee, developing with Homee is really easy, too. Don't worry, we abstract all the difficult things for you such that you don't have to worry about radio technologies. 


Tech Specs

Rewards

Team

That is us: four creative technology enthusiasts - supported by a penguin called Tux. But we have a big vision. During our studies we got the chance to develop and research in smart home services for two full years. After these two years we had understood that there are lots of problems with smart home and that's why we developed Homee, a simple remote for your home.

f.l.t.r.

  • Markus Graf: His home is the internet. From server-side applications to responsive web design. Everything you see in your browser was done by him.
  • Waldemar Wunder: Our business man with a technical background. He likes numbers, business models and Android development.
  • Tobias Graf: The best friend of Tux. From Raspberry Pi to embedded systems and microcontrollers such as Arduino, he programs everything he gets his hands on.
  • Jochen Schöllig: iOS & OS X Developer (Apple Fanboy) and full-time Optimist. Passionate about design, sports and cool gadgets like Homee.


Timeline

We have a working prototype and are now focusing on:

  • Finalizing the engineering schematics for the final product
  • Developing and iterating on the user experience for the apps (Please give us feedback!)
  • Developing and documenting the SDK and all APIs

We will soon begin to:

  • design the packaging
  • get product certifications
  • design the supply chain process
  • start tooling
  • procure the materials
  • then produce!

story:
Securitapp is an app (Apple & Android) that turns your old and unused mobile phone's camera, into a surveillance system. Point the camera to the area of your home or business that you need to control. And if a motion is detected, the app will take a shot and send it instantly to your email.

Securitapp will keep your family, home or business safe.



Easy, Cheap and Simple.

Just install the app on your old mobile phone (Apple and most of Android phones), set the email where the system will send the alerts, plug it in and go.



Receive alerts in real-time


If a movement is detected, that could mean an intrusion. Instantly receive, view and act on the alerts wherever you are. 


Once you receive an alert, you decide how to respond. Do you want to text your neighbor to check in? Call the police? You decide.


Features


Every year 5.5 million burglaries are committed in the world.


Service Plans

Securitapp is a new approach to home security. While you're away, securitapp will keep your home, family or business safe.


  • Lifetime license for just 7,99€ (Indiegogo from 5€)
  • Or annual fee for 1,99€/year (Indiegogo from 1€)


Compared to other security systems

Other security systems are :

  • Expensive (installation costs and monthly fees)
  • Complicated
  • Need to be installed
  • Can't take with you everywhere


The Team

We believe the world would be safer if everyone has access to security systems at their homes and the places they care about.
Everyone has the right to feel safe and secure.
So, we decided to create Securitapp, a surveillance system for everyone and for anywhere.
Our three core values are :
Make it EASY
Make it CHEAP
Make it SIMPLE

We think we've got it... and you too.

Securitapp comes from the team behind Avant Web Solutions and MAGAZAPP, a mobile development company based in Barcelona - Spain. 

Pere Sanz (Management/Creative) - Linkedin

Wilfredo Pérez (Technical) - Linkedin

Pilar Agudo (Financial) - Linkedin


Why we need your support

We believe in crowdfunding. The advantage of bringing a product into the market through crowdfunding is that we can see if there's really a market for it, plus we can improve on the product by listening to your ideas. So that's what we're after in this campaign. 

If we can get the people to back our project, that'll show us there's a market for Securitapp and we'll start developing the product immediately.

story:
The world's first complete carb tracker for diabetics.

Easycarb is the first complete solution for tracking carbohydrates, intended to make the process simple, accurate and efficient. It consists of a powerful app combined with a dedicated portable Bluetooth scale, which together automatically calculate the exact amount of carbs in a given meal, no matter where you are.




Total portability
Take control of your carbs wherever you go with the Bluetooth SmartScale. We designed it with portability and comfort in mind, and its long-life battery will provide you with months of smooth operation.
Cloud-based food database
The heart of the app is a comprehensive cloud-based food database that displays and logs nutritional information for basic, whole foods as well as prepared dishes.
Nutritional value calculator
The integrated Easycarb nutrition calculator provides users with accurate carbohydrate, fibre and other nutritional values for every meal – like never before possible.
Insulin dosing recommendation
The app instantly provides the user with precise corresponding insulin values for every meal, based on the user's insulin sensitivity profile.
PDF report exporter
The powerful integrated logger enables the user to export a personalised PDF report to share with their physician or caregiver.



Step one

The scale weighs the item and sends the data to the mobile app via Bluetooth.

Step two

Select the same food article on the app, which automatically calculates the number of carbs and insulin values.










Step three

Powerful logger logs everything, so you don't have to.




 


We began developing the Easycarb SmartScale with portability and reliability in mind. Once we had the initial concept on paper, we presented it to local  diabetes communities, who helped us tailor it to the needs of the users.
We realized that the scale should be big enough to make weighing convenient for all kinds of foods, but should be kept small enough to fit into any pocket, to keep it both discrete and fully portable.



The scale features an extremely precise load cell sensor capable of detecting even the slightest difference in pressure. But just to be on a safe side, it will come equipped with a pressure overload safety mechanism, so you don't ever have to worry about it breaking down.



After months of rigorous testing at least a dozen variations we are proud to introduce the final version of the Easycarb SmartScale. We are convinced it's colourful, sleek design will captivate anyone who lays their hands and eyes on it – and its sturdy build will ensure it lasts. We also equipped it with a powerful coin battery and a smart automatic on/off mechanism, which eliminates the need for pesky cables and will provide months of smooth, reliable operation.












We are a young, committed interdisciplinary team of experts from various sciences; biomedical professionals and researchers, programmers and developers, together with accomplished industrial and graphic designers. We believe interdisciplinary knowledge and sharing of experience and expertise produces the best results; but most of all, we are convinced we can revolutionize the way carbohydrates are managed and make people's lives better.




Like what we do and what we stand for? There are many ways how you can help us out. Spread the word about Easycarb on social media, join our newsletter or publish a story about us in your awesome magazine or blog. Thanks!

 

How does the app calculate carb values in my meal?
The app contains a comprehensive integrated food database with precise nutritional values for every kind of food. This allows it to automatically calculate the amount of carbs (and other nutrients) in a serving based on its weight.

Do I have to use a bowl/plate when weighing items on the SmartScale?
Use of a bowl/plate is not required for Easycarb to function, especially when weighing food items that do not require a bowl/plate (eg. croissant, fruit, etc.).

How does the scale determine the weight of the food inside a bowl/plate?
The Easycarb scale will come equipped with a TARE option, which subtracts the weight of a given bowl/plate, similar to standard kitchen scales. The app will carefully guide the user, to make sure all weighing is performed properly.

Can Easycarb determine the carbohydrate content of complex meals (pasta, pizza, risotto etc.)?
It depends on the complexity of the meal. Easycarb can determine the carbohydrate content of complex meals that contain a single main carbohydrate source (eg. lasagne).

Can I use the Easycarb App without the scale?
Although the Easycarb App was carefully designed to work seamlessly with the bundled SmartScale, it can also serve as a stand-alone tool. In this case, users have to determine the weight of the food items themselves and input them into the app manually.

Does the food database contain all of my favourite foods?
Easycarb uses a very comprehensive food database which is based on the USDA's National Nutrient Database. Didn't find the item you were looking for? No problem, users will also have the option to add their own food  items as well.

How will Easycarb be able to recommend an insulin dosage?
Every person is unique and has their own insulin sensitivity profile. Easycarb will enable users to quickly calculate their own sensitivity coefficient and save it, making it possible to display recommended corresponding insulin values for each meal.*

*The insulin values provided are only recommendations based on the user's imported data and personal user profile, and should ALWAYS be carefully considered before making final dosing decisions.

story:
What Happened

On Christmas Eve Mary and our Dad were walking from their car to midnight service at our church in Atlanta when two men approached them, fired a gun and stole their wallet, purse, and cell phones. 

Mary had just recently received a brand new iPhone 4s for graduation, and as a student at UGA isn't in a position to buy a new one. Right now she's using one of our Dad's old phones and is perfectly content with it. 

The police are working on tracking down the robbers, but it's very unlikely any property would ever be recovered.

What We Need 

Although Mary hasn't asked for anyone to replace her phone, it upsets me that she had to endure a tramautic event like this, on Christmas Eve no less, and I would like to try and replace the phone for her. As it turns out, these iPhones are awfully expensive when your contract isn't up for renewal, and I'm not in a position to spend $550 on a brand new phone for her.

If, AND ONLY IF, you are in a position to contribute, I would love to see if her friends and family can pool together a small portion of their respective earnings to cover the expense of a new iPhone 4s. If we are able to exceed the goal I've set $550, then I will use the extra money to get her the best iPhone available.

The Impact

Mary has no idea I'm setting this fund up, and I hope all of you will do your best to keep it that way. You may only be able to chip in $10, $5 or even $1, but if enough of us join together, we can remind my little sister that there is more good out there than evil.

I have set this group to expire in 30 days (early February) and if my goal of $550 isn't reached by that time, any money you contribute will be automatically refunded to your account. 

 

Thank you in advance for helping. :)

story:
IPHOXY TV Creating a BUZZ and being featured on :

                              

               

                     

       

                         

                                       

       Thanks  to everyone who supported us so far , we are working day and night to make sure you get the best quality and up to date software and the piece of mind you deserve. but we still have along way to go and we are dedicated to success but our success cant be complete without your help and support and for that we are truly thankful.                       


WHAT IS IPHOXY TV ?

 IPHOXY TV is the best HDMI dongle ever made ,that will turn your dumb TV into         a smart TV. It’s a wifi display dongle with 4.4 android software built in  and our own coded special software, and it also has a mirroring function from all devices (phones tablets PCs) windows android and apple  .
Mirroring simply means that you will be able to display the content of your phone tablet  or computer to a bigger screen with a touch of button .


IPHOXY TV runs on a Dual core RK3188 CPU  that will make the system run smoothly with no interruption, and you will be able to view it on 2k - 4k screens, A sleek design that’s truly revolutionary , you are getting a full HD display from this little tiny device ,

The Story Behind IPHOXY TV .

We here at iphoxy accessories are really passionate about technology and new products, and we always hoped and tried to make people's lifes easier

with the amount of new technology that is being made every day,  we really wanted
to add our own touch into the technology world, our first trial was with the projector X , the projector X  was accomplished after a lot of hard work and dedication that we worked on for 2 years , but it didn't go well  because the manufacturing price was too high so we stopped our campaign after 2 days of launching it ,so now we came up with a new concept with a similar idea called IPHOXY TV ,



Solving a Problem !!!

we have all been there , facing huge TVs with small brains ,or connection problems with wires cables and devices for the sake of multiple viewing , and this is what we started working on here at iphoxy ,  a device that connects to phones ,  tablets and PCs and  by itself smart , with android 4.4 built in that is compatible to connect wirelessly with all platforms ,

·  Windows ( xp 7 vista 8 and 8.1).

·  Android devices ( tablets and phones)  running  4.0 and higher.

·  iOS (iPhones  iPads  iMacs itouch) 6.0 and higher 



IPHOXY TV FEATURES.

·  Cast the web and data to your TV.

·  Content you love from Netflix  YouTube hulu and others.

·  Download apps to your TV.

·  Friends and family can use your IPHOXY TV with their phones and tablets and PCs without setting up anything.

·  Turning your TV into a smart TV.

·  Play your favorite games on a bigger screen and a higher resolution.

·  High-Definition Entertainment.

·  Stays out of sight , IPHOXY TV is designed to plug directly into the back of your TV.

·  Watch a lot of  new free TV channels .

·  Supports multi languages. 


Competitors ????

Despite the best efforts of Panasonic, Samsung, Sony, LG and others, most of the televisions in people's homes these days are not of the smart variety. However, there are hundreds of millions of regular televisions packing HDMI ports, and IPHOXY’S new IPHOXY TV device offers a way to put some brains into those dumb TVs by giving them access to web-based content. Having AN IPHOXY TV dongle connected to your TV means you can stream videos straight from a Google Play, Netflix or YouTube app, or mirror the content from any device by any device it means phone tablet PCs whether its apple android or windows.

sure, we've seen devices with some identical functionality, like plair , Chrome cast ,air tame, and others more. But IPHOXY TV it’s the first of its kind to have android software mirroring and casting from other devices like phones tablets and PCs (apple android windows ) ,not to mention the affordable price of $84, is it a worthy addition to your living room? and is it really "the easiest way to enjoy online videos and music on your TV"


yes we believe so!!!


why we need your help ?

We have the whole manufacturing plan ready that will soon be ready for production. Though we have big ambitions, we are a small company and only have the capacity to finance modest production runs.  Placing an order of multiple thousands of units is beyond our grasp.  

This is where you come in.  You can help us to increase the amount of product we can order from the factory as well as accelerate the speed with which we can get it into the homes of our customers. Your support will make this possible and will be a vital spark in growing a company obsessed with creating the best products ever.

 IPHOXY TV is the best HDMI dongle ever made ,that will turn your dumb TV into         a smart TV. It’s a wifi display dongle with 4.4 android software built in  and our own coded special software, and it also has a mirroring function from all devices (phones tablets PCs) windows android and apple  .
Mirroring simply means that you will be able to display the content of your phone tablet  or computer to a bigger screen with a touch of button .

story:
Features

 

 

 The Real Universal Charger

 

Wireless charge is compatible with multiple Quick charge Smartphone ,

USB Charge is compatible with Smartphone , Speaker , Headphone , Ipad , Tablet , PSP, and much more.

 

 

 

 

About Us

Sanbent  is a very collaborative & passionate team and we are so pround of to be here . We estalished in the late of 2014 at a vary small group , we aim to provide some good charging product to customer. Now we have grown up more after a few years of trials and efforts , we have built up our own develop dept & produce dept in order to make more creative product as well as control the quality .  

It's not easy for us to pass this journey , but so much thanks to all the people that always encourage and support us , without you we won't get here today . Please continue to support us , we believe that we could do better !! 

 Timeline

 

 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Questions & Answers :

 

1.How do I choose the perk & adaptor ?

We provide 2 standard adaptors :

American Standard Adaptor - with two Flat plug , Input AC 100-240V , output DC 12V/3A . It can be used in  : USA / Canada / Japan / Brazil / Thailand etc.

Euro Standard Adaptor - with two Round plug , Input AC 100-240V , output DC 12V/3A . It can be used in  : German / France / Netherlands / Denmark / Norway / Finland / Portugal / Belgium / Hungary / Spain / Sweden / Russia etc .

 

2. How many colors are available for the charger?

Black and White will be available , you can choose the color after click the perk .

 

3.Where we ship ?

We ship from China , and use standard shipping service : 10-15days for most of the countries , it will take a few more days to faraway countries . It depends on your country & customer clearance.

 

4.Does the shipping cost conclude the import fee & custom tax ? 

NO , for GST & VAT or other related import fees & custom tax , if any , will be collected from the buyers when delivery based on the import policies of their country .

 

5.What is in the package ?

The standard package conclude wireless charger and DC 12V Adaptor .

 

6.If the shipping address could be changed ? 

When your order is under “processing”, you can edit your shipping address . 

 

7.Can I cancel the order and get the refund ? 

When your order is under “processing”, you can cancel the order and ask for the refund . If the order has been shipped , you will need to wait till receive the package then send back to us , we will refund after getting the package.

 

8.Is the package can be tracked ?

YES , our shipping channels can be tracked .

 

For any other questions , please just contact us immediately via the account or send us email: senbent1688@outlook.com ,we will reply you timely!

story:
About Taxes 

All international duties, taxes, or clearing fees are not included in the prices. We highly recommend you consult your local tax authorities first. Different countries have different tax policies. If you must pay the duties/taxes, but you refuse to, your package will be abandoned. If that happens, we can neither ship another package nor issue a refund.

 

Contacts

Please email us with any questions at info@magnetartech.com

story:
Share = 1 x Magic Touch

Not Lottery

We need your help!

Share the project on social networks , send the proof to alinsilaur@gmail.com and get 1 Magic Touch at the special price of $ 1 . You will receive 1 Magic Touches at your preferred size. 0nly 2000 pieces.


The story of the project



After more than 4 months of working day and night, LEDO engineers have successfully developed the NEW VERSION Magic Touch.




If you use iPhone 6/iPhone 6 Plus, you probably feel the frustration as we do: difficult to control with one hand and reach button on the upper corner, or even drop the phone and break your heart.


                                       
The Magic Touch has a special built-in circuit, connecting the buttons (left and right) between the lower and upper corner of the screen accordingly, where most IOS apps locate the "back" and "confirm" button.

story:
Mass production is starting this month. Last chance to be one of the first to receive Jiffy.

A BIG THANK YOU TO ALL THE BACKERS OF THE PREVIOUS CAMPAIGN! THANK YOU FOR YOUR TRUST AND SUPPORT. IT MEANS A LOT TO US! 

Small, stylish wearable device that fits in your pocket. Pull it out when your other devices need saving in any emergency. Jiffy uses the new technology "Quick Charge 2.0" This is the fastest technology out at the moment for charging devices.

We are living in the time of technology that has been developing more and faster than ever. Technology has become essential in today’s world. Our lives have become closely linked to mobile electronic devices, because they give us freedom of communication.


Jiffy helps your devices when they run out of juice.

When the battery runs out devices and gadgets become useless pieces of plastic and metal. They become unusable.

Jiffy is an eco-charger and using the new technology "Quick Charge 2.0" will assure your device a quick charge that truly offers freedom and unlimited independence when it comes to charging your mobile devices and gadgets.That’s it! You are completely independent of any power supply, electric network, or wall outlet.  Jiffy is an eco-charger that has a priceless advantage both in everyday life and especially when travelling and going on new adventures even to the ends of the world.

THE IDEAL SITUATION- to maintain a last call, an emergency call when you are in a critical situation, to send a last text, or study a map with GPS in case you get lost and can’t find sources to charge your device nearby.

TOTAL ENERGY INDEPENDENCE- charge devices and gadgets at any time, any place and without taking in to consideration the weather, or temperature outside.


Imagine a scenario of being lost in the woods, in the desert, or in a jungle. Your phones battery will be assured only by Jiffy!


PRIORITY- compared to other methods of charging gadgets, Jiffy doesn’t need gas balloons with chemical reactions as other chargers. You can use it at night, in the shade, in thick forests unlike solar chargers. Jiffy also doesn’t need wind, or water currents.

IMPORTANT-No traditional electricity, no air pollution, and you don’t need to look for a power outlet. In this way you don’t need to worry about where you will charge your mobile phone, camera, Bluetooth headset, or any other devices that can be charged through USB.

Charge while on any type of transportation: train, ship, bus, or even wagon. You can rest assured and camp as much as you want, do extreme mountain sports, go hiking, or rock climbing without worrying that your camera, or smart phone will be without battery and you will remain without communication.

We all know how problematic it is to find an electrical power outlet when going on longer trips. Also we know situations when electricity shuts off at home because of powerful rain, wind, or other natural phenomena that cause damage to power grids. You will be able to access the internet, radio, or other news portals in times of danger and emergency.

Thanks to the USB attachment with LED light, Jiffy can be used as a light source. It does not need batteries and can be used at any time when there are blackouts and electricity and light are most needed. It is perfect to have a Jiffy handy in your emergency kit.

MULTI USB- the cable is perfect to charge any gadget at any time. Charge your devices and gadgets, or help a friend that needs help, but needs a different kind of cable.

How does Jiffy work? 

Jiffy represents a USB charger that mechanically produces electricity without eliminating toxic substances into the atmosphere. Electricity production is carried out by a three phase asynchronous micro generator with very high productivity, which is driven by a complex mechanical watch. With a simple movement the mechanism is charged with kinetic energy which is transmitted to the micro generators. The charging module is 5V USB that charges all the devices that support the standard USB. The intensity of electric current is up to 2200 mA and this offers a faster charge, by using the new tehnology "Quick Charge 2.0".

For the people that are less technical, Jiffy with the 2200mA can simultaneously charge 6 smart phones with 4” screens that are navigating the internet through Wi-Fi, or 4 smart phones that are navigating the internet through 3G. 

Technical info about the prototype:

Behind the micro generator is mounted a controller that has the function of continuously recovering the current and 5V voltage stabilization. Also an electrolytic capacitor which has the function of a micro accumulator is connected in the scheme to remove the current fluctuations produced by mechanical processes under the influence of kinetic energy.

Electrical scheme

We documented our work process and wanted to share with you the important steps. Also watch the first prototype we tested.

Thanks for making it all the way down here to meet team Jiffy!

What we intend to do after the campaign is finished?

After the Indiegogo campaign is finished we will start work on Jiffy immediately because we know that time is the biggest enemy for a start up. We know that we will encounter obstacles along the way, but we are ready to face them and if everything goes as planned we will deliver Jiffy within the timeline that we estimated. 

We hope that Jiffy is just the first of many devices that we work on. For us this is hopefully going to be a successful campaign that will turn into a small business and generate enough income to give us the possibility to work on bigger projects. It would be great to work on other projects that will bring solutions to problems like reusable energy, eco friendly energy, global warming etc. These are the problems that bother us and we hope that with your help we will be able to start attending to them.

TIMELINE


Perks

For us this is hopefully going to be a successful campaign that will turn into a small business and generate enough income to give us the possibility to work on bigger projects. It would be great to work on other projects that will bring solutions to problems like reusable energy, eco friendly energy, global warming etc. These are the problems that bother us and we hope that with your help we will be able to start attending to them.TIMELINEPerks

story:
Introducing ODIN!

We are excited to share ODIN, the first product from Dos Owls, with the Indiegogo community. Following our succesfull Kickstarter campaign, we're looking to upgrade some of the features in our first device. We'll be going into our first mass production in a few months and with your help, we plan to upgrade the hard drive capacity and include a tripod mount. 

Together, we will produce the first Android smart-projector that directly projects online content from a compact, battery-operated device allowing sharing and viewing in unlimited ways.

Stretch Goals

$75,000: Include tripod mount
$175,000: Increase internal storage capacity from 16 GB to 64 GB 
$300,000: New color

What Can I Do With ODIN?

ODIN is the ideal product for people who consume most of their entertainment using Netflix, Hulu, Amazon, the web and mobile applications. As we consume more information via the Internet, we need a compact, portable device that gives us a large visual display.  

  • Stream movies from Netflix and Hulu
  • Access files from Dropbox or Skydrive
  • Surf the web on a Chrome browser
  • Use Google Docs and Office 365 to work by connecting a keyboard and mouse
  • Play Xbox on a big screen
  • Stream music from your phone to the Bluetooth speakers
  • Express your creativity in new ways - use as a guide to paint a mural, in an art display, and more

These are just some of the activities you can accomplish with ODIN. We are sure that you will think of thousands of other ways.

Stream and beam Netflix in your living room via ODIN's WiFi. Access to over 1 million apps on the Android ecosystem gives you endless options for online content.


Movie night with grandma at the hospital? Easy. Beam Hulu onto a wall and enjoy entertainment in the most unexpected places.


Connect ODIN to an Xbox or/ Playstation and experience game-play in completely new ways.


Create new uses that suit your interests and lifestyle.


How Does ODIN Work?

ODIN combines an Android powered PC, state-of-the-art projector, Bluetooth speakers and WiFi in a compact, portable gadget. It is battery operated and can meet the demands of today's digital consumers and creators who value mobility and freedom.


OPTICAL DISPLAY

Contains state-of-the-art DMD optical technology that beams powerful LED light and a large screen size. 

  • Place ODIN 1 yard away from the wall, and it displays a 25” screen size

  • Place it 10 yards away for a 250" screen size.

ODIN's optical lens is so strong, you can see the projected screen with normal indoor lighting at up to 45" screen size, which is bigger than most flat screen TVs.


KITKAT ANDROID OS

Our intuitive user interface allows for simple navigation and organization of all your apps. ODIN uses a quad-core Android microprocessor and KitKat operating system, which provides access to over 1 million Android apps.  


Home Page (Preliminary)

Settings Page (Preliminary)


CONNECTIVITY

ODIN includes array of connection methods. Built in WiFi wirelessly connects to the Internet as well as a phone’s hotspot. Embedded Bluetooth allows for easy communication between external Bluetooth speakers, keyboard, mouse, and other accessories. ODIN has an HDMI port to connect to XBOX or Playstation, two USB drives for a keyboard, mouse, or flash drives, and a headphone plug.

BLUETOOTH SPEAKERS

ODIN has two play modes:

  • A: Full projector mode using the projector, speakers and access to Android apps

  • B: Bluetooth speaker mode for streaming music from your phone directly to the two speakers  


BATTERY

ODIN's battery provides about two (2) hours of run-time in portable mode. For extended viewing and charging, just connect ODIN to an outlet with the included power cord. 


FUNCTIONAL DESIGN

ODIN is designed with flexibility in mind. Beam onto a wall, or rotate the head 90 degrees and display content on the ceiling for a truly unique viewing experience. (Patent Pending)


COMPACT SIZE

ODIN is lightweight and similarly sized to a typical paperback book. It can be easily carried in your briefcase, tote bag or jacket pocket for portability. It is 6" long, 4.25" wide, 1.8" thick, and weighs 1.7 pounds.


Today's Projector Systems

We think pictures do a much better job than any text.


Live Demo


Inspiring Creativity

There are many artistic and creative uses for ODIN. For example, use it to create murals and other wall art, as part of an interactive art display, or as a backdrop to a party.

DOS OWLS TEAM

ALEX YOO BIO - FOUNDER

Originally from the suburbs of Chicago and currently residing in Bed-Stuy, Brooklyn, Alex Yoo earned his first professional experience in the fast-paced financial world of Wall Street. For five years, he plied his trade diligently at Houlihan Lokey, Nomura Securities and Tri Artisan Partners.

However, he soon grew restless with the repetitive PowerPoint presentations and Excel sheets, so he decided to make a change. His next venture came about as a matter of necessity. A habitual sharp dresser, he’d always had difficulty finding dress shirts that worked for his body frame. He took a bold risk and launched an online custom shirt company called Alexander West. He poured all his energy and resources into the business, and Alexander West is presently an established player in the NYC custom clothing market.

Alex’s newest project is a tech venture called Dos Owls. The idea stemmed from a desire to enjoy his NetFlix/Hulu content on a more compact, multi-functional device. The first Dos Owls product is called ODIN, and it has several distinct features including an Android processor, portable theater-like viewing, wireless connectivity, exceptional sound output and innovative design.

DOS OWLS TEAM

Brooklyn Creative Team

  • Alex Yoo, Founder (Bed-Stuy, Brooklyn)
  • Valentin Sidersky, Electrical Engineer (Navy Yard, Brooklyn)
  • Lance Hazelton, Industrial Design (Bushwick, Brooklyn)
  • Michael Boswell, Art and Graphic Design (Williamsburg, Brooklyn)
  • Omar McFarlane, Culture + Web (Long Island, NY)
  • Rob Soucy, Video Director (China Town, Manhattan)
  • George Hagan, Copy (Astoria, Queens)
  • Andrew Zimbelman, Illustrator (Park Slope, Brooklyn)

China Engineering / Production Team

  • A. Zhang, Technology Lead
  • W. Chi, Mechanical Engineer
  • H. Liu, Software
  • A. Zeng, Software
  • A. Feng, Hardware
  • T. Wong, Production
  • A. Ho, Industrial Design
  • A. Fong, Hardware
  • C. Wong, Quality Control

ODIN DEVELOPMENT STORY

Alex Yoo:

The initial concept for what is now the Dos Owls ODIN first appeared about two years ago and I started working on developing ODIN in the Spring of 2013. Since I did not come from a technology / engineering background, I had to teach my self the basics of mechanical, industrial, optical, and electrical engineering in addition to design for manufacturing and software development (firmware/OS/application). 

First, I attended as many hardware workshops as possible (e.g., Hardware Innovation Workshop by MAKE and Hardware Workshop organized by Marc Barros) and talked to anyone that was in hardware technology development as well as a lot of relevant reading. I also started attending relevant Meetup groups around the NYC area and joined Hack Manhattan hackerspace to hang around technology enthusiasts and makers.

The biggest development hurdle in the beginning was finding skilled and experienced engineers who could develop ODIN in addition to being economically feasible.  Due to limited resources, I looked to Asia. With persistence, patience and many trips to Asia, I created connections to talented and experienced Chinese engineers and manufacturers. Shezhen, China has an amazing infrastructure of experienced engineers and electronic production facilities that can't be compared to anywhere in the world.

Our first prototype, based on a dual-core microprocessor, failed to meet our high expectations for performance and user experience. Therefore, we are currently upgrading all of our hardware specifications (to quad-core, more RAM, Bluetooth 4.0, among others) to have robust performance using Andorid 4.4 KitKat operating system. 

ODIN Product Specifications

PLEASE NOTE THAT FINAL SPECIFICATIONS CAN CHANGE.  ALL OF OUR REFINEMENTS WILL BE TO IMPROVE THE DEVICE.

GENERAL

  • 4.3" W x 6" L x 1.8" H (at thickest)
  • ~1.7 lbs w/ aluminum base 
  • Black / 10KGold 
  • 90 degree adjustable stand

INTERNALS

  • Quad-core ARM Cortex-A9, 1.6GHz 
  • Android Operating System 4.4 KitKat 
  • 2GB DDR RAM
  • Wi-Fi (B/G/N) 
  • Bluetooth 4.0 
  • 16GB Internal Memory

OPTICAL TECHNOLOGY

  • Display Technology: 0.3" DMD (Direct Micromirror Display)
  • Light Source: LED (RGB) 
  • Resolution: WVGA (854 x 480) 
  • Contrast Ratio: 1000:1 
  • Throw Ratio: 1.66:1 (meter) 
  • Refresh Rate: 60 Hz 
  • LED Life: 20,000 hours 
  • 115 Lumens ANSI 
  • Size: 25" @ 1 yard to Infinity
  • Manual focus

POWER

  • Power via DC 5.5mm 12V 3A 
  • Rechargeable Battery 7.4V 3000 mAh 
  • Battery Life: ~ 2 Hours in Portable Mode; ~1 Hr. 15 Min in Full Power Mode
  • Bluetooth Speaker Mode: ~ 8 Hours 

CONNECTIONS

  • Video: Single HDMI Connection 
  • Audio: 3.5mm TRRS 
  • 2 x USB 

AUDIO

  • 2 x 4 Watt Bluetooth Speakers

PROTOTYPE AND COMPONENT PICS

TIMELINE TO SHIPPING

JUNE

  • PCBA + SMT Round 2
  • New Battery Design
  • New Mouse Pad Design
  • Prototype #2
  • Firmware + Android 4.4 Kitkat Development (cont'd)

JULY

  • Trial Assembly
  • Thermal Testing
  • Sound Testing
  • Windage + Shock Testing
  • Mold/Tooling Quote
  • Firmware + Android 4.4 Kitkat Development (cont'd)

AUGUST

  • Prototype #3
  • Start Tooling/Molding
  • HDMI License
  • UL/CE/FCC Testing
  • Packaging Design
  • Carrying Case Design and Fabrication
  • Firmware + Android 4.4 Kitkat Development (cont'd)

SEPTEMBER

  • Pilot Run Assembly
  • Tooling Revision
  • Battery Certification for Export
  • Firmware + Android 4.4 Kitkat Development

OCTOBER

  • Finish First Mass Production Run

DECEMBER

  • Shipment to first batch of supporters
JANUARY
  • Shipment to IGG supporters

SEEKING PARTNERS

We are currently looking for strategic business partners and financial partners with hardware experience. 

Please contact alex@dosowls.com

DELIVERABLE

Each ODIN box will include ODIN, power cord and protective carrying case.

PLEDGE GIFTS


FAQ

  • How is your product better compared to other portable projecters? Like Brookstone has 2 pocket projectors that is 85 and 200 lumens.

    View Brookstone's Project Projector here

    Brookstone projector is a traditional projector. ODIN is "Smart."

  1. ODIN's optical engine is much more advanced. Screen size will be 250" if it is 10 yards away for theater viewing and our quality is much more clear.
  2. Brookstone needs to be plugged in. ODIN can be battery powered or plugged in.
  3. ODIN can stream Netflix, Hulu and 1 million other applications. Brookstone cannot. It is a traditional projector that needs to be hooked up to a computer or another content provider.
  4. ODIN can be a Bluetooth speaker when it is not projecting anything. It will replace the Pill, Jambox, etc.
  5. Also, lumen figures can be very deceiving. It is never consistent from one projector to a another.

  • Is ODIN compatible with iOS?

  • Can ODIN screenshare with my mobile device?

    ODIN supports Android's native Miracast. For iOS, see below.

    • Yes, ODIN is currently capable of streaming audio from iOS via Bluetooth and using your iOS device as a mobile hotspot. Wirelessly streaming photos and videos from iOS is on our roadmap. While we don't have a set date, ODIN's software is upgradeable to provide it with enhancements and improvements.

  • What is ODIN's resolution?

    ODIN displays at 854 × 480 pixels (WVGA). Please see update #1 where we stream Netflix to see the optical quality.

  • What is ODIN's battery life?

    ODIN will run for 2 hours in Projector Mode (projector, speakers, and access to Android apps) and 8 hours in Speaker Mode (audio only + Bluetooth). The battery will not be user replaceable.

  • Does ODIN support keystoning?

    ODIN was made for direct straight shots and direct ceiling shots. It does not have keystoning for angles.

  • What is the lifespan of the bulb?

    ODIN's LED lifespan is good for 20,000 hours. This equals 2.25 years of continuous playback.

  • What is the warranty on ODIN?

    ODIN comes with Dos Owls' standard one year warranty on parts and labor for manufacturer defects from the date of shipment.

  • Will I be able to update the version of Android on ODIN?

    Yes. ODIN will ship with KitKat/Android 4.4, but we are designing a software update push through capability. 99.5% is Android. 0.5% is to make it more aesthetically inviting and functional for a big screen experience.

  • Will ODIN be compatible with my country?

    Yes, we will send the correct AC plug for your specified country.

  • Does ODIN support HDCP?

    This is on our roadmap but currently more testing needs to be done.

  • Can I run Steambox on ODIN?

    Unfortunately, no, but we are currently exploring this option for future versions.
story_txt:
Introducing ODIN!
We are excited to share ODIN, the first product from Dos Owls, with the Indiegogo community. Following our succesfull Kickstarter campaign, we're looking to upgrade some of the features in our first device. We'll be going into our first mass production in a few months and with your help, we plan to upgrade the hard drive capacity and include a tripod mount. Together, we will produce the first Android smart-projector that directly projects online content from a compact, battery-operated device allowing sharing and viewing in unlimited ways.

Stretch Goals$75,000: Include tripod mount$175,000: Increase internal storage capacity from 16 GB to 64 GB $300,000: New color

What Can I Do With ODIN?
ODIN is the ideal product for people who consume most of their entertainment using Netflix, Hulu, Amazon, the web and mobile applications. As we consume more information via the Internet, we need a compact, portable device that gives us a large visual display.  

Stream movies from Netflix and Hulu
Access files from Dropbox or Skydrive
Surf the web on a Chrome browser
Use Google Docs and Office 365 to work by connecting a keyboard and mouse
Play Xbox on a big screen
Stream music from your phone to the Bluetooth speakers
Express your creativity in new ways - use as a guide to paint a mural, in an art display, and more
These are just some of the activities you can accomplish with ODIN. We are sure that you will think of thousands of other ways.

Stream and beam Netflix in your living room via ODIN's WiFi. Access to over 1 million apps on the Android ecosystem gives you endless options for online content.




Browse the web or work in Google Docs or Office 365 by connecting a keyboard and mouse (via Bluetooth or USB). Also connect to Dropbox, Google Drive, and other business productivity applications.
Movie night with grandma at the hospital? Easy. Beam Hulu onto a wall and enjoy entertainment in the most unexpected places.


Connect ODIN to an Xbox or/ Playstation and experience game-play in completely new ways.


Create new uses that suit your interests and lifestyle.

How Does ODIN Work?

ODIN combines an Android powered PC, state-of-the-art projector, Bluetooth speakers and WiFi in a compact, portable gadget. It is battery operated and can meet the demands of today's digital consumers and creators who value mobility and freedom.
OPTICAL DISPLAYContains state-of-the-art DMD optical technology that beams powerful LED light and a large screen size. 

Place ODIN 1 yard away from the wall, and it displays a 25” screen size
Place it 10 yards away for a 250" screen size.
ODIN's optical lens is so strong, you can see the projected screen with normal indoor lighting at up to 45" screen size, which is bigger than most flat screen TVs.


KITKAT ANDROID OS
Our intuitive user interface allows for simple navigation and organization of all your apps. ODIN uses a quad-core Android microprocessor and KitKat operating system, which provides access to over 1 million Android apps.  

Home Page (Preliminary)

Settings Page (Preliminary)

CONNECTIVITY
ODIN includes array of connection methods. Built in WiFi wirelessly connects to the Internet as well as a phone’s hotspot. Embedded Bluetooth allows for easy communication between external Bluetooth speakers, keyboard, mouse, and other accessories. ODIN has an HDMI port to connect to XBOX or Playstation, two USB drives for a keyboard, mouse, or flash drives, and a headphone plug.


BLUETOOTH SPEAKERS

ODIN has two play modes:
A: Full projector mode using the projector, speakers and access to Android appsB: Bluetooth speaker mode for streaming music from your phone directly to the two speakers  


ODIN sports two 4-watt Bluetooth speakers (to compare, iPhone 5 has one 0.8 watt speaker).
BATTERY
ODIN's battery provides about two (2) hours of run-time in portable mode. For extended viewing and charging, just connect ODIN to an outlet with the included power cord. 

FUNCTIONAL DESIGN
ODIN is designed with flexibility in mind. Beam onto a wall, or rotate the head 90 degrees and display content on the ceiling for a truly unique viewing experience. (Patent Pending)

COMPACT SIZE
ODIN is lightweight and similarly sized to a typical paperback book. It can be easily carried in your briefcase, tote bag or jacket pocket for portability. It is 6" long, 4.25" wide, 1.8" thick, and weighs 1.7 pounds.


Today's Projector Systems

We think pictures do a much better job than any text.


Live Demo

Inspiring Creativity
There are many artistic and creative uses for ODIN. For example, use it to create murals and other wall art, as part of an interactive art display, or as a backdrop to a party.


DOS OWLS TEAM
ALEX YOO BIO - FOUNDER
Originally from the suburbs of Chicago and currently residing in Bed-Stuy, Brooklyn, Alex Yoo earned his first professional experience in the fast-paced financial world of Wall Street. For five years, he plied his trade diligently at Houlihan Lokey, Nomura Securities and Tri Artisan Partners.
However, he soon grew restless with the repetitive PowerPoint presentations and Excel sheets, so he decided to make a change. His next venture came about as a matter of necessity. A habitual sharp dresser, he’d always had difficulty finding dress shirts that worked for his body frame. He took a bold risk and launched an online custom shirt company called Alexander West. He poured all his energy and resources into the business, and Alexander West is presently an established player in the NYC custom clothing market.
Alex’s newest project is a tech venture called Dos Owls. The idea stemmed from a desire to enjoy his NetFlix/Hulu content on a more compact, multi-functional device. The first Dos Owls product is called ODIN, and it has several distinct features including an Android processor, portable theater-like viewing, wireless connectivity, exceptional sound output and innovative design.

This is on our roadmap but currently more testing needs to be done.

Unfortunately, no, but we are currently exploring this option for future versions.

story:
You can apply Cover X on top of your Macbook Pro like any other cover.

- It has two slots on both sides (only for Macbook 15") where you can easily insert your 2.5" HDD of any size. 

- The internal space is compatible with the most common HDD, from WD to Lacie. 

- There is a secure-cable clip on both sides so the cluttered connection disappears completely. 

- High-quality hard rubber-coated case: it’s ideal for protecting your Macbook from scratches and bumps

Easy. Fast. Useful.

 Inserting and extracting of the HDD is intuitive.

1) Just take the support plate equipped with a tab, 

2) place the HDD on the suction cup, 

3) insert it inside and the magnetic hook, located below the plate, will ensure a firm grip that will prevent falls. 

4) And here it is, put in your bag, travel/walking and get back

*The insertion system is a prototype therefore it may vary in the final product 

Colors and compatibility:

*Other colors will be available in the future

*Compatibility with Macbook Pro 17 "is expected in the future

AVAILABILITY:

We want everything to be perfect, so as a launch window the product will be available and delivered in early 2019.

_______________________________________________________________

Our intention is to market the product online all over the world. 

We strongly believe in this project and we want to make better your work life and your free time. 

That's why we need your support! 

Help us in any way you can, from an offer to a word of mouth!

Thank you so much.

Social link:

https://www.instagram.com/coverx_for_macbook/

https://www.instagram.com/giovannialtrui/

Website (under construction): http://www.coverx.tk

story:
www.iChameleon.org

 

Cable for charge and share data between all devices!

Specifications :

COMPATIBILITY WITH ALL MOBILE DEVICES : iChameleon is adapter with USB fram a side and Micro USB e USB C (for your android) and lightninf (for your Apple devices). You can use this cable with all devices of the world. 

SUPER EASY KEYRING - With the pratical magnet build-in, the cable also becomes a easy keyring.

ONE CABLE TO CHARGE - When you have this cable with you, you do not need anything else! You can charge all your mobile devices.

ONE CABLE TO SHARE DATA - When you have this cable with you, you do not need anything else! You can share data with all your mobile devices.

 

          Compatible 100% with Apple iOS and Android

          Super fast charger and data synchronization

 

   

 

Joined by a great friendship and passion, we have developed various projects, all of great success. Free spirits in an ultra-technological world, we continuously study new cutting-edge solutions, which offer users total freedom, an ideal condition to fully enjoy the potential of all our devices.

story:
Summary


EmotiDial is an extremely compelling and powerful App that empowers any smart phone user to explore what mood his/her friends are in before they dial them.

How often do you dial someone, only to realize it's was not a good time to call. With EmotiDial, you no longer have to be worried about this. Before you dial someone, just check what mood that person is in. Similarly, when you receive a call, the caller's mood will also be indicated, so you decide if you really wish to take that call.

If you are in a mood for a movie, just check who else is in the same mood as you, then dial from within the App, using our innovative Dialer Dashboard. You can update your mood as often as you like  and also design and upload your own moods for private use  - or publish them online for all to use. 

You can also upload all your Contacts on our Cloud and restore them to any phone at any time you wish. Upgrading your phone, or moving across platforms (e.g. from iOS to Android or vice versa)? No worries, just download the EmotiDial App on your new phone and simply LogIn and click on Restore and you are done! No more wasting hours on trying to copy your Address Book to a new phone/OS. EmotiDial makes managing your Contacts a breeze - and does it much more securely too.

Best of all: Not only is this all FREE, its also loads of FUN too! 


Almost 100 default moods to choose from, and counting....


Feel Empowered
Incoming calls from fellow EmotiDial Contacts will indicate both their current mood and  location. Now you decide if you really want to take that call.



One-Touch Dialing, Chat or Messaging 

Click on any Contact in your Address Book and choose how you wish to communicate with them  - a simple voice call, SMS, chat, Viber, Whatsapp, Skype etc. No need to open different Apps separately. 


Design your own Dial-pad 

Choose your style of keys, the color theme, font size and even the type of font you wish to use for the keys on your customized Dial-pad.



Never worry about your Contacts/Address Book ever again

We all change our phones once in a while and the biggest challenge is to transfer or copy our Contacts/Address Book to the new phone. With EmotiDial this is no longer an issue as you can create, backup and restore all your Contacts on and from the Cloud. The EmotiDial cloud also supports restoring Contacts across different Operating Systems; so for instance, if you wish to migrate from iOS to Android, simply backup your Contacts using your iOS Phone, and restore all the Contacts to your new Android.  For added security, you can also backup all Contact data from the Cloud to your own SD Card if you so desire.


Mutilingual

Available today in 24 languages, and we are working hard to add more...


Our Indiegogo Campaign is designed to help make EmotiDial available to everyone globally who has a Smart Phone; and the Funds we raise will help us to specifically achieve the following goals:

  • More quickly migrate from Testing Phase (Beta)  to a fully functional app - that will be available for download globally.
  • Broaden our prospective user-base by adding iOS, Windows and other versions of EmotiDial. Currently we can only support Android, (which is circa 85% of all Smart phone owners).  With your help, we wish to make this available to every smart phone owner in every country in the world.
  • Enable FREE VOIP Calls and Messaging - just like Viber and Whatsapp but with a few fun thrills thrown in. (We wish not to be imitated, so regret we can not disclose all these features here at this time).
  • Offer the world's first "MOSS" feature, or Multi-user Optimized Security Settings  Features to all our Users. If you wish to have your messages deleted upon being read, just select that Option and it will be done. If you wish to save and archive them, or delete them every 24 hours, just a few clicks will do that too, and much more... For the first time ever, you will be able to decide how you wish to manage your communications security. This feature is currently in advanced stages of development by us.
  • Offer EmotiDial in the world's Top 50 languages. Currently we only offer the Top 24 Languages.


The concept of knowing your contacts' /mood before you dial them is the brainchild of Ray Nasir, who now has a "Patent-pending" on this concept and the processes involved. Work on making this concept a reality began in late 2013 and we have gotten thus far making EmotiDial a reality today. Our Team has a life-long passion to help people through technology and whilst EmotiDial is by no means our first such initiative, it is certainly the one we feel that is the most promising  and truly has the potential to some day be even bigger than Facebook, God-willing!


What We Need & What You Get

We estimate that we need about US$150,000 to help us move to the next immediate phase, from where we can then have a sufficiently large user base to generate enough revenues to keep the service live and current. Revenue sources will primarily be Premium subscriptions as well as the non-intrusive banner ads.

EmotiDial is a Freemium App, and we expect over 90% of our Users to be using the Service for Free for life. The remaining 10% will be Premium customers who are willing to pay a small annual fee for extra features that we will offer them. Being realistic, we have incorporated the banner ads from day one, as this helps us to cover some of the costs incurred in offering this service for free.

We are confident of reaching, if not exceeding our goal of raising US$150,000 for this Project. If we exceed this, we can grow faster and make this powerful App available to more people sooner everywhere. If we fail to meet the full goal that we have set, then we will still do the best we can to achieve as many of the tasks we have set ourselves, as possible within whatever amount we do raise. In all cases, we promise we will keep you posted via email, if you so desire.


                                                       

Every contribution made matters, and we are grateful for this. As a humble thank you, your name will be permanently listed on our website for life;  even once we grow bigger than Facebook :)  To be part of something that we hope and believe will someday be on billions of Smart phones globally is not an opportunity to be missed. Ambitious as this may sound, the math behind this ambition is really quite simple: 

  • Facebook is about 1 Billion Users and counting;
  • Total number of cell/mobile phones globally: 6+ Billion; of which Smart phones are almost 2 Billion and counting (growing faster than Facebook's growth rate)
  • Not everybody is on social media, but everybody who has a phone, does dial! With this free App, there is no reason why they would not EmotiDial instead! 


For every contribution made, we have tried to be as fair as we can at this time, and offer various tiers of Premium Membership as generously as we can. 

  • $10  contribution -  One Years FREE Premium Membership
  • $25  contribution -  Two Years FREE Premium Membership
  • $50 contribution -  Five Years FREE Premium Membership
  • $250 contribution -  Life Time FREE Premium Membership
  • $1,000 contribution -  Life Time FREE Premium Membership for you and 5 family/friends

                                                         

Restricted to the first visionary Contributor only, who contributes US$150,000+, we are happy to award him/her a Co-Founder status, with virtually all privileges that come with this. Your contribution will make this all possible much sooner - so it is only fair that you earn this special recognition, because you made it happen! Since we are a bit media shy, we would be delighted for you to take some (or possibly all) of the media attention if you so desire. Who knows what doors this may open for you - especially if EmotiDial someday has billions of users globally. 

If you are contemplating becoming a Co-Founder, please feel free to connect with us first for a conference call - we would be delighted to answer any queries you may have. 


Risks & Challenges

Our software is stable and proven - we run on the world's largest and most stable IT Cloud, and we have a great team. The risks we face as a business is really experiencing exponential growth, commonly seen in many of the popular apps. Whilst our solution is designed to handle exponential growth, we are a small organization and currently lack the financial muscle to finance such rapid growth. There is no shortage of venture capital potentially available to us. However, sadly none of it is at a fair valuation at this time. 

More importantly though, we feel that we want to do this differently and interactively with you - our User-base; and  crowd-funding seems to be the only way. We are confident that once we meet or exceed the goal of raising US$150,000, we will be able to mitigate the risks and challenges that we currently face.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to contribute here at Indiegogo, then worry not. You can also help us by downloading and using the App and asking your friends to do the same too. Sharing this on Facebook, Twitter and other social media sites will also help. 

Please consider sharing it using the share buttons under the video (above) . This will help us a lot to spread the word, and is greatly appreciated.

If that's a tall order too, then I guess you could say a prayer for us....we could do with that too ;)    Thank you.


Connect with us

If you have any queries, comments or suggestions,  please do feel free to email us at: sam@EmotiDial.com. We would be delighted to respond to you as promptly as we can.
story_txt:
Summary






EmotiDial is an extremely compelling and powerful App that empowers any smart phone user to explore what mood his/her friends are in before they dial them.
How often do you dial someone, only to realize it's was not a good time to call. With EmotiDial, you no longer have to be worried about this. Before you dial someone, just check what mood that person is in. Similarly, when you receive a call, the caller's mood will also be indicated, so you decide if you really wish to take that call.
If you are in a mood for a movie, just check who else is in the same mood as you, then dial from within the App, using our innovative Dialer Dashboard. You can update your mood as often as you like  and also design and upload your own moods for private use  - or publish them online for all to use. 
You can also upload all your Contacts on our Cloud and restore them to any phone at any time you wish. Upgrading your phone, or moving across platforms (e.g. from iOS to Android or vice versa)? No worries, just download the EmotiDial App on your new phone and simply LogIn and click on Restore and you are done! No more wasting hours on trying to copy your Address Book to a new phone/OS. EmotiDial makes managing your Contacts a breeze - and does it much more securely too.
Best of all: Not only is this all FREE, its also loads of FUN too! 


Almost 100 default moods to choose from, and counting....




Feel Empowered
Incoming calls from fellow EmotiDial Contacts will indicate both their current mood and  location. Now you decide if you really want to take that call.


One-Touch Dialing, Chat or Messaging Click on any Contact in your Address Book and choose how you wish to communicate with them  - a simple voice call, SMS, chat, Viber, Whatsapp, Skype etc. No need to open different Apps separately.  


Design your own Dial-pad Choose your style of keys, the color theme, font size and even the type of font you wish to use for the keys on your customized Dial-pad.





Never worry about your Contacts/Address Book ever againWe all change our phones once in a while and the biggest challenge is to transfer or copy our Contacts/Address Book to the new phone. With EmotiDial this is no longer an issue as you can create, backup and restore all your Contacts on and from the Cloud. The EmotiDial cloud also supports restoring Contacts across different Operating Systems; so for instance, if you wish to migrate from iOS to Android, simply backup your Contacts using your iOS Phone, and restore all the Contacts to your new Android.  For added security, you can also backup all Contact data from the Cloud to your own SD Card if you so desire.



Mutilingual
Available today in 24 languages, and we are working hard to add more...


Our Indiegogo Campaign is designed to help make EmotiDial available to everyone globally who has a Smart Phone; and the Funds we raise will help us to specifically achieve the following goals:


More quickly migrate from Testing Phase (Beta)  to a fully functional app - that will be available for download globally.
Broaden our prospective user-base by adding iOS, Windows and other versions of EmotiDial. Currently we can only support Android, (which is circa 85% of all Smart phone owners).  With your help, we wish to make this available to every smart phone owner in every country in the world.

Enable FREE VOIP Calls and Messaging - just like Viber and Whatsapp but with a few fun thrills thrown in. (We wish not to be imitated, so regret we can not disclose all these features here at this time).

Offer the world's first "MOSS" feature, or Multi-user Optimized Security Settings  Features to all our Users. If you wish to have your messages deleted upon being read, just select that Option and it will be done. If you wish to save and archive them, or delete them every 24 hours, just a few clicks will do that too, and much more... For the first time ever, you will be able to decide how you wish to manage your communications security. This feature is currently in advanced stages of development by us.
Offer EmotiDial in the world's Top 50 languages. Currently we only offer the Top 24 Languages.



The concept of knowing your contacts' /mood before you dial them is the brainchild of Ray Nasir, who now has a "Patent-pending" on this concept and the processes involved. Work on making this concept a reality began in late 2013 and we have gotten thus far making EmotiDial a reality today. Our Team has a life-long passion to help people through technology and whilst EmotiDial is by no means our first such initiative, it is certainly the one we feel that is the most promising  and truly has the potential to some day be even bigger than Facebook, God-willing!

What We Need & What You Get

Revenue sources will primarily be Premium subscriptions as well as the non-intrusive banner ads.
EmotiDial is a Freemium App, and we expect over 90% of our Users to be using the Service for Free for life. The remaining 10% will be Premium customers who are willing to pay a small annual fee for extra features that we will offer them. story:
You can now connect your iPhone, iPad, or iPod with our Thunder Cable to your MacBook with USB-C ports for syncing and fast charging. Introducing the all-new Thunderbolt technology that is the backbone behind our product. Our cables support super-fast data transfer and charging. This cable can also be used with your Apple 29W, 61W, or 87W USB-C Power Adapter to charge your iOS device, and even take advantage of the fast-charging feature on the 12.9-inch iPad Pro.

Our Type-C to Apple comes as a reversible 3.0 USB cable and 2A current cable. They are not only high-speed data cables, they come with a quick charge capability that allows you to charge your phone within the quickest time possible.

Our Type-C to Apple cable comes in three colours to allow you the option of choice. You can either get a white, a black or a pink one depending on your preference. It is a light PVC weigh at only 32g. It has an impressive 2A current speed.

Be assured of a quality cable that has undergone through the strictest tensile, flexing and bending tests to ensure that you get a product that is up to the highest standards possible. This way, we ensure that you get a durable product that withstands numerous folding.

 

Our cable is long enough and ensures that you do not get restricted to make use of your gadget as you charge it. This way none of your important messages and emails are left responded not responded to.

The fact that the cable comes in a stepped plug design makes it very convenient for you to be able to charge your gadget or even synchronize you two gadgets without having to necessarily remove your devices ’protective case.

It is a cable that not only promises you value for your money, but the service delivery that comes with this cable sets it apart from everything else you have used before.  It is a lightweight PVC coated cable that comes in different colour shades; black, white and a feminine pink rose to make sure whatever you taste , it has been catered for, aesthetics wise. At a 1000mm length, we are sure to make it possible for you to be able to make use of your gadget even when you charge it. As it’s a reversible cable, that allows you to sync data between your two gadgets at a high speed as well as charge your phone very fast through the one of a kind 2A quick charge option. It is a flexible cable that we have made sure that it has gone through vigorous tensile, flexing and bending tests to make sure that the product is a durable. Get yourself our Type-C to Apple cable and you will have gotten more than you have bargained for.

We at DigitStyle LLC, housed in Moscow Russia, believe that anything worth doing is worth doing well. We want to create a top of the line, durable, efficient and cost effective cable for iPhones. DigitStyle LLC is a company, existing for about 5 years now; working with a highly professional and experienced team at the back. Our members are experienced, professional and dedicated, to ensure that our customers get the premium quality of our products. We also produce mobile phone accessories including phone covers, chargers, cables and more.

We have found manufacturing partners in Shenzhen, China. We already have a fully working and tested prototype. We need to crowdfund to proceed with production since it takes a lot of money to produce 50-100 pieces. If backers help us we will able to produce quality cables on a large scales. We plan on accumulating enough resources for mass production by June 2017.The only forcible risk is that we might face a little delay in production due to finalization of capital. But, we expect to make timely delivery in the US.

You can now avail exclusive offers on bulk orders. Pre-order now to save money and avail huge discounts when you order multiple cables from us. This is what we are offering:

Does EZ cable come with Apple MFi certification?

Apple certification for EZ cable is one of the items that we are looking into. Please follow our project for any updates.

story:
What is HugeFlash?

HugeFlash is the of the most affordable external drive for your devices on Android or IOS. Today, there are various models of flash drives, but models from other manufacturers with a capacity of 128, 256 and especially 512 GB are much more expensive than we would like. Fortunately, now you have a HugeFlash - an external drive that is equally suites to a computer, and a tablet or smartphone.

As you can see, there is an existing model of simple body for HugeFlash. We 'll do it because design of copletely new model will increase the price.

How it can be used?

You can store on it your video, photos, music, and share them with your friends. It is indispensable in travel or even on weekends when you need to make a lot of long videos in high quality. You can also backup your data without access to the Internet, because huge flash requires no internet, no charge.

Save & share your files!

No matter what you use: iOS, Android or PC. There are Lightning, USB 3.0 and Micro USB buit-in connectors! Just slide the button up-and-down and select the one that you need.

USB 3.0 can be transformed into Micro USB.

The size that fits

It is not enough that the device to be effective, you need it to be convenient. The smaller the device, the better it is.

 

Three of the most popular colors

Black, gold and silver colors have become classics for electronic devices and they fit most smartphones. 

 

Tens and hundreds of thousands of files in your hands

Huge Flash App: reliable application

А new application will be developed later for HF. Here are the main features:

  • File Manager: multiple file formats to be supported
  • Built in music/movie player
  • Password protected/all data encrypted
  • Backup for iOS devices
  • Internal/External memory capacity display
  • New design: brushed metal

  • Will be offered for free in App Store & Google Play

Update! The following features will be added:

  • Support Touch ID encryption
  • Supports files hidden

 

HugeFlash specifications & features

  • Aviable 128GB / 256GB / 512GB.
  • USB 3.0 flash drive with Apple Lightning, Micro USB connections.
  • Password protected. No charge, no internet required. No battery.
  • Alluminium body, plastic switch.
  • Dimensions: 5.3cm х 2.2cm х 0.7cm / 2.09" х 0.87" х 0.28"

 

Campaign Timeline

August-Semtember: HugeFlash production.
October-November: Shipping to our early backers. 

 

Perks

Super Early Birds

  • $39 -HugeFlash 128GB Super Early Bird (45% off regular IGG)
  • $69 -HugeFlash 256GB Super Early Bird (45% off regular IGG)
  • $119 -HugeFlash 512GB Super Early Bird  SOLD OUT!

Early birds

  • $49 - HugeFalsh 128GB Early Bird
  • $89 - HugeFalsh 256GB Early Bird
  • $125 - HugeFlash 512GB EarlyBird

Family Pack

  • $199 - HugeFlash 128GB 5 pcs.  (50% off regular IGG)

Regular

  • $79  - HugeFlash 128GB
  • $149 - HugeFlash 256GB
  • $199 - HugeFlash 512GB

 

Risks and challenges

No project is without their risk and challenges. Nevertheless , we do our best to minimize the risks. We promise to openly and honestly communicate about any changes in the course of the campaign.

Warranty: 1 year

Color selection: you can not choose the color at the time of purchase, because this would require creating too many perks. Therefore, at the end of the campaign, everyone will receive a message in the mail asking you to choose the color.
