story:
Who We Are

We are a team of devoted developers, called DevLis Innovation, who love to create new things from amazing ideas.
We think that there is something missing in the gaming industry, something that needs to break the limitations that we encounter in most game systems available nowadays. We want to create a new concept of interaction between the gamer and the game itself!

 

What We Need & What You Get

We decided to have this project posted on IndieGoGo.com so we could have a starting point for the development of a production model, but more important, we need to prove that this idea can work and it will help every "game lover" all around the world to benefit even more from their gaming systems.

Just like it was shown in the presentation video, if this idea comes to life, every person will be capable of "pluging in" a powerful controller, the ouPad gamepad, and take the game experience to a whole new level.

We are not only looking for funds, we are also looking for supporters that can help us making this possible. Ideas and "mind support" are welcome and very important to us.

If by some reason we are unable to reach our desired goal, the funds that were acquired by us will be returned to their respective owners.

We will not give up if this happens, but unfortunately we'll not have all the means necessary.

 

The Impact

With the ouPad, any developer or enthusiast will be able to program and create something new for this device, since it will be completely open source! With this amazing capability, new contents will emerge into the game industry, giving anyone a chance to show their idea to the world.

This universal gamepad will be capable of working with any type of game, whether it's new or old, and most of the interfaces or menus that would be hidden to the user will now be present in the palm of their hands.

 

The OUYA Project

The OUYA is one of the best projects that showed up on Kickstarter, an amazing idea, an amazing product, and a nice price!

Now, imagine the OUYA console and our gamepad together...

Do you see the picture?

You get an amazing open source gaming system that will send you to another dimension!

Below there is an example of that, you playing NfS Hot Pursuit in a OUYA console, where the game screen is on the TV and the speedometer is shown in the ouPad gamepad.

 

Prices

We intend to make the ouPad Standard Edition available at a price between the $79 and $99.

The ouPad IndieGoGo Editions will not be for sale.

 

Specifications

  • 4.0 inches capacitive touchscreen (800x480)
  • 1 Ghz processor
  • 512MB RAM
  • 8GB of internal flash storage
  • Retro-illumination
  • WLAN 802.11 b/g/n
  • Bluetooth 4.0
  • USB
  • 9 buttons
  • 2 slim joysticks
  • 1 D-pad
  • Vibration
  • Android OS

 

Thank You

Thank you for being interested in our project!

The final question now is: ARE YOU IN?

 

ouPad: The open source touch gamepad

 

Update #1

We're already making a new prototype, so stay tuned for more!
story_txt:
Who We Are
We are a team of devoted developers, called DevLis Innovation, who love to create new things from amazing ideas.We think that there is something missing in the gaming industry, something that needs to break the limitations that we encounter in most game systems available nowadays. We want to create a new concept of interaction between the gamer and the game itself!
 
What We Need & What You Get
We decided to have this project posted on IndieGoGo.com so we could have a starting point for the development of a production model, but more important, we need to prove that this idea can work and it will help every "game lover" all around the world to benefit even more from their gaming systems.
Just like it was shown in the presentation video, if this idea comes to life, every person will be capable of "pluging in" a powerful controller, the ouPad gamepad, and take the game experience to a whole new level.
We are not only looking for funds, we are also looking for supporters that can help us making this possible. Ideas and "mind support" are welcome and very important to us.
If by some reason we are unable to reach our desired goal, the funds that were acquired by us will be returned to their respective owners.
We will not give up if this happens, but unfortunately we'll not have all the means necessary.
 
The Impact
With the ouPad, any developer or enthusiast will be able to program and create something new for this device, since it will be completely open source! With this amazing capability, new contents will emerge into the game industry, giving anyone a chance to show their idea to the world.
This universal gamepad will be capable of working with any type of game, whether it's new or old, and most of the interfaces or menus that would be hidden to the user will now be present in the palm of their hands.
 
The OUYA Project

The OUYA is one of the best projects that showed up on Kickstarter, an amazing idea, an amazing product, and a nice price!
Now, imagine the OUYA console and our gamepad together...
Do you see the picture?
You get an amazing open source gaming system that will send you to another dimension!
Below there is an example of that, you playing NfS Hot Pursuit in a OUYA console, where the game screen is on the TV and the speedometer is shown in the ouPad gamepad.

 
Prices
We intend to make the ouPad Standard Edition available at a price between the $79 and $99.
The ouPad IndieGoGo Editions will not be for sale.
 
Specifications

4.0 inches capacitive touchscreen (800x480)
1 Ghz processor
512MB RAM
8GB of internal flash storage
Retro-illumination
WLAN 802.11 b/g/n
Bluetooth 4.0
USB
9 buttons
2 slim joysticks
1 D-pad
Vibration
Android OS
 
Thank You
Thank you for being interested in our project!
The final question now is: ARE YOU IN?
 
ouPad: The open source touch gamepad

We're already making a new prototype, so stay tuned for more!

story:
Beacoin

Of late the new bluetooth 4.0 specification has been getting a lot of  hype due to its extremely low voltage specifications and  bluetooth beacon implementation. So we decided to create the Beacoin. This coin sized bluetooth device will act as a beacon for both iOS (iBeacon) and Android. We have decided to open source the SDK for iOS and Android and will be made available on out github page once the funding goal has been achieved. The device will run off a 3V button battery that is designed to last for up to a year.

  • My name is Basil and I am the technical Co-Founder of TECSOL. We started our company in 2009 and are into development of software services related to iOS, Android and Web Applications. We are also into the business of electrical consulting and deal with electrical simulations at the grid level.
  • The current solutions for iBeacon only support iOS and are expensive. iOS implementation only speaks of beacon development between two iOS devices. We are currently developing the SDK to support Android as well. Also there is no need to have an iOS device to act as a transmit beacon. Beacoin will help you setup beacons and you can use our SDK for any custom development that you are looking to deploy. Most beacons available in the market cost 5 times as much. We are looking to pull the cost of the device down.
  • We already have the prototype design that runs on the TI2541 BLE chip on the CC2541DK-MINI - CC2541 Mini Development Kit. It works well on iOS7 and Android devices that support BLE. We have tested it on the iPhone 5, Samsung Galaxy S4 and the iPad Air and are looking to mass produce this device. Our designs are fully verified by TI and we are working closely with the TI engineers to make this happen. We are already a part of the TI development community.
  • Our device will also support firmware upgrades in case the beacon bluetooth profile changes at any time. This will be done with a micro usb connection and software that will be made available once we have reached our goal.


Product Design Concept

Product Use Case

The concept was best explained by Apple during during their developer conference. Here they have used of another iOS device to act as a beacon. Our product eliminates the need of this.



This video only speaks of beacon implementation on iOS. We will be releasing an open source SDK for Android on our github page once we reach the funding goal.


CNET iBeacon Video


iBeacon in the news

  • Forbes - iBeacon and the future of mobile shopping.
  • The Guardian
  • Macrumors
  • Clut of Mac
  • Apple Insider
  • Tech Crunch
  • Business Insider

Current Competitor Ads in the Market







1st Prototype

2nd Prototype

Reference design for production


CC2541 TI BLE 

Competitors

This technology is new and so are our competitors. We believe the price of the device is high and want to enable developers to adopt this technology by getting the device for cheap. 

Here are a list of our competitors.

  • Estimote
  • Radius Networks
  • Shopkick - iBeacon based shopping service

What We Need & What You Get

  • We are looking to raise 28,000.00$ to take this prototype and move it into production, packed and ready for delivery. 
  • Every perk has at least 1 beacoin that will be delivered to you. You should be able to get started by downloading out SDK that will house a lot of examples that will work out of the box.
  • We are looking for a fixed funding. In case we do not reach our goal we will refund the money back to you. We have a working prototype with us. The goal is to enable other developers to benefit from this technology and make exciting products out of them. If we do not reach our goal we cannot manufacture for the indicated price and hence the fixed funding.

Perks

Schedule


The Impact

  • The current devices that are available in the market are bulky and expensive. We are looking to achieve a target price of 8-10$ per beacon.  Our aim is to make the device as cheap as possible so that there is no hesitation in the adoption of this great technology. Our devices will also support firmware upgrades in case there are any changes to the bluetooth profile.
  • For more information about  our company please visit http://www.tecsolsoftware.com 
  • You can visit our github page at https://github.com/basilabbassv/
  • We have given a very simple description because this is a very technical requirement and intended with a target market of developers and service providers who are looking to implement iBeacon. This description is not aimed at end consumers and hence we have not given any design integration in this page apart from the main image.
  • If you have any questions feel free to contact us on basil@tecsolsoftware.com

For more information about  our company please visit http://www.tecsolsoftware.com 


You can visit our github page at https://github.com/basilabbassv/

We have given a very simple description because this is a very technical requirement and intended with a target market of developers and service providers who are looking to implement iBeacon. This description is not aimed at end consumers and hence we have not given any design integration in this page apart from the main image.
If you have any questions feel free to contact us on basil@tecsolsoftware.com

story:
Why an Android App?:

First almost everyone has an old / older android device that they can use to guard their bit coins. Second android devices come in so many sizes and shapes that it makes it harder for hackers to track down and steal the bit coins. Third android devices are able to interface with USB and SD cards as well as other storage media. Fourth there are  less hacks available for android software.

This is a secure online or offline storage app for the Crypto currency Bitcoin. This means that any android device that can run the app can be used to store or create  a secure storage device.

All  versions  have the following basics

8 Character passwords

Secure storage of the bitcoins

Select able storage (choose a location) of the bitcoins (limits based on version)

Ability to add/remove bitcoins

Ability to read qr codes to get a wallet address

Send and receive coins 

Hold bitcoin chain

Detect internet connection (toggle on/off)

Auto email for every login and log out 

Upon log out turns app off.

Store past transactions with ability to password protect the information

Background notifier -the background changes color if the device is connected to the internet.

Log off button (turns off internet all types both wifi and cellular for the device)

Evacuate system Will automatically connect the device to the internet and send the bitcoins to a specified device.(this is heavily coded so that it cannot be changed.)

3 Failed Password attempts causes automatic evacuation (applies to all passwords)

Version 1 

All Basics 

Specifics

Evacuate is set to address before hand evacuated coins are donated to future development address)

Can only save to the device storage 

Standard email only


Version 2 

All basics 

10 Character password

captcha image

Image Password

Standard email with personal message user can add 

Can change storage to MicroSD but file on SD cannot be opened by any program/device other then the one that created it.

Date of last login Password ( If you loged in on sept 21 2013 then the next time they log in they need to put in Sept 21,2013 it will then change to the new date

Evacuate is set to address before hand evacuated coins are donated to future development address)


Version 3 

All basics 

10 Character password

captcha image

Image Password

Standard email with personal message user can add 

Can change storage to MicroSD but file on SD cannot be opened by any program/device other then the one that created it.

Date of last login Password ( If they loged in on sept 21 2013 then the next time they log in they need to put in Sept 21,2013 it will then change to the new date

Can Change Evacuation bitcoin wallet address 


Version 4

All basics 

8 Character min password up to 60 Characters

captcha image

Image Password

Can modify entire email to even add days from the date for extra date security.

Can change storage to MicroSD but file on SD cannot be opened by any program/device other then the one that created it.

Date of last login Password ( If they loged in on sept 21 2013 then the next time they log in they need to put in Sept 21,2013 it will then change to the new date User can toggle this password on or off after passing it the first time Default (00/00/0000)

Can save the bitcoin file to any attachable device but file  cannot be opened by any program/device other then the one that created it.(user can toggle this to allow it to be opened by this software only (with another device. with a 20 character password, captcha image, Image password, Pin, and date creation password)( All of these need to be set at time of creation)( Automatic Evacuation if password fails 2 times and internet connection is detected evac-address is not view able if in any device but original and then only when file is being updated in original device)

Can Change Evacuation bitcoin wallet address 


We need funding to get the final design built

The funds requested will be used to create all of the above secure apps. 

All backers will be able to purchase the apps through this campaign for half the price they will be put on google play and they will get them months before they are ever released publicly.

 The Impact

As governments continue to shift and threaten to fail just adds to bit coins user base. As more and more people move to bitcoins hackers will follow and security become's a must. This software fills that need using a decentralized device base and bank level security makes this the perfect product to protect your Money.

Other Ways You Can Help


  • Please get the word out and make some noise about my campaign.
  • Bitcoin Address for donations: 1Lqi5j6wCEQnuPKzWy5Arfz99PiQNAaa cd
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
earMC is a stylish accessory that provides a solution for out of control earphones.  Hold your earphone wires in place by attaching earMC to a convenient spot on your clothes.

Please like us on Facebook here

  • Transfer the weight of earphone wires away from your ears

  • Small and lightweight

  • Stylish 2 piece design

  • Strong magnetic hold, securely attaches to clothes or other items

  • Easy to store when not in use, just remove from clothes and leave attached to earphones

  • Available in 7 different colors








earMC uses magnetic force to temporarily and securely attach the wire of your earphones to your clothes. This gives you flexibility to choose a convenient location for earMC and easily adjust as needed. The front piece of earMC includes a guiding wire channel which keeps the wire tight and in place. 

Furthermore the front piece is a stylish and decorative accessory that can be changed according to your outfit (please see the accessory packs).



  • We need $5,000 USD for tools and machinery.  

  • The earMC is developed, tested and ready to be sold!


  • WARNING: This product uses powerful magnets which may cause interference with medical devices such as Pacemakers for the heart and should not be used by persons with such devices.

  • Unfortunately we can not ship to Australia and New Zealand due to regulatory reasons.


Even if you can't help us with pledging, please support us by promoting earMC and the video to as many people as possible. We are very grateful to you for sharing and spreading earMC within your network in order to raise awareness.

Thank You!

story:
What if your phone adjusts to you & your posture?

Change your viewing angles Effortlessly!

Phone the Rock does not use Magnet, but just pure physics & the magic of goooood silicone. Phone the Rock rests your phone perfectly whichever angle you choose.

Mother Nature. We love her Curves & Edges. It's the resting place for mocking birds, wind, and us, humans. Inspired by 'Rocks', we designed Phone the Rock for all the multi-taskers, readers, Instagramers, who love the fast access to cell phones.  

Phone the Rock lets you adjust the viewing angels in seconds. Effortlessly. It boosts productivity & efficiency.

Finally, smartphones can be used as DUAL SCREEN. All you have to do it to place your phone on the Phone the Rock. Choose among 5 desired viewing angles. It will adjust to you and your posture.

We are bombarded by all these push notifications and alerts.  

Every time they require our attention, they happen to interrupt our work flow. When it repeats, it gets annoying.

What if we can change the viewing angles effortlessly and instantly. Not only that, what if the phone adjusts to your posture? That's PHONE THE ROCK. 

  

People who need to do multiple jobs at the same time, gets distracted easily. They mostly stop what they are doing when they check smart phones. Because a smart phone should be held with a hand, unlike desktops or laptops, it creates problems. 

Not only does it reduce the efficiency of the work, but also causes frequent breakdown of the cable and ruins tidy interior.

We came up with a cradle that adjusts to the posture/position of YOU as well as optimizing the viewing angle.

Officially Introducing... Phone the Rock.

  

 

Phone the Rock is the main Reward, and yet you can choose to purchase "BLOOM - the most convenient and stylish pencil case ever!" 

  

 

 

"Phone the Rock" is a TOTALLY new cradle for smart phones, designed to improve work efficiency. 

 

JUST place it on Phone the Rock. Its main body is made up of silicone, coated with Non-Slip Surface. (We do not use Cheap Rubber). 

It just works without any glue, magnets, non-slip sticky pads, etc. Silicone, itself, provides the firm grip.

It stands the test of time. Works Effortlessly & Permanently.

 

Choose among 5 viewing angles. Check it Out!

 

Smartphones are designed for our conveniences, yet their extensive usage, especially when sitting at a desk, can lead to various health issues. These include bad posture, stiff neck and back pain. With "Phone the Rock", you can continue using your devices, all while keeping a comfortable and most importantly, healthy posture.

Phone the Rock adjusts to you, your posture, and your habits. You will encouraged to move, adjust, and fidget. All you need to do is to turn Phone the Rock and it will adjust to your current posture EFFORTLESSLY instantly. 

 

Smartphones can be used in any direction, regardless of horizontal or vertical position. 

 

"Phone the Rock" can be used in any direction according to your preferences.

 

Rock Your Cable Management Game

"Phone the Rock" naturally organizes the charging cable. Hide ugly cables underneath; Keep the desk tidy. Level up the organization game. 

 

We believe it's the BEST Docking System, ever invented. 

  Boost Productivity & Efficiency 

 "Phone the Rock" allows you to use both hands to work while still using your smart phone. FREE SECOND SCREEN! 

 

 You will not impede your work efficiency no matter what you do.  

Phone the Rock is Beautiful Everywhere  

  

"Phone the Rock" is made of high-end silicon instead of cheap rubber. It Looks Beautiful Anywhere. 

 

  

  

 

 

 

  

 

 PORTABLITY? DURABILITY?? 

1. It is very PORTABLE as it is made of soft silicone: flexible & durable.

 

2. It stands TALL & STRONG.  

 

3. It is always CLEAN. Simply rinse with water when IF it gets dirty over time. 

  

 Own the Nature. Get All 3 Colors.

Pick the Reward Perk for 3 Rocks! We know you will love it!

The color of 'phone the rock' is composed of sea, sand and rock. 

  

  

  

  

Development  

  

We spent much time in the idea and engineering to design a comfortable angle for eyes to reach without sacrificing the exterior design. 

 

 "Phone the Rock" may look simple in appearance, but we have put a lot of ideas and engineering points into the details of this product. 

 

  

 

  

Bloom is a combination of a pencil holder and a pencil case.
(You can store and carry anything such as cosmetics, play products and other utensils if they are the right size for Bloom)
 

 
It is designed to allow users to pick up their favorite pen in the flow of consciousness without lifting their head while concentrating on their work.
 
 

 
The height of the Bloom is fixed with the height of human eyes considered. Therefore, you can find the pen you want right away from the Bloom while focusing on what you are doing.
 
 
 75º slope of the Bloom makes pens slanted forward so you can use a pen efficiently even without a desk. 
 

  

  

  

They Naturally Fit Your Lifestyle!


 

  

  

Tivit product is built around the idea of changing the world by designing and developing innovative items. One at a time. Check out our upcoming items and their logo.

Kickstarter is a dream platform for product designers/developers like us. We are here to build a community. The TIVIT community to develop interesting concepts & feasible ideas into a group of useful products to improve our lives. We are looking forward to launching 9 upcoming items just like Phone the Rock & Bloom.

Chief Director in Design: Ian Bok

Chief Director in Marketing: Seo, Agnes H.

Phone the Rock.   Phone the Rock is the main Reward, and yet you can choose to purchase "BLOOM - the most convenient and stylish pencil case ever!"     "Phone the Rock" is a TOTALLY new cradle for smart phones, designed to improve work efficiency.  JUST place it on Phone the Rock. Its main body is made up of silicone, coated with Non-Slip Surface. (We do not use Cheap Rubber). It just works without any glue, magnets, non-slip sticky pads, etc. Silicone, itself, provides the firm grip.It stands the test of time. Works Effortlessly & Permanently. Choose among 5 viewing angles. Check it Out! Smartphones are designed for our conveniences, yet their extensive usage, especially when sitting at a desk, can lead to various health issues. These include bad posture, stiff neck and back pain. With "Phone the Rock", you can continue using your devices, all while keeping a comfortable and most importantly, healthy posture.Phone the Rock adjusts to you, your posture, and your habits. You will encouraged to move, adjust, and fidget. All you need to do is to turn Phone the Rock and it will adjust to your current posture EFFORTLESSLY instantly.  Smartphones can be used in any direction, regardless of horizontal or vertical position.  "Phone the Rock" can be used in any direction according to your preferences. Rock Your Cable Management Game"Phone the Rock" naturally organizes the charging cable. Hide ugly cables underneath; Keep the desk tidy. Level up the organization game.  /figure>We believe it's the BEST Docking System, ever invented.   Boost Productivity & Efficiency  "Phone the Rock" allows you to use both hands to work while still using your smart phone. FREE SECOND SCREEN!   You will not impede your work efficiency no matter what you do.  Phone the Rock is Beautiful Everywhere    "Phone the Rock" is made of high-end silicon instead of cheap rubber. It Looks Beautiful Anywhere.             PORTABLITY? DURABILITY?? 1. It is very PORTABLE as it is made of soft silicone: flexible & durable. 2. It stands TALL & STRONG.   3. It is always CLEAN. Simply rinse with water when IF it gets dirty over time.    Own the Nature. Get All 3 Colors.Pick the Reward Perk for 3 Rocks! We know you will love it!The color of 'phone the rock' is composed of sea, sand and rock.         Development    We spent much time in the idea and engineering to design a comfortable angle for eyes to reach without sacrificing the exterior design.   "Phone the Rock" may look simple in appearance, but we have put a lot of ideas and engineering points into the details of this product.       Bloom is a combination of a pencil holder and a pencil case.(You can store and carry anything such as cosmetics, play products and other utensils if they are the right size for Bloom) 
 
It is designed to allow users to pick up their favorite pen in the flow of consciousness without lifting their head while concentrating on their work.
 
 


 
The height of the Bloom is fixed with the height of human eyes considered. Therefore, you can find the pen you want right away from the Bloom while focusing on what you are doing.
 
  75º slope of the Bloom makes pens slanted forward so you can use a pen efficiently even without a desk.        They Naturally Fit Your Lifestyle!
     Tivit product is built around the idea of changing the world by designing and developing innovative items. One at a time. Check out our upcoming items and their logo.

Kickstarter is a dream platform for product designers/developers like us. We are here to build a community. The TIVIT community to develop interesting concepts & feasible ideas into a group of useful products to improve our lives. We are looking forward to launching 9 upcoming items just like Phone the Rock & Bloom.
Chief Director in Design: Ian Bok
Chief Director in Marketing: Seo, Agnes H.

story:
Protect your MacBook, protect your health—iSafer can do more than other laptop sleeves. As well as being waterproof and shockproof, it blocks harmful radiation and cools down heat buildup. All in one light, slim and attractive zippable sleeve. The patented technology in our product is truly unique is its category.

 

Ultimate protection for both MacBooks and their users

We all enjoy the fun and convenience of our MacBooks, but our aim is to make the experience even better. We want to protect the important things in our life. Our MacBooks deserve proper protection... but isn't protecting ourselves even more important?

Research has suggested that close contact between the human body and Wi-Fi radiation can be harmful to the urinary system and causes lower fertility rates. Heat is another issue, as it shortens the life of laptops and also causes itchiness to your skin. See what the press is saying:

  
 
 

Heat & radiation insulation—Putting it to the test 

iSafer presents a simple, compact and integrated solution to users. It is waterproof and shockproof, with a built-in multi-functional pad that can lower device temperature, block heat and Wi-Fi radiation. Our built-in, proprietary X-filament pad can effectively circulate thermal heat and block radiation from electronic devices. See the blue areas in the test results in the chart below? The larger blue areas indicate less heat and less radiation. 

 
 

Tests were performed in an indoor environment, at a room temperature of 29°C. After running for 2 hours, the laptop temperature went up to around 42°C. With iSafer padding, users would only feel temperatures of around 34-36 °C, which is almost the same as human body temperature. 

Did you know that by running your laptop for 1 hour, you are actually producing 0.0189kg of carbon?  Even more if you are using an external USB cooling fan. The iSafer sleeve bag is an easy way to lower laptop temperature without the need for electricity. Let's assume you use your MacBook 5 hour per day... you will save 16.425kw of electricity and 10.34775kg of carbon daily!

In the radiation test, we used mobile phones, Wi-Fi devices and microwaves as test subjects.

In all the devices, iSafer successfully blocked 99% of the radiation without affecting Wi-Fi connection speeds. 

 
Water & shockproof

We have all made stupid mistakes in life, like falling out of bed trying to turn off an alarm, or spilling a glass of water next to a keyboard... iSafer has you covered against such slip-ups! It is designed with a special water repellent surface fabric—the kind used in wetsuits, actually. The Chloroprene rubber sponge also offers great protection for your MacBook from shocks and scratches.

  

Quality construction

Besides providing built-in health features to notebook users on the go, the iSafer sleeve also functions beautifully as a durable and attractive ‘standard’ laptop case. The attention to construction quality that our team has put into the crafting of this product is evident at first glance. The unique eco-sponge material not only offers unparalleled protection from both water spills and impact damage—it is also pleasant to use and touch, providing a comfortable degree of soft yet firm elasticity and grip.

Designed to be environmentally friendly

We are committed to developing a safe product that does not contain any hazardous materials. We also care about environmental sustainability. The iSafer sleeve has passed the following regulations:

  • Green material
  • ULC
  • Oeko-tex Standard
 
Our carefully-selected materials are certified by:
  • RoHs (Restriction of Hazardous Substances)
  • CPSIA (Consumer Product Safety Improvement Act)
  • PAHs (Polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbon) (less than 10mg/kg in sum of all PAHs)
  • REACH (Registration, Evaluation, Authorization and Restriction of Chemicals) 
 

Slim & compact design

iSafer can be used open or folded on your lap or at a desk. An ultra-slim profile and light weight make it easy to stow away in a backpack or luggage. 

 

Attractive shell design

We selected a stylish yet low-key Paisley pattern for our product debut. This design has its roots in Asian culture, and is associated with eternity and life—echoing the eco-friendly philosophy of our brand. The pattern was printed on non-hazardous substances and uses advanced printing technologies to ensure its duration and colorfastness.

 

PERKS: Available packages  

  
 
 

Who we are 

Gracio is the company behind the iSafer multi-functional, protective laptop bag product. We are a unique new breed of Taiwanese company  dedicated to the research of special materials and new processing technologies to generate innovative, useful, aesthetic and environmentally-friendly product designs. With a powerful industrial technology background, we provide world-class R&D, production, logistic and service capabilities.

 

MacBook version available now!

Our design is complete, and we've already successfully established the tooling and manufacture supply chain process. We're ready to fulfill our dream of getting iSafer out there to everyone! But to do this, we have to meet our suppliers’ minimum order requirements, which is usually 500 sets minimum. If we can raise 500 orders, then our dream can become a reality! We are extremely excited about the potential of our product, and are looking forward to creating a broad user base and hearing your feedback.

iSafer is a unique "UK-designed, Taiwan-built" product that we have been been working on for two years, striving to find the perfect combination of materials to create the best possible experience for users. We have now reached the point where we feel we have successfully created a product that will benefit you and integrate seamlessly into your on-the-go lifestyle. We are happy, proud and fully ready to bring it to market. 

 

Production plan

PRODUCT 

We have taken the following steps to ensure that we deliver the best quality product: 

  • Made design refinements to enhance the user product experience. 
  • Extensively tested products for performance and durability. This includes manufacturing the materials to meet safety and performance standards.

MANUFACTURING 

We have established solid relationships with experienced contract manufacturers to mitigate the risk of delays by material suppliers and to ensure quality control is implemented to the highest level. We have built golden samples with our manufacturers and they fully understand our product, specifications and production timelines.

SHIPPING DATES 

We have taken manufacturing processing times into account and are confident we will ship by the projected dates. If, by any chance, things take longer than planned, we will promptly keep you informed.

  • Early bird estimated delivery: Oct 2013
  • Select estimated delivery: Nov 2013
 

Thank you!

Your contribution is crucial in helping us to launch our product. We hope you will join us, contact us and share us with your friends. Thanks in advance for your contribution and for taking the time to learn about iSafer, we really appreciate it!

Your funds will help us:

  • Gather enough funding to start production tooling charges.
  • Achieve sufficient shipping quantities to produce tooling for molded parts.
  • Order the materials for our first project production run.
  • Package and ship iSafer to your doorstep!

 

Comments,Question,Partnerships?

Please use the comment section, chat with us online, or email us: isafer.gracio@gmail.com  And a final thank you to our current partners & contributors! 

 

FAQ

Q: Will iSafer obstruct the USB port, adapter or any other external devices?

A: No, there is no port interference when using your MacBook on the iSafer pad.

Q: Can I wash my iSafer bag? How should I clean it?

A: Gently wipe the surface with a clean, dampened cloth and a natural detergent.

 

Tips to keep your iSafer sleeve bag clean and neat:

1. Avoid contact with sharp objects to avoid cuts and scratches on your iSafer sleeve bag.

2. Avoid folding the sleeve bags for too long, to prevent unwanted fold marks on the surface.

story:
HTML Editor Sample Page

... For the benefits of some who doesn't really understand a  3D Printer ..


I have found a short animated film for you. This animated film is created by "funk-e Studios":


... Why such an affordable 3D Printer? :)

3D printers can bring about changes, such as crafting ideas into tangibles, schools use them to evoke creativity in students, personalizing gifts, printing houses, and much more. But generally speaking, only those with cash to spare can afford to pay an exorbitant price for the 3D printers.


     Therefore, we are here to...

     

  • share what the world brings to us, to everyone.
  • do our little part to "affortify creativities".
  • TWO goals to achieve in this Short Term: To bring you affordable PrinterM3 in hope to invoke creativity and fun in our stressful lives; To make profit to start a neuron-related business for ourselves.

...Ah! And the love story I am supposed to tell.


Maybe bring forth some love, to your classmates in need... Perhaps some simple can't afford it.


Where will the monies go to and what was done thus far?

 

For all the 3D Printernias, we knows the cost down to the screws used, and we have to thank the Internet for this. By looking at the price-tags we have put on, I believe you know our profit margins are really minimal. 

For all the kind souls out there, please kindly spread the words on our behalf!

We have chosen the All-or-Nothing scheme, as we would like to see a project from the beginning to end. Also, we have done up contract with the manufacturer, so that the pledges would not be disappointed of not receiving their rewards (except for Acts of gods etc).

     


                                              Here are some pictures:

 

White PrintM3 are our elegance series, productions for this series will be higher than the futuristic Matt Black with slightly-illuminating glo


Oh! I must say this, The Logo, that you see above were slanted, but on purpose, because we have a surprise for supporter... OH BUT WELL, MIGHT as well put it right upfront: As we mentioned earlier that we went all out for this Indiegogo's campaign, so we had wanted to metal stamp PrintM3's logo, and the flipped slipped side would be Indiegogo's PLUS a number. Number represents who is the No. 1 buyer or no. 13 etc...



Specifications and others...

  • Note: Colours may differ from what you see in these pictures as suppliers mentioned that these are a mock up via computer.

  • Height of printer: 520mm/ Diameter: 300mm

  • Triaxial Itinerary of X, Y and Z:  200mm, 200mm, 220mm

  • Print Precision/ Print Thickness: 0.1mm to 0.3mm (added 09/06/14)

  • X, Y, Z axis positioning resolution: 0.01mm

  • Printing area is 220mm height/ 200mm Diameter

  • Printing speed: 4800mm per minute (plus/ minus)
     
  • Maximum Temperature: 255 deg cel.
     
  • One Printing Head; Printing Nozzle Diameter 0.4mm [Note: 0.5mm to 1mm interchangeable on your own]

  • PLA and ABS compatible 1.75mm+-0.1mm

  • Filament colors avail: White, Black, Red, Green, Yellow, Blue, Purple, Silver, 
    Gold, Orange, Silver, transparent, brown, luminous green, pink, grey. [Note: for simplicity reasons, the free filament(s) that comes with it are choose randomly]

  • Compatible with Windows 7, Vista, Linux, Mac-ox, XP, 8

  • SD card; STL format.

 

I'll update again, when more information comes along.

story:
What is Gaday.net
Gaday.net is random anonymous chat, but it is slightly different from other chats we may already know.
Gaday.net allows users to rate the person they’ve been chatting with to prevent situations known from other websites of this type where nine out of ten randomly chosen users are jokers, perverts or bots.
Gaday.net doesn’t require any registration but we found an effective way to identify the users. This allows rating a particular user. Collecting a number of negative ratings bans a user from chat temporarily. A banned user will need to solve an anti-spam token to be able to use chat again. If the same user will collect another particular number of negative ratings it will block the user permanently from using our service. On the other hand, collecting positive ratings eliminates negatives and lets the user to chat without any restrictions.
Another thing that makes gaday.net different form other chat services is stating your own sex is compulsory. You don’t need to choose the other chat user sex, but before you can enter a chat room you need to state yours. If you want to chat with man / woman only you may select one and you will be assigned to the other user with chosen by you sex.
One more difference is choosing the language you want to talk in. It is quite common that on Omegle you are connected with the person talking in another language that you don’t know. In gaday.net you choose the language you want to talk in and only users who talk this language will be connected with you. It doesn’t matter if you speak English, German, Polish or Spanish .We will find someone speaking in the language you can easily communicate in.

What is the money needed for?
We are looking for funds to prepare a mobile app for all popular mobile operating systems(iOS, Android, Symbian and Windows Mobile).Preparing a native application for those systems will cost around 10k $
Gaday.net has been born form an idea for mobile application. We think it is the ideal idea for mobile users. It doesn’t matter where you are ( a bus, boring meeting at work, or relaxing at your favorite armchair after work) ,you can meet and chat to someone interesting. As a mobile application we can also use such mobile features as GPS, compass and camera. With users’ permissions, we want a mobile application to find other chat users close to them using a GPS or let them choose areas from a map where to look for chat users they want to talk to.  
We think about two types of application: Basic and Premium. Premium application will not contain any adverts. We need adverts in the basic version of application to maintain high standards of servers and application performance.
The web version of gaday.net is working now. The project has been made by a team of three people. We spent a lot of our time and our own money, but funding the developing of mobile application is out of our reach but we really want it to be as good as our idea.

Why we did not add promotion video?

We could make a nice and interesting video for this project
but we decided not to wast the time for something that doesn't make the idea any better.
Instead in our opinion it's better to gain funds as soon as possible
and start working on mobile application so everyone can enjoy the chatting anywhere you are.

Premium application will not contain any adverts. We need adverts in the basic version of application to maintain high standards of servers and application performance.The web version of gaday.net is working now. The project has been made by a team of three people. We spent a lot of our time and our own money, but funding the developing of mobile application is out of our reach but we really want it to be as good as our idea.
Why we did not add promotion video?
We could make a nice and interesting video for this projectbut we decided not to wast the time for something that doesn't make the idea any better.Instead in our opinion it's better to gain funds as soon as possibleand start working on mobile application so everyone can enjoy the chatting anywhere you are.

story:
HaloLight in short.

Started by five MSc students from the University of Amsterdam, the HaloLight quickly emerged from idea to testable prototype. As young entrepreneurs, we strongly believe that we are able to help the world use it's resources more efficiently. Too often people just go out and acquire new electronic devices, when they can easily use devices they already possess for the same purpose. This is creating unnecessary electronic waste and we believe much of it can be prevented.  

Our solution to this problem is to build and design complementary products to already much used electronical appliances. Our first design focusses on lighting. Who does not use their smartphone to light those places where no light is available or the availability of light-sockets is compromised? Our Halo Light uses an intricate system of mirrors to reflect the flashlight to the entire room, without the use of light sockets, cables or light bulbs. Just use your smartphone!

What We Need & What You Get

We have people from different disciplines such as product design, marketing and finance. Right now we are looking for seed funding to get the design finalized and cover the costs of initial production.

For each pledge we offer you a personalized HaloLight, with different finishes possible.

The Product

We realized a new docking station for a smartphone that also functions as a decorative light by using the phone’s flash. The docking station is wireless, portable and contains no electronic components. The smartphone and the docking station are complementary to each other. The phone's flash is LED, which is extremely durable and energy efficient. The docking station will not fill a whole room with light but should be seen more as a mood or ambient light. It could also perfectly work as a reading light. Other potential functions could be some sort of wake up light. In combination with an app, the brightness of the flash could gradually increase before your alarm clock goes off. Another potential the docking station has is that it could also function very well for people who love to go camping, since it is ultra portable and wireless.

NOTE: Please make sure to add shipping.

NL: $8
EU: $15
USA: $20

story:
(guarda più sotto per il testo in italiano...)

 

Hi,

My name is Giacomo, I'm the founder of designerwannabe.com and I'm here to introduce you to our new project, Scaleno.

Our company acts as an online platform where small companies can meet young and talented designers. Over the past 8 months we've received several interesting proposals from our community members but we fell in love with one, Scaleno. The designer is called Giulia and we want to take her project further.

Scaleno is an iPhone docking station made entirely out of wood using a unique technology. Scaleno is shaped to passively amplify the audio coming out of the integrated speaker and to redirect it towards you. Scaleno is also designed to allow the original charging cable to be connected while listening to your favorite music. On top of that, Scaleno will also act as a perfect hands-free speaker for your calls, keeping your ears away from potentially harmful waves!

We created Scaleno working alongside Giulia, a young and talented Italian designer, and a small artisan company with a huge know-how thanks to hundreds of years of experience in woodcarving.

Our mission is to emphasize the value of made in Italy, investing in young designers and discovering smaller companies with excellent craftsmanship. Things that our country is famous for, but are far too under-utilised in today's market.

 

Who we are

Giacomo: After a brilliant career in the communication industry, Giacomo decided to start his own business 1 year ago. Today he works alongside different companies creating new ideas and helping innovate their portfolio.

Alessandra: After years working as an interior designer and an architect (and after giving birth to 2 beautiful babies) Alessandra joined Giacomo into his adventure. Today Alessandra is assisting Giacomo in his daily activities.

Giulia: Youngest of the team, she is already an award winning industrial designer.

 

What will we do with the raised money?

Now, in order to make the difference, we need your help. With your contribution we’ll be able to:
- Produce our first round of Scaleno
- Give Scaleno the packaging it deserves
- Promote Scaleno into shops and build an e-commerce

 

What you get? Perks!

Every little helps, so we are glad to accept offers for as low as $1 (yes, $1). If you pledge $1 your name will appear on our “Thank you” page on www.scaleno.it . Of course we’ll be happy if you will contribute more, and we want to reward the ones that believe in us.

If you pledge $10, we’ll email you a PDF version of a Scaleno papercraft, customized with your name. You can then cut it and build it to remember about us. You can cut and build as many paper Scalenos as you want!!

When you pledge $59 for our Early Bird Special, or $69 later, you’ll receive one piece of our first batch of Scaleno. You can choose between one of the following wood types:

Maple

Mahogany

Beech

Durmast

Cherry

Ash

Walnut

For $64 if you’re quick, or for $79 if you’re not, you can get one piece of our first batch of Scaleno but you’ll be able to customize it engraving your choice of text on 2 lines (max 30 characters per line).

If you pledge $69 you can also take advantage of our Limited Edition. Limited Edition’s Scaleno’s will be numbered and signed individually by our designer, Giulia. Those units will also be built with untreated arolla pine wood, which is a typical Dolomites wood, very light and flavorful. This type of wood will never be used again to build Scaleno, so that yours will be a really unique piece.

For more, you can get more Scalenos and we are happy to supply shops for larger quantities.

 

Want to help but have no cash?

We would be really grateful if you could help us spread the word about this campaign, so please use the share buttons to tell your audience about us!

 

Scaleno’s specs

Works with Apple iPhone 3GS, 4, 4S, 5*

Size HxWxL: 170mm x 80mm x 93mm

Weights:   Arolla Pine 80grams

                Maple 130gr.

                Light Maple 130gr.

                Mahogany 150gr.

                Beech 150gr.

                Durmast 150gr.

                Cherry 120gr.

                Ash 160gr.

                Walnut 140gr.

*with the new iPhone 5 it is not possible to use the standard cable due to length of its connector.

 

THANK YOU!

 

**************************************************************

 

Ciao,

Il mio nome è Giacomo, sono il fondatore di designerwannabe.com e sono qui per presentarvi il nostro nuovo progetto, Scaleno.

La nostra azienda ha sviluppato una piattaforma che mette in contatto aziende manifatturiere medio-piccole con giovani designer di talento. Negli scorsi 8 mesi abbiamo ricevuto numerose proposte interessanti dai membri della nostra community, ma ci siamo innamorati di una, Scaleno. La designer che lo ha creato si chiama Giulia e vogliamo trasformare questo progetto in realtà.

Scaleno è una docking station per iPhone costruita interamente in legno a partire da un unico pezzo con una tecnologia unica. La particolare forma di Scaleno amplifica passivamente il suono proveniente dall’altoparlante del telefono e lo ridirige verso l’ascoltatore. Scaleno è inoltre progettato per ospitare il cavo di ricarica originale Apple, tenendo il telefono in carica durante l’ascolto delle tue canzoni preferite. Inoltre, Scaleno è un perfetto accessorio per telefonare in viva-voce con le mani libere e un suono chiaro.

Abbiamo creato Scaleno grazie all’aiuto di Giulia, una giovane designer di talento, ed una piccola realtà artigiana con un enorme know-how dovuto a generazioni di esperienza nella lavorazione del legno.

La nostra missione è di proporre prodotti Made in Italy investendo in giovani designer e cercando di scoprire piccole eccellenze artigiane. Design e artigianato, fattori per cui il nostro paese è famoso nel mondo!

Chi siamo:

Giacomo: Dopo aver condotto una brillante carriera nel settore della comunicazione, Giacomo ha deciso di iniziare la sua avventura imprenditoriale poco meno di un anno fa. Oggi collabora con diverse aziende assistendole nella fase di creazione di nuove idee ed aiutandole ad innovare il loro portfolio.

Alessandra: Dopo aver lavorato per alcuni anni come interior designer e come architetto (e dopo aver dato alla luce due bellissimi bimbi), Alessandra si è unita a Giacomo nella sua avventura. Oggi lo assiste nella gestione delle relazioni con i designer e con i clienti.

Giulia: La più giovane del team, ha già vinto dei concorsi nel campo del design industriale.

Cosa faremo con la somma raccolta?

Ora, per fare la differenza, abbiamo bisogno del vostro aiuto. Con i vostri contributi saremo in grado di:

-       Produrre il primo lotto di Scaleno

-       Produrre il packaging che Scaleno merita

-       Realizzare un e-shop e promuovere scaleno presso negozi del settore

Quali ricompense?

Anche 1$ ci è utile, quindi non ci sono scuse J Con un’offerta di almeno 1$ il vostro nome sarà pubblicato nella pagina dei ringraziamenti sul nostro sito www.scaleno.it. Ovviamente saremo ben felici di accettare donazioni più importanti, ed ecco cosa vi aspetta in questo caso:

Se doni 10$ ti invieremo una versione cartacea di Scaleno, personalizzata con il tuo nome, da tagliare, piegare ed incollare. Potrai tagliarne e costruirne quanti vorrai per ricordarti sempre di noi.

Se contribuisci con 59$, per uno dei primi 50pezzi o 69$ successivamente, riceverai uno Scaleno del nostro primo lotto. Potrai scegliere tra le seguenti essenze di legno:

 

Acero

Mogano

Faggio

Rovere

Ciliegio

Frassino

Noce

Per 64$ se sei veloce, o per $79 se non lo sei, potrai avere uno Scaleno personalizzato con due linee di testo incise (massimo 30 caratteri per linea).

Se doni 69$ puoi ricevere un pezzo della nostra Limited Edition di Scaleno. L’edizione limitata sarà realizzata in cirmolo non trattato, un legno tipico delle nostre montagne. Ogni esemplare sarà numerato e firmato da Giulia, la nostra designer. Con il legno di cirmolo verrà realizzata solo questa seria limitata e non verrà più utilizzato per produrre altri pezzi cosicché il tuo pezzo sia davvero unico.

Per contributi ancora maggiori, potrai ricevere maggiori quantità di Scaleno e saremo felici di fornire grandi quantità con i pacchetti per negozi.

Tabella di conversione dollari-Euro $/€:

Per noi europei, abituati ad utilizzare gli Euro, una tabella che ti aiuterà a capire quanto valgono le diverse donazioni:

1$ = 0,80€ (ti costerebbe di più offrirci un caffè!!)

10$ = 8€

59$ = 45,50€

64$ = 49,30€

69$ = 53,10€

79$ = 60,80€

135$ = 103,90€

149$ = 114,70€

399$ = 307€ (30,70€ a pezzo)

759$ = 584€ (29,20€ a pezzo)

E se non riesco a donare?

Puoi aiutarci lo stesso. Ti saremmo davvero grati se deciderai di condividere questa campagna sui social network e con le persone che pensi possano apprezzarla. Utilizza i pulsanti di condivisione e fai in modo che tante persone sappiano di noi!

Specifiche:

Funziona con Apple iPhone 3GS, 4, 4S, 5*

Dimensioni (Altezza x Larghezza x Lunghezza): 170mm x 80mm x 93mm

Peso:    Cirmolo 80grammi

            Acero 130gr.

            Mogano 150gr.

            Faggio 150gr.

            Rovere 150gr.

            Ciliegio 120gr.

            Frassino 160gr.

            Noce 140gr.

*Attenzione: con iPhone 5 le dimensioni del cavo non permettono di utilizzare Scaleno con il telefono in carica.

 

GRAZIE!!

story:
WHAT IS BARK ARCADE?

The Bark Arcade is an online platform for HTML5 games played directly in your browser. The admission gives you access to the complete game collection. A special controlling system allows you to play the games on a big screen, using your smartphone or tablet device as a controller. Ultimately, the Web Arcade presents not only a low priced alternative to conventional online game stores, but also to regular game consoles. 

PLAY AWESOME HTML5 GAMES ON YOUR BIG SCREEN
USE YOUR TABLET, SMARTPHONE OR COMPUTER AS A CONTROLLER
PLAY HOT MULTIPLAYER MATCHES

The platform gives you immediate access to all featured games, without needing to download them separately. There will also be an App provided, which enables you to play on a big screen, using your smartphone or tablet device as a controller. This makes playing HTML5 games into a whole new experience.

 

KEY FEATURES

  • HTML5 games platform
  • Social payment support for game developers
  • Mobile devices as controller
  • Customizable game controller
  • Hotseat multiplayer matches in the Browser
  • Everything is in the browser: Desktop, Notebooks and Tablets can be used for the game or as controller either

 

HTML5

HTML5 is an upcoming technology, also for game development. With more and more developers, the community is growing constantly. However, HTML5 games are still kind of rare. So after developing a HTML5 game for iOS, I couldn’t help but wonder: why aren’t more developers using this convenient technology?

What is missing, is an online platform with a correspondant payment model, where indie games can be released for free and still make money.

 

CONTROLLER

Your smartphone is your controller and thus has many more capabilities that can be used to enchance your gaming experience. Each game can provide it's own controller layout or use one of the standard controller provided by the platform. It can interact with the controller, changing whats displayed or even how things work while the game is running. All this is done in simple HTML and Javascript.

 

TIME BASED SOCIAL PAYMENT MODEL

The admission is based on a monthly payment of $2, but can be increased voluntarily. It allows access to the complete game collection in the library.

The games played by a user are being tracked, so that these games can take share in the sales according to the play time. 60% of the total income will be distributed among the game developers, 40% will be used for server costs, platform-development and -service.

 

SUPPORTED GAMES ON RELEASE

Game developers will not only take share in the earnings, but will also be promoted on the platform. Therefore, we are confident of finding studios which will provide their games. At least, we will support a few nice HTML5 open source games, like Emberwind HTML5, and our own games, like Steamclash.

 

WHAT WE NEED YOU FOR

With your help, we could employ two developers (Malte and Philip) to get the Bark Arcade started. After a first alpha version with correspondent API, the next steps would be:

  • Setting up server structures
  • Development of the Bark Network
  • Further development of the API
  • Further development of Controller Apps for Android and iOS
  • Optional Desktop Apps

 

PERKS

Free access

All donations above $2 gives you free access to Bark Arcade for a period of time. In comparison, the regular minimum monthly admission to the platform is $2.

Premium contributor status

On top of that, you will permanently have the premium contributor status, which gives you an extra contributor badge in highscores and ladders, yearly exclusive premium ingame material and features, like extra characters and levels. It will also show other players that you supported the project from the beginning in your profile.

Closed beta

And of course, you will get the closed beta version of the Bark Arcade as soon as it’s out. This won’t only help us to refine the product, but it will also give you the opportunity to check out the whole thing.

Signed T-shirt

All donations of $64 and more will be given a Bark Arcade T-shirt, signed exclusively by Malte!

You telling the game advice

The $256 “You telling the game advice” perk offers a personal thank you from us by mentioning your name in the loading screens. Your picture and name will randomly be shown next to the game advice speech balloon for the Bark Arcade games.

 

IF WE GET MORE

In case we raise more than our goal of $16.000, we contemplate on what we could further develop - purely hypothetical.

Above $30.000: We will produce a free to play game for Bark Arcade.

Above $40.000: We will support Windows Phone 8

Above $50.000: We will support offline games.

Above $150.000: We will develop a set-top box for Bark Arcade!

 

RISKS

Since this is a fixed funding, there will be no risk for you in making a donation. In the case of not reaching our goal, you will get your money back.

If we achieve our goal, you will naturally get your perks. However, we are not sure how long it will take to launch the beta version, but we are confident that it will take no longer than six months after the successful funding.

In order to use Bark Arcade, you need a WiFi connection. Modern home WiFis are stable and fast enough.

 

TIMELINE

  • January 2013 – crowdfunding finished
  • January 2013 – Beginning of work: development of Beta version, servers ect.
  • July 2012 - Closed Beta
  • October 2012 - Release and start of the contributor memberships

 

FOR GAME DEVELOPERS

We are always on the lookout for new contacts and ideas. If you are a developer and interested in the project, we would love to hear from you so why don’t you give us a shout!

In addition to the input and network API, we also plan to provide cool game APIs for highscores, ladders, achievements and eventually even online games. Yay!

Please take note that we will need the money raised by this campaign for developing and for server structures. That is to say that any income can only be distributed to game developers after new memberships have been created.

However, the advantage of publishing a game in an early stage is that your game will be promoted and established on the platform from the start on.

 

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

Network

  • Fast default home WiFi

Desktop System

  • Dual Core, 2x1Ghz
  • 1 GB Ram
  • Graphics card
  • Windows, Mac or Linux

Desktop Browser (Windows, Mac, Linux)

  • All browser supporting WebRTC like Firefox
  • Bark Arcade Browser

Mobile Browser (Android, iOS)

  • Bark Arcade App (recommended)
  • All WebRTC supporting Browsers

 

ANY QUESTIONS?

contact us!
story_txt:
WHAT IS BARK ARCADE?
The Bark Arcade is an online platform for HTML5 games played directly in your browser. The admission gives you access to the complete game collection. A special controlling system allows you to play the games on a big screen, using your smartphone or tablet device as a controller. Ultimately, the Web Arcade presents not only a low priced alternative to conventional online game stores, but also to regular game consoles. 
PLAY AWESOME HTML5 GAMES ON YOUR BIG SCREEN USE YOUR TABLET, SMARTPHONE OR COMPUTER AS A CONTROLLER PLAY HOT MULTIPLAYER MATCHES
The platform gives you immediate access to all featured games, without needing to download them separately. There will also be an App provided, which enables you to play on a big screen, using your smartphone or tablet device as a controller. This makes playing HTML5 games into a whole new experience.

 
KEY FEATURES

HTML5 games platform
Social payment support for game developers
Mobile devices as controller
Customizable game controller
Hotseat multiplayer matches in the Browser
Everything is in the browser: Desktop, Notebooks and Tablets can be used for the game or as controller either
 
HTML5
HTML5 is an upcoming technology, also for game development. With more and more developers, the community is growing constantly. However, HTML5 games are still kind of rare. So after developing a HTML5 game for iOS, I couldn’t help but wonder: why aren’t more developers using this convenient technology?
What is missing, is an online platform with a correspondant payment model, where indie games can be released for free and still make money.
 
CONTROLLER
Your smartphone is your controller and thus has many more capabilities that can be used to enchance your gaming experience. Each game can provide it's own controller layout or use one of the standard controller provided by the platform. It can interact with the controller, changing whats displayed or even how things work while the game is running. All this is done in simple HTML and Javascript.
 
TIME BASED SOCIAL PAYMENT MODEL
The admission is based on a monthly payment of $2, but can be increased voluntarily. It allows access to the complete game collection in the library.
The games played by a user are being tracked, so that these games can take share in the sales according to the play time. 60% of the total income will be distributed among the game developers, 40% will be used for server costs, platform-development and -service.
 
SUPPORTED GAMES ON RELEASE
Game developers will not only take share in the earnings, but will also be promoted on the platform. Therefore, we are confident of finding studios which will provide their games. At least, we will support a few nice HTML5 open source games, like Emberwind HTML5, and our own games, like Steamclash.
 
WHAT WE NEED YOU FOR
With your help, we could employ two developers (Malte and Philip) to get the Bark Arcade started. After a first alpha version with correspondent API, the next steps would be:

Setting up server structures
Development of the Bark Network
Further development of the API
Further development of Controller Apps for Android and iOS
Optional Desktop Apps
 
PERKS
Free access 
All donations above $2 gives you free access to Bark Arcade for a period of time. In comparison, the regular minimum monthly admission to the platform is $2.
Premium contributor status
On top of that, you will permanently have the premium contributor status, which gives you an extra contributor badge in highscores and ladders, yearly exclusive premium ingame material and features, like extra characters and levels. It will also show other players that you supported the project from the beginning in your profile.
Closed beta
And of course, you will get the closed beta version of the Bark Arcade as soon as it’s out. This won’t only help us to refine the product, but it will also give you the opportunity to check out the whole thing.
Signed T-shirt
All donations of $64 and more will be given a Bark Arcade T-shirt, signed exclusively by Malte!
You telling the game advice
The $256 “You telling the game advice” perk offers a personal thank you from us by mentioning your name in the loading screens. Your picture and name will randomly be shown next to the game advice speech balloon for the Bark Arcade games.
 
IF WE GET MORE
In case we raise more than our goal of $16.000, we contemplate on what we could further develop - purely hypothetical.
Above $30.000: We will produce a free to play game for Bark Arcade.
Above $40.000: We will support Windows Phone 8
Above $50.000: We will support offline games.
Above $150.000: We will develop a set-top box for Bark Arcade!
 
RISKS
Since this is a fixed funding, there will be no risk for you in making a donation. In the case of not reaching our goal, you will get your money back.
If we achieve our goal, you will naturally get your perks. However, we are not sure how long it will take to launch the beta version, but we are confident that it will take no longer than six months after the successful funding.
In order to use Bark Arcade, you need a WiFi connection. Modern home WiFis are stable and fast enough.
 
TIMELINE

January 2013 – crowdfunding finished
January 2013 – Beginning of work: development of Beta version, servers ect.
July 2012 - Closed Beta
October 2012 - Release and start of the contributor memberships
 
FOR GAME DEVELOPERS
We are always on the lookout for new contacts and ideas. If you are a developer and interested in the project, we would love to hear from you so why don’t you give us a shout!
In addition to the input and network API, we also plan to provide cool game APIs for highscores, ladders, achievements and eventually even online games. Yay!
Please take note that we will need the money raised by this campaign for developing and for server structures. That is to say that any income can only be distributed to game developers after new memberships have been created.
However, the advantage of publishing a game in an early stage is that your game will be promoted and established on the platform from the start on.
 
SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS
Network

Fast default home WiFi
Desktop System

Dual Core, 2x1Ghz
1 GB Ram
Graphics card
Windows, Mac or Linux
Desktop Browser (Windows, Mac, Linux)

All browser supporting WebRTC like Firefox
Bark Arcade Browser
Mobile Browser (Android, iOS)

Bark Arcade App (recommended)
All WebRTC supporting Browsers
 
ANY QUESTIONS?
contact us!

story:
The Radgile Vic 2020 is a better way to work and play.  Instead of being forced to sit hunched over a desk in order to enjoy a large monitor up close, the innovative console enables computer users, gamers and people who conduct business from home to enjoy a versatile workstation – complete with their large screen monitor and/or video projector, computing device or game console, keyboard, mouse and power supply – to be used with their optimal seating choice.  

The Vic 2020 can be viewed as a perfect complement to your existing work setup, or, as a complete desk replacement.  For many, using the Vic 2020 as a standing station along side their current setup will provide a new option.  For many others, using the Vic 2020 with an existing sofa, recliner, or chaise will be the perfect alternative to using a laptop on their lap.

In addition, the Vic 2020 can be fitted with accessories such as a planned device charging station and additional shelves and bins for endless versatility.  Lastly, the shelving system houses a cord management system that is integrated with a power supply chamber in the base, completely concealing all cords except the one going to the power source.





That is not an endorsement, but we think Jony's quote succinctly captures the essence of good design.  Which is why we've designed the Vic 2020 with those same ideas and principles in mind. As a result, the Vic 2020 is as stylish as it is functional.  With a footprint measured in inches rather than feet, the Vic 2020 can fit anywhere, and it can even serve as a desk replacement.  Due to its modular design, the Vic 2020 is endlessly versatile.  With its integrated cord management system and adjustable shelving system, the Vic 2020 can serve many purposes and elegantly handle many scenarios.


The Vic 2020 has no mechanical mechanisms and almost no moving parts.  The only parts that move are the castors.  Everything else is designed for strength and enduring beauty.




Sit high or sit low.  The adjustable shelving system can accommodate casual seating positioned close to the ground as easily as it can be used at typical seating heights.

Or stand.  For many, the Vic 2020 is fine for a standing scenario right out of the box.  For others, we are actively developing a standing adapter that will allow you to effortlessy extend the vertical range of the shelving system and position a keyboard and mousing surface as high as 45" from the ground.

You can also add additional shelves and storage options, such as drawers and bins.  Other accessories, such as a device charging station, will add additional utility to the Vic 2020 for many people.  For others, the included shelves will meet their needs for years to come, which of course, is also great!



Do you have 10 minutes?  The Vic 2020 will come in three main pieces, plus the shelves.  Connect the three main pieces (just 4 bolts required - tool included), add the shelves, castors and ballast, and you're done.  You can probably even sip your coffee a few times during assembling and still come in under 10 minutes.



One look at the console reveals how all of the components lock together to form a single component that directs all forces directly to the base - the same way that houses and other buildings are designed to rest on their footings.  With no mechanical parts, the result is a solid build that looks sleek and is designed to last.

The material used to build the Vic 2020 will be selected as part of finalizing the design for manufacturing and final testing.  We will select a high quality resin that provides a stylish appearance and the structural integrity that the Vic 2020 requires.


Well, make that no maintenance.  Once assembled, just use and enjoy the Vic 2020.


Today, you may use your laptop plugged into a docking station at the Vic 2020.  Tomorrow, you may place a tablet on a shelf and after a brief automatic sync, you will have instant access to the available mouse, keyboard, display and power source.  Either way, you have convenient infrastructure services at the ready, and your favorite choice of seating to allow you to enjoy it all.  With the Vic 2020, you're ready for today and tomorrow.


Shapes

Because of the high cost of tooling, depending on how we do during this campaign, we will likely initially only be able to produce one embodiment of the Vic 2020.  Contributors at the designated levels will get to have a vote on which shape they like best.  Due to many other factors that need to be considered, we cannot guarantee that the vote will control.  However, you can be certain that the result of that vote will be a major factor in our decision about which embodiment to build first.

Colors

Classic Black and Stone Grey, with matching color shelves, will be the initial colors available.

More Options & Accessories

We have exciting plans for the Vic 2020.  More colors, translucent shelves, a standing adapter that increases the functional range of the shelving system, a charging station for neatly charging all of your devices, drawers and bins for organizing your stuff - these things are all validated concepts which we look forward to delivering as soon as possible!



Summary

We need funds for the two major phases of bringing the Radgile Vic 2020 to market:

Phase 1 - Final technical design and testing - $50,000

Phase 2 - Tooling - $400,000

The fixed funding amount of $50,000 will go toward finalizing the technical details of the design and final testing.

Any amount above our fixed funding goal will go toward the tooling needed to produce one embodiment of the Vic 2020.  Any amount in excess of the amount required for the tooling to produce one embodiment of the Vic 2020 will go toward additional product design and tooling.

More Details

The next step required for bringing this product to market is to finalize the technical design.  Things like wall thickness, manufacturing process, and manufacturing materials need to be specified and tested.  We are working with experts in the field of design, finite element analysis, and mold making to make sure we deliver a quality product.

The fixed funding goal of this project is sufficient to complete Phase 1.  If we do not reach a sufficient stretch goal to complete Phase 2, we will still be in a great position to launch a new project to secure the additional funding.  Our stretch goal for Phase 2 is $450,000.  Because of the large parts required to build the Vic 2020, tooling is very expensive.  Reaching our stretch goal during this campaign would be amazing, but there is still a lot of progress that can be made if we only reach our fixed goal of $50,000 during this campaign.  Either way, the steps we need to take are the same, and either way, we are committed to bringing the Vic 2020 to market - but we need your help!

Schedule




Real people need real solutions.  With your backing, together we can change the way people work and play in the modern world.  We need your help - every contribution helps!

While your backing is vital, equally important is getting the word out to others.  We have multiple pages on our website that will each share a different image and bit of information with your friends, so please, share our news early and often, and help us get everyone excited about the revolutionary Radgile Vic 2020!  You can also find us on Facebook, Twitter, Google+, and Pinterest, so please find us there too!


Come along for the ride! - Welcome to the team.  You will receive all of our updates and get to experience what goes into bringing a product to market. It's going to be a wild ride, and you will be in the loop every step of the way.

Vic 2020 Visionary sticker - A handsome sticker to place on your laptop or wherever you like showing that you were there at the beginning!

Vic 2020 Visionary status - Welcome to the club.  You will be eligible for special offers and discounts offered exclusively to Vic 2020 Visionaries by Radgile Design for years to come.

Your name on Vic 2020 Visionary page - A little public recognition for your contribution.  Its our way of saying thank you, and letting the world know that we couldn't have done it without you.  If you prefer your participation to remain private, that is fine as well, and it will not affect your Vic 2020 Visionary status one bit.

Vic 2020 Visionary USB car adapter - A small token of our appreciation that is also pretty handy.  This Vic 2020 Visionary branded adapter allows you to charge any USB device using a standard car power receptacle.

Vic 2020 Visionary 2GB USB thumb drive - Who couldn't use an extra thumb drive?  This Vic 2020 Visionary branded thumb drive does what every thumb drive does, but with a proud reminder of your contribution toward making the Vic 2020 a reality.

Vote for favorite shape - We're thrilled you want a Vic 2020 - but which one?  You get to tell us your favorite embodiment (square or round) of the Vic 2020 and directly influence which one gets produced first.  Please note however, that due to many other factors that need to be considered, we cannot guarantee that the vote will carry the day.  Nonetheless, you can be absolutely certain that the result of this vote will be a major factor in our decision about which embodiment to build first.

Voucher to buy one Vic 2020 at *wholesale price* from first production run - You will receive a voucher that will allow you to purchase one Vic 2020 as though you were purchasing a bunch of them in bulk to re-sell. Shipping costs and tax will be extra, and will be determined at the time of your order.

Voucher to buy one Vic 2020 at *factory cost* from first production run - You will receive a voucher that will allow you to purchase one Vic 2020 at the unit production cost.  By far, the largest cost inputs for producing the Vic 2020 are the cost of materials and the volume of material required to produce one unit.  While we cannot know the exact cost until those items are resolved in the final technical design, it is estimated that our unit cost to produce the Vic 2020 will be $80.  You contribute a little more now to save a lot more later.  Shipping costs and tax will be extra, and will be determined at the time of your order.

Priority factory handling - This means that once orders begin being fulfilled, your order will be handled by our fulfillment center first.  This could mean that you will receive your Vic 2020 anywhere from a couple of days to a couple of weeks faster than you otherwise would have.  This prioritized handling only refers to handling by our fulfillment centers - shipping priority and speed will be whatever you specify when you order.  This does not affect shipping costs and tax.  Shipping costs and tax will still be extra, and will be determined at the time of your order.



Bill Catlan is the founder and lead product developer for Radgile Design, the innovative developer of the world's first video integration console - the Radgile Vic 2020. Bill has been programming computers from a very young age - beginning on a Commodore VIC-20 - and has seen and built many computer setups over the years. Inspired by the performance ergonomics of Formula One race cars and fighter jets, and the everyday comfort of chaises and recliners, Bill saw an opportunity to develop a better way for all kinds of users - from gamers to computer professionals - to work and play.

Bill is an accomplished software developer, entrepreneur, and lawyer.  He has run complex software integration projects for Fortune 500 companies in his 20+ years of enterprise software development and consulting career, and he brings that vast experience to this project.  He has consulted with experienced plastics experts and design professionals and will continue to do so in order to ensure that a quality product is delivered.  As a Vic 2020 Visionary contributor, you can count on regular communication and updates, and you will truly feel like a part of the team as development proceeds. 

  • Bachelors degree from Binghamton University
  • Law degree from Hofstra University School of Law
