story:
Phones are gaining pixels and megapixels shedding ounces. But they seem close to reaching a plateau of incremental improvements.

 

Moto Mods™ is a unique opportunity to innovate at a fraction of the cost of buying a new phone. Let’s go beyond the one-sided phone that we got stuck with for so long. The key to the untapped potential of the backside of your phone is the right type of controls - tactile. Relying on the sense of touch for feedback eliminates the need for visual confirmation.

 

Moving a finger along the sensor’s surface will control/change the level of intensity. So our sensor might control text scrolling speed, car acceleration, color saturation, and many more.

 

We are working on bringing to life a new tactile input control. We are very early in product development. Therefore, you have a chance to participate and shape the direction we take. As a backer, you vote on one of the options below, or suggest an alternative.  

 

Your vote will direct the prototype design. Your contributions will fund it. And then we are back with the prototype for product funding, you will have earned 5% discount.

Option #1. Texture

The surface roughness will provide the tactile feedback. The smooth surface for low intensity/speed, changes to “sandpaper” surface, then to one with ridges with round caps, and finally ridges with sharp caps. Each next one will be indicative of an intensity/speed increase.

As size of ridges on the surface grows, the space between the finger and the underlying sensors increases. That distance can be measured directly by the sensor, and provide sensor output.

Option#2. Curvature

Circular cut in the cover. Sensor is laid along the circumference of the cut. The tactile feedback is provided by the change in the angle as finger travels along the circular edge.

Many more alternatives are possible. For example, a groove narrow at one end and and wide on the other with the width of the groove providing tactile feedback.

Vote or just leave your comments.

Make your opinion count.

Otherwise, we are all stuck with our old boring phones forever.

story:
The Need

Point-of-load electrical AC power meters are able to provide detailed information on power usage but data must be recorded over days or weeks and displayed in an easily understood format to be useful. Not only is the current/power data needed but also when and how long the load is on.

A smart phone or tablet, which is Bluetooth enabled, is the choice of most homeowners for reviewing such information. Both peak and average power of an air conditioner, for example, can be measured over days or weeks. The current on standby (off current) and full operation of an appliance, such as a computer or TV, can be recorded, as well as when it is on (something a parent may want to know).
In addition to local readings, the meter has network capabilities, ready for the smart grid and Internet of  Things. And also, being non-contact, is completely safe.

In addition to local readings, the meter has network capabilities, ready for the smart grid and Internet of Things.

Our Non-contact Meter

The thin, credit-card sized power meter simply slips over a standard electrical plug as it is plugged into the receptacle. No electrical contact is made with the plug prongs because of a unique current and voltage sensors involving inductive and capacitive pickup. Power calculations, timing and logging are done by an internal microcomputer. Data is taken every 10 seconds and transmitted via Bluetooth upon request. It may be programmed to send alerts if operation is detected outside of preset conditions (e.g. on too long or at wrong time of day). Because of the internal battery the meter retains logged data and will respond wirelessly even if unplugged. 
   

         

 

 

 

Smartphone Display

Data from the meter is transmitted wireless via Bluetooth to a nearby smart phone or tablet. The meter may be programmed to send updates if there is a change of load (e.g. TV on). The meter continues to log data (weeks) even when the wireless connection is unavailable and updates when it becomes available. User graphs indicate when the load changes (on or off) occur. Also analysis of energy usage over time is provided.

     

       

 

Why Load Monitoring?

This wireless meter is convenient for the following applications:

  • Appliance energy usage  ---     Data is averaged over days or weeks
  • Screen time tracking   ---    Logs when and how long TV, video games or PC is on
  • Identify vampire loads  --    Standby current or phantom loads
  • Smart grid ready   ----         Suitable for smart buildings and IoT applications

Screen Time Tracking Video


Saving Energy by Monitoring

Studies by utilities have shown that 5% to 20% of electrical energy is wasted in residential and commercial spaces. Some diligence is needed by homeowners and office managers to avoid this waste but they need to know where the waste is occurring. For the average homeowner annual saving of $200 can be realized. A simple one-time reading can be of some help but what is really needed is long-term monitoring over days or weeks to understand where energy is being wasted. This is why logging is an easily graphical readout or dashboard is needed.

Features

  • The thin, credit card size meter slips over a plug without contract with electrical leads so that it is completely safe
  • Both AC current and voltage are measured (patent pending technology)
  • Current, power and power factor measured every 10 sec (20 A, 150v range)
  • Times of load current and voltage on/off or change recorded – up to 50 events (typically covering days or weeks)
  • Total energy and average current/power calculated over months of use
  • Phantom load (standby current) measured
  • Current or logged data transmitted via Bluetooth for review by smart phone or tablet
  • Battery operation allows data storage and transmission even when not attached to plug
  • Alerts sent if operation at wrong time or for too long detected
  • Bluetooth 4.0 (LE, low energy or Smart) compatible
  • Range: 50 to 200 meters LOS

The Development Process

We are well along in the development process and have a prototype of the non-contact power meter, although not in the thin form which slips over a plug. The prototype was presented at a technical conference and a discussion of our concepts and the background of the project are given in a white paper:
We are experienced in developing and manufacturing wireless sensors but have not married the non-contact prototype with Bluetooth – this is the project for which we are requesting funding. 


             Our prototype


Smart Grid and IoT

A major goal of the smart grid is to achieve control and monitoring of the grid from the generators down to the individual load level with data communicated in real time via the Internet. Our wireless meter has the necessary networking capability when the grid is ready for it. Our meter can also suitable as a sensor node for the Internet of Things, a grand concept where all sensors on the Internet, numbering in the billions, are interconnected.

Business Model

After supplying the meters as perks we expect to continue production of the meters and sell through our website as we do our other networked sensor products. However we believe that a large market might be reached through resellers and distributors, and perhaps technology transfer.

WiFi Option – stretch goal of $70k

Bluetooth LE has become a preferred choice for many wireless sensors but these can only be accessed by smart phones or tablets when they are within range. Where smart phones are not available WiFi is often a better option. As a stretch goal we will provide WiFi as an option. Two versions are being considered: (1) a small sensor board with a attached electronics and (2) a dual plug the size of the cover. The second plug allows two independent loads to be monitored. Please send us your preferences.

 

Thank you

For supporting the development of the wireless non-contact meter for smart buildings, smart grid and IoT. And a special thank you for those from our Screen Time Tracking Facebook site.

story:
OwnCloud Gallery App

OwnCloud already provides a good native Android and iOS App but the Problem is it cannot show you your images as thumbnails or as a gallery view. So you will need a lot of time to take a look at your pictures one by one downloading the original one.
To solve this, I already created a hybrid app that uses the thumbnail feature of OwnCloud 6/7:
https://itunes.apple.com/de/app/owncloud-gallery-free/id892583417
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=md.steuer.mobile.owncloud_gallery.free
The problem with the hybrid approach is that there are performance and connectivity problems because of SSL certificates and similar.
The hard thing to really generate thumbnails is to generate a valid web session by programmatically sign the user into his OwnCloud instance over a web session. Otherwise the generation is not possible.
The apps will be open source
https://github.com/wolfgang-s/owncloud-gallery/
and published on the app store and play store for free with some limitations. Through a small fee through in app purchase/billing these limitations will be gone.
If you support this project you will get a promo code to remove the limitations without paying any fee.
You can track the process of this app on github when the funding is done.

story:
As Featured on:


Does the idea of never running out of power on your smartphone sound appealing? How about a wire-free lifestyle where simply touching your desk/car/office dock charges and connects your phone? This is what you'll get with E-Fusion:

  • Wireless connection! No dangling wires to clutter your car or your desk
  • True USB connection let you sync with iTunes or download your photos with no additional wires to plug in!
  • Keep your phone charged whether in your car, home, office...
  • Quickly rotate from portrait to landscape while maintaining electrical contact
  • Fully adjustable docks let you orient your phone just right
  • Dock and undock easily! Our heavy base doesn't follow your phone
  • Finally use the GPS without worrying about draining your battery!
  • Powerful magnets keep you phone in place while biking around town (6 Lbs of pull force to hold the 5 oz phone in place)
  • Replaces the original phone connector with our sturdier version
  • 1/4-20 tripod mount under the Universal Dock makes it easy to keep the same setting for your podcast videos, etc.
  • Keep the same docks regardless of which brand of phone you go to next or which new connector the manufacturer decide to use (just get the appropriate case for your phone)
  • Home, office, car, bike, boat, wall, tripod, etc.

 

Modern smartphones are such great devices but, until now, making full use of their extraordinary features (hands-free via Bluetooth, GPS, location-based-reminders, etc.) would quickly render the phone useless from lack of power.




This is just the beginning of the journey! We want to make sure most phones are supported (either by doing the cases ourselves or supporting existing cases manufacturer to do so) so your whole family and friends can connect to the same dock. And with your help on this project we can make this dream a reality!

 

How do we stack up against the competition?

You may have heard of the Duracell Powermat or the Qi wireless charging standard being used on some of the latest phones (Google Nexus 4, Nokia Lumina, etc.). So how does the E-Fusion wireless charging system compares? The chart below is pretty self explanatory:

 

How it works


Wireless Conductive Charging is quite simple. It relies on physical contacts between spring pins on the dock side and matching traces on the back of the phone. In principle it works just like your old cordless phone did when you returned it to its base for charging. Ours differ in the ability to rotate the device while maintaining contact.
We house this clever connector in the center of a magnetic ring in the dock so that when the phone is placed near it, it is attracted to the dock to form a solid bond.



 

Perks for Indiegogo contributors

*The interface between the docks and phone will remain the same for future cases. So you'll still be able to use your same set of docks on cases you buy in the future either from us or any other case manufacturers taking advantage of our free open-source design.

 

HDK (Hardware Development Kit) available to all phone case manufacturers and DIYers license free

We want this to become the standard for smart-device magnetic charging dock. And so we will be offering 3D models and design guides as an Open Source project for the connector used on the device side. If you are a case manufacturer and want early access to those documents as well as the ones for the dock side, check out our HDK kit on the right.
With inexpensive rapid prototyping services (such as Shapeways) we look forward to DYIers creating amazing designs to connect all their devices.

How did we get to this point?

It took multiple rounds of prototypes to get to the sweet spot we are at now. Although the idea for such a magnetic charging case came to life many years ago, we were sure somebody was going to create one for us to use. After waiting and waiting we realized the great opportunity we had on our hands. So we got to work, about a year ago, and went through many design iterations, as you can see on the picture below. The case kept on getting better every time with more accessories to go along with it, like the low profile car mount and bike mount, as well as adding the 1/4-20 tripod mount and wall mount to our Universal Dock. We're now at the mature point where we're ready to start production tooling and just need you to help us get there.


What's Next?

Here is a short roadmap highlighting the plan for the next few months if the funding succeeds:

Jul      Indiegogo
Aug    Hard tooling
Sept   Tool sample inspection and tooling adjustment. Pre-production run
Oct     Full production run
Nov    Shipping

FAQ

How does it affect battery life?
Your battery life improves! Don't listen to those stuck in the Ni-Cad batteries era (where full charge/discharge cycles where beneficial). The battery type used in most modern electronics (Lithium-ion) actually benefit from frequent recharge. For example, assuming you use 100% of your phone battery charge per day, recharging it twice a day vs. just at the end of the day will give your battery approximately 250 additional days of life.
(sources: Electropaedia, Battery University)

Why not use induction wireless charging technology?
As cool as induction wireless charging technology is, it comes with some drawbacks. First, it takes longer to charge. Second, it doesn't provide USB connectivity to sync your device to your computer or car. Third and perhaps most importantly, the heat it generates can actually reduce battery life.
(source: Battery University)

Don't the strong magnets affect the phone functions in any way?
This was our fear from the very beginning and we conducted a vast array of tests to confirm this project was feasible before starting any development on the cases. The result from all those tests boils down to our "secret sauce" which provide surprisingly strong magnet pull to keeps the phone securely held in place, while not letting any magnetic field bleed pass the case.

When will a case be available for my XYZ phone?
Because we want as many phones as possible to be included we will be offering the technology (case side) as an Open Source project for any person or company to use free of charge. So you are likely to see a selection of cases available shortly after launch. The best way to ensure this happen is to make this project a success by either backing the project (get a set for your cousin's iPhone) or spread the word about E-Fusion to all your friends.
UPDATE 6/27/13: We just added a post on our Facebook page where you can vote for your phone of choice: Vote!

Music by Dan-O at DanoSongs.com
In-studio photos by Sunnyvale Photo Studio

story:
Mass production is starting this month. Last chance to be one of the first to receive Jiffy.

A BIG THANK YOU TO ALL THE BACKERS OF THE PREVIOUS CAMPAIGN! THANK YOU FOR YOUR TRUST AND SUPPORT. IT MEANS A LOT TO US! 

Small, stylish wearable device that fits in your pocket. Pull it out when your other devices need saving in any emergency. Jiffy uses the new technology "Quick Charge 2.0" This is the fastest technology out at the moment for charging devices.

We are living in the time of technology that has been developing more and faster than ever. Technology has become essential in today’s world. Our lives have become closely linked to mobile electronic devices, because they give us freedom of communication.


Jiffy helps your devices when they run out of juice.

When the battery runs out devices and gadgets become useless pieces of plastic and metal. They become unusable.

Jiffy is an eco-charger and using the new technology "Quick Charge 2.0" will assure your device a quick charge that truly offers freedom and unlimited independence when it comes to charging your mobile devices and gadgets.That’s it! You are completely independent of any power supply, electric network, or wall outlet.  Jiffy is an eco-charger that has a priceless advantage both in everyday life and especially when travelling and going on new adventures even to the ends of the world.

THE IDEAL SITUATION- to maintain a last call, an emergency call when you are in a critical situation, to send a last text, or study a map with GPS in case you get lost and can’t find sources to charge your device nearby.

TOTAL ENERGY INDEPENDENCE- charge devices and gadgets at any time, any place and without taking in to consideration the weather, or temperature outside.


Imagine a scenario of being lost in the woods, in the desert, or in a jungle. Your phones battery will be assured only by Jiffy!


PRIORITY- compared to other methods of charging gadgets, Jiffy doesn’t need gas balloons with chemical reactions as other chargers. You can use it at night, in the shade, in thick forests unlike solar chargers. Jiffy also doesn’t need wind, or water currents.

IMPORTANT-No traditional electricity, no air pollution, and you don’t need to look for a power outlet. In this way you don’t need to worry about where you will charge your mobile phone, camera, Bluetooth headset, or any other devices that can be charged through USB.

Charge while on any type of transportation: train, ship, bus, or even wagon. You can rest assured and camp as much as you want, do extreme mountain sports, go hiking, or rock climbing without worrying that your camera, or smart phone will be without battery and you will remain without communication.

We all know how problematic it is to find an electrical power outlet when going on longer trips. Also we know situations when electricity shuts off at home because of powerful rain, wind, or other natural phenomena that cause damage to power grids. You will be able to access the internet, radio, or other news portals in times of danger and emergency.

Thanks to the USB attachment with LED light, Jiffy can be used as a light source. It does not need batteries and can be used at any time when there are blackouts and electricity and light are most needed. It is perfect to have a Jiffy handy in your emergency kit.

MULTI USB- the cable is perfect to charge any gadget at any time. Charge your devices and gadgets, or help a friend that needs help, but needs a different kind of cable.

How does Jiffy work? 

Jiffy represents a USB charger that mechanically produces electricity without eliminating toxic substances into the atmosphere. Electricity production is carried out by a three phase asynchronous micro generator with very high productivity, which is driven by a complex mechanical watch. With a simple movement the mechanism is charged with kinetic energy which is transmitted to the micro generators. The charging module is 5V USB that charges all the devices that support the standard USB. The intensity of electric current is up to 2200 mA and this offers a faster charge, by using the new tehnology "Quick Charge 2.0".

For the people that are less technical, Jiffy with the 2200mA can simultaneously charge 6 smart phones with 4” screens that are navigating the internet through Wi-Fi, or 4 smart phones that are navigating the internet through 3G. 

Technical info about the prototype:

Behind the micro generator is mounted a controller that has the function of continuously recovering the current and 5V voltage stabilization. Also an electrolytic capacitor which has the function of a micro accumulator is connected in the scheme to remove the current fluctuations produced by mechanical processes under the influence of kinetic energy.

Electrical scheme

We documented our work process and wanted to share with you the important steps. Also watch the first prototype we tested.

Thanks for making it all the way down here to meet team Jiffy!

What we intend to do after the campaign is finished?

After the Indiegogo campaign is finished we will start work on Jiffy immediately because we know that time is the biggest enemy for a start up. We know that we will encounter obstacles along the way, but we are ready to face them and if everything goes as planned we will deliver Jiffy within the timeline that we estimated. 

We hope that Jiffy is just the first of many devices that we work on. For us this is hopefully going to be a successful campaign that will turn into a small business and generate enough income to give us the possibility to work on bigger projects. It would be great to work on other projects that will bring solutions to problems like reusable energy, eco friendly energy, global warming etc. These are the problems that bother us and we hope that with your help we will be able to start attending to them.

TIMELINE


Perks

You can use it at night, in the shade, in thick forests unlike solar chargers. Jiffy also doesn’t need wind, or water currents.IMPORTANT-No traditional electricity, no air pollution, and you don’t need to look for a power outlet. In this way you don’t need to worry about where you will charge your mobile phone, camera, Bluetooth headset, or any other devices that can be charged through USB.Charge while on any type of transportation: train, ship, bus, or even wagon. You can rest assured and camp as much as you want, do extreme mountain sports, go hiking, or rock climbing without worrying that your camera, or smart phone will be without battery and you will remain without communication.We all know how problematic it is to find an electrical power outlet when going on longer trips. Also we know situations when electricity shuts off at home because of powerful rain, wind, or other natural phenomena that cause damage to power grids. You will be able to access the internet, radio, or other news portals in times of danger and emergency.Thanks to the USB attachment with LED light, Jiffy can be used as a light source. It does not need batteries and can be used at any time when there are blackouts and electricity and light are most needed. It is perfect to have a Jiffy handy in your emergency kit.MULTI USB- the cable is perfect to charge any gadget at any time. Charge your devices and gadgets, or help a friend that needs help, but needs a different kind of cable.How does Jiffy work? Jiffy represents a USB charger that mechanically produces electricity without eliminating toxic substances into the atmosphere. Electricity production is carried out by a three phase asynchronous micro generator with very high productivity, which is driven by a complex mechanical watch. With a simple movement the mechanism is charged with kinetic energy which is transmitted to the micro generators. The charging module is 5V USB that charges all the devices that support the standard USB. The intensity of electric current is up to 2200 mA and this offers a faster charge, by using the new tehnology "Quick Charge 2.0".For the people that are less technical, Jiffy with the 2200mA can simultaneously charge 6 smart phones with 4” screens that are navigating the internet through Wi-Fi, or 4 smart phones that are navigating the internet through 3G. Technical info about the prototype:Behind the micro generator is mounted a controller that has the function of continuously recovering the current and 5V voltage stabilization. Also an electrolytic capacitor which has the function of a micro accumulator is connected in the scheme to remove the current fluctuations produced by mechanical processes under the influence of kinetic energy.Electrical schemeWe documented our work process and wanted to share with you the important steps. Also watch the first prototype we tested.Thanks for making it all the way down here to meet team Jiffy!What we intend to do after the campaign is finished?After the Indiegogo campaign is finished we will start work on Jiffy immediately because we know that time is the biggest enemy for a start up. We know that we will encounter obstacles along the way, but we are ready to face them and if everything goes as planned we will deliver Jiffy within the timeline that we estimated. We hope that Jiffy is just the first of many devices that we work on. For us this is hopefully going to be a successful campaign that will turn into a small business and generate enough income to give us the possibility to work on bigger projects. It would be great to work on other projects that will bring solutions to problems like reusable energy, eco friendly energy, global warming etc. These are the problems that bother us and we hope that with your help we will be able to start attending to them.TIMELINEPerks

story:
Introducing OxBack

Hold onto your dongle.

 

It's Easy to Use

OxBack is easy to apply to your phone. Once it's on, the adapter can easily be popped in and pulled out.​​

It Won't Get in the Way 

Your phone still slides easily in and out of your pocket.

Your phone rests steadily on the OxBack and doesn't wobble when you use it.

OxBack even makes your phone easier to hold.

 

It Won't Fall Out

OxBack firmly grasps your dongle.

Adhesive

We use a 3M smart adhesive that can stick to any variety of case.

Dimensions

OxBack is thin and convenient.

Patent Pending

Prototyping and Development

We went through numerous different designs before we reached the perfect one. 

We perfected the design with our 3d printer but what you receive will be much smoother and cleaner.

Who We Are

Ben and Carl came up with the first concept of OxBack in January 2017. Ryan joined shortly after as a Co-Founder, using his background in engineering to help with design and prototyping. Max, with his experience in media relations, was brought in to help with branding and PR. 

Timeline

Our campaign ends August 11th. When we reach our goal we will begin manufacturing with injection molding in mid-August. We will receive our first samples in late August, and be ready to ship to our backers around the world in September. 

Why Order Now?

By backing now you'll get to own one of the very first OxBacks plus exclusive access to prices only available during the Indiegogo campaign. 

Share With Your Friends

Help us grow our community.

Share on Facebook and tag a friend who has lost their dongle:
https://www.facebook.com/OxBack-192202651310976/

Video Soundtrack 

Track: Highway 1
Artist: Clu. 
https://soundcloud.com/iamclu

Patent Pending

story:
With your help, we hope to develop Bump 2 Know, an app to assure safe encounters and promote STD prevention.

What is Bump 2 Know? Bump 2 Know is a mobile app that handles multiple types of data to allow two people to verify each other and pass confidential STD data. We have developed apps in the past and we have experience in secure systems reducing the risks of completing the project to near zero. Dr. Bernstein has extensive knowledge in patient data and data handling assuring the proper handling of patient data.

Who We Are Bump 2 Know is founded by Carl Perkins, a serial technology entrepreneur, and Dr. Allan Bernstein, a prominent medical doctor and councilman. Mr. Perkins has been developing technologies in the areas of AI, Internet Marketing and Marketing Systems and Apps for the last two decades. Collectively, we have the skills to develop and market Bump 2 Know and to navigate the laws and relations necessary in the medical industry to make this happen.

Our Vision We hope that our app becomes an integral part of organizations like planned parenthood and other support organizations to change the way couples engage each other and hopefully greatly increasing the awareness of STDs.



What We Need & What You Get

We hope to reach our goal of $38,000 in order to develop the app in entirety, including top of the line tools to securely and accurately ensure the identity of the user. We will also be contacting well known clinics all over the country in order to find ways of making STD testing more affordable for Bump 2 Know users.

The Impact

Currently, there are more than 110 million STIs overall among men and women nationwide, and more than half of all Americans will get an STD/STI in their lifetime. Can you imagine a world where you can discreetly exchange STD statuses with your partner, whether it be a casual encounter or a lifetime relationship? We believe that with the help of Bump 2 Know, we can greatly decrease the number of new cases. In the long run, we see this app increasing the lifespan of our future generations and would even like to see this app going on a global level!



Risks & Challenges

We feel that the risks of developing the system are minimal. Our biggest risk is developing secure and possibly ephemeral data transfer from STD labs to our customers' phones. We are in the process of presenting multiple protocols and data scenarios to labs and developing a medical data transfer system that has not been done before.
Our current processes are patent pending, but we expect to develop more patents as we work through the myriad of STD labs. Dr. Bernstein is well versed in the issues with patient privacy and data security. His political connections will help us achieve rapid connections to STD labs.

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word..Share us on Facebook!

story:
Power Snap Band

With all the high tech capabilities our smartphones have the one thing we are short on is power!

If you are like me you use your phone to take photos/videos, surf the web, watch movies, heck you can even talk on the stupid thing! The problem is that I use it so much I run out of power.

Hi my name is Todd Burnham,

I am the co-founder and creator of the Power Snap Band. Do you remember the 90’s when the snap bracelet was “THE” thing? Well I do and I know how much fun people had with them. I took that blast from the past and made it the new “IT” thing! How? I put in a 800 MAH rechargeable battery that is just enough power to get you through until the next charge! It is lightweight, stylish, fun and comes with 3 tips integrated into the band to allow you to charge any device that uses micro USB, USB-C or Lightning charging.

Power Snap Band is perfect for an active lifestyle or for a night on the town when you really want to make sure you have access to your Map apps or so you can make sure you have enough juice to use your ride apps.

When might I need a Power Snap Band? The short answer is you never know BUT times where I have used my Power Snap Band: Concerts, Jogging, Vacation, Airports, Kids ball games, when I saw Big Foot (just kidding he was too fast).

 You can get a power bank with a lot more power and trust me I have those to but I love the Power Snap Band for emergencies. I don’t always carry my bigger charger because I don’t want to be tethered to the cords I have to carry or if I take the one that has the built in cord it is too large to put in my pocket. Power Snap Band is small but mighty. You can’t plan an emergency BUT you can have an emergency plan. Make Power Snap Band part of your emergency prep and always be prepared! 

 

 

Power Snap Band Let Your Charge Apple Devices!

Power Snap Band Also Charge Type-C or USB-C Devices!

Power Snap Band Also Charge Micro Devices!

Photo Gallery

Power Snap Band 360 View Video

 
Showing More Videos and Demo of Power Snap Band Working Prototype
 

 

 
 
 

Make Power Snap Band Your Everyday Use And Emergency

 

Seeing Prototype All Coming Together 

 

Time Line

Our team has been working very hard, putting the best hardware, design,
engineering and best manufacturing in place to make this dream come true. Our
manufacturer has been in business for 11 years making power banks and is a
leading expert in the field or power bank technology.

Now, we are looking to you, our friends, for help raising the funds that we need
to make this product a reality. $15,000 should do the trick. Every dollar counts
toward this goal and we appreciate all the feedback and support we are getting.
                                                                  
What We Need & What You Get
We have come to you, Indiegogo, for help raising $15,000. These funds are
going to cover the costs of manufacturing, marketing, and distributing the initial
run of the Power Snap Band line. As a thank-you, we have put together some
excellent deals as rewards for all our contributors, including huge discounts on power snap band itself.

The Impact
This device is going to save people money and make charging your devices
more convenient than ever before. We are confident in the unique utility of Power Snap Band and excited to bring it to market.

Our Commitment
The last few months have been filled with hard work partnering with the best
factories in China to bring the best new technology in to your life. We are ready to move forward with manufacturing our product. This will be ship out by end of Feb/Mar 2018 time frame.

Why Indiegogo - We have been working on brand new product over the last
couple of months and investing our personal money, time, research and
resources. We have come far and we have refined the Power Snap Band to make
it the best powerbank on the market.

The funds raised with our indiegogo will be used to finalize molding, meet small order for the first run, marketing, and order production bringing Power Snap Band to the world for everyone to enjoy. We chose Indiegogo because over the last several years this has been a hub for entrepreneurs and dream-chasers to realize their goals and bring an idea to life. Check out our Website www.powersnapband.com, bring advance technology to
your devices.

Risks and challenges

With any project, there are risks and challenges that must be considered before going forward. These can include:

● Supply Chain: Manufacturing Delay

A delay in the supply chain would cause us to miss our promised shipping deadlines. We don’t anticipate that this will become a problem, as we have developed really close relationships with our suppliers and have worked out a generous timeline that we intend to beat.

● Fulfillment Capacity

If we generate a lot of interest and we get swamped with orders, it is possible that fulfillment and shipping will be delayed. However, we have worked out a schedule for our project to ensure that we allow plenty of time to ship our orders in a timely fashion. We will be devoting our full-time efforts to this project.

Above all, we want our potential backers to know that we plan to be very upfront and honest about any delays or challenges that we run into along the way. If we happen to run into delays during production or distribution, we will let you know about it as soon as we know about it!

Time spent researching, battling time zone differences, numerous emails, Skype, WeChat and phone conversations, meeting the engineering team and seeing the manufacturing process I was finally able to realist my dream - from the idea of a wearable power bank band to a working prototype.

Reflecting on what appeared to be mammoth inroads to get to this stage, nothing could prepare me for the time, energy and effort required to launch this Campaign.

Our biggest challenge is meeting our funding goal to bring this product to life. Without reaching that goal we will not be able to mass produce the product at the needed volume to reach the retail value

TIMELINE

We are standing by to begin manufacturing immediately after our indiegogo campaign closes. Our prototype has been developed, tested, and adjusted, so now all we need is you. Your pledge covers the costs to manufacture and ship your rewards and run our first small batch. We've had extensive experience in power bank development before setting out on our own, and we have already worked with our manufacturer on other products. What’s most important to us is getting this critical safety tool to our backers on time, and ensuring that it’s well-made and reliable.

Other Ways You Can Help

In addition to contributing some money, we ask that you share this campaign with everyone you know. Post the link on Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, SnapChat and Instagram: your support means a great deal to us, and we are grateful to you.


Thanks for taking the time to read about our Project. Let Make This A Reality!

story:
WiFiBoostGo:"the only intelligent option for your smartphone"

Secure Data & Privacy  on all Access Point with a Double Key-encryption WiFi zone

                

          WiFiBoostGo (SLIM version) & the LIMITED EDITION WiFiBoostGlo

                                                                                                                                     

A WiFi signal booster with smarts

- WiFiBoostGo provides crystal clear WiFi reception on weak signals by boosting your smartphones signal range up to 600%. It also extends the range of weak wireless routers  in your home or office

- WiFiBoostGo gauges the battery power on your device while being a portable power-bank for your smartphone

- WiFiBoostGo extends the storage capacity for your smartphone or tablet.

- Manage everything from one simple app that’s available on GooglePlay and the AppStore.

Smartphones have become a daily part of our lives. For business, pleasure or a bit of both, we all use our phones to surf the web and to connect with our own. 

                                                                                                                                    


We've Research and Developed the concept of a #WiFiSignal booster and we're confident that with your help we can raise the funds necessary to produce #WiFiBoostGo and make it available to the public.

       WiFiBoostGo: 4 power-ups for your iPhone!

 #SciFiReality for #TheInternetOfThings...

So what do we need the most for our phones?  We all  love our smart-phones, although sometimes we wish they could do more!

Ideally we want crystal-clear WiFi reception, a super-long battery life and some extra storage wouldn't hurt. And we want to manage it all from a cool app.   

1. Excellent! Your new smartphone can brew coffee, lock the garage and draw your bath with the apps you’ve just installed. But you find that you’ve got to go to the kitchen and turn the machine on, stand right next to the garage to lock it and you might as well just take a shower.

WiFiBoostGo increases the range of the WiFi signal that your phone can actually achieve what these cool apps promise they can deliver.        

Even on new devices -  just like the iPhone 6 Plus with massive storage and a "solid 24 hours talk-time " - battery-drain & storage issues still remain.  

2. WiFiBoostGo is packed with a huge battery which can recharge your phone in less than an hour and is good for 5 recharges; so you’ll never have to worry about looking for an outlet when your battery runs low.

3. Transfer files to the SD Card on the #WiFiBoostGo to free up space on your phone. We all know how quickly those GB’s can fill up: with WiFiBoostGo you can record and upload those viral videos you’ve never been able to capture at the time.

4. A Free App to find all WiFi spots, boost your phones WiFi signal, manage your smartphone so you can surf and store everything on the internet. You can download the WiFiBoostGo app for free from GooglePlay and the Apple Store.

A portable power-house for your mobile phone; WiFiBoostGo boosts 4 aspects of your device:

  • Signal & Speed: Increases WiFi range by 600%* for a stable WiFi internet signal - live streaming is a breeze
  • Stamina & Power: The super sized battery acts as an auxiliary power source to recharge your phone under any conditions
  • Storage & Space: A secondary external storage device; WiFiBoostGo can handle SD cards for added storage connections.
  • App Control: Download the WiFiBoostGo App for FREE on Google Play and the App Store and manage your content easily.

#WifiBoostGo features state-of-the-art technology for maximum power gain on all devices: a portable #PowerBank and extra storage for your iPhone.

                                                                                                                                 

     WiFiBoostGo: #CyberWiFi not science-fiction

You've probably wasted tons of precious MB's with your carrier; you may have even switched companies in the hope of a better network, but have discovered that 

            the more things change the more they stay the same.


We know the score. That's why we've developed WiFiBoostGo. You see, our phones are the problem. My phone (no matter what phone I use) and ALL other devices trying to get a decent WiFi connection contribute to huge traffic spikes, low bandwidth sharing & poor- or no-WiFi reception, even at powerful HotSpots.

 No-one will ever tell you this; especially if they're trying to sell you the latest edition of the "Supernova Smartphone" or whatever.

Cue MonzGear - that's us - a tech-savvy group of developers based in Hong Kong, where we've developed the WiFiBoostGo; an environment where the chances of winning the Lottery are better than getting an uninterrupted WiFi signal.


 During Research and Development on the WiFiBoostGo we focused  on smartphones, but since we're tech junkies, we discovered during our stringent R&D process, that WiFiBoostGo can also super-charge Notebooks, Tablets, Laptops & even Desktop PC's.

                                                                                                                                    

"In a nutshell, smart-phones really need an intelligent boost to make them work properly..."


Speed, Stamina & Storage: we should have just said Sexy & Sleek!

The WiFiBoostGo Antenna : By improving the three fundamental antenna parameters - antenna efficiency, antenna impedance and size which in this case really does matter – WiFiBoostGo triples your phones’s WiFi signal range at once. The LED display lights indicate the connection levels of WiFi signals in the vicinity. Activate the Signal Booster and juice up the range to 600%*. 

Indoors :

Outdoors:


The following  images illustrate the extraordinary gain in WiFi reception, boosted Frame & Ping rates, plus amazing gains in connection (The results are screenshots from the OOKLA Speedtest App for iPhones. For in-depth results go to www.monzgear.com.)

       

  <-- Before & After -->   


Speed: Light is almost as fast!

OK. So this is really an over-the-top exaggeration, but with WiFiBoostGo you can stream live videos, play games, Skype and chat all with amazing clarity and not delay! WiFiBoostGo juices up your signal range by up to 600% so that your smart phone is always connected. 'Nuff said!

"...both SLIM & BOLD... are lightweight, compact & robust power-houses...what else would you expect from a #CyberWiFi concept?"


Stamina: High Nitro Factor

WiFiBoostGo has a high capacity 6000mAh Lithium Polymer Battery (BOLD Version) with a High Nitro Factor, high-speed charging technology which can recharge your phone 5X faster than an ordinary adapter. 

This makes WiFiBoostGo the fastest charging portable battery pack on the market. Super-charge your phone in just 30 minutes; fully charge an iPhone, Sony, Samsung, Nokia or HTC Smartphone on-the-go without the need of a power outlet. 

A PowerBank with huge reserves (The NITRO  version is even bigger!)

The WiFiBoostGo's  power bank rapid charge design allows for seamless power transfer.

  • USB2.0 to transfer energy to your iPhone and tablet
  • Supports Qualcomm Quick-Charge 2.0 rapid charge
  • Supports Apple 2.4mode (Maximun 2.4A@5V)
  • Samsung Galaxy Tablet & Samsung Phones
  • Power adapter for global sockets to charge the WiFiBoostGo

The #PowerBank battery utilizes the HVDCP* method for rapid power exchange 


* High-Voltage Dedicated Charging Port 

Storage: Stockpile your Database

WiFiBoostGo  also has  SD Card Storage slot with which you can increase your phones storage capacity by up to 128 GB. All SD cards can be accommodated. Transfer files from your Camera Roll or from your Docs folder or store your favourite playlists without filling-up your phone.

App Control: Dashboard Dominance

Manage all of #WiFiBoostGo from the Home Screen on your iPhone or Tablet. Download the App and manage your WiFi connections, transfer files seamlessly to other devices, find strong signals in the area and link them so that you're never off-line. Once WiFiBoostGo hits the production line, the app will be made available for Free on GooglePlay, the Apple Store and our own website.

The App will also tell you when you smartphone's battery is low so you can BOOST with the WiFiBoostGo  and also how many recharges of your phone it can handle before you need to fill-it-up, so to speak.

                             

(The above image is from the prototype app for iPhones, Android & Blackberry smartphones. For an example of a working version, head on over to http://monzgear.com)

Technical Specifications:

The tech specs for WiFiBoostGo depend on the weight class. We are currently appraising 2 versions: SLIM & BOLD. 


The SLIM version is a 3000mAh battery powered unit, which gives up to 3 charges for a mobile phone, and the BOLD version, with a 6000mAh battery which can recharge any mobile phone 5 times before recharging.

Phone recharging with WiFiBoostGo is an exchange of the same power source, thus your battery does not strain to convert the energy. 

WiFiBoostGo itself requires a power socket to recharge once the juice runs dry, but once topped-up it will drive your mobile devices once they start to fade.

Both SLIM & BOLD are lightweight, compact & robust power-houses -what else would you expect from a #CyberWiFi concept?

                                                                                                                                   

WiFiBoostGo & The Indiegogo Campaign: Why we need you

We’ve turned to Indiegogo to open our idea to you, the awesome community of tech-savvy travelers of the world; to learn from you and with your support get this product faster to market. Our product components are almost ready for tooling and then mass production, but only your help will get us there. 

The expertise for manufacturing products is at hand; we have partnered with manufacturers with tremendous experiences in the electronics industry eager to give the recycled bit a shot: and together we can make this happen.

R & D (Research & Development) is done, and our prototype is ready to hit the production line.

With this campaign we want to ensure that our resources and final product are environmentally safe. Components that can be recycled & are environment friendly and bio-degradable.  We want to do our part for a cleaner eco-system.

As most electronic manufacturers are in Asia, the biggest problem is pollution, our designs include plans for a fully bio-gradable casing as well as all non-essential components be made from recycled materials.

Funds from the campaign will resource 5 steps of the production & distribution  process:

  1. Finalize the Design & Procure Recycled raw materials
  2. Meet Minimum Production Requirements
  3. Trial Production & Final Testing 
  4. Final Production
  5. Shipping to You, our loyal backers

Mockup of the Blueprints of our final design goal.
                                                                                                                                  

The Proposed Production Schedule                            

       

                            

  
December 2014:  

Launch Indieggo Campaign

Complete the design work for the mass-produced version of WiFiBoostGo. 

Procurement Plan for WiFiBoostGo antenna and the internal circuitry components (recycled materials). 


January 2015:

End Indiegogo Campaign

Complete the Tool Casing for the antenna and the moulds for all the parts. 

February 2015: 

Construct the PCB (Printed Circuit Board) and the PCBA (Printed Circuit Board Assembly) components from the procured materials.

Trial Production run (factory stuff) with the alpha version of plastic and PCB. 

Fine tuning the design and any modifications will be done then. 

Beta production run is done. Final testing of the Beta units. 

March 2015:

Final assembly, testing & packaging. 

WiFiBoostGo is shipped to all our backers. 

Our manufacturers are in China and their production line can deliver mass quantity in high quality to end users at a brisk pace.

                            


                                                                                                                                  

                   Meet the Team: @Monzgear

With over 10 years in the design & development of #Innovative products for OEM (original electronics manufacturer) customers, across the globe for such companies as Polaroid, Kodak and Monster. 

Our goal is to create elegant products that simplify life and make our current technology more effective. 

We have a very successful track record with mass produced products in 

  • Monster SKY
  • WiFi Surveillance Camcorder

(Both are application driven devices to enhance various features of your smartphone/tablet)

Our development team has contributed to the Wireless Technology that drives other Portable Wireless Devices on the market

Our vision is to design and develop innovative products directly for consumers, without the middleman; producing  environmentally sound and #EcoFriendly electronics. This makes for flexible products, with an intrinsic value based on more than just economics! 

                                                                                                                                  


Color Coded Coolness:

WiFiBoostGo is dressed in the coolest color of them all: Black.

They say that the devil is in the details, and so we've created 4 color schemes for both SLIM & BOLD versions: These are Cherry Acid Red, Gold Flow Stallion, Lime Wire Green & Electric Heaven Blue. Cool names for cool colours!

Exclusively for our Indiegogo sponsors, we've created the WiFiBoostGlo, yes you read correctly it was not a typo, WiFiBoostGlo has a glowing antenna to indicate power status.

                                                                                                                                  

Risks & Challenges: 

Development, Production & Distribution

As we've already developed the WiFiBoostGo prototype and have tested it in the most demanding of WiFi reception environments (bars, restaurants, lounges & cafes in Hong Kong)  the main challenge is in maintaining the same high standards with the proposed procurement plan in an awesome design. Global electronic device requirements have already been met, including the stringent FCC in effect in most of North America and Europe.

"...we'd rather plan for the greatest margin of error... than sell you some half-baked lie every month with a vague email..."


Being located in Shenzhen's manufacturing hub, we are in situ of the planet's greatest software and electronics production environment (Hint: it's not Silicon Valley), so it is very simple for us to focus on these research, development and manufacturing issues. We are working directly with the component suppliers and recycled-parts manufactures to ensure the highest quality for WiFiBoostGo. We appreciate your confidence in us and we promise to deliver to you the best *boosting* experience possible.

Intellectual Property(IP) Rights are very important and we ensure that all our parts are manufactured in separate and undisclosed OEM's so that there will be no chance of some hacked-product hitting the market 6 months after you've received your WiFiBoostGo. 

We've given Alpha & Beta Testing a large time-window for incidentals. 

After the Alpha production run at these separate facilities, the componnets are assemebled, tested, tweaked and modified if necessary and the re-design is sent for Beta production and the cycle repeats. When we're satisfied that the product is reaady, we order the main production run, collect & assemble the components, marvel and gleam at this cool invention that YOU have held make possible and ship the WiFiBoostGlo to YOU. These large time windows are there to ensure that we can deliver in the time that we have stated. 

We don't want to burst your bubble by sending you an "Oops! Sorry, but production has been postponed" sop-story. No! We'd rather be straight-up and plan for the greatest margin of error than try to pull the wool over your eyes and keep feeding you some half-baked lie every month with an obscure & vague email...

Our Research & Development facilities lack the necessary Tooling & Construction platforms, so we have budgeted for the purchase and/or production of specific tooling for moulds and components. Quality, Assurance and Certificates for Health, Safety and other Regulatory organizations are obtained through an inspection process by globally recognized entities within the industry.

                                                                                                                                  

Perks For Our Backers

A note to our Backers: A $10 Shipping Fee has been included into the amount for the Perks.


The $5 perk is a Big Banner with your name on it! This too will find it's way to your inbox. You can use this Banner on your own web-page if you wish, but your name will go down in Monzgear history and onto our website as one of the people that made this possible. Thanks! We know you like our idea but are not in the position to contribute more. Thanks!


SLIM & Discreet

"Super Early Bird" backers of the SLIM version will get the Limited Edition WiFiBoostGlo for $49. Only 150 of these!


BOLD as GOLD

"Super Early Bird" backers of the BOLD version will get the Limited Edition WiFiBoostGlo for $69. Only 150 of these!


Plus we've got awesome Combopack perks: Check out the pledges on the right --->

                                                                                                                                  

Retail price for WiFiBoostGo will be:

SLIM version: $99.00

BOLD version: $119,00 

(We’re still tweaking the NITRO prototype to maintain the "Sleek & Sexy" look and feel of SLIM & BOLD. Retail price is estimated to be $179.00)

You can pre-order at these prices. Pre-orders do not include the WiFiBoostGlo.

WiFiBoostGlo is a Limited Edition version for this Indiegogo Campaign ONLY!

                             

You can contact us at: http://www.monzgear.com for more details on ordering and why we've developed the WiFiBoostGo.

                                                                                                                                  

"In a nutshell, smartphones really need an intelligent boost to make them work properly..."


Other Ways You Can Help

There are many ways to contribute! We know that you may not be in the position t o help us out with a contribution, that's why we've set aside 30 LIMITED EDITION units of the WiFiBoostGlo (the SLIM version) to those of you get the message across the loudest! Use the Social Buttons on this campaign to spread the word and one of these could be yours! Use the Social Links at the top of the page to Share this campaign. 

                                                                                                                                  

FAQ

This section Frequently Asked Questions provides extra information

What is WiFiBoostGo?

WiFiBoostGo is a digital Signal Booster for your iPhone which packs a hefty back-up power source while also functioning as a portable storage server. All features are managed from the free app that will be made available once production commences

How Does WiFiBoostGo work?

WiFiBoostGo locks onto the available wireless signals. By Boosting your iPhone's signal range, you can enjoy a stable wireless connection regardless of the interference from other devices, both indoors and outdoors.

Just having the WiFiBoostGo activated increases the signal range of your Smart-Phone by 200%. This means that is the WiFi Signal is 2(Low Reception) bars on any device, the WiFiBoostGo makes it 4(Good Reception) automatically! If there’s a really weak signal, flicking the antenna will increase the range of the Smart-phone by 600%. This means that a signal of 1 (Weak/Bad) becomes a 5 (Very Good/ Crystal Clear)!

How does it Power-Up or Cyberize my Smart-phone?

WiFiBoostGo provides 4 extensions to your favourite mobile device:

1. Boosts the WiFi (Wireless Frequency) of the device so that a crystal clear uninterrupted internet signal can be maintained.

2. Provides a power source with which you can recharge your Smart-phone by simply routing the energy via USB cable should the battery on your Smart-phone run low.

3. WiFiBoostGo also acts as an external Hard Disk with Wireless Transfer.  A SD Card slot that can read ALL memory cards and the CamerRoll on the iPhone.

4. The App manages all the functions of the WiFiBoostGo, allowing you to access & manage files, folders, and power supply.

Where can I get the App?

You can download the WiFiBoostGo App on http://www.monzgear.com and on Google Play and the App Store once we commence production of WiFiBoostGo.

What are SLIM & BOLD?

WiFiBoostGo comes in 2 sizes & 4 colours. SLIM contains a 3000mAh Battery to run the device and can recharge your iPhone at least three times before needing a recharge. BOLD has a 6000mAh battery and can reacharge your iPhone 5 times before needing a recharge. BOLD can also recharge a laptop battery once before needing a full recharge. BOLD is recommended to boost your iPad or any other tablet. Both versions boost your signal range by up to 600%

Is it safe?

The components of WiFiBoostGo have all passed the stringent approval requirements in Asia, Europe & America. It is a Class A Electronics Product with energy conservation specifications and wireless frequency emissions well below the accepted standards for health and safety.

What exactly do you mean by eco-friendly?

WiFiBoostGo is a Class A Electronic Product. All Electronic Products contain components which can be toxic to the environment. We’ve developed WiFiBoostGo with the environment in mind. We’ve used recycled and bio-degradable materials on the non-essential parts, such as the casing and other components. The sensitive hardware has been made from materials that are not toxic to the environment even if they are discarded. Our approach is to minimize damage to the environment. We can say that WiFiBoostGo is 100% Eco-Friendly.

What is the Limited Edition WiFiBoostGlo?

Exclusively for those of you that contribute to WiFiBoostGo Development Fund, we have created the WiFiBoostGlo. The functionality of the LIMITED EDITION WiFiBoostGlo is exactly the same as that of the WiFiBoostGo with one cool addition: a power-sensitive antenna! 

The antenna registers the device battery and changes colour according to the power levels. so when it is fully charged, the antenna is green. When the batter yis running low, it glows red. When you'r recharging, the antenna glows a soft golden yellow. This is a LIMITED EDITION only for our backers to show our appreciation for their own unique innovative spirit in supporting our cause. Thanks!

 LIMITED EDITION: WiFiBoostGlo

WiFiBoostGo:"the only intelligent option for your smartphone"Secure Data & Privacy  on all Access Point with a Double Key-encryption WiFi zone                          WiFiBoostGo (SLIM version) & the LIMITED EDITION WiFiBoostGlo

                                                                                                                                     





A WiFi signal booster with smarts


- WiFiBoostGo provides crystal clear WiFi reception on weak signals by boosting your smartphones signal range up to 600%. It also extends the range of weak wireless routers  in your home or office
- WiFiBoostGo gauges the battery power on your device
while being a portable power-bank for your smartphone
- WiFiBoostGo extends the storage capacity for your smartphone
or tablet.
- Manage everything from one simple app that’s available
on GooglePlay and the AppStore.


Smartphones have become a daily part of our lives. For business,
pleasure or a bit of both, we all use our phones to surf the web and to connect
with our own. 

                                                                                                                                    


We've Research and Developed the concept of a #WiFiSignal booster and we're confident that with your help we can raise the funds necessary to produce #WiFiBoostGo and make it available to the public.
       WiFiBoostGo: 4 power-ups for your iPhone!


 #SciFiReality for #TheInternetOfThings...
So what do we need the most for our phones?  We all  love
our smart-phones, although sometimes we wish they could do more!
Ideally we want crystal-clear WiFi
reception, a super-long battery life and some extra storage wouldn't hurt. And we want to manage it all from a cool app.   

1. Excellent! Your new smartphone can brew coffee, lock the garage and draw your bath with the apps you’ve just installed. But you find that you’ve got to go to the kitchen and turn the machine on, stand right next to the garage to lock it and you might as well just take a shower.
WiFiBoostGo increases the range of the WiFi signal that your phone can actually achieve what these cool apps promise they can deliver.        

Even on new devices -  just like the iPhone 6
Plus with massive storage and a "solid
24 hours talk-time " - battery-drain & storage issues still
remain.  
2. WiFiBoostGo is packed with a huge battery which can recharge your phone in less than an hour and is good for 5 recharges; so you’ll never have to worry about looking for an outlet when your battery runs low.
3. Transfer files to the SD Card on the #WiFiBoostGo to free up space on your phone. We all know how quickly those GB’s can fill up: with WiFiBoostGo you can record and upload those viral videos you’ve never been able to capture at the time.
4. A Free App to find all WiFi spots, boost your phones WiFi signal, manage your smartphone so you can surf and store everything on the internet. You can download the WiFiBoostGo app for free from GooglePlay and the Apple Store.
A portable power-house for your mobile
phone; WiFiBoostGo boosts 4
aspects of your device:

Signal & Speed: Increases WiFi range by
     600%* for a stable WiFi internet signal - live streaming is a breeze
Stamina & Power: The super sized battery
     acts as an auxiliary power source to recharge your phone under any
     conditions
Storage & Space: A secondary external
     storage device; WiFiBoostGo can handle SD cards for added storage
     connections.
App Control: Download the WiFiBoostGo App
     for FREE on Google Play and the App Store and manage your content easily.


#WifiBoostGo features
state-of-the-art technology for maximum power gain on all devices: a portable
#PowerBank and extra storage for your iPhone.
                                                                                                                                 
     WiFiBoostGo: #CyberWiFi not science-fiction
You've probably wasted tons of precious MB's with your
carrier; you may have even switched companies in the hope of a better network,
but have discovered that 
            the more things change the more they stay the
same.



We know the score. That's why we've developed WiFiBoostGo. You see,
our phones are the problem. My phone (no matter what phone I use) and ALL other
devices trying to get a decent WiFi connection contribute to huge traffic
spikes, low bandwidth sharing & poor- or no-WiFi reception, even at
powerful HotSpots.
 No-one will ever tell you this; especially if they're trying
to sell you the latest edition of the "Supernova Smartphone" or
whatever.
Cue MonzGear - that's us -
a tech-savvy group of developers based in Hong Kong, where we've developed the
WiFiBoostGo; an environment where the chances of winning the Lottery are better than getting an uninterrupted WiFi
signal.

during our stringent R&D process, that WiFiBoostGo can also super-charge Notebooks,
Tablets, Laptops & even Desktop PC's.
                                                                                                                                    
"In a nutshell, smart-phones really need an intelligent boost to make them
work properly..."

parameters - antenna efficiency, antenna impedance and size which in this case really
does matter – WiFiBoostGo triples your phones’s WiFi signal range at
once. The LED display lights indicate the connection levels of WiFi
signals in the vicinity. Activate the Signal Booster and juice up the range to
600%*.

     Surveillance Camcorder

(Both are application driven devices to enhance various features of your smartphone/tablet)
Our development team has contributed to the Wireless Technology
that drives other Portable Wireless Devices on the market
Our vision is to design and develop innovative
products directly for consumers, without the middleman; producing  environmentally sound and #EcoFriendly
electronics. This makes for flexible products, with an intrinsic value based on
more than just economics! 
                                                                                                                                  



Color Coded Coolness:
WiFiBoostGo is dressed in the coolest color of them
all: Black.
They say that the devil is in the details, and so
we've created 4 color schemes for both SLIM
& BOLD versions: These are
Cherry Acid Red, Gold Flow Stallion, Lime Wire Green & Electric Heaven
Blue. Cool names for cool colours!


Exclusively for our Indiegogo sponsors, we've created
the WiFiBoostGlo, yes you read correctly it was not a typo, WiFiBoostGlo has a glowing antenna to
indicate power status.

                                                                                                                                  
Risks & Challenges: 
Development, Production & Distribution
As we've already developed the WiFiBoostGo prototype
and have tested it in the most demanding of WiFi reception environments (bars,
restaurants, lounges & cafes in Hong Kong)  the main challenge is in maintaining the same
high standards with the proposed procurement plan in an awesome design. Global
electronic device requirements have already been met, including the stringent
FCC in effect in most of North America and Europe.
"...we'd rather plan for the greatest margin of error... than sell you some half-baked lie every month with a vague email..."


Being located in Shenzhen's manufacturing hub, we are in situ of the planet's
greatest software and electronics production environment (Hint: it's not
Silicon Valley), so it is very simple for us to focus on these research,
development and manufacturing issues. We are working directly with the
component suppliers and recycled-parts manufactures to ensure the highest
quality for WiFiBoostGo. We appreciate your confidence in us and we promise to
deliver to you the best *boosting* experience possible.
Intellectual Property(IP) Rights are very important and we ensure that all our parts are manufactured in separate and undisclosed OEM's so that there will be no chance of some hacked-product hitting the market 6 months after you've received your WiFiBoostGo. 
We've given Alpha & Beta Testing a large time-window for incidentals. 
After the Alpha production run at these separate facilities, the componnets are assemebled, tested, tweaked and modified if necessary and the re-design is sent for Beta production and the cycle repeats. When we're satisfied that the product is reaady, we order the main production run, collect & assemble the components, marvel and gleam at this cool invention that YOU have held make possible and ship the WiFiBoostGlo to YOU. These large time windows are there to ensure that we can deliver in the time that we have stated. 
We don't want to burst your bubble by sending you an "Oops! Sorry, but production has been postponed" sop-story. No! We'd rather be straight-up and plan for the greatest margin of error than try to pull the wool over your eyes and keep feeding you some half-baked lie every month with an obscure & vague email...
Our Research & Development facilities lack the necessary Tooling & Construction platforms, so we have budgeted for the purchase and/or production of specific tooling for moulds and components. Quality, Assurance and Certificates for Health, Safety and other Regulatory organizations are obtained through an inspection process by globally recognized entities within the industry.
                                                                                                                                  
Perks For Our Backers
A note to our Backers: A $10 Shipping Fee has been included into
the amount for the Perks.

The $5 perk is a Big Banner with your name on it! This
too will find it's way to your inbox. You can use this Banner on your own
web-page if you wish, but your name will go down in Monzgear history and onto
our website as one of the people that made this possible. Thanks! We know you like our idea but are not in the position to contribute more. Thanks!


SLIM
& Discreet



"Super Early Bird" backers of
the SLIM version will get the
Limited Edition WiFiBoostGlo for $49. Only 150 of these!


BOLD as GOLD



"Super Early Bird" backers of
the BOLD version will get the Limited Edition WiFiBoostGlo for $69. Only 150 of
these!


Plus we've got awesome Combopack perks: Check out the pledges on the right --->
                                                                                                                                  
Retail price for WiFiBoostGo will be:
SLIM version: $99.00
BOLD version: $119,00 
(We’re still tweaking the NITRO prototype
to maintain the "Sleek & Sexy" look and feel of SLIM & BOLD. Retail
price is estimated to be $179.00)
You can pre-order at these prices. Pre-orders do not include the WiFiBoostGlo.
WiFiBoostGlo is a Limited
Edition version for this Indiegogo Campaign ONLY!
                             
You can contact us at: http://www.monzgear.com for more details on ordering and why we've
developed the WiFiBoostGo.
                                                                                                                                  




"In a nutshell, smartphones really need an intelligent boost to make them work
properly..."

Other Ways You Can Help
There are many ways to contribute! We know that you
may not be in the position t o help us out with a contribution, that's why we've
set aside 30 LIMITED EDITION units of the WiFiBoostGlo (the
SLIM version) to those of you get the message across the loudest! Use the
Social Buttons on this campaign to spread the word and one of these could be
yours! Use the Social Links at the top of the page to Share this campaign. 
                                                                                                                                  
FAQ
This section Frequently Asked Questions provides extra
information
What is WiFiBoostGo?
WiFiBoostGo is a digital Signal Booster for your
iPhone which packs a hefty back-up power source while also functioning as a
portable storage server. All features are managed from the free app that will be made available once production commences
How Does WiFiBoostGo work?
WiFiBoostGo locks onto the available wireless signals.
By Boosting your iPhone's signal range, you can enjoy a stable wireless
connection regardless of the interference from other devices, both indoors and
outdoors.
Just having the WiFiBoostGo activated increases the
signal range of your Smart-Phone by 200%. This means that is the WiFi Signal is
2(Low Reception) bars on any device, the WiFiBoostGo makes it 4(Good Reception)
automatically! If there’s a really weak signal, flicking the antenna will
increase the range of the Smart-phone by 600%. This means that a signal of
1 (Weak/Bad) becomes a 5 (Very Good/ Crystal Clear)!
How does it Power-Up or Cyberize
my Smart-phone?
WiFiBoostGo provides 4 extensions to your favourite
mobile device:
1. Boosts the WiFi (Wireless Frequency) of the
device so that a crystal clear uninterrupted internet signal can be maintained.
2. Provides a power source with which you can
recharge your Smart-phone by simply routing the energy via USB cable should the
battery on your Smart-phone run low.
3. WiFiBoostGo also acts as an external Hard Disk
with Wireless Transfer.  A SD Card slot that can read ALL memory cards and
the CamerRoll on the iPhone.
4. The App manages all the functions of the
WiFiBoostGo, allowing you to access & manage files, folders, and power
supply.
Where can I get the App?
You can download the WiFiBoostGo App on http://www.monzgear.com and on Google Play and the App Store once we commence production of WiFiBoostGo.

What are SLIM & BOLD?

WiFiBoostGo comes in 2 sizes & 4 colours. SLIM
contains a 3000mAh Battery to run the device and can recharge your iPhone at
least three times before needing a recharge. BOLD has a 6000mAh battery and can
reacharge your iPhone 5 times before needing a recharge. BOLD can also recharge
a laptop battery once before needing a full recharge. BOLD is recommended to boost your
iPad or any other tablet. Both versions boost your signal range by up to 600%
Is it safe?
The components of WiFiBoostGo have all passed the
stringent approval requirements in Asia, Europe & America. It is a Class A
Electronics Product with energy conservation specifications and wireless frequency emissions well below the accepted standards for health and safety.
What exactly do you mean by
eco-friendly?
WiFiBoostGo is a Class A Electronic Product. All
Electronic Products contain components which can be toxic to the environment.
We’ve developed WiFiBoostGo with the environment in mind. We’ve used recycled
and bio-degradable materials on the non-essential parts, such as the casing and
other components. The sensitive hardware has been made from materials that are not
toxic to the environment even if they are discarded. Our approach is to
minimize damage to the environment. We can say that WiFiBoostGo is 100%
Eco-Friendly.
What is the Limited Edition
WiFiBoostGlo?
Exclusively for those of you that contribute to WiFiBoostGo
Development Fund, we have created the WiFiBoostGlo. The functionality of the
LIMITED EDITION WiFiBoostGlo is exactly the same as that of the WiFiBoostGo
with one cool addition: a power-sensitive antenna! 
The antenna registers the device battery and changes
colour according to the power levels. so when it is fully charged, the antenna
is green. When the batter yis running low, it glows red. When you'r recharging,
the antenna glows a soft golden yellow. This is a LIMITED EDITION only for our
backers to show our appreciation for their own unique innovative spirit in
supporting our cause. Thanks!


 LIMITED EDITION: WiFiBoostGlo

story:
Embrace EzBand

We are a group of passionate tertiary students aspiring to be technopreneurs. Our idea for EzBand came about when we were having difficulty making payment on public transports. We noticed that many students carry their laptops with one hand and use the other to dig around their bags or wallet looking for their payment card. We also realise that elderly usually hang their passes around their neck. We were inspired to do something about this and thus EzBand.


EzBand+ 

Handy Thumbdrive 


Why EzBand?

EzBand will not only ease peoples’ life, it can also act as a fashion accessory and also helps forgetful elderly, teenagers who are in a rush, people who frequently misplace their cards, people who have too many cards.     

Funds
  • Maunfacturing
  • Development


Join EzBand

Being a contributor to our project would help us greatly in getting the funding we need to manufacture the product and the thought of people supporting our idea will also spur us to continue to improve. Nevertheless we will also grabs this opportunity given by contributors to showcase not only our idea but also how we are passionate about EzBand. Contributors will also be presented a limited IndieGoGo edition of EzBand.


FAQ

1. What if goal is not met? 
The funds collected would still continue to go to manufacturing EzBand. We believe in our idea and with what little fundings we have, we will still continue to produce it and start to grow from there. (:
2. Is it available for other countries?

We will first make it a success in Singapore before bringing it to other countries.  

3. What if EzBand does not fit my my hand?

We have different sizes. 

4. What kind of customisation can I do?

You will be able to craft any words or pictures into the band, as long as a design of your EzBand is emailed to us.

If you have any other quires, feel free to drop us an email: amperealw2014@gmail.com

Thank you (: 

As a contributor, you are not only supporting us but also supporting our idea. EzBand will be valuable to you like how it is to us as we all believe in the same goal; that it will change the way people pay for public transport and also ease peoples’ life. At the same time, bringing joy to peoples’ life due to convenience of EzBand.
