story:
We love Pinball Games

tPinball is an accesory designed for tablets that will allow you to play pinball as if it was a real pinball machine. With its 3 buttons, it emulates perfectly the 2 flippers as well as the plunger, so as to offer a real sensation that only tPinball can give you.

tPinball will be available in two colors, black and white, and you will be able to choose the one you like the most.

 

Below you can check how it looks on an ipad, ipad mini and nexus 7.

 

Adaptable to any tablet

Thanks to its extendable design, tPinball is suitable for most tablets. Besides, you will be able to take it anywhere because of its small size.

 

For all platforms

tPinball is compatible with iOs, Android, PC and Mac. Can you imagine playing on your tablet and also being able to connect tPinball to your PC/Mac to play your favorite pinball emulator?

 

 

Open Source PDK + 3D Printer Ready

tPinball has an Open Source Pinball Developer Kit (PDK) for all available platforms, and it is very easy to integrate.

To check how to integrate PDK, two games will be launched. One for Android devices and the other for iOs.

These games will be launched with an open source license, so you will be able to check how the PDK was integrated to them.

On top of this, in JanduSoft we believe that 3D printers are the future, and this is why we will share the 3D pinball model for all those people that wish to print their spare parts.

 

 

 

 

Operating Mode

tPinball works as a keyboard connected via bluetooth, so if your tablet or computer is a bluetooth-enabled product you will be able to use it. In order to do this, you will only have to synchronize it with your device.

tPinball works with 2 AA batteries and it has an on/off button so you can save energy when you are not playing.

 

Compatible Games

We are currently talking to developers in order to integrate PDK to other games, so you can enjoy the greatest possible number of games with this device.

If you are a developer and you want to integrate PDK to your game, let us know and send a 586x100 size image of your game and a 100x100px image of your logo so that we can add them to the list of games that will be compatible.

It doesn't have to be a pinball game, there is only one requirement to use PDK: the game should not use more than three buttons.

 

Confirmed Games 

Here there is a list of confirmed games that will work with tPinball. 

Companies that support us

   

We need money to make tPinball happen

It's not easy for a small company to make this kind of product. A great initial investment is required to launch this project and that is why we need a small help from the community.

The process of plastic injection is not cheap, and this is besides the production cost of the connection board, and the cost of assembling the final product.

This is the reason why we need to produce a minimum number of units to launch the project into the market.

Consequently, our campaign costs are really high. But we hope that thanks to the community, we will be able to carry out this project.

 

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you want to help us, you can do it in different ways, not just participating in the project. There are many other ways you can do. Here is a list of them:

  • Tell your friends and relatives
  • Share our campaign on twitter, facebook or other social networks
  • Get in touch with developers so they can integrate PDK to their games
  • Talk about us in your blogs/forums/favorite websites
  • "Like" us on our facebook profile

 

 

As seen on...

Do you have a blog that mentions us? Have you seen us on the media? Let us know and we will create a link on this page.

 

 

Tell us what you think

Do you have something to tell us? Leave a comment or visit our webpage www.tpinball.com and get in touch with us.

story:
Short Summary

uBubble is the WINNER of Startup Weekend Stavanger!

Step out of your bubble and EXPLORE!

Ever had trouble to refine and customize all of your newsfeeds and explore them as location-based, relevant information? 

Social media comes to your life!

Our application will help you to discover the world outside of your bubble!

This funding will be spend to register our trademark, fund company and eventually copyright our concept.

What we need & what you get

We have a passion to develop the product people will enjoy using while its evolving their way of interaction.

Your contribution is extremely important to us! This way we will know how many people are interested in the product, how could we do it better and last but not least gather funds to kick off the process to deliver a minimal viable product which we can show to potential investors.

Our team consist of:

Our designer, Jeremy, his passions are visiuals and user interactions.

Business developer, Max who has already worked with startups before.

Renate, our marketing and economics specialist.

Alex, technical advisor and social communication.

The Impact 

Our goal is to enrich the way you interact with people, places and social media around YOU! 

Business developer from uBubble team, Max has previously started one company which i has got 100.000 € of governement-controlled investments and investors to develop lifting equipment for the offshore industry and has therfore experience on launching startups.

This thing is real, guys we are participating in Startup Weekend Stavanger this april.

Look at us working on http://instagram.com/ububble

We are past design phase and ready to start developing a prototype while we are getting business and marketing strategy in place!

Other Ways You Can Help

We are looking for:

- A young yet expirienced iOS developer to help us make a prototype.

- Talented software engineer focusing on backenend systems which could get data from different information channels such as Facebook, Twitter, FourSquare and other types of sources such as newspapers, map apps and bus routes applications.

Follow us on:

Facebook        https://www.facebook.com/bububbleapp

Twitter            https://twitter.com/uBubble_app

Instagram       http://instagram.com/ububble

Web-Site        http://ububble.co

story:
Incredible worldwide media coverage at the MWC19

The 2019 edition of the Mobile World Congress was definitely one to remember for Avenir Telecom and its P18K. Thanks to its unique offer, the P18K made it to UberGizmo’s “Best of MWC” list and quickly became one of the highlights of the show with hundreds of journalists, bloggers, and YouTubers lining up to get their hands on it.

 

Over 7 million views on YouTube

7 million...Yes, that’s how many times videos on the P18K have been watched following its unveiling at the Mobile World Congress 2019.

 

Let the story continue…

After receiving such an enthusiastic interest from the press and from the public, we wanted to make sure the success story of the P18K would continue. By launching this unique smartphone on IndieGogo, we’re ensuring that anyone who wants to get it can easily order it.
 

What makes the P18K so special?

  • Unparalleled Battery Life

A recent survey by Morning Consult has revealed that something much more practical than most current innovation is at the top of smartphone users' wish lists. According to the survey, longer battery life is the most important feature for American smartphone owners, ahead of usability, storage, and durability (Statista, Feb 2019)

The P18K incorporates unrivalled technological advances as it features the most powerful battery ever developed for a smartphone, offering a concrete solution to the needs of the modern day smartphone users.  The carefully selected software and operating system help extend battery life, promising a seamless consumer experience.

The P18K will be the biggest crowd pleaser, given that its users will be able to make up to 90 hours of calls, listen to 100 hours of music and watch around 2 days of video on a single charge. In standby mode, the battery lasts up to 50 days, perfect for long trips where access to power may be limited.  And when a full charge is necessary, users can recharge their device quickly thanks to the fast charge feature and the fast charger provided.

The P18K also offers a power bank functionality to easily charge other devices such as smartphones and tablets.

2-in-1 smartphone
The P18K is easier and lighter to carry around than a regular power bank + a smartphone.

 

  • Five Cameras for Amazing Shots

Nothing has been left behind when designing the P18K as cameras also boast some innovative features. This unique smartphone is among the first to feature five cameras, of which TWO are front-facing in the slide-across "pop-up" housing.  The 16MP and 2MP lenses promise users sharp and bright selfies.

The P18K features 3 rear cameras (12MP + 5MP + 2MP), which together produce incredibly bright shots with stunning depth of field and a professional finish.

  • The Pop-Up Revolution

The introduction of Pop-Up technology allows for a fully uninterrupted screen.  The 6.2" Full HD+ display offers exceptional image quality with rich colours and strong contrast.  It promises an immersive user experience, displaying images as they were intended to be seen.

 

  • Delivering High-Level Performances

Performance has been placed at the heart of the P18K's development to deliver a smarter, faster and more powerful smartphone.

It offers 6GB of RAM and 128GB of storage to enable users to switch from app to app with ease and store thousands of multimedia files.

The MediaTek Helio P70 chipset ensures agility and speed across a range of applications and tasks.  The phone's graphics performance has been enhanced, with optimised energy efficiency delivering unparalleled user experience.  

 

 

Download the Technical Specifications

 

Challenges

At present, we have an initial functioning prototype of the P18K that we built with our industrial design partners and that was presented and tested at the Mobile World Congress 2019.

Our teams are now working to finalise mechanical engineering, PCB and radio electronics for the P18K. We’ll also be working with our factory to launch the mass production.

Our aim is to have the product available for shipping to the first backers of our campaign in October 2019. We will be providing our backers with regular updates on the P18K's progress.

Please note that there are inherent risks during the production process that may be beyond our control, including but not limited to:
•Certification delays
•Production delays
•Supply Chain/Mass Production

 

About Avenir Telecom

With 30 years of expertise in the mobile phone industry, Avenir Telecom designs and distributes mobile phones and accessories, including a full range of products under the exclusive Energizer® licence. Headquartered in Marseille, Avenir Telecom operates worldwide with products currently sold in 55 countries. The Group has offices in Eastern Europe, India, China and the United Arab Emirates. Thanks to these varied locations, the company can establish its international positioning and capture market share in areas of strategic growth. Avenir Telecom is listed on Euronext in Paris – compartment C (FR0000066052 – AVT). Avenir Telecom share is part of the CAC Mid & Small and CAC Technology indices.
story_txt:
Incredible worldwide media coverage at the MWC19
The 2019 edition of the Mobile World Congress was definitely one to remember for Avenir Telecom and its P18K. Thanks to its unique offer, the P18K made it to UberGizmo’s “Best of MWC” list and quickly became one of the highlights of the show with hundreds of journalists, bloggers, and YouTubers lining up to get their hands on it. Over 7 million views on YouTube7 million...Yes, that’s how many times videos on the P18K have been watched following its unveiling at the Mobile World Congress 2019. Let the story continue…After receiving such an enthusiastic interest from the press and from the public, we wanted to make sure the success story of the P18K would continue. By launching this unique smartphone on IndieGogo, we’re ensuring that anyone who wants to get it can easily order it. What makes the P18K so special?Unparalleled Battery LifeA recent survey by Morning Consult has revealed that something much more practical than most current innovation is at the top of smartphone users' wish lists. According to the survey, longer battery life is the most important feature for American smartphone owners, ahead of usability, storage, and durability (Statista, Feb 2019)The P18K incorporates unrivalled technological advances as it features the most powerful battery ever developed for a smartphone, offering a concrete solution to the needs of the modern day smartphone users.  The carefully selected software and operating system help extend battery life, promising a seamless consumer experience.The P18K will be the biggest crowd pleaser, given that its users will be able to make up to 90 hours of calls, listen to 100 hours of music and watch around 2 days of video on a single charge. In standby mode, the battery lasts up to 50 days, perfect for long trips where access to power may be limited.  And when a full charge is necessary, users can recharge their device quickly thanks to the fast charge feature and the fast charger provided.The P18K also offers a power bank functionality to easily charge other devices such as smartphones and tablets.2-in-1 smartphoneThe P18K is easier and lighter to carry around than a regular power bank + a smartphone. Five Cameras for Amazing ShotsNothing has been left behind when designing the P18K as cameras also boast some innovative features. This unique smartphone is among the first to feature five cameras, of which TWO are front-facing in the slide-across "pop-up" housing.  The 16MP and 2MP lenses promise users sharp and bright selfies.The P18K features 3 rear cameras (12MP + 5MP + 2MP), which together produce incredibly bright shots with stunning depth of field and a professional finish.The Pop-Up RevolutionThe introduction of Pop-Up technology allows for a fully uninterrupted screen.  The 6.2" Full HD+ display offers exceptional image quality with rich colours and strong contrast.  It promises an immersive user experience, displaying images as they were intended to be seen. Delivering High-Level PerformancesPerformance has been placed at the heart of the P18K's development to deliver a smarter, faster and more powerful smartphone.It offers 6GB of RAM and 128GB of storage to enable users to switch from app to app with ease and store thousands of multimedia files.The MediaTek Helio P70 chipset ensures agility and speed across a range of applications and tasks.  The phone's graphics performance has been enhanced, with optimised energy efficiency delivering unparalleled user experience.    Download the Technical Specifications ChallengesAt present, we have an initial functioning prototype of the P18K that we built with our industrial design partners and that was presented and tested at the Mobile World Congress 2019.Our teams are now working to finalise mechanical engineering, PCB and radio electronics for the P18K. We’ll also be working with our factory to launch the mass production.Our aim is to have the product available for shipping to the first backers of our campaign in October 2019. We will be providing our backers with regular updates on the P18K's progress.Please note that there are inherent risks during the production process that may be beyond our control, including but not limited to:•Certification delays•Production delays•Supply Chain/Mass Production About Avenir TelecomWith 30 years of expertise in the mobile phone industry, Avenir Telecom designs and distributes mobile phones and accessories, including a full range of products under the exclusive Energizer® licence. Headquartered in Marseille, Avenir Telecom operates worldwide with products currently sold in 55 countries. The Group has offices in Eastern Europe, India, China and the United Arab Emirates. Thanks to these varied locations, the company can establish its international positioning and capture market share in areas of strategic growth. Avenir Telecom is listed on Euronext in Paris – compartment C (FR0000066052 – AVT). Avenir Telecom share is part of the CAC Mid & Small and CAC Technology indices.

story:
About the Findy Product


         


These buttons were designed to be stylish and discreet in order to prevent any visual eyesores from emerging. For example, if you were to attach one of the buttons to your car keys, it would appear to be just another key chain that easily blends in with all of the other key chains that you have accumulated.Each button comes with a tiny light that flashes and flickers as well as a small speaker,so you will be able to hear and even see them once they have been activated through your control panel during a search.

"Findy Remote is small, priceless controller with Bluetooth  4.0 technology, that helps you keep track of everything.This device is especially created for those people who would like to have separate controller at their home, office, or even garage instead of using their daily phone. It makes finding things even more comfortable! It is also wonderful solution for those who own older models of phones that do not support Bluetooth 4.0 technology."





Primary range of the Findy covers a distance of up to 150 feet. Keep in mind that the Findy is not currently able to calculate that distance and reflect its measurement on the interface of the control panel, but it is programmed to help you to easily and quickly determine the strength of the signal as you get closer to and farther away from the object that is being tracked.


As soon as one of the devices being tracked gets disconnected or goes out of range and loses the actual signal, the control panel will notify the user so that they can resolve the issue accordingly. This feature will also map the last location when that device was connected so that you can effectively retrace your steps in order to retrieve the item if necessary.


Another benefit of the Findy is that you will be able to stay connected with your friends through this system so that you can help them to keep track of their things as they help you to keep track of yours. A "Friend's Findy" signal will flash whenever you are close to their devices so that you can quickly contact the owner to let them know what you have found. There truly is so much that you can accomplish by using the Findy system and its innovative design has still left plenty of room for growth and more enhancements in the near future.


Look and Share Findy also on:



        

If you have some questions, please contact with us by team@myfindyapp.com

story:
Hello everyone! We are Cinespa Studios, a production and audiovisual training company. We are here to present the SteadiPhone,  a device to help you getting the best quality pictures with your mobile phone. From now on, you will dramatically improve the quality of your pictures and videos, in an easy and simple way, there will not be any more blurred photos and videos with vibrations for you.


An exclusive and unique product
  After many years carring out different professional projects with mobile devices, we realized that most of the users of the mobile phone cameras, were not able to take good pictures or videos because the pictures were blurred, and the videos would not stop vibrating, so most off the good memories records were ruined.

  The mobile devices are getting more and more popular nowadays, and we are constantly using them to share freshly captured pictures and videos in professional and social networks, and in the same way, the necessity of new devices to let the people get professional quality pictures are becoming more and more demanded these days. To cover this demand we have developed our “Stediphone”, an affordable device with the best results, letting you get the best pictures, in any moment and in the easiest possible way. Being a professional photographer has never been that easy.

What we need and what you get
  To carry this project out, we are putting on sale the devices for all of you. Your rewards are directed solely to cover the costs for the production process and product shipment.

  Cinespa Studios have the logistical capacity to develop SteadiPhone, with no problems to distribute the product, whatever its dimension of sale. Technicians and administrators of the organization, have conducted studies on the costs, to ensure that the product will reach its destination on said date, no delays, no excuses.

  The rewards are clearly defined so you can purchase the product for a unique price. If are working with a company interested on its distribution, you can choose the reward that best suits your interests.



Why SteadiPhone?
  Our campaign is based on the slogan "Make the Difference".  The use of SteadiPhone bring your photos and videos a superior quality of pictures from other users. Thus, whether for personal use (vacations, tourism, ...) or professional, you'll get outstanding results. From now on, your social networks can be filled with professional images.

Follow us
  On Twitter and Facebook, you can get in touch with us, following everything that happens in relation to the project, we will publish daily the progress of our campaign. You can visit our official website, please find the link below, There, you can upload your videos to share experiences with other users of Stediphone.

We grant you the best service for the best price.

Regards, Juan Miguel Morante and Jorge Latorre.

Official website: Web Official SteadiPhone

story:
PRESS KIT AVAILABLE IN THE GALLERY


OVERVIEW    FEATURES    TECHNOLOGY    REWARDS    FAQ


THANK YOU FOR JOINING US IN THE JOURNEY TO BRING ARCO TO LIFE!!








 

     








    




NOTE: We will send a survey asking for colour of choice after the campaign ends.

NOTE: Shipping cost must be added as extra to the contribution you make. Please add it once you click the perk you want. It will be displayed below the contribution as additional gift. Illustration below




The T-shirt sizes will be collected from you after the completion of the campaign and will be delivered in January 2015. 

Where we are at and where we will take it to


We have been working on arco since March 2014. We now have a functioning prototype which we are quite excited about. As you can see arco works quite well with iOS devices. However, we don't want to stop here. We want arco to be accessible even for android users. Hence we are developing the app to do so. 

We would also like you to have features that will allow you to customise arco. The app will allow you to play with vivid colours and assign it to your notification types. More information on specifics will be provided as we progress.

The next phase for arco will be to finalise the electronics designs and develop the PCB. This will enable us to make arco slimmer than our prototype. In parallel we will be working on the app development to add the customisation features.

The prototype was developed in house. However, to provide best quality product, we will outsource PCB design and App development to an expert team that we have good relations with. Details on this and our manufacturers will be provided once they allow us to share.

Once the campaign ends, we will give a green signal to our manufacturers to create the mould for the casing. It should take 40 days for them to make one. Meanwhile we will also send our final PCB designs for mass manufacturing. 

Once we receive them, we will integrate it, test it and ship it to you as soon as possible. We expect to ship arco in April 2015.

We will keep you updated throughout our journey. However, if you need any more details, please contact us directly on hello@meworksco.com and we will be happy to answer your queries.


The Making of arco!



About Us

MeWorks is an Australian startup company currently operating from Dubai, United Arab Emirates. We focus on developing products and services in the field of Internet of Things (IoT), Wearable Technology and Robotics.  We like to build gadgets that make your life easier and fun. Hence we have invented arco.   

We are also working on another exciting technology called fodo which we will be launching soon. 

We are quite passionate about our technology and any new technologies in IoT, Wearables, Robotics and Gadgets domains. 

You can find out more information about us at www.meworksco.com

We would also love to get social with you via our Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and Pinterest. So please get in touch and share our exciting technologies with your family and friends.



 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES


We have come a long way to create a prototype that works with iOS device without an app. However, since we want android users to be able to use arco and allow customisation, we are developing the app. 
The only risk that we see is the app development taking a longer than expected time. However, we have enough time to complete the app before we ship the product and we are positive that we can achieve it. Android connectivity to send notifications is possible as it already exists in other products. So we are not facing any difficult challenges of implementing these extra features. We will keep you updated with our progress.
To make this project a reality, we need to achieve our minimum goal of $40,000 so we can get our moulds made, app developed etc. The main challenge that we see is not being able to achieve this goal through Indiegogo. However, we would like to be positive and  we are not going to give up till we reach our goal.

FAQ


Adding Shipping Cost?

Please add relevant shipping cost on top of your perk as additional contributions. Once you select your perk, it will be displayed below the perk as additional gift. If you do not add, we will send you an email to remind you. You can then add it separately through "no perk, I just want to contribute" option. Simply click contribute now next to the video and it will show on top. Scroll up for illustration instructions. Just below the rewards.


How can I select the colour for my arco's body in order?

You can just place the order now by choosing your suitable perk. After the campaign ends, we will send you a survey asking for the colour preference. 


Does arco work with android devices?

Yes, we are working on an app that will allow arco to work with android devices. Unlike iOS devices, it will need an app to be downloaded which will be available for free. Android compatibility is possible as it already exists in other devices like smart watch for similar features.


Does it work with all smartphones?

Arco works with smartphones with built in Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) / Bluetooth SMART. Please check if your smartphone has BLE. For your reference, check this link.

Requirements:

 iPhone 4S and newer 
 iPad Mini, iPad 3rd gen and newer 
 iPod Touch 5th gen. 
 Must run iOS 7 or above
Android:
 Android devices running Android 4.3 or above


What if I don't have a compatible smartphone? Or what If I don't want smartphone connectivity for arco?

You can still purchase arco as a cool device. There is a functions button on arco which you can use to turn the light on. Kids without a phone can also play with it.


When will it be available?

Delivery is estimated to in April 2015.


What is arco?

Arco is a smart reactor that connects to your smartphone via bluetooth and reacts to your phone notifications. Never miss important notifications or phone calls when you are away from your phone in style.

  

How does it work?

Its simple. Just connect it to your smartphone by pairing bluetooth and wait for notifications. Depending on your notification, it will blink different colours. For example, if you get a facebook notification, it will blink blue. If you are getting call it will notify you with red flash, if you get an email it will blink green and so on. (It works without any app with iOS devices)


How can I use it?

You can wear it on your t shirt, place it on your work desk, keep it on your bed side table or place it on your car dash. Basically anywhere you like to be visually notified of your important notifications.

    


How do I pair arco to my smartphone?
You can connect to arco via the bluetooth of your phone. Your phone should have Bluetooth Low Energy or Bluetooth Smart built in. Please scroll up for the question on the requirements.

How to stop arco from flashing continuously after it receives notifications?


You can simply acknowledge your notifications on the phone by viewing it or clearing it. The flashing will stop.


What if I am away from phone, how can I stop arco from flashing?

You can press the function button on the side to stop it from flashing. You don’t necessarily have to go to your phone to do that.

    



At night how can I stop arco from flashing?

You can turn it off, disconnect from your phone or switch your bluetooth off in the phone. If you have the app, you can place it on do not disturb mode.


How can kids play with arco?

Arco is not only for adults. Even kids without phone can use it. Simply turn it on and press the functions button on the side. Arco will start flashing.


Is the battery rechargeable?

Yes, the battery can be recharged using micro USB cable provided. Just like your smartphone.


How long will the battery last?

Since it uses bluetooth low energy which consumes very less power, the battery can last for long. Since arco has RGB LEDs which consume most of the power, the battery life can depend on the usage. However, we are designing to give a battery life of few days at least for normal usage.


How can I wear it?

Arco comes with magnet inside which will allow you to wear it. We will provide you with another magnet piece that you can place it inside your t-shirt to attract arco to you.


How do I mount it anywhere?

Since arco has magnet inside, you can mount it on any metal surfaces like refrigerator. Alternatively, you can stick the extra magnet piece to a non metal surface using double sided tape and then mount arco on it. Arco also comes with an awesome stand which allows you to place arco anywhere, your work desk, bedside table etc.


Can I connect multiple arco to my smartphone?

Yes, you can have multiple arco connected to your smartphone. You can place them at multiple locations where you spend most of your time. They all will react to your notifications.


How many colour options are available for arco's body?

There are 7 options available currently. Scroll up for image. Black, Grey, Bondi Blue, Mahagony Red, Keepsake Pink, Indigo and Cobalt Blue. After the campaign ends, we will send you a survey asking for the colour preference.


How many light colours are possible?

Arco has RGB LEDs which can illuminate 16 million different colours. We are developing an app which will allow you to select any colors you want.


Can arco work without an app?

Yes, If you are using iOS device, you do not need an app unless you want to customise arco. If you have an android device, you will need to use an app to receive notifications.


What is the app for?

The app will allow you to connect arco to your android device. Apart from that it will also allow you to play with the lights and customise arco. Details of this will be available later.


ANY OTHER QUESTIONS? 

Please leave a comment or ask us through social media.

 That's all folks!!

Arco has RGB LEDs which can illuminate 16 million different colours. We are developing an app which will allow you to select any colors you want.
Can arco work without an app?
Yes, If you are using iOS device, you do not need an app unless you want to customise arco. If you have an android device, you will need to use an app to receive notifications.
What is the app for?
The app will allow you to connect arco to your android device. Apart from that it will also allow you to play with the lights and customise arco. Details of this will be available later.

ANY OTHER QUESTIONS? 
Please leave a comment or ask us through social media.


 That's all folks!!

story:
ShadowBox is an all-purpose, battery-powered, color-adjustable, wireless LED smart lamp that is capable of average run times of 8 and 12 hours between recharges. It can be controlled through either a customized infrared remote or with your smartphone through a long range radio frequency transmitter (ShadowHub).



It is packed full of useful lighting features including fades, flashes, strobes, music mode and more.  Designed into an extremely portable and functional enclosure, ShadowBox is a light that handles a variety of lighting needs.





Right out of the box, you can adjust ShadowBox with it's custom infrared remote.  Just point it at a light and choose a setting!

Our ShadowHub radio transmitter let's you control up to 30 lights.  It broadcasts its' own WiFi network to which you connect your smartphone or tablet.  

Your commands are sent to ShadowBox's over a 2.4 GHz radio signal at a range of over 500ft in all directions (open space).  ShadowHub can be magnetically mounted, run on AA batteries or through a USB-AC adapter, and is also networkable to an existing WiFi network.





Our LED panel incorporates high-output RGB LEDs and a center White LED ring in order create an amazing array of color washes and floods. Outputs up to 1000 Lumens at 120 degrees.

The center white LED ring intensity can be dialed and mixed in with the colored LEDs to create pastels and even more hues of color.  Used alone, the center ring serves as a flood light that will run for over 24 hours (prosumer battery).



ShadowBox is available with different battery options (run-times are with lights set to full brightness).

Consumer Pack - 4.5Ah battery, 3 hours on white, 4-6 hours on colors

Prosumer Pack - 8.0Ah battery, 5 hours set to white, 8-12+ hours on colors

*Battery Life Run Times are Estimates Based on Testing.  Results may vary.

The light body is available in a black or white matte finish.

A solid polycarbonate body combined with a sturdy metal stand ensure that ShadowBox is extremely robust and will withstand a fair amount of abuse.

 360 degree swivel so the light is easy to direct.

Water and kick proof latching LED switch. DC charge jack with water plug.

Weather Proof for the most extreme conditions


Attachable silicon diffuser works to soften the light.


 O-Clamp mountable

About the Founders:  

Chris Stahel started VividLite in 2009 when he handmade his first wireless led up-light. He had been working in the event industry at that time and was searching for a solution to his own lighting frustrations. He was tired of running wires and wasting hours of each day setting up event lighting only to break it down again at the end of the day. When he couldn't find the wireless light that he was looking for... He set out to make one himself and a few weeks later, VividLite was born. As soon as word got out about the new light, sales started to come in quickly.  Chris knew that he needed help and wanted someone on his team to help bring products to the next level.

Ken Wu joined shortly after the company was created and had a strong background in product development and manufacturing.  Having worked for years in smartphone design and development, he knew he could leverage his experience and that working together with Chris was a great match.  The two of them partnered up to bring the original product to new levels as well as to create new innovative and exciting products.

Since 2009, VividLite has been making quality products with the customer in mind. They have set up a strong team and they love what they are doing!!! Our mission at VividLite is to have fun while enabling people to brighten the world around them. We design and build thoughtfully engineered, durable, long lasting products that are easy to use and extremely versatile. With each product we design, we strive to capture a broader audience by packing as many features as possible into well priced products that stand out from anything else on the market. WE ARE EXTREMELY THANKFUL FOR THE LOYAL CUSTOMERS WE'VE MET ALONG THE WAY.

Risks and challenges

We have been designing and manufacturing lighting products since 2009. We are very familiar with the production, shipping and delivery process. We've got some great experience under our belts and have built our reputation manufacturing solid products that we stand behind by offering the best customer service of which we are capable. We've been through unexpected situations more than once, and we always go the extra distance to provide every customer with the best product and experience possible.

Ship Date: We've designed our rewards packages and shipping timelines based on very conservative estimates. There are always a few things that are out of our control such as customs, port strikes, delays due to severe weather condition and/or other unforeseen issues. Either way, we guarantee that you will receive an extremely high quality product and we will be in constant communication with updates regarding progress or changes. We always strive to exceed expectations!

Mobile Application Changes: As we refine the ShadowBox Mobile App, we will roll out new features and improve the user experience. Any changes to the code within the application will have the chance of causing small bugs or errors (even after thorough testing). We'll only make changes that enhance the product experience and we will always work quickly to fix anything that doesn't work perfectly within the app. Changes in the app are at our discretion and timeline and will be based on user feedback and customer comments.

Thanks so very much,
Chris & Ken and the Entire VividLite Team

story:
Welcome!

What's My Page?

My Page is an app, which allows you to create your own website in just a few minutes. You just need to choose a website-design, set the title and description and fill in the content you want to place on your website. The app is currently only available on the iOS App Store and this is what i want to change.

Everything started 6 month ago, as my mother asked me to build her, her own website. As i started working on her website, i got the idea to create an app, which allows her to build up her website on her own.

After many sleepless nights of constructing, programming, drinking coffee and performing magic tricks, i created an prototype of the app, which is now available for iPhones, iPads and iPods. [Get it!].

Give me website-samples!

The following link provides a sample website, which has been created with the app My Page.

http://indiegogo.paaage.com/

What's next?

I'm currently working on the following points. Your support would help me a lot to finish everything quite faster.

  • Android support (for Android 2.1 and above)
  • An upgraded iOS version of the app
  • Even more functionality (i.e. image-galleries, video-uploads, subcategories, and a lot more)

Why do i need your support!?

The developement of the iOS app took me a lot of time, because i had to face many problems that occured during the developement-process.

I really love developing apps, but i can't do it withouth your support, because there are many things that costs a lot. All-in-all i investigated about 2500€ into the app and that's a lot for an 19 years old student. For example: I bought devices to test the app, i bought special software to create the app, i had to rent a server that stores all the data,...

Your support would be really helpfull and mean everything to me! I would really like to thank you more than 1000 times, if this project gets founded successfully.

About me

 

My name is Lukas Böhler and i am an austrian hobby-developer. I love developing apps a lot, because every new app is a new challenge and let's me collect a lot of experience. I really hope that you enjoy using my apps! If you have any kind of questions, problems or suggestions, feel free to contact me.

I'm currently working as an conscientious objector performing community service. This job is a really good compensation to the developer-thing. I also like to play guitar and sing a little bit :)

PostScript

P.S.

Sorry for any misspellings or other issues in this project.

P.P.S.

I want to thank everybody, who backs this project. I really really really want to thank you!

story:
The Mountek SWITCH celebrates our 5th crowdfunding campaign! It's never been easy to deliver on thousands of orders at once, but with the faith and generosity of the Indiegogo community, we've successfully delivered on four innovations to date. See our most recent InDemand campaigns for the Mountek AIRSNAP and Mountek GRIP+, both now featured on Amazon Launchpad. Our smartphone car mounts have moved on to become best sellers on Amazon with rave editorial reviews. With your help, we aim to do the same with the Mountek SWITCH, for seamless integration between you, your phone, your car, and your home. 



If you like what you've seen so far, that was just practice. Shown in the campaign video are merely proof of concept protoypes. At this time, we'd like to share the updated 3D drawings of the Mountek SWITCH (as of May 24, 2016).

WE MAKE MOUNTS. That's our specialty. The Mountek SWITCH was designed with elegance and function in mind. When not in use, it hides flush with the wall. So your visitors won't even notice that it's anything but a regular light switch! When you need the mount, side grips and support legs spring open to accept your device.The Mountek SWITCH has been designed to support any smartphone and tablet up to the width of a full-size iPad.



Engineered to support the weight of a full-size iPad, the Mountek SWITCH features a 3-way pivot arm made of galvanized steel. 



USB ports have now been hidden underneath the SWITCH panels. 2 ports are positioned beneath the actual switches, and 1 port is positioned beneath the mounting platform.

[Unlocked if $50K stretch goal is met]

[Unlocked if $100K stretch goal is met]




One of the biggest challenges in designing the Mountek SWITCH is that switch panels are all different around the world. For this reason, the Mountek SWITCH will only work in Canada, Mexico, and the USA at this time. However, if you live in any other country, you can still benefit by mounting your devices and mobile accessories on your wall. The SWITCH GLOBAL is the only perk that will ship worldwide, since it does not have to be installed over a specific type of light switch. It comes non-powered WITHOUT USB ports or LED lighting. To install, simply peel off 3M adhesive backing and stick to a smooth surface. As shown below, it will ship with a removable switch cover (highlighted in blue). You'll also have the add-on option to replace the two screws with accessory pegs. As an added bonus, the SWITCH GLOBAL ships in October, earlier than any other perk:


The Mountek SWITCH is compatible with the following four switch types. If you have any of these standardized switch plates, your Mountek SWITCH will install into the existing screw pattern. No drilling necessary. 



At the end of the campaign, you'll receive an email to select from 4 different types of switch patterns. Contribution amount for each perk is the same regardless of which types you will choose. Here are the 4 available types:


Completely cut the cords with wireless charging. Every Mountek SWITCH can be upgraded to wirelessly charge your Qi enabled devices. Wireless charging at the fastest speeds available will be unlocked if we reach our $100k stretch goal. At that amount, we can procure supplies in high volume and pass the savings onto you. Our target price point for each Qi Wireless upgrade is $30. NOTE: The newer Samsung phones are already Qi enabled. Apple smartphones do not have built-in wireless charging yet, but you can buy aftermarket cases that will give your iPhone this capability. Not sure if your phone is Qi enabled? Visit this link from your smartphone and this website will let you know:  http://qi-wireless-charging.net/check/


  • Single tool install. Only a screwdriver is required to install the Mountek SWITCH.
  • No drilling. The Mountek SWITCH replaces your current faceplate and installs into existing screw holes. 
  • Minimal wiring. Your existing light switch(es) will remain in place. Simply clamp into existing wiring to power the Mountek SWITCH. *Step-by-step instructions will be included to ensure safe and proper installation.
  • Reversible. Worried about wall space? The convertible device mounting platform can be installed on either the left OR right side of your existing switch(es).

This is the absolute minimum amount we need to deliver a feature rich Mountek SWITCH. Help us make our vision a reality and never lose your charger again!

For loyal Mountek backers, we've created a Mountek Connector. Snap your car mount onto a connecting ball joint, so you can mount a SECOND device on the same switch! More details later...Keep your keys, shades, and bluetooth headset where you can find them. 



We believe in complete transparency and keeping our backers informed. Campaign updates will be posted with progress pics and videos, once each key milestone is met.

     In 2006, Chance Dunn depleted his personal savings to produce the world's first CD slot car mount. Then he asked his long time friend, Randy Miguel, to become a co-founder of Mountek, Inc. It took them an entire 3 years to patent the idea, learn the manufacturing process, and produce their first samples. In 2010, they sold the first Mountek GRIP car mount on eBay. It quickly became a bestseller on Amazon, and the team could barely keep up with wholesale orders. Unfortunately, it didn't take long for other companies to capitalize on the idea. Copy-cat CD slot mounts were discovered everywhere they looked. Undeterred, they focused on innovations rather than lawsuits.

     In 2013, Chance and Randy wanted to manufacture a product in the USA, but without institutional investors, they were low on capital. That's when they launched their first Indiegogo campaign for the nGroove Snap, and it was a huge success. Since then, the crowdfunding community has backed their innovations, and they've been able to bring their ideas to life exponentially faster. Today, Mountek is still a very small company, but they have big ideas that aren't just for the car. With the Mountek SWITCH, they're taking a giant step out of the car to simplify people's lives at home.

Q: Why is it only available in Canada, Mexico, and USA? 
A: The light switches for these countries have the same measurements and voltage. In the future, we'll be creating switch plates to fit other countries' screw patterns and specifications.

Q: I don't live in Canada, Mexico, and USA. Can I still get one?
A: Due to electrical certification requirements, the Mountek SWITCH will only ship to these countries. HOWEVER, you can fund the 'SWITCH GLOBAL' perk to get the mount only (without USB power or LED lighting). 

Q: Why would I want the SWITCH GLOBAL perk if it doesn't have power?
A: First, it makes a great wall mount because it doesn't have to be installed over existing light switches. Second, it ships one month earlier than any other perk! So even if you're in Canada, Mexico, or USA, fund 'SWITCH GLOBAL' if you can't wait until November to try out the mount.

Q: Will I have to remove my existing switches? 
A: The Mountek SWITCH will only replace the switch plate, and your existing switches will remain. Without having to rewire, installation is simple.

Q: Do I have to do any drilling? 
A: Nope. The Mountek SWITCH matches standardized screw patterns.

Q: How does it get power?
A: The Mountek SWITCH gets power from the wires connected to your light switches. We'll be including detailed instructions on how to crimp our connections into the existing wiring.

Q: Should I cut the power to that circuit before installing?
A: Absolutely, YES. You should also use a live circuit tester to make sure there is no electrical current.

Q: What if I'm not comfortable installing it myself?
A: Then we'd recommend hiring a certified electrician to install a Mountek SWITCH on all of the switches in your home :)

Q: Will it come in different colors?
A: Right now it will definitely come in white. If we reach our stretch goal of $125k, you'll also have an option to get it in black.

Q: Will it mount a smartphone in a protective case?
A: Most certainly. The Mountek SWITCH can mount all smartphones in practically any case. 

Q: What if I don't have enough space to the right of my switch panel?
A: Not to worry, you can optionally install the mounting platform on either the left or right side of your switch panel. It's reversible!


Thanks for your ongoing support,
~From all of us in San Diego, California, USA.

The Mountek SWITCH can mount all smartphones in practically any case. Q: What if I don't have enough space to the right of my switch panel?A: Not to worry, you can optionally install the mounting platform on either the left or right side of your switch panel. It's reversible!


Thanks for your ongoing support,~From all of us in San Diego, California, USA.

story:
Tired of charging your smartphone or tablet? Use a power bank to keep you moving. But what capacity? Why limit yourself with lower capacity chargers or add bulk to your bags with those heavy bricks. Go ahead and build your own custom capacity charger in seconds. Yes, thats true. Welcome G-Power from Mustustech!

What is G-Power?

G-Power is the ultimate power bank for all your needs. Be it your iPhone, iPad, Kindle or any such device in the market, this charger will add juice to its veins in no time. Based on the building blocks philosophy, the user decides what capacity power bank he wants to have. Just add the desired number of add-on modules and multiply the capacity. The best part is, the add-on modules also provide unique functions of their own. So, why limit yourself to a single function, uninteresting charger when you can have this awesome piece of technology!
 


G-Power contains Li-polymer batteries. Thus they are lighter and have negligible memory effect which means they are efficient and lightweight with no false charge indicators. Even the common problem with the cheaper Li-Ion batteries where after little use, the battery charge would drop suddenly, is not an issue here. Due to their inherent quality, Li-Polymer batteries are found in all the high quality devices like iPhones and what can be a better companion than the G-Power. 
Every G-Power unit contains three important pieces:
  • Main Controller Board (6000 mAh capacity inbuilt)
  • Daughter Board (6000 mAh capacity add-on)
  • Solar Board (Yup, environment friendly and makes life easy!)








This highly efficient solar board would charge the G-Power throughout the day. It even works in shade. Don't expect miracles from it, its not a fast charger but it will come in handy when you are stuck on a mountain with no power to charge your GPS. 

The solar panel is of very high efficiency. It will work even in very low light conditions


The Charge Base

Wait a sec !  Have I mentioned a "Fast Charger" ?

 

Yes, this is the charge base for the G-Power. It will completely charge the 12000 mAh battery in approximately 3 hours. Simply connect it to the mains using the supplied wall charger and you have the G-Power charge base up and running in no time. It also contains a micro-usb input so your phone charger can also be used to power it.

Here are the dimensions:

That empty slot? Well, that contains a high quality tangle free flat cable for you!


Mammoth Power  

Here's the deal. This charge base not only helps in charging the G-Power, it also helps in using it in its full glory. As I have mentioned earlier, you decide what capacity you want. This added capacity has heavier charging needs. Here you see how it goes :

 Isn't this amazing ! 

G-Power can have up to 9 daughter boards, each of 6000mAh capacity which means a total of whopping 60,000 mAh capacity. That's enough power to charge an iPhone 5s  38 times or Nexus 5 26 times or an iPad Air 7 times! 
Decide what you want....





Something more to add!

Now, here's the icing on this multi-layered cake...

Yup, that's the qi standard wireless charger. It sits right on the top of the G-Power main board. As promised, you decide the capacity. The one shown in the pic would have 18,000 mAh capacity. Simple calculation, (number of boards) x 6000 mAh. Just put any of your wireless charging capable device on the top and this highly efficient charge module will fuel it up. It has got < 85% conversion efficiency which places it amongst the best available out there.
The coolest part is, you can use the wireless charge module standalone too. It has got a micro-USB input. Simply connect it through your USB cable to your PC or wall charger and it works as a charm (on its own!).


But my phone does not have wireless charging feature!

No problem at all. We have made tie-ups with manufacturers of wireless charge adapters. These adapters would fit between the battery and back panel of your phone. Just slip it in and your phone becomes wireless charging enabled. For iPhone, you have the option of a full case too.  

 

Just add the wireless adapter while checkout. We will discuss with you on the options available for your phone model before shipping.

What We Need & What You Get

We have invested heavily in the pre production. The products are CE, FCC, RoHS, Qi certified and the design is patented. We are really confident that this product will be loved by the users worldwide. 

We need support in cash or kind. Indiegogo is a platform for us to judge the feedback of users and generate some moolah. All the campaign supporters are our rockstars! 

    Risk & Challenges

    The production line has been setup and the raw materials procured. Currently we are shipping directly from our production base in Asia. We plan to start nationwide operations in the USA with the money raised from the campaign. 

    If we do not raise enough money, this plan could be put on hold nevertheless, we will ensure it reaches everyone.

    We also have plans to build more functionality in the product. This would need a lot of money for research and testing. If we gather enough momentum, it will give us the signal to go ahead in this direction.  

    Future Plans

    We are working on the plans to build a mini projector module add-on to G-Power. This is a sample. It would need a lot of money to be put in production. We will set the wheels moving in this direction if the response from the campaign is super awesome. Be assured, if we build this, we will surely tell you about it. 

      Other Ways You Can Help

      We have really tried hard to bring the product in the market. Please share/like/tweet about this. Any help from you is of immense importance.

      Referral 

      --> For every 3 purchases from you referral, we will gift one daughter board! 

      --> For every 10 purchases from your referral, we will gift one 12000 mAh starter kit

      --> For every 12 purchases from your referral, we will gift one 12000 mAh kit

      --> For every 20 purchases from your referral, we will gift a 12000mAh kit + Wireless charge module + Charge adapter

      FAQ

      1. What if your goal is not acheived?

      We will do everything possible to bring it to reality even if the goal is not met. We have already invested our savings in the product, the production line has been setup and the raw materials purchased so all our backers will get their G-power. 

      P.S. But we hope you love it and we meet our goal :)

      2. What if I want to add more modules to my order?   

      Before shipment, we will contact everyone by email confirming the order. You can do any upgrade at that point.  

      3. If I order more than one G-power kit, how many charge

       bases will I receive?

        Each G-power kit(excluding the starter kit) includes charge base. So if you order 3 kits, you will get 3 charge base.

      4. Does G-Power support simultaneous charging?  

      Yes. G-Power does support it. This means you can plug in your device to G-Power while it is charging and  both of them will be charged simultaneously.


      5. What would happen if I forgot to remove the G-Power modules from charge base?

      We have taken care of that. Intelligent circuitry has been embedded in the device which ensures there would be no overcharging or damage. Once the G-Power batteries are charged, the controllers will stop the charging process automatically. This ensures a complete peace of mind to the user.

      6. What if I forgot to disconnect my tablet or phone?

      That is also been taken care of. G-Power will stop the charge process once the batteries of your device is full, it doesn't matter whether it is connected to the charge base or not. 

      7. Does Wireless module support all the phone models?  

      Any phone with wireless charging function will work with wireless charge base. For the devices which do not have the functionality inbuilt, you can have a charge adapter. Any smart device with a micro-usb or apple 30 pin or lightning connector can have the feature enabled.

      8. Does G-Power come in different colours? 

        Currently this is the only colour available.

      9. What are the shipping charges?

      As a Indiegogo campaign complimentary perk, the bill is on us. Free worldwide shipping for the products. This is a limited time offer. 

       

      Thank you!


      We would like to thank everyone for any contribution and any assistance in the realisation of this project. 
      Please share the project via Facebook and Twitter. 

      Any doubts/queries/questions regarding the product or the functionality of the modules or if you just want to say hello, be sure to contact us at info@mustustech.com, we will be happy to help!

      For Press Inquiries contact info@mustustech.com

story:
Step into the future with a 300,000 GHz Fenton PC

What is this you might ask?

This is the first step to the future.

High-speed small-footprint computing is as desirable as eating Swiss Chocolate in Zermatt. You just can't ever seem to get enough of it! The technology behind this system may be in it's infancy, but every day more and more companies are proving it's awesome power.

Why is it called a Fenton?

That was my dad’s middle name. It sounds cool. This is for him.

This product is the result of years of thinking, sketching, drawing, designing, rendering and coffee drinking. 

Now, the magic is what happens inside the box… It is a processing system capable of running at a minimum of 30GHz - almost 6 times faster than the current fastest commercial system available, and a maximum of between 300THz and 400THz. That is ridiculously fast!

I have a world-wide patent pending, published in July 2013, and I need to raise funds to build this system. I am hoping to start shipping these world-wide before August 2015, but early adopters and crowd-sourced backers will get them far in advance of that. My patent covers the technology behind the speed of these systems, and can be used in almost any device requiring a computer processor - watches, phones, tablets, laptops, desktops, servers, televisions, cars, drones... the list goes on. 

That should be enough to get you hooked... but if not, please read on. 

The Fenton processing system will require less energy to run as it is using the latest technologies under the hood – things like graphene, spintronics and tunnelling resonators. No cooling fans, and equipped with solid state drives, mean as close to silent operation as you can get, and all running on less energy… GREEN, GREENER, GREENEST! 

What do I need from you? 

I am trying to raise some cash to start production of this device, and with 2-billion tablets, laptops and computers out there being replaced almost every three years, you don’t want to be left behind. So, please be a pioneer and help me get this product to market. 

I am offering a fantastic deal for early adopters as the first of these devices will expect to go to market at around the £1000 mark. 

So, step into the future and jump on board. 

Thank you for reading this far.

Martin 

Inventor, Pioneer... the David in the Goliath.

story:
We have a goal of further improving Certum Phone with the support of the community. We strive to find professionals, enthusiasts and collaborators in various fields to make the phone even better. Those involved in the development work of Certum will receive regular updates of progress, background information and justification for the selected components, as well as an opportunity to impact on the emphasis and fine-tuning of various features. Some developers will also be able to participate in the final testing of the phone's features.

The areas to be developed are:

 

 

 

 

"During the five years I spent in London I personally experienced what coverage problems can really mean. Such basic tasks as giving a simple phone call from my apartment was difficult because there simply was no signal. I also bought 4G SIM from my then-operator – mainly because the coverage maps they provided to me at the shop showed both good out and indoor coverage in my home address. To my disappointment and disbelief, the phone never reached 4G network indoors.

I started researching how the situation could be resolved and as a result Certum Phone was initially born. Now the phone is also accompanied by a unique app that lets the user to benefit from the best wireless connections regardless of where they are using their phone."

— Janne Knuutinen | Certum Phone CEO

 

 

 

 

Why Indiegogo?
The development of the new features and applications featured in the Certum Phone demands self-reliant and independent operating environment. That is why we are covering part of our operations with this unaffiliated Indiegogo crowdfunding.

What comes in the box?
The package will include the Certum Phone, a charger, USB-C to 3,5 mm headphone adapter and instructions. Add your SIM card and you got everything you’ll need to get started.

Are the shipping fees included?​
Shipping is included. However, please note that we are not responsible for customs, taxes, import duties, brokerage or any additional charges by your local government.

When will I receive my order? ​
The first units are expected to be delivered in June 2019. Please check your pledge’s expected delivery dates. 

Why have you set such a high funding goal?​
For us it is important to be able to develop and produce Certum Phone independently, without the pressure from any mobile network operator. That is also why we have chosen Indiegogo as a source of funding. We are all in to reach a goal that we believe secures the production, manufacturing and global shipping pricewise. The target has been chosen after careful calculations.

How confident are you with your shipping target?​
The people who have contributed to the development of Certum Phone have on average 15 years of experience in the mobile phone industry – many have been out there for far longer. We have produced dozens of different phones combined. We have thought it all through. So yeah, we are pretty confident.

What if you fail to reach the funding target?​
All contributions will be fully refunded, so you shouldn’t worry.

To which countries do you deliver to?​
European Union, United States of America, Canada, Albania, Andorra, Bosnia & Herzegovina, Georgia, Iceland, Liechtenstein, Macedonia, Monaco, Montenegro, Norway, San Marino, Switzerland, Vatican City. The Certum Phone will work in other networks and countries, but will not be certified for those areas in this first stage.

Why the Certum Phone is not delivering to my region?​
This first version of the Certum Phone will be certified for CE and FCC so we are delivering only to the countries where those certifications are valid. Later we will be able to deliver the phones also to your specific region in collaboration with our partners.

Will my existing SIM card work on the Certum Phone?​
Yes. We support most common 3G and 4G international frequency bands and carriers.

Will the phone receive updates after launch?
Yes, Certum gets regular Android security and performance updates. Certum related app featured on the phone will also be updated regularly.

Does Certum Phone have a warranty?
A standard manufacturer warranty will apply. 

I would like to participate in feature and application development. Can I work for you?
If you would wish to take part in the development of Certum Phone, as a backer you will have the opportunity to share your contribution in our community.

I have a question that wasn’t covered here. How to get in contact with you?​
Please hit us at info@certumphone.com

story:
Pixsso is a 4.4" always-on electronic paper display to provide relevant information anywhere you want. Stick it to any wall, desk, calendar or even your fridge; and Pixsso will update you on weather forecast, reminders, commute times, messages, to-dos, news and so on.

Easy Install & Customizable

Unpack it, download the app and pair it with your phone using Bluetooth LE, it’s that simple.

From the iPhone (iOS 6.0+) or Android (Jelly Bean+) app, select the type of information you want to display and update your loved ones with the things that matter to you. 

Battery Life

A carefully designed device built over Bluetooth low energy, an electronic paper display and a polymer lithium battery to power your Pixsso for over 6 months. Pixsso can truly exist in the background of your life, unlike devices you need to charge.

The Story

Pixsso started by the need to stay in touch with my brother who has been living abroad for years. Pixsso provides his status updates right in my kitchen calendar, having the updates visible throughout the day, really helps me connect.

A Day with Pixsso

We designed Pixsso with our daily routines in mind, this is how it integrates seamlessly into your life:

Waking Up: Waking up its hard, we all know it. However, Pixsso brings the extra motivation we all need to start the day. Keep updates to your next vacation and see status updates from your closest ones.

Getting Ready: Just as you are about to leave for work or school, Pixsso will give you a quick glance of the day ahead. Check your calendar appointments and todos for the day, keep track of your bus route and commute times to leave on time.

Work: With Pixsso, you can keep your TODOs in plain sight to avoid distractions and complete your work. Pixsso is perfect to display, in the background, your next appointment and the right reminders to keep you on track.

Down Time: While chilling at home, keep track of status updates and invitations while your phone charges away from you.

Tech Specs

4.4" screen, 3 second refresh time, Bluetooth LE, micro USB charging.

Product Timeline

Risks and challenges

We are working hard to make Pixsso a high-quality product that fits just right into our lives; however, unexpected challenges can occur in this journey that we are planning to mitigate as follows:

Procurement: We have already established a relationship with our electronic paper provider to license their technology into our product but we have yet to finalize the purchase. To minimize risks, we are planning to purchase the core electronics components first, followed by the remaining commodity components.

Manufacturing: Our team has manufactured several hardware solutions and we are confident we can deliver Pixsso to you. However, to mitigate any potential manufacturing delays, we are ramping up manufacturing slowly and negotiating quality standards from our partners.

Software: Our team has experience shipping backend professional software. However, there is a potential risk of being rejected from the app store during the review process. To mitigate this risk, we would ship Android first followed by a delayed version of the iPhone app.

We are committed to make the right calls for you, our customer. With your support, there is no doubt we will make Pixsso a success!


FAQ

Q: There is almost no information on the app, and no information about integrating with my own software (important for myself and others!). 

 A: At Pixsso we believe in open source software, we are planning on making all of the code available in Github under MIT license.

 Q: The price point seems a bit steep, what's up with that?

 A: We would like more than anything to offer a lower price point, but since this a hardware project and we need to source all the materials this is the lowest we can go. If we end up selling more Pixsso's we might be able to go lower! 

 Q: The display is too small! (or too big) I think you should make it bigger/smaller. 

 A: We hear you, the current size is what we decided on after much deliberation as to what size would be the most useful. But if the people want something larger in the future we are open to it.
story_txt:
Pixsso is a 4.4" always-on electronic paper display to provide relevant information anywhere you want. Stick it to any wall, desk, calendar or even your fridge; and Pixsso will update you on weather forecast, reminders, commute times, messages, to-dos, news and so on.
	






	Easy Install & Customizable


	Unpack it, download the app and pair it with your phone using Bluetooth LE, it’s that simple.


	From the iPhone (iOS 6.0+) or Android (Jelly Bean+) app, select the type of information you want to display and update your loved ones with the things that matter to you. 






	Battery Life


	A carefully designed device built over Bluetooth low energy, an electronic paper display and a polymer lithium battery to power your Pixsso for over 6 months. Pixsso can truly exist in the background of your life, unlike devices you need to charge.


	The Story


	Pixsso started by the need to stay in touch with my brother who has been living abroad for years. Pixsso provides his status updates right in my kitchen calendar, having the updates visible throughout the day, really helps me connect.





	A Day with Pixsso


	We designed Pixsso with our daily routines in mind, this is how it integrates seamlessly into your life:



		Waking Up:
	

	Waking up its hard, we all know it. However, Pixsso brings the extra motivation we all need to start the day. Keep updates to your next vacation and see status updates from your closest ones.



		Getting Ready:
	

	Just as you are about to leave for work or school, Pixsso will give you a quick glance of the day ahead. Check your calendar appointments and todos for the day, keep track of your bus route and commute times to leave on time.



		Work:
	

	With Pixsso, you can keep your TODOs in plain sight to avoid distractions and complete your work. Pixsso is perfect to display, in the background, your next appointment and the right reminders to keep you on track.


Down Time: While chilling at home, keep track of status updates and invitations while your phone charges away from you.





	Tech Specs


	4.4" screen, 3 second refresh time, Bluetooth LE, micro USB charging.





	Product Timeline




Risks and challenges
We are working hard to make Pixsso a high-quality product that fits just right into our lives; however, unexpected challenges can occur in this journey that we are planning to mitigate as follows:

We are committed to make the right calls for you, our customer. With your support, there is no doubt we will make Pixsso a success!

Q: There is almost no information on the app, and no information about integrating with my own software (important for myself and others!). 

 A: At Pixsso we believe in open source software, we are planning on making all of the code available in Github under MIT license. 

 Q: The price point seems a bit steep, what's up with that?

 A: We would like more than anything to offer a lower price point, but since this a hardware project and we need to source all the materials this is the lowest we can go. If we end up selling more Pixsso's we might be able to go lower! 

 Q: The display is too small! (or too big) I think you should make it bigger/smaller. 

 A: We hear you, the current size is what we decided on after much deliberation as to what size would be the most useful. But if the people want something larger in the future we are open to it.

story:
At Mobile Power Pro we are excited to announce our new line up of products! All our products are the latest and best in technology. Our 20,000 mAh power bank has 3 USB ports and boasts a 2A quick charge. The best part of of this power bank is the three input charging options. This allows you to charge with Lightning, Micro or USB-C Type C.

20,000mAh Power Bank - This awesome charger comes with 3 USB Ports (to charge all your S#!%) 3 input options that will allow you to charge with a Lightning, Micro USB or Micro USB-C (that's the new micro). Unlike other chargers that only allow you to recharge with a micro cord our charger gives you options! Colors available are pink, black, white and blue.

Our Commitment 

The last few months have been filled with hard work partnering with the best factories in China to bring the best new technology in to your life. We are ready to move forward with manufacturing our product. This will be ship out by end of August/October time frame.

Why Indiegogo - We have been working on brand new product over the last couple’s months investing our personal money and time. Coming this far, we have refined the Mobile Power Pro 20,000mAh to make life easy. The funds raised with our indiegogo will be used to finalize marketing, website, and order product bringing it into the world for everyone to enjoy. We chose Indiegogo because over the last several years this has been a hub for entrepreneurs and dream-chasers to realize their goals and bring an idea to life.

Check out our Website www.mobilepowerpro.com - Mobile Power Pro is online retail store that bring advance technology to your devices.

Thank you for supporting Indiegogo Campaign.
