story:
A Smart Car for Everyone

 


As transportation and mobile computer technology continue to develop, more and more people are looking for ways to integrate their smart phone into their car for music, entertainment, and other connected applications.  ONICS Corporation is a San Diego, California based car aftermarket company that developed a proprietary system which aims to transform your car into a smart car, as well as create a better and safer way to drive.



People have landed on the moon with a fraction of the computing power that rests in your pocket or purse.

Smart phones today come standard with quad-core processors, High Definition capacitive displays, as well as an array of enhanced chips to increase connectivity and speed.

ONICS takes full advantage of this "power in-your-pocket" and partners it with your car to truly unlock the potential of this amazing technology.

Upgrade your phone, upgrade your smart car.  ONICS will continue to unlock possibilities with greater technology in smart phones and more enhanced and customizable applications. 

A Truly Connected Car.

Once you connect your smart phone inside the ONICS system, your car is now a connected car, allowing your personalized smart car experience to begin!


Quick Drive? Your Phone Does NOT Need To Be Docked...

One of the great features of the ONICS system, is the ability to use every benefit through Bluetooth on the ONICS system.  Docking will charge your phone and offer a great visual aid for applications, yet you can use ONICS with your voice control while the phone rests in your pocket or purse.

A Unique Design To Keep-Up With You.

The ONICS faceplate can be easily removed with a push of a button, as well as it is an economical solution to always keep your ONICS system using the latest and greatest smart phone available.

A Personalized Operation With ONICS.

With the ONICS application, you have the ability to choose-and-use your favorite apps whenever you want using the 5 different screens loaded with 6 different applications or pre-installed "quick buttons".  Simply click the "+" symbol on the home screen, and your favorite app can be selected from any app on your device!

 ONICS Inside: Unmatched Quality

ONICS has officially partnered with electrical engineers from Texas Instruments to bring you the highest quality audio components and internals along with the latest chip technology.  Coupled with the unique ONICS applications in software and hardware, you will benefit from features that are currently unheard of, and you will be able to rely on a long-standing leader in the circuit board and chip space.

  • Roll down your windows and start your car with a push of a button.
  • Low on gas?  ONICS will route you to the nearest gas station, tell you the price of the gas, and give you the best route to get there.
  • As you approach your car, ONICS unlocks your doors for you!
  • Accidents happen.  With ONICS, your family and friends will be alerted with a location and text message alert if you are in a collision.
  • Avoid paying high repair and diagnostic fees with ONICS' advanced engine tools.  ONICS will tell you what the problem is, how much on average to fix it, and give you reviews of local shops so you can get back on the road again.
  • Music (any application)
  • GPS (any application)
  • Voice Calling/Voice-to-text

ONICS Applications Defined

HOME APPLICATION

The ONICS system includes an app that preforms various functions and includes a quick launch screen for any app installed on the phone, either by quick touch or by voice. This allows you to customize the infotainment system to your needs. You can choose your music provider, your favorite navigation app, quick dial, and even quick message.

PARENTAL APPLICATIONS

 CAR START CONTROL

This application can be used for seat belt control, where the phone is required to be docked for children, geo-fencing, and time limits for driving. This app also provides an additional level of protection from car theft. This application requires additional ignition controller, which ONICS will be offering shortly after Spring if 2015.

 CAR SPEED NOTIFICATIONS

This feature can be used to TEXT the parent of the young driver when the car exceeds the specified speed limit in an area.  The phone will save the data and send a graphical overview for the trip as needed, along with the notifications of vehicle speed and location.

 OTHER CAR NOTIFICATIONS

This can be used to TEXT the parent the location when the trip stops/starts, gas level alerts, a check engine light, any accidents/air bag deployment, and other driver data.

SAFETY APPLICATIONS

 SEAT BELT SAFETY:

This application increases the installed seat belt warning by using ignition controller (optional) to prevent car starting prior to seat belt being buckled.  Further, it can track and submit periodic reports on number of occurrences where the seat belt was not used.

 FRONT CAMERA APPLICATIONS:

By integrating with front camera both OEM and aftermarket options the ONICS unit can provide services:

  • Frontal collision warning
  • Rolling 5 minute video save
  • Parking assistance

 BACK CAMERA APPLICATIONS:

By integrating with both OEM and aftermarket rear cameras, the ONICS unit can provide services:

  • Rear collision warning
  • Rolling 5 minute video save
  • Parking assistance

 DRIVING SCORE:

Various driver scores can be calculated and reported on through the applications the ONICS software team has built/are building. The ones currently being developed are 

  • Brake, accelerate, and turn score
  • Driving style for tires and brakes
  • Typical usages, average miles driven, driving by time of day charts etc.

SOCIAL APPLICATIONS

 Camera Applications

By installing or integrating with car’s front/rear cameras, the ONICS system can record external video. This video can then be edited, saved and uploaded by the phone.

Real-time streaming of video from cameras to servers, for example, webcasting a car rally / race, streaming front view live from other drivers is possible with ONICS (say, a group of friends traveling in different cars to the same destination, i.e, sharing road-trip experiences real-time)

 DUI check point alerts

 POI (point of interest) visits and games

 Virtual Garage

 SPEED TRAPS

These above listed apps can upload the police check points to alert the ONICS users for the traffic delays.  ONICS will also update through many of the current applications on the market to keep you "in-the-know".

PERSONAL ANALYTIC APPLICATIONS

These applications sample and save data over time, and can provide the user with rich data on their usage, trips and related elements. The sampling rate can be controlled to provide as detailed data as the application needs.

The data is saved to the phone and uploaded to the ONICS cloud periodically.

 CAR USAGE

 LIFE TIME FUEL USAGE (COST)

 FUEL ECONOMY

 TRIP DETAILS

 SAVE CURRENT TRIP

 DRIVING HABITS

 LOCATIONS VISITED

DIY

 CAR REPAIR GUIDE:

Specified car guides that give you detailed direction, with photos and videos on how to fix the particular check engine problem that is occurring 

 CAR HEALTH MONITORING:

ONICS will use data retrieved from the ECU and monitor miles accrued on existing parts and components, and allow you to be reminded when something may need replacing or maintenance

*Note: Some applications have already been tested and completed by the ONICS software team, however there are some applications that are not yet completed.  We will be updating the backers consistently on the progress made on each application.

ONICS NEXT STEPS:

Indiegogo, ONICS needs YOUR help to get us to mass-market!  Your pledges are going to get ONICS to manufacture mass quantities and move us into further Application testing.  As you can see below, ONICS has completed many stages in building this product and getting it ready for market.  

We look forward to getting this product to our Indiegogo backers FIRST, and delivering on a great product with unmatched quality!


OUR TEAM THANKS YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!

Risks and Challenges:

As with any new hardware or software technology, much time is spent gathering information from consumers, testing and re-testing in the field, as well as sometimes having to go back to the principal design to alter or enhance certain design aspects.  ONICS is continuing to enhance and gather feedback to strengthen our product/software and brand, and we are confident that this product and it's stated features will impress and satisfy.

One specific challenge currently is our feature listing of the IOS system on the Apple devices.  In particular, the Apple OS is much more narrow in the selection and utilization of 3rd party applications, and thus the IOS 7 version of ONICS will be different than the Android version at launch.  The IOS version will still utilize most of your needed applications for music, GPS, calling and texting, yet it will have limitations for other smart features at launch.

We know the IOS 7 situation is not ideal at the moment, yet we are excited to work on IOS 8, which fixes many of the issues stated above, and opens the doors for the ONICS/Apple capability.  Our software engineers are on this topic currently, and working towards a solution for Apple users.  Arguably, in 2 months, this posting about IOS 7 may be irrelevant due to IOS 8 and it's capabilities.

With our team comprised of successful entrepreneurs in the automotive industry, our top-class engineering team with expertise in building and designing products for the defense of our country, as well as some of the best and brightest people who have worked directly for Fortune 500 companies at the executive level, ONICS will deliver for you.

story:
Get your $1 perk by clicking on the animated message above

 

Watch below to see "True Tablet Mobility" in action:

It's easy to understand why wearing your tablet  enhances its overall performance ... while you are mobile

 

... now watch to understand how GoPad also enhances tablet performance while you are stopped!

 

 GoPad comes with this versatile carrying sleeve: the GoBag.  Together, they optimise your tablet's utility wherever you go.

 

The included GoStrap facilitates a host of new tablet applications in highly-mobile work environments:

 

Get the mobility of a Smartphone and the productivity of a laptop.  Now one tablet can fulfill all of your needs!


There's an ergonomic problem inherent to all tablets.  Watch this video to better understand how GoPad solves it:


GoPad gives you great value: it's really three products in one!


Why we need Indiegogo's help and why supporters can depend on us to deliver their New GoPad

 

Watch A Day In The Life of GoPad users

 

 

So if you've held back from owning a tablet, GoPad is the incentive you've been waiting for.  Get both and get GOing!

 

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

GoPad's Video Gallery is a series of practical demonstrations that show you:

  • How to use a GoPad safely and effectively in harsh work environments where shock protection, water resistance and long-term wearing comfort are cause for concern

  • How to use it as a powerful selling tool in a retail store.  The clip also covers sales-related tasks such as inventory, warehousing, real-estate, door-to-door and others

  • How artists and hobbyists can make creative use of a GoPad

  • How a wheelchair-bound person can use it to effortlessly hold their tablet for long periods

  • How Microsoft's Windows 8 tablet compares ergonomically to a GoPad/Samsung Windows 8 solution

  • How Nurses, Doctors and Patients can use GoPads in hospitals

  • How GoPad owners can use it as a mobile entertainment center at home

  • How to wear it for freer side access to the touchscreen

  • How both students and teachers can optimise tablet use at school

  • And more to tips come ... send in yours and we'll post them

story:
Inspired by the sawtooth roof architecture of the early 19th century, Sawtooth is a docking station comprising of a series of ridges to stand devices while charging on your desk, office, meeting room, classroom and anywhere at home


Featured in  


6-Port USB with up to 2.4A each  

The Sawtooth dock has six (6) USB ports. Each port is capable of charging up to 2.4 A (amps) of current independently. Each port is equipped with firmware to automatically detect and select the optimal charging amps specifically for your device.


Standard and Qualcomm Quick Charge™ 2.0 Editions

Choose from two versions. The Quick Charge 2.0 Edition has these USB ports that can detect Qualcomm Snapdragon chipset with Quick Charge 2.0 charging capability to charge at either 5V, 9V or 12V and charges up to 75% faster. The rest of the three USB ports will be configured with standard detection technology to charge Apple devices at 5V up to 2.4A. The Standard Edition, as the name implied, comes with six standard USB ports. 

The Standard Edition is currently available and we will ship immediately. You will get your shipment within 7 days. The Quick Charge 2.0 Edition has to go through Qualcomm/UL compliance testing. It’s currently being tested by the chip manufacturer and an independent testing company in Shenzhen. The target delivery date of the Quick Charge 2.0 Edition is January/February 2016. 


Charging, ECO, Safety and Protection

Longer battery life and faster charging are what we demand of our smartphones.

High-end devices are now equipped with smart charging technology that signals the charger for appropriate voltage and current (amps). A smart charger, like the Sawtooth, analyses the signals and delivers the requested outputs.  

When the device is done charging, a smart charger should indicate it is done. Sawtooth does this with a white LED light, the light will go off when charging is complete. No further current is delivered to the port, a cool ECO friendly feature. 

As a safety feature, Sawtooth is equipped with a surge protector. It also has protection for over-current, over-heating, over-voltage, and short-circuit. 


BEST FOR 

Reception Area of Your Business 

Increase customer happiness with a Sawtooth dock and charger in your reception area, waiting room, co-working area, bar, saloon, coffee shop, or restaurant. Strategically place a unit where you want your customers to mingle and to pick up a few things on their way out. No more worried customers messing around with the power outlets in your store. 


Public Libraries

Stop library patrons from congregating around power outlets. It does not look good when you have people sitting or squatting on the floor next to an outlet. You can stop all these behaviour by having a Sawtooth dock and charger in the checkout area. Remember that it is a fast charger. 


In the Office

Put a Sawtooth dock and charger on top of the credenza in a meeting room or common space in a cubicle area. It may increase productivity. The Sawtooth is so beautiful and elegant that you may want one on your desk to organize your gadgets. Everyone may want one in their cubicles to save space.


At Home Anywhere

Like a building with a beautiful sawtooth roof with ridges, Sawtooth is an art piece for your home. Whether on the table at the foyer, in the den, on the kitchen counter so that everyone can be with Mom, or in the study, Sawtooth makes a good presence.

As one customer wrote, “It works so that when my grandkids come to visit there are no wires all over the house that I could trip and fall over.” Sawtooth is also great for kids’ rooms. It is not only perfect to help keep their room neat, but also safe. Sawtooth charges fast and it will cut off power to each port when the device is done charging and is equipped a surge protector.


Inspired by Sawtooth Design Architecture, circa 1827

The sawtooth design pays tribute to a British architect, William Fairbairn, who designed the sawtooth roof around 1827 to bring daylight into buildings. Lately, sawtooth roofs are becoming trendy again to maximize interior daylight. We adopted the sawtooth design, using the ridges to stand the devices.

The grooves are wide enough to accommodate smartphones and tablets with thick covers. We also provide a ridge rod to hold the devices in the dock at a 15º slope.


Specifications


Perks


Our Design, Manufacturing, Fulfillment & Support 

Sawtooth is designed in California.  The Printed Circuit Board Assembly (PCBA) is architected by our engineering team in Berkeley, California and Shenzhen, China in collaboration with engineers from our integrated circuit (IC) partners in Silicon Valley. 

We founded Plashr with an OEM manufacturer in Shenzhen that has more than 15 years of experience doing injection moulding and making plastic objects. This manufacturer also owns a PCB factory and PCBA assembly facility. In other words, you can say we are vertically integrated, from design to manufacturing.

Plashr takes full ownership of the quality control. We strive for the highest quality. Our team has and will continue to meticulously identify and define testing and quality control points in our manufacturing process to ensure quality. Our testing and quality control extend beyond our factory and also to the suppliers from whom we are sourcing some of our parts, such as cables.

We have experience supporting our backers and managing the fulfillment process from another crowdfunding project. We learned from our mistakes from the All Dock project. This time we are working with forwarders in the USA, EU countries, Canada and Australia to manage the last shipping tier.

We will expedite shipment by consolidating packages to the USA, EU countries, Canada and Australia into bulk parcels and shipping them by air to the respective forwards, who will clear customs and unpack, label and ship the packages to you via the local postal services. There will be NO SHIPPING charges to these countries.

We will be shipping door-to-door to other countries either from our factory in Shenzhen, or via our forwarder, by air using the most reasonable postal service or carrier.  There will be NO SHIPPING charges to Japan, South Korea, Singapore and Malaysia.  

There will be a $20 surcharge to ship to countries not mentioned above. Customers getting the package door-to-door are responsible for import duty/tax. Please consult the import duty/tax policy of your country. 

Everyone knows fulfillment is a daunting step. We are prepared this time. We are starting early to plan our survey, stretch goals, packaging, invoicing and picking slips. We have identified and will apply appropriate human resources to prepare for fulfillment and to support the backers. All inquiries and questions will be answered within 24 hours, except on weekends.


Our Design Story, Innovation & your Awesome Experience

We received a request to have a multi device charger with the cables on the outside, specifically for use in public places. Having the cable outside is more manageable for businesses, libraries and other public areas where they may have no idea how many of their customers/patrons use Android or iPhone, and having the cable inside the box does not really work. With the sawtooth design and short and flat charging cables, we believe Sawtooth can also be used anywhere.

We started exploring various design ideas in October and adopted the sawtooth roof design very early in the design phase. We now have a final prototype and are ready for manufacturing.

We are also very serious about Quality Control in our manufacturing process. We not only have to develop test procedures for the circuit board assembly process, but also we need to impose Quality Control on our suppliers, especially the cable manufacturers. The cost to replace and reship defective units is very high, and everyone in Plashr strives to achieve no defects. 

As you can see in the schedule below, Design and Prototyping, Printed Circuit Board Assembly (PCBA) Design and Testing, and QC Testing take up most of the time in our schedule.

Furthermore, we are very serious about preparing for fulfillment and supporting our backers. We are updating our IT infrastructure to use better Help Desk, Invoicing, Shipping, Billing and Payment systems. We want to answer all inquiries and questions within 24 hours except on weekends. We want to ship as early as possible. We want to send you notifications when your package is in transit and the tracking number when it’s with the carrier or postal service.

We are aiming for a totally awesome experience from the day you backed us, keeping you connected with us until you receive and open your reward.


Risks and challenges

When we got involved in the All Dock project, we always felt very uncomfortable because we were in a weak position to manage the risk. The project was sourcing from different companies that did not communicate with each other, and it was questionable whether we were dealing with a trading company or an actual manufacturer. We parachuted into the project to get it delivered. There was no quality management system, nor was there an IT infrastructure to support fulfillment and customer service. What we experienced was typical of many crowdfunding projects, making them very risky.

We founded the Plashr platform because of our risky experience. Our goal with Plashr is to mitigate the manufacturing risk and to build the infrastructure to better distribute our products and serve our customers globally. We achieved this by partnering and offering a compelling value proposition to the right manufacturers. With a manufacturer in the founding team, we are now vertically integrated with access to everything; PCB (design, assembly and firmware programming), injection molding design/production and product assembly. We are also putting in place a Quality Management System across the entire supply chain, including at our supplier factory. In short, we are addressing the risk at the root of the problem.

Nevertheless, there will still be unforeseen circumstances going forward. Some we can foresee early, but some may pop up during execution. For example, we have been told there is a backlog in the supply of Apple-certified chipsets for lightning connectors. We are still engineering our circuit board to combine Qualcomm Quick Charge 2.0 and existing USB handshake protocols/standards. We will announce how we will support Quick Charge 2.0 at 9V, 12V and 20V.

On the fulfillment front, we are working with logistic companies to pin down the most efficient and cost effective way to ship in the USA, EU countries, Australia, Canada, Japan and Greater China with no shipping and import duty/tax. Our goal is not to make money on shipping but to lower the cost of ownership of our product for everyone around the world. Today, we know where we can send with no shipping charges, and many countries have no import duty/tax below a certain amount. For the rest of the countries (not listed above) we have to impose a $20 shipping surcharge. As we uncover ways to ship to new countries, we will update you. If you know of a cheaper and effective way to ship to your country, please let us know.

Finally, we would like to add that our challenges go beyond Indiegogo. Indiegogo is a valuable launchpad to connect with our backers. We would be doing a disservice to our backers if we did not grow and bring more innovations to market. The Plashr brand is also the platform for how we are going to get there. We are developing the capability of selling online everywhere, including China.


FAQ

The width of the groove - does it fit device with thick cover/case?

Yes, The groove between the ridges is about 0.91 inches (23 mm) at the top and 0.63 inches (16 mm) at the bottom. The groove is also deeper. It should be wide and deep enough to hold iPad and tablet with all cases and covers in the market today.

story:
A young creator, whose work is also a pleasure.

 

Hello! My name is Róbert Lencsés and i love to work with wood. 

At the time of mobile phones and TVs, made from plastic and electronics , people forget the essence and beauty of wood.

My goal is to give every home a piece of nature reshaped into something nice and practical.

And i need your help to achieve it.

I invested a lot of hard work, effort and enthusiasm in design and production of wooden stands in order to provide my clients with first-class products.

 

Types of wood that I use

From left to right

Walnut, mahogany, mountain ash and zebrawood. 

 

What I produce?

I produce wooden stands for Apple products. 

So far I've made stands for : 


iPhone

 

Docking station for iPhone 

 

iPad mini, iPad 9.7", iPad 12.9"

 

Universal stand for MacBook

 

Apple Keyboard with Numeric Keypad

Risk and challenges

There is no risk ! 

Even if the campaign failes, i still can make the wooden stand for you. It just takes a little longer.

 

What i need 

For this project i need this amount of funds - 13 530 $

9 723 $ for new CNC mill. For faster production.  The one i use is slow, old and in bad condition.

2 264 $ for drum sander.  For surface sanding of wooden stands. Many times faster than me. 

1 543 $ for oscillating spindle sander. As the previous machine, but this is for sanding edges.

Also you can help me by telling your friends about my campaign,and/or sharing on Facebook.
 

 

 

What you get

You will get limited edition of my wooden stands with heart shape instead of Wood Stuffs logo.
And big thank you from me.

 

 

What is needed to make a wooden stand ?

Production begins by sawing  dry wooden timber to the required size.
This process produces wood waste that finds use by my friend. He makes wooden handles for knives. 

 

Then I plane the timber to produce a nice flat plate, which is then inserted into the CNC milling machine.

 

On CNC mill i create a program for milling.

 

When it is finished, each product must be manually sanded.
Then is modified by radius cutter.

 

At the end is every wooden stand treated with mineral oil and beeswax. 
 

 

Features

1. Made from real wood

2. Durability

3. Lifetime

4. Unique

 

Future

In future i plan to create stands for more Apple products. 
I already have prototypes of wooden stands for Beats by dr. Dre, iMac and docking station for Macbook.

And also i plan to use more types of wood, like bubinga, ebony and pink ivory.

story:
2roll is a portable and lightweight game set containing the most popular board games: Backgammon, Chess, Checkers and Nine Men's Morris.

It is designed to fit into our modern lifestyle and to start playing again real social games.  Not via Internet or Smartphone.

But... Offline and face-to-face. With lots of fun and no electricity needed
(ok, accept daylight or a lamp :)

We have the dream to get people again close to each other and start chatting and playing. Inside families or with friends or even with friendly strangers in a coffee shop or bar.

Come on lets see who wins!


2roll contains the word „roll“ which gives the practical form of this
portable game.

It stands for fun playing it, but also for fun looking at it. The love of colours brings a bright smile to everyone. We want to look young, fresh and happy.
Just fashionable!

It is designed to be portable and lightweight. Water-resistant and
easy to assemble.

... And many more colours and different textures are already in the
„dream pipeline“!

Vote for your favorite color combination and help us to choose our first production!




2roll contains 4 games in 1.

Backgammon
The classic board game which Millions of people love playing from Turkey to Germany to USA and elsewhere. Almost each country or better each region in this world calls it differently and there are many rules how to play. We add a doubling dice for those who want to play serious and credit points.

Chess
The most popular board game ever. We created the different symbols from pawn to king and queen by printing the backside of each token in order to save space and fit into the Zip-case. Now the token has 2 sides. One solid face side and one printed backside to play chess.

Checkers
As well a widely spread game, using the same board as chess but with solid tokens. Often you just need to ask your grandma how to play it and get the right moves!

Nine Men's Morris
Maybe this is the less know game of all 4 here, but still one of everyone’s childhood memories, which we just need to re-start again. It’s a bit like playing Tic-tac-toe or 3-in-a-row. Have fun, but don’t get too mad, if you don’t  win :)


1, 2, 3... you roll it down to play and roll it up again to carry on...

You just need to:
-  open the Velcro tape straps
-  unroll both game layers
-  open the zip bag
-  take out dices and tokens
-  and start playing

We have attached the game set with press buttons to keep both parts always together. The Zip-role is filled with tokens and dices for all 4 games.
Matching in the colour of each game!





„Because I, Tim, was sitting in the planes around our Globe many times a year and I did not want to play either with a heavy weight case nor I wanted to play alone with my iPhone apps“.

No, Tim wanted to start developing a game which looks cool and is easy to take on any journey from relaxed Thailand beach holidays to hiking tours in Nepal or for work into the hotel lobby or lunch break.

Store checking and hunting for a cool backgammon like 2roll from Hong Kong, Bangkok, Berlin, London, NYC to L.A and many more cities, nowhere he found a travel game like this. All existing games are too boring and either in brown or black leather colours or classic wood or metal cases. That’s how it started by not finding a modern, cool look.


Ohhh boy, we had hundreds of fabrics in hand. We sewed first prototypes out for super lightweight nylons, to create the lightest ever backgammon game set. But then the problem of wind blowing while playing accured. By starting to look for fabrics and trims, we needed to find a good valuable weight. Which ended in a great Oxford construction. Possible to use for laser cut. Water-repellent and durable as well as still very light.

Then days and nights of thinking started... Which colour combinations we should run? What about fashion colours? What about matching to each countries flag?... Like the Brazil game set in yellow, green white?

We have done 16 different colours in the first period, but than we faced the minimum costs and quantities for matching dices and tokens.

The toughest part began: eliminate colours which all look coooool!

On the same time we created our logo. Tim’s wish was to have something moving like roll up or down.

And a FACT is that Tim is not and will never be a graphic designer... so from his first idea:

Jurgita and Gian stepped in and finally came up with the perfect looking logo of 2roll.


Followed by designing gimmick labels as well as pressbuttons and last but not least a really new and fresh looking chess symbol symbols:


During the very last step of the product, we thought of how to package, wrap and sale our game.

From Plastic formed around the 2roll to see-through-bags. To finally carton boxes as below.

And we are still keeping this issue open to discuss with all of you, which colour you like most? .... Or would you prefer even the recycled look with print?


Tim noticed: „My idea and intention was: Don’t to play alone... therefore why making this wonderful product alone? No way!“

As said, lovely Sarah with her structural senses, Gian with his crazy inspirations and Jurgita with her never stop sparkling feel for fashion joined!

How fun! 4 people in 1 project > creating a 4 in 1 game.

Tim H. Founder
 Tim founded 2roll. From a simple drawing on the plane 10.000m above sea level to this current stage. He is the „fabric lover“ and now concentrated on the production and sales management.

Sarah D. Operations
She is controlling the structure of 2roll. Keeping the „family“ on track and together as well as to keep all projects deadlines, that’s her daily challenge. Next to preparing exhibitions and the customer relation. And don’t forget her skills in sewing...

Gian F. Design
 Gian, he is the Creative Director behind 2roll and designed together with Jurgita from logo, labels to packing and tokens as well as inspired 2roll.

Jurgita V. Design
 Jurgita’s feeling for the newest artworks and design inspirations keeps 2rolls status to be a lifestyle product and never forgetting to be edgy and cool.
Her first booth drawing for our first exhibition you will see soon.


Day 1 - after 60 INDIEGOGO days (24 June 2014)
First thing: say thank you to all our backers and sum up all rewards like the pin, tote bags and number of reward games needed.

26 June 2014
Meeting in Zurich to sum up all materials needed from fabric to tokens and dices as well as labels. Going through each item and define production quality standards.

27 June 2014
Ordering all items and handing over the production time lines with its deadlines to be reached.

30 June March 2014
Getting all confirmations of each single supplier to manage all deadlines

1 - 31 July 2014
Production of all trims and accessories. As well as fabric.

1 - 15 August 2014
Sending all materials to the test laboratory in order to underline and secure our quality standards.

After tests all show pass, we start sending all goods into the sewing line.

365 days – almost! We have spent quiet much time now and lots of brainstorming and waiting for the next prototype as well as lots of fun time up to this moment.

From the first scratch of a single travel backgammon to finally a 4 in 1 game set.

Proudly we can say, we are still alive and happy... due to our supporting friends and family.

In order to bring 2roll to you and the market. We have monetary goals to achieve.

GOAL Indiegogo  = 15.888 USD

This money is necessary in order to produce at least 1 – 2 game colour combinations.

This is our biggest challenge to face - the minimum by colour (1000 pieces) and production MOQs for all items from tokens to fabric to labels and even screen printing.

We love our fashionable range, but we also understand now, that we need to watch our internal costs. We also understand, why there are only black and white and brown and white games on the market!!! Because who wants to take the risk to make a PINK game...the answer is: US! But therefore we need your support.

GOAL SALES = 1.000 pcs / game combo

We are ambitious and eager to achieve 1.000 pcs by game combo colour.
Then we will not have any leftovers of dices or tokens.

Therefore any corporate orders of airlines, banks or hotel chains are
very welcome!

But for sure we believe in every single  of „you“ who loves chess or backgammon, checkers or Nine Inch Morris to play while traveling.

Visit our new launch homepage on www.2roll.com

As with all start-up projects, the main risk is to deliver everything within the estimated timeframe.

We have taken all possible production issues into consideration and planned our schedule accordingly.

All designs and material parts are finalized, tested and ready for production.
If we raise our USD 15.888 target, we should all be right to delivery 2roll by Autumn 2014.

We also feel it's extremely important to make clear that 2roll in it's current format is a limited edition hobbyist product, and that is what supporters will essentially be acquiring through the play set rewards.

By backing the project you are helping us along with development and design of a better 2roll for the future, while acquiring the current version of the set.
story_txt:
2roll is a portable and lightweight game set containing the most popular board games: Backgammon, Chess, Checkers and Nine Men's Morris.
It is designed to fit into our modern lifestyle and to start playing again real social games.  Not via Internet or Smartphone. 
But... Offline and face-to-face. With lots of fun and no electricity needed (ok, accept daylight or a lamp :)
We have the dream to get people again close to each other and start chatting and playing. Inside families or with friends or even with friendly strangers in a coffee shop or bar.
Come on lets see who wins!2roll
contains the word „roll“ which gives the practical form of this portable game.
It stands for fun playing it, but also for fun looking at it. The love of colours brings a bright smile to everyone. We want to look young, fresh and happy. Just fashionable! 
It is designed to be portable and lightweight. Water-resistant
and easy to assemble. 
... And many more colours and different textures are already in the „dream pipeline“!Vote for your favorite color combination and help us to choose our first production!2roll contains 4 games in 1.
BackgammonThe classic board game which Millions of people love playing from Turkey to Germany to USA and elsewhere. Almost each country or better each region in this world calls it differently and there are many rules how to play. We add a doubling dice for those who want to play serious and credit points.
ChessThe most popular board game ever. We created the different symbols from pawn to king and queen by printing the backside of each token in order to save space and fit into the Zip-case. Now the token has 2 sides. One solid face side and one printed backside to play chess.
CheckersAs well a widely spread game, using the same board as chess but with solid tokens. Often you just need to ask your grandma how to play it and get the right moves!
Nine Men's MorrisMaybe this is the less know game of all 4 here, but still one of everyone’s childhood memories, which we just need to re-start again. It’s a bit like playing Tic-tac-toe or 3-in-a-row. Have fun, but don’t get too mad, if you don’t  win :)1, 2, 3... you roll it down to play and roll it up again to carry on...
You just need to:-  open the Velcro tape straps-  unroll both game layers-  open the zip bag-  take out dices and tokens-  and start playing
We have attached the game set with press buttons to keep both parts always together. The Zip-role is filled with tokens and dices for all 4 games. Matching in the colour of each game! „Because I, Tim, was sitting in the planes around our Globe many times a year and I did not want to play either with a heavy weight case nor I wanted to play alone with my iPhone apps“.
No, Tim wanted to start developing a game which looks cool and is easy to take on any journey from relaxed Thailand beach holidays to hiking tours in Nepal or for work into the hotel lobby or lunch break. 
Store checking and hunting for a cool backgammon like 2roll from Hong Kong, Bangkok, Berlin, London, NYC to L.A and many more cities, nowhere he found a travel game like this. All existing games are too boring and either in brown or black leather colours or classic wood or metal cases. That’s how it started by not finding a modern, cool look.
Ohhh boy, we had hundreds of fabrics in hand. We sewed first prototypes out for super lightweight nylons, to create the lightest ever backgammon game set. But then the problem of wind blowing while playing accured. By starting to look for fabrics and trims, we needed to find a good valuable weight. Which ended in a great Oxford construction. Possible to use for laser cut. Water-repellent and durable as well as still very light.
Then days and nights of thinking started... Which colour combinations we should run? What about fashion colours? What about matching to each countries flag?... Like the Brazil game set in yellow, green white?
We have done 16 different colours in the first period, but than we faced the minimum costs and quantities for matching dices and tokens. 
The toughest part began: eliminate colours which all look coooool!On the same time we created our logo. Tim’s wish was to have something moving like roll up or down.And a FACT is that Tim is not and will never be a graphic designer... so from his first idea:
Jurgita and Gian stepped in and finally came up with the perfect looking logo of 2roll.Followed by designing gimmick labels as well as pressbuttons and last but not least a really new and fresh looking chess symbol
symbols:During the very last step of the product, we
thought of how to package, wrap and sale our game.
From Plastic formed around the 2roll to see-through-bags. To finally carton boxes as below.
And we are still keeping this issue open to discuss with all of you,
which colour you like most? .... Or would you prefer even the recycled look
with print?
Tim noticed: „My idea and intention was: Don’t to play alone... therefore why making this wonderful product alone? No way!“As said, lovely Sarah with her structural senses, Gian with his crazy inspirations and Jurgita with her never stop sparkling feel for fashion joined!
How fun! 4 people in 1 project > creating a 4 in 1 game.

Tim H. Founder
Tim founded 2roll. From a simple drawing on the plane 10.000m above sea level to this current stage. He is the „fabric lover“ and now concentrated on the production and sales management.Sarah D. OperationsShe is controlling the structure of 2roll. Keeping the „family“ on track and together as well as to keep all projects deadlines, that’s her daily challenge. Next to preparing exhibitions and the customer relation. And don’t forget her skills in sewing...

Gian F. Design
Gian, he is the Creative Director behind 2roll and designed together with Jurgita from logo, labels to packing and tokens as well as inspired 2roll.


Jurgita V. Design
Jurgita’s feeling for the newest artworks and design inspirations keeps 2rolls status to be a lifestyle product and never forgetting to be edgy and cool. Her first booth drawing for our first exhibition you will see soon.

1 - 31 July 2014Production

story:
Gadget Sin: "iPhone 5s case with perfectly-matched accessories"
Yanko Design: "The Must-Have iPhone Fix"
Phones Review: "the iPhone never has to go naked to charge"
Nascent Array: "set to mesmerize you with its precision cuts and bold design" 
Pat Mahon: "..practical and beautiful"  "could feature in modern art galleries"

Transform and enhance your device with the AUGMENT iPhone case and integrated accessories.


WHAT IS AUGMENT?

- Have you ever needed to remove your protective case before docking?

- Have you ever not been able to connect your headphones while using a protective case?

If you have ever had difficulties connecting your favorite accessories to your device or you simply just like to keep your tech gear coordinated and in order, AUGMENT is the solution.

AUGMENT is the world's first protective case and integrated accessory system for the iPhone 5 / 5S. The integrated function and style coordinates your essential peripheral devices to enhance your user experience. Our mission is to organise and simplify your device peripherals in a unified approach.

In this campaign we are launching the first two products in the AUGMENT series - the AUGMENT Case and AUGMENT Dock.


THE CASE

Infused with the AUGMENT design DNA, the AUGMENT case gives you access to the world of AUGMENT accessories. 

AUGMENT gives you the confidence to buy a protective case without compromise. You will never again need to ask "but will this work with my protective case?", because the AUGMENT accessories are specifically designed to complement the AUGMENT case and to be integrated in both style and function. We've thought about everything so that you don't have to.

Transforming bold design

The AUGMENT case design breaks the mold of the standard iPhone case by transforming the shape and style of your iPhone to give it a unique appearance. Every detail has been carefully refined, prototyped, and tested to ensure a premium quality result. Our years of experience making and designing cases and accessories means that you can be confident of the highest standards of quality and function.

TPU and PC construction

The case is made from a combination of high grade Polycarbonate (PC) and Thermoplastic Polyurethane (TPU) similar to other premium cases on the market. The difference is that AUGMENT is made with the softer TPU material on the outside which means that your case is more resistant to small scratches. We hate it when you buy a nice shiny new case and it's scuffed up before the first day of use is over!

Patent Pending mounting system

The AUGMENT mounting system makes the AUGMENT series possible. The cavity and mounting points allow the case to easily and securely connect with the other AUGMENT products reducing the strain on the ports and integrating your experience.

THE DOCK

Uses the standard Apple Lightning cable

The AUGMENT dock incorporates the standard Apple Lightning connector. When your dock arrives just simply insert your Lightning cable as per the instructions and start docking! 

No tools or adjustments required

The AUGMENT dock is designed to work perfectly with your AUGMENT case. There are no screws or complicated steps to adjust the dock before it will work. Just insert the cable, snap shut the two piece enclosure and go!

Micro suction base 

We think that un-docking should be just as easy as docking your phone. The micro suction base ensures that when you lift the phone up, the dock doesn't come with it. The micro suction material is revolutionary technology that sticks to any flat surface, meaning that you don't need to use a big heavy dock that looks like a larger paper weight. Micro suction will stick to smooth, flat surfaces.

Prototype images shown


THE PERKS!


COLOUR SELECTION

BLACK / WHITE / RED / YELLOW / BLUE?

The products are available in 5 different bold colour options and can be mixed or matched to suit your style.

Following the end of the campaign, backers will be contacted to confirm your colour choices and shipping details. 


SHIPPING

Shipping is FREE to any country, worldwide! For the duration of this campaign you not only get AUGMENT at a discounted price, but you also get free shipping.


PROJECT TIMELINE

We have already done our prototypes, validated the design, and had quotations from our world class vendors. Once this project reaches its funding goal we will be kicking off tooling ASAP! We will be there for every mold trial, on the line for production, and watching the parts go out the door to you. We wish we could be there when it arrives too, but unfortunately our frequent flyer points won't get us to every doorstep.


WHO ARE WE? 

RUBIX are a creative team who love to challenge the norm. Our mission is to create electronics, accessories and apparel that reshape and enhance user experience through great design. We are obsessive about the detail and committed to delivering the best possible product. 

We are experienced in working in design, development and production for the world's leading brands and we know what it takes to deliver a great product. We are located in Hong Kong and on the ground in China, working together with our world class vendors from day one of every project.


WHY DO WE NEED YOU?

We have the access to talented designers and world class manufacturing partners, however product tooling and factory MOQs are expensive. Crowdfunding not only gives us the opportunity to gain access to the funding required in advance, it also allows us to interact directly with our customers, get valuable early feedback before the product goes to production. We love the fact that we can start building relationships early on in the process and also reward our loyal supporters by ensuring that they are the first ones to get product in hand at the best value possible! 


FAQs

Will the AUGMENT Dock work without the AUGMENT Case?

Yes! The AUGMENT Dock works very will with a 'naked' iPhone 5/5S and will also work with various other protective cases.

I want to support this idea, but I don't have an iPhone. Can I still contribute?

Yes you can! Just press "CONTRIBUTE NOW" and you can simply select "No perk, I just want to contribute" and select the amount you wish to donate. Of course you can always buy an AUGMENT Case and Dock for a friend.

I haven't upgraded to the 5S. Will the AUGMENT Case work with my iPhone 5? 

Yes! The protective case has been designed to fit both the iPhone 5 and iPhone 5S.

Can I use my existing headphones with the AUGMENT case?

The AUGMENT case has been designed to allow greater clearance than the Apple standards. The case should fit almost any headphones with a connector diameter of 7mm or less. (Apple's standard case allows only 6mm clearance)

How can I update my address? Please contact us at - contact@rubix.co

Any further questions you can email the RUBIX team at contact@rubix.co


Apple is a trademark of Apple Inc.

© RUBIX CO. LTD 2013

have the access to talented designers and world class manufacturing partners,
however product tooling and factory MOQs are expensive. Crowdfunding not only gives

story:
A New Cycling Experience!

       

      Not less than 12 features have been integrated into a single product! 

          Safety, Connectivity & Fun have been the key drivers while we designed the product.

           

          BEAKOR combines a fully wireless device and a smartphone application.

           

          The device has been designed around:

          • an Innovative Lights System,

          • an Integrated Dual Cam Video System and

          • a Dedicated Smartphone app (iOS and Android).

           
           

           

           

          From the Media…

           

           

           

          Why BEAKOR?

          Cyclists’ population growing fast in urban areas, so as the amount of accidents

          • 1 cyclist out of 1000 will experience an accident this year
          • 75% of them happen in urban areas
          • Severity of accidents materially increased. 15% of them being severe or fatal.

           

                ​

           

           

          BEAKOR, the Swiss Knife of Cycling Devices

          When New Technologies & Connectivity meet Design

           

          SEE & BE SEEN

          Unique light system that improves cyclists' safety, by increasing their visibility from all vehicles and pedestrians; but also, make more visible their own route ahead.

           

          LED TURNING INDICATORS

          Like cars do, LED Turning Indicators send very distinctive front and back notifications to other vehicles, on your next direction changes.

          They are activated through the remote control.

           

          GROUND LASER TURNING INDICATORS

          Activated via remote control to indicate by night which direction you turn, laser indicators project on the ground distinctive blinking orange arrows to notify other vehicles following you, which way you are going to turn.

           

          ANTI-BLIND SPOT

          Laser projected signal on the ground and ahead of the bike to announce you meters away, to other vehicles at junctions, hence reducing seriously the risk of collisions.

           

          AUTOMATED BRAKE LIGHTS

          Enable to notify very efficiently vehicles following you, that you are slowing down and avoid collision dangers.

          Automatically activated when the bike is reducing speed via an innovative accelerometer component.

           

          STRONG HEADLAMP

          With one of the most powerful Headlamp available in the market, seeing the road won’t be anymore an issue.

          Hours of dark night cycling experience thanks to the high charge/intensity battery, without a need to recharge it

           

          DISTINCTIVE BLINKERS

          Front & Back Blinkers are fully integrated in each modules, and can be activated and disconnected through the remote control.

          Powerful LEDs have been selected to ensure by day, night or even foggy weather, vehicles or persons would be to notify of your presence

           

          SMART VIDEO RECORDING SYSTEM

          As part of the new trend for dashboard cams and action cameras, front and back BEAKOR modules with each, a HD camera can record looping sequences of your journey for safety, insurance purposes; but also, cameras that can record continuous videos like any action cam for a fun use.

           

          LIVE « MIRROR VIEW »

          Back module wide angle cam coupled with your smartphone enables Live Streaming as Mirror View.

          Powerful feature, never provided to cyclists thats enables to check what’s happening behind without having to turn head or to add mirrors on its bike.

          Back Cam records also in Loop together with the front cam as a “black box” feature to provide proofs of responsibility in case of an accident

           

          FRONT/BACK HD CAMERAS

          Activated thanks to the iOS/Android native smartphone application.

          Like the very trendy dash cams, enables Looping Video Recording and/or Continuous Video Recording features for enhanced safety, insurance purposes and also for memorable cycling experience. Videos recorded are stored on the integrated BEAKOR SD memory card, downloadable on your smartphone, or can be shared on social networks.

           

          Native iOS/Android Smartphone Application

          Developed to extend BEAKOR modules new features, the application ables to control/improve the safety and better analyze your journey.  It allows you to connect socially, access all your videos recorded and, manage/update your modules.

           

          ACCIDENT ALERT SYSTEM

          Unique feature NEVER PROVIDED TO CYCLISTS UNTIL TODAY. Generates in case of a detected accident and if connected to a smartphone, automatic messages with GPS positioning sent via email or text message to a pre-defined list of contacts.

          Function is activated via sensors in the modules that detect accident situations.

           

          SOCIAL NETWORK CONNECTIVITY

          Function provided by BEAKOR smartphone application, will allow you to share with friends, all cycling session parameters that BEAKOR will enable you to capture.

          You won’t be anymore alone on your bike offering to all your friends, to share your experience.

           

          LIVE VIDEO CAST

          You will be able to cast Live Remote Video Feed thanks smart connectivity functions.

          Front or back camera can be selected, as well as quality of the feed, to cast.

          This function will help you share freely and very easily with your friends live unmemorable moments of your cycling sessions.

           

          Additional Features

          ANTITHEFT ALARM SYSTEM

          Bored at alarm systems that triggers off for no reasons ?

          This smart Antitheft Alarm System will recognize via embedded tilt sensors if your bike is really being stolen, being tilted but also then after moved forward or backward significantly. 

          2 TYPES HORN SIGNAL

          One for pedestrians and the other one, more powerful, for cars. 

          Horns are activated via the respective remote control button

           

           

          How to Get BEAKOR?

          The full BEAKOR system (front & back modules, remote control) can be purchased separately (front or back, remote control) if you choose to use only some of the features.

           

           

          BEAKOR Perks

          Please find and choose the offers/perks that suit best your wishes, interests and needs.

           

           

          BEAKOR Prototyping

          After more than one year working hard on BEAKOR, we have succeeded in finalizing the design and build lately prototypes with the finish of the final product we aim towards.

          We have been able to research, identify, test and audit most of the electronic components that will be embedded in BEAKOR.

          However, 15 months down the road and after investing most of our own money, we miss some funding that would able us to finalise the PCB editing & layout and firmware/software development, which would give us a fully functional prototype.

           

           

          BEAKOR Timeline

          From birth to success, thanks to your support, please check BEAKOR's evolution along the time.

           


           

          About Us

          We are two brothers from Toulouse, France, passionate about cycling and technology, looking at delivering a safer and yet fun, environment for all cyclists over the world.

           

          Ludovic KESSAS       

          Founder and CEO

          lk@beakorcycling.com

          Former Head of France at tier-one Investment Banks in London. Ludovic has more than a decade of operational experience on trading floors forging entrepreneurship and team management. Ludovic holds a Specialized Master in Bank and Financial Engineering from Toulouse Business School, and a MSc in Financial Markets from Paris Dauphine University.

          Ludovic is passionate about sports and challenges. He successfully achieved the Iron Man long distance triathlon 70.3 from Aix-en-Provence in 2014. It is actually while training hard for it, cycling downtown but also in the county side, that Ludovic realized how much cyclists face daily road safety issues.

           

          Sébastien KESSAS

          CFO and Head of Sales

          sk@beakorcycling.com

          He has made a 20 years’ carrier within tier-one Investments Banks in Europe and occupied different management roles within Fixed Income industry.

          Sébastien said: “With more than 1 billon cyclists throughout the world, an increasing number of new urban practitioners every day, and the danger of cycling within cities, the need to enhanced safety has become a clear goal. We think our product will make a real difference”.

          Sébastien holds a Master in Financial Markets from Paris Dauphine University.

          Sébastien is passionate about sports. After several 20K run races, he is looking for his first triathlon challenge with his brother.

           

           

          BEAKOR Accessory

          BEAKOR Storage Case

          Storage case is the perfect companion of your BEAKOR device and enables you to carry both modules (front and back) in a nice and perfectly fitting box.

          Case is made of high end materials. 

           

          BEAKOR LED illuminated T-Shirt

          Perfect compliment to your Beakor device, LED blinking T-Shirt are highly fashionable, geek and funny apparel.
          LED lights are flashing in blue/white like Beakor logo.
          Please make sure to follow cleaning instructions to offer long life to your T-Shirt.

          T-shirt  100% cotton

          LED panel
          Techniques: Velcro & sewed in
          Effect: flashing

          Inverter
          Voltage: DC6V or 3V
          Using 2 AA batteries or 4AAA Batteries
          Auto flashing inverter

          How to wash the t-shirt?
          1. Please hand wash
          2. Remove the power unit before washing, keep the inverter dry
          3. Do not submerge any part of the flash panel, wash the t-shirt only
          4. For panel with velcro, take the velcro off, and put the velcro and panel aside, then you can wash as you want

           

          BEAKOR Bike Phone Holder

          Phone holder adaptable to most bikes.
          Perfect companion to your Beakor device as it will enable you to fix securely your smartphone and access all its commands, use Beakor App’s functions and notably the very appreciated mirror view function.

          Details
          Material: ABS
          Suitable for mobile phone to fix on a bicycle
          You can adjust as you need, to fit most common phones models (iPhones, Samsung,…)
          360 rotation patella
          Quake proof designed, convenient and reliable to use
          Two wings of soft fixations, offering a more secure use
          It comes with a non-slip pad

           

           

          Risks & Challenges

          For highly technological IoT objects such as BEAKOR, risks & issues can be experienced through different ways: the application from theory to hardware, and the application from theory to software.

          Among these issues, software are the easiest to control and reduce.

          For BEAKOR we have conducted a 2 months’ long due diligence process to rightly select our software development partner. This very experienced and professional smartphone developer company will be in charge of coding the last functions already designed for the 2 native platforms we have retained (iOS and Android).

          With regards to hardware risks, they are generally the most important ones to focus on in such kind of IoT venture. Sometimes, great ideas cannot always be translated into real products, because of potential technology limitations, or because production costs can be misjudged.

          For BEAKOR, we have already cleared all these points.

          To arrive where we are, we have partnered up with a group of automotive designers, industrial designers, smartphone application developer and with Seebo, an Israeli founded start-up specialized in IoT products.

          The choice of manufacturing partners, electronic components, optimization of design & productions costs, have been reviewed, audited and selected, to offer the greatest degree of certitude today over this project, BEAKOR.

          Despite all the attention paid to details on all parts of this project, few remaining risks cannot be totally discarded.

          Potential delivery delays - Manufacturers and component suppliers can experience shortage of products. If on our side we have secured access to production lines to sustain large order requests from customers, this cannot be excluded.

          Certification - Different parts of our product must be tested and certified by various agencies. This process can also experience delays, even though our engineers have worked hard to set up pre-certification process, enabling to start the process promptly once the campaign is finished.

          We feel confident in our ability to deliver a high-quality product on time.

          Should you have any questions, please feel free to email us at: contact@beakorcycling.com
story_txt:
A New Cycling Experience!
 
Not less than 12 features have been integrated into a single product! 








Safety, Connectivity & Fun have been the key drivers while we designed the product. 
 
BEAKOR combines a fully wireless device and a smartphone application.
 
The device has been designed around: 

an Innovative Lights System, 
an Integrated Dual Cam Video System and 
a Dedicated Smartphone app (iOS and Android).

    From the Media…   Why BEAKOR?Cyclists’ population growing fast in urban areas, so as the amount of accidents
1 cyclist out of 1000 will experience an accident this year
75% of them happen in urban areas
Severity of accidents materially increased. 15% of them being severe or fatal.
       ​  BEAKOR, the Swiss Knife of Cycling DevicesWhen New Technologies & Connectivity meet Design SEE & BE SEENUnique light system that improves cyclists' safety, by increasing their visibility from all vehicles and pedestrians; but also, make more visible their own route ahead. LED TURNING INDICATORSLike cars do, LED Turning Indicators send very distinctive front and back notifications to other vehicles, on your next direction changes.They are activated through the remote control. GROUND LASER TURNING INDICATORSActivated via remote control to indicate by night which direction you turn, laser indicators project on the ground distinctive blinking orange arrows to notify other vehicles following you, which way you are going to turn. ANTI-BLIND SPOTLaser projected signal on the ground and ahead of the bike to announce you meters away, to other vehicles at junctions, hence reducing seriously the risk of collisions. AUTOMATED BRAKE LIGHTSEnable to notify very efficiently vehicles following you, that you are slowing down and avoid collision dangers.Automatically activated when the bike is reducing speed via an innovative accelerometer component. STRONG HEADLAMPWith one of the most powerful Headlamp available in the market, seeing the road won’t be anymore an issue.Hours of dark night cycling experience thanks to the high charge/intensity battery, without a need to recharge it DISTINCTIVE BLINKERSFront & Back Blinkers are fully integrated in each modules, and can be activated and disconnected through the remote control.Powerful LEDs have been selected to ensure by day, night or even foggy weather, vehicles or persons would be to notify of your presence SMART VIDEO RECORDING SYSTEMAs part of the new trend for dashboard cams and action cameras, front and back BEAKOR modules with each, a HD camera can record looping sequences of your journey for safety, insurance purposes; but also, cameras that can record continuous videos like any action cam for a fun use.  LIVE « MIRROR VIEW »Back module wide angle cam coupled with your smartphone enables Live Streaming as Mirror View.Powerful feature, never provided to cyclists thats enables to check what’s happening behind without having to turn head or to add mirrors on its bike.Back Cam records also in Loop together with the front cam as a “black box” feature to provide proofs of responsibility in case of an accident FRONT/BACK HD CAMERASActivated thanks to the iOS/Android native smartphone application.Like the very trendy dash cams, enables Looping Video Recording and/or Continuous Video Recording features for enhanced safety, insurance purposes and also for memorable cycling experience. Videos recorded are stored on the integrated BEAKOR SD memory card, downloadable on your smartphone, or can be shared on social networks. Native iOS/Android Smartphone ApplicationDeveloped to extend BEAKOR modules new features, the application ables to control/improve the safety and better analyze your journey.  It allows you to connect socially, access all your videos recorded and, manage/update your modules. ACCIDENT ALERT SYSTEMUnique feature NEVER PROVIDED TO CYCLISTS UNTIL TODAY. Generates in case of a detected accident and if connected to a smartphone, automatic messages with GPS positioning sent via email or text message to a pre-defined list of contacts.Function is activated via sensors in the modules that detect accident situations. SOCIAL NETWORK CONNECTIVITYFunction provided by BEAKOR smartphone application, will allow you to share with friends, all cycling session parameters that BEAKOR will enable you to capture.You won’t be anymore alone on your bike offering to all your friends, to share your experience. LIVE VIDEO CASTYou will be able to cast Live Remote Video Feed thanks smart connectivity functions.Front or back camera can be selected, as well as quality of the feed, to cast.This function will help you share freely and very easily with your friends live unmemorable moments of your cycling sessions. Additional FeaturesANTITHEFT ALARM SYSTEMBored at alarm systems that triggers off for no reasons ?This smart Antitheft Alarm System will recognize via embedded tilt sensors if your bike is really being stolen, being tilted but also then after moved forward or backward significantly. 2 TYPES HORN SIGNALOne for pedestrians and the other one, more powerful, for cars. Horns are activated via the respective remote control button  How to Get BEAKOR?The full BEAKOR system (front & back modules, remote control) can be purchased separately (front or back, remote control) if you choose to use only some of the features.  BEAKOR PerksPlease find and choose the offers/perks that suit best your wishes, interests and needs.  BEAKOR PrototypingAfter more than one year working hard on BEAKOR, we have succeeded in finalizing the design and build lately prototypes with the finish of the final product we aim towards.We have been able to research, identify, test and audit most of the electronic components that will be embedded in BEAKOR.However, 15 months down the road and after investing most of our own money, we miss some funding that would able us to finalise the PCB editing & layout and firmware/software development, which would give us a fully functional prototype.  BEAKOR TimelineFrom birth to success, thanks to your support, please check BEAKOR's evolution along the time.  About UsWe are two brothers from Toulouse, France, passionate about cycling and technology, looking at delivering a safer and yet fun, environment for all cyclists over the world. Ludovic KESSAS       Founder and CEOlk@beakorcycling.comFormer Head of France at tier-one Investment Banks in London. Ludovic has more than a decade of operational experience on trading floors forging entrepreneurship and team management. Ludovic holds a Specialized Master in Bank and Financial Engineering from Toulouse Business School, and a MSc in Financial Markets from Paris Dauphine University.Ludovic is passionate about sports and challenges. He successfully achieved the Iron Man long distance triathlon 70.3 from Aix-en-Provence in 2014. It is actually while training hard for it, cycling downtown but also in the county side, that Ludovic realized how much cyclists face daily road safety issues. Sébastien KESSASCFO and Head of Salessk@beakorcycling.comHe has made a 20 years’ carrier within tier-one Investments Banks in Europe and occupied different management roles within Fixed Income industry.Sébastien said: “With more than 1 billon cyclists throughout the world, an increasing number of new urban practitioners every day, and the danger of cycling within cities, the need to enhanced safety has become a clear goal. We think our product will make a real difference”.Sébastien holds a Master in Financial Markets from Paris Dauphine University.Sébastien is passionate about sports. For panel with velcro, take the velcro off, and put the velcro and panel aside, then you can wash as you want BEAKOR Bike Phone HolderPhone holder adaptable to most bikes.Perfect companion to your Beakor device as it will enable you to fix securely your smartphone and access all its commands, use Beakor App’s functions and notably the very appreciated mirror view function.DetailsMaterial: ABSSuitable for mobile phone to fix on a bicycleYou can adjust as you need, to fit most common phones models (iPhones, Samsung,…)360 rotation patellaQuake proof designed, convenient and reliable to useTwo wings of soft fixations, offering a more secure useIt comes with a non-slip pad  Risks & ChallengesFor highly technological IoT objects such as BEAKOR, risks & issues can be experienced through different ways: the application from theory to hardware, and the application from theory to software.Among these issues, software are the easiest to control and reduce.For BEAKOR we have conducted a 2 months’ long due diligence process to rightly select our software development partner. story:
Dear Friends,
My name is Darin Noyes and I am looking for funding for my 2013 racing program.  I have been building and driving my own cars now for about 15 years, and 2013 will be my last year of competition.  I have always been a low budget team, as I have been a “one man gang” when it comes to working on the cars, maintenance, fundraising, and everything else that a race team entails.  I am hoping with your help that this year will be a great ending to a hobby that I have enjoyed through out the last several years!

I race around the Sioux Falls, SD area.  The tracks I run on are 3/8ths to ½ mile dirt tracks, and this year I will drive a USRA B Modified.  I am a member of Team JDRF, or Juvenile Diabetes Research Foundation.  Although juvenile diabetes is generally associated with a younger crowd, I have had Type 1 (or juvenile) diabetes since I was 11 years old.  It gives me great pride to carry the Team JDRF Race For a Cure decals on my car, and I hope I can be an example to people of any age that this disease does not have to own you!  We have come a long ways in the way we fight diabetes since my diagnosis, and more and more work is being done everyday.  I feel my racing program is just one more way of raising awareness as we Race For a Cure!

FUNDING GOALS

I am hoping to raise $4000 for my final year.  This would go towards the purchase of a new motor.  I have always built my own motors, and it would be nice for once to be able to compete on the same level as most of the competition.  If I do not meet my goal, a race team can go through a lot of money in a short time, so anything I am able to raise will be sorely needed!  Tires, fuel, broken parts, entry fees, etc…can make for a long season!  If my goal of $4000 is reached I will make a $400 donation to JDRF! 

BOTTOM LINE

Racecar sponsorship is another great way to get your company or cause name out in front of people.  Race fans are fiercely loyal and tend to favor brands that they know help fund their favorite pastime.  Along with the other Team JDRF drivers, we were able to raise $15,000 in 2012 for the Juvenile Diabetes Research Foundation.  That is a tremendous amount of support from our smaller sized market area, and I am very proud of everyone that made that happen!  Anything my team can do to add to that in the next coming year, with your help I look forward to doing it!
