story:
This is Cautoh


A new way to be a smart drinker

We have been drinking for centuries, and yet we still don't know much about what really happens when we do it. There's technology in every step of our lives, and yet not much when you pour that beer... Cautoh is a portable breathalyzer that uses an advanced alcohol sensor to help you track your alcohol intake and make more responsible drinking choices. With Cautoh, you can see if and when you're ready to drive after a few glasses of wine, avoid pesky hangovers, and remind yourself when enough is enough. Cautoh is small, portable, and discrete.

Our team has been working hard to take the guesswork out of drinking leaving more room for fun!  And now, a year later, we are proud to present Cautoh - your perfect drinking partner for a night out with friends.


As seen in:




With you since you walk into the bar...

Get a forecast with your drink-buddy, Cautoh. The app will be there from start telling you how will you react in advance to each drink. Do you know that kind of guy that always impress with their use of technology? Well... you can be that guy!




Are you dinning and want a cup of wine?...

What about a good ale with that steak... While you enjoy that sublime moment Cautoh will got you backed. Enjoy and let the app tell you when you should be sober after that drink!


Support your team, nothing else.

Watching a game with friends tends to get a little crazy sometimes. But that's OK. You can always use Cautoh to know who can drive, or to get an Uber if all resulted too buzzed.





How does it work



Awesome Features






Really small and portable
Beautiful design





Really easy to use!                                      


Hit the play below!



How is that it doesn't need a mouthpiece? Well, we found out that you can cup your hand around the breathalyzer to form one and still get pretty accurate results. Once you learn how to blow in it you won't hesitate sharing it with your friends. At the end in the FAQ we dig more in the accuracy.






But we are not just a breathalyzer

What if you need a quick estimate of the alcohol level you are going to get while drinking? We got you backed, with our free app you can keep track of what you are drinking so the app gives you the approximate alcohol level based on the drinking timeline, weight, and gender.

Download the app now and check out the quality for yourself before contributing:

               




Perks

Now is the time:





Get yours for free!

Spread the word and reap the benefits!  If your friends purchase 4+ Cautohs, you will get yours for free!  Make sure to be logged in Indiegogo and share them, that way we can track and identify your referrals.  You will be able to see every purchase your friends make on your personal dashboard. How awesome is that?! 

Find out exactly how in this Indiegogo's post




Roadmap



Meet the Cautoh team


Reach us and tell us what we can do for you, we'll be pleased to help:

           
              Leon Hernandez, CEO
             @leonfhl
                
Daniel Cano, CTO              
@danielcanog              








We are a Colombian team who love our country, and since the myth of "a cup of coffee lowers your alcohol level" is one of the common ones, we thought this was the perfect chance to let you enjoy a cup of fresh Colombian coffee and test this myth's validity. 

**Spoiler alert!**  It's false...  :(   but the coffee is awesome!!  :D

Back to our story.

We met almost 8 years ago in college, and 3 years ago we got together to create our first tech startup, we realized that thanks to our complementary skills on programming and electronic design, we could create advanced technology and decided to leave the B2B business and get directly to the customer with a helpful product. So we started again one year ago and we have worked hard to exploit the best of each to get this product ready. We know you will love it.



 

Why are we doing this

One weekend while talking over a beer on some random topics we both realized that alcohol level myths were present in our life on a regular basis, and there wasn't a reliable and easy way to know how alcohol affects our body. And digging around we found that people want to avoid breaking the law, but still want to have just a beer or a cup of wine with a meal. And almost nobody has a clue about the alcohol levels when they drink. So we knew we could do something to solve this, and there started the journey!


Don't be a stranger:

       
       




Press Kit link here!

End of the funny part, more technical stuff below ;)


Risks & Challenges

We have been working for over a year developing Cautoh and getting it ready for production and we already sold a few units to early adopters. We know that before mass production begins, we may find some problems but we have plans to mitigate all the risks and have enlisted great advisors and partners that will also help.

Manufacturing:

We need to create the tooling to manufacture different parts of the product as the plastic injection mold. This process is not very complex since our product was design to keep it simple, but requires time to get it just right. Complications could potentially emerge but to tackle this risk, we've selected experienced partners that can work closely with us through the whole process.

Software:

As you probably already saw the app is already deployed and functional, but we have made all the hardware integration with Android, so we need to finish development on iOS prior production. We have a lot of experience in this area but if necessary we will look for additional help to solve any problems that could emerge.

Our team is strong and counts with the capabilities to solve problems and overcome challenges, as we’ve done so far. Our goal is to make a high-quality product for you and deliver it right on time.

FAQ

Q: How accurate is it the sensor?

A: We use a high-precision semiconductor sensor, also the device is designed so you can cup your hand around it and use it as mouthpiece so you can get a more affordable and yet precise device. With that configuration, we have measured great results compared with a professional breathalyzer (+/-0.004% BAC, the limit allowed in the U.S. is 0.08% so you form an idea of the accuracy). Also, we up-compensate the measure on the app so a false negative is way less likely to happen.

Q: Let's talk money, honey. What if you don't reach the goal?

A: Don't worry a bit, we have a fixed goal. That means you will have a FULL refund if we don't reach the 100%. That's because all the money is intended to be used in production so we can't assure to deliver the product with any less. That being said, if you backed us you better be sharing the campaign the most you can ;)

Q: How long does the battery last?

A: Cautoh uses a single AAA Alkaline battery, and it has an autonomy of almost 100 tests with it.

Q: Is it safe to share it?

A: Most definitely. Cautoh is designed so you never touch the plastic case with your mouth as you blow trough your cupped hand, so feel free to find who's your drunkest friend.

Q: Does Cautoh come with a warranty?

A: Absolutely!  Every Cautoh will come with a 1-year warranty from any manufacturing faults or defects.

Q: Why do you need Indiegogo for?

A: We have put care in build a great product! So we need your contribution to lowering the production costs. So the money is going to be used on mass production setup and iOS development final stages.

Q: Can I get a refund?

A: According to Indiegogo’s refund policy, all backers can get a refund directly through them until the campaign ends. Instructions can be found here. After the campaign, please reach out to our team at support@cautoh.com!

Q: How do I get in touch?

A: You can message us on here or email us at info@cautoh.com. We care about your thoughts, keep in touch.

Q: Why is it called Cautoh?

A: Awesome question! In Spanish cauto means cautious and OH is the chemical symbol for alcohol, so we mixed it up! :D
cauto + OH = Cautoh   
We want to carry the message that it's cool to enjoy some drinks but, to do it in a responsible way.

Q: Can I support this project even more?

A: Sure! Love you asked that... Fell free to contribute all you want or buy as many perks as you want, and you can also share this campaign with all your friends. Tell them about this, email them about this, message them about this, convince them, Ahhggrrrrr!




------------------- ♥ -------------------
Thank you for backing us,
you are and always will be the hero!
--------------

Why are we doing this



One weekend while talking over a beer on some random topics we both realized that alcohol level myths were present in our life on a regular basis, and there wasn't a reliable and easy way to know how alcohol affects our body. And digging around we found that people want to avoid breaking the law, but still want to have just a beer or a cup of wine with a meal. And almost nobody has a clue about the alcohol levels when they drink. So we knew we could do something to solve this, and there started the journey!
Don't be a stranger:


  
       
  
       
  

Press Kit link here!End of the funny part, more technical stuff below ;)





Risks & Challenges


We have been working for over a year developing Cautoh and getting it ready for production and we already sold a few units to early adopters. We know that before mass production begins, we may find some problems but we have plans to mitigate all the risks and have enlisted great advisors and partners that will also help.
Manufacturing:
We need to create the tooling to manufacture different parts of the product as the plastic injection mold. This process is not very complex since our product was design to keep it simple, but requires time to get it just right. Complications could potentially emerge but to tackle this risk, we've selected experienced partners that can work closely with us through the whole process.
Software:
As you probably already saw the app is already deployed and functional, but we have made all the hardware integration with Android, so we need to finish development on iOS prior production. We have a lot of experience in this area but if necessary we will look for additional help to solve any problems that could emerge.Our team is strong and counts with the capabilities to solve problems and overcome challenges, as we’ve done so far. Our goal is to make a high-quality product for you and deliver it right on time. 
FAQ
Q: How accurate is it the sensor? 
A: We use a high-precision semiconductor sensor, also the device is designed so you can cup your hand around it and use it as mouthpiece so you can get a more affordable and yet precise device. With that configuration, we have measured great results compared with a professional breathalyzer (+/-0.004% BAC, the limit allowed in the U.S. is 0.08% so you form an idea of the accuracy). Also, we up-compensate the measure on the app so a false negative is way less likely to happen. 
Q: Let's talk money, honey. What if you don't reach the goal?
A: Don't worry a bit, we have a fixed goal. That means you will have a FULL refund if we don't reach the 100%. That's because all the money is intended to be used in production so we can't assure to deliver the product with any less. That being said, if you backed us you better be sharing the campaign the most you can ;)
Q: How long does the battery last?
A: Cautoh uses a single AAA Alkaline battery, and it has an autonomy of almost 100 tests with it.
Q: Is it safe to share it?
A: Most definitely. Cautoh is designed so you never touch the plastic case with your mouth as you blow trough your cupped hand, so feel free to find who's your drunkest friend.
Q: Does Cautoh come with a warranty?
A: Absolutely!  Every Cautoh will come with a 1-year warranty from any manufacturing faults or defects.
Q: Why do you need Indiegogo for?
A: We have put care in build a great product! So we need your contribution to lowering the production costs. So the money is going to be used on mass production setup and iOS development final stages.
Q: Can I get a refund?
A: According to Indiegogo’s refund policy, all backers can get a refund directly through them until the campaign ends. Instructions can be found here. After the campaign, please reach out to our team at support@cautoh.com!
Q: How do I get in touch?
A: You can message us on here or email us at info@cautoh.com. We care about your thoughts, keep in touch.
Q: Why is it called Cautoh?
A: Awesome question! In Spanish cauto means cautious and OH is the chemical symbol for alcohol, so we mixed it up! :Dcauto + OH = Cautoh    We want to carry the message that it's cool to enjoy some drinks but, to do it in a responsible way.
Q: Can I support this project even more?
A: Sure! Love you asked that... Fell free to contribute all you want or buy as many perks as you want, and you can also share this campaign with all your friends. Tell them about this, email them about this, message them about this, convince them, Ahhggrrrrr!

------------------- ♥ -------------------Thank you for backing us, you are and always will be the hero!--------------

story:
Save your cable

 

We all know the problem of poor-quality cables getting broken over time. This is gonna fix this problem! By simply putting this plastic tube over the weak point of the cable and heating it up, it will shrink down and provide perfect securtiy from breaking.

Final product, no risks, launch: early 2017

story:
Time for a true revolution of gaming - INDIEGO Roots of Gaming

INDIEGO! was planned as gaming console but we failed because people told us that they don't need another PC.. they just asked for the Software.

So here we go a second time. This time it is all about the OS that transforms any of your devices (PC, MAC, Amiga and Raspberry Pi) into a sort of Steambox. On PC and Mac we will also provide access to Steam, Desuara and other App-Stores as well.  

The goal is to deliver a custom user interface that was specifically designed for gaming in living rooms and on large screens.  

The INDIEGO! is about retro, indie and NexGen gaming. Why rebuy your old retro games all the time...? Play your originals with INDIEGO!

Based on our experiences we made with our work around AROS and the creation of AEROS (www.aeros-os.org). We provide you a single Operating system which can run your existing Amiga (CD32), AROS, C64, DOS, Mac, Windows and Linux games. But not only limited to those. 

Due to the open character and the support for Homebrew everyone is invited to add more support for more platforms and games. 

INDIEGO!-OS will offer a media centric User-Interface (based on our experience with AMC - Amiga mediaCenter). You can access the INDIEGO!-Marketplace straight from your sofa. You will find games, demos, movies, music and more for virtually any gaming system released since digital Stone Age. As long it is legal. 

Enjoy your favorite games from your childhood... play again milestones in gaming history.  

The INDIEGO!-Marketplace can also be accessed from Windows, Linux, OSX (PPC and i386), AmigaOS 3.x, AmigaOS 4.x, MorphOS and more. 

We will optimize INDIEGO!-OS for several devices. But thankfully we have now the trust of Genesi USA and we are proud to bring INDIEGO!-OS(and AEROS) to the EFIKA MX53 and the Raspberry Pi.

Step 1(already done partially for Raspberry Pi www.aeros-os.org):

AEROS for EFIKA MX53 incl. 68K emulation for free.

Step 2:

INDIEGO!-Client for ARM Linux

Step 3:

INDIEGO-OS for Raspberry Pi and EFIKA MX53 and other devices.

You will be able to access your games from AEROS with a Client (window-mode or full screen) or you login straight into INDIEGO!-OS ideal for big TV's.

EFIKA MX53 brings enough performance to emulate faster Amigas.

A PI reaches roughly A500 speed. The Efika will allow emulation of A1200 - we will check this and report back! 

When we reach the final stretch goal we will release also AEROS including the lx-command for free on all named Platforms. 

So far there is a free version and a "Plus" version available that offer extended features. 

INDIEGO-OS WILL BE AVAILABLE FOR FREE anyway!!! 

Compatible devices will be called INDIEGO!-certified. 

One of those IndieGO!-/Steam/boxes is the AresOne 2014.

To make things affordable for everyone we will switch focus on small, efficient ARM devices as the Raspberry Pi and the Efika MX53.

You can even transform a sub 30$ Net client into a retro console with access of thousand or more hours of entertainment. Mostly for free.

The EFIKA MX53 platform creates a solid foundation for consumer and embedded products, including netbooks, tablets 

INDIEGO-Marketplace will be full of free software, an ideal platform for not so rich people. As you and me.

Others call themself "open" because they use a open source OS as core... we do too. BUT:

In our case we use a system derived from debian (see www.aeros-os.org for old versions)...  But for our definition this is not "open" enough.

Imagine you registered on STEAM... well you are free to access it as well and enjoy your games on the your INDIEGO!-system with your own account.

You like Desura.. Well than use Dersura to get your favorite games..

Check INDIEGO! App-store as an alternative and decide which store offers the best price. 

You like Onlive.. ok use it on your INDIEGO straight from your sofa. (not for all ARM-devices yet)

This is freedom and not a dictated game library and prices.

And being able to run a game you bought already for PC/LINUX, Amiga and other consoles is nice too. 

INDIEGO! is a platform for digital art. 

Enjoy our Demo Scene channel - watch, enjoy, share your  favorite scene demos for nearly every homecomputer or console straight on your TV. 

Who needs a VJ ; ) 

INDIEGO! works straight from SD-card or USB-Stick. No installation required! 

Take your entire library to your friend's party. 


INDIEGO! Is a paradise for independent developers.

Based on a multi-hybrid-OS the system runs a lot of stuff for different CPU-architectures.

Just code in the language you like and embed the result in a INDIEGO! app container called IGO. 

Developers can register at www.amc.biz/igo 

Ask us for more details.

No special SDK needed. 

The OS

The core OS is a heavily customized debian based on our experiences with AEROS. 

The UI is called IGNAS and because design matters it is skinable. 

Your donations will be used to do a proper visual design.

Due to the low footprint the OS consumes normally less than 40MB RAM.

GAMES, games and even more games

The INDIEGO! will come with a online marketplace full of games and demos and you can start playing your favorite C64, Amiga (CD32), DOS, Linux and Windows games from day one. 

To allow you to store, collect and take your games to a friends party, we will also offer INDIEGO!-OS on USB-sticks(64GB+) and SD-cards. 

No need to install anything onto Harddrive. Just plug the INDIEGO!-Stick into your PC and you are ready to rock.

Photos, music, movies and Video on demand

The INDIEGO supports a lot of media center applications like AmiMC (aka AMC in the Amiga Scene), XBMC and Plex. 

Who we are

We are a group of retro-amigans and dreamers.. the difference to pure dreamers is that we aren't just talking but we really try something. 

The idea for INDIEGO! comes from Pascal Papara member of Open Invention Network, (Distribution Mainatainer and publisher)

IGNAS the UI is done entirely by Fabio Falcucci (Scuilib, AmiMC, G.E.M.Z, Hfinder and more)

IndieGO!-Marketplace (a multiplatform App Store) comes from Ares Computer Inh. Pascal Papara 

The needed changes to the AROS Kickstart replacement for CD32 are done by Jason McMullan (thank you for helping out and continous support for our beloved opensource OS) 

Our spiritual roots are www.aros.org -> the Opensource reimplementation of AmigaOS and the classic Amiga system.

Our partners are André Nolte for design http://andrenolte.com 

We would also like to thank to all our partners in the small remaining AMIGA universe.. 

Sharing in mind...

Every Operating system - distributor who includes the client can participate on sales.

Resellers can build INDIEGO-systems and can participate as well. 

What we need  & What you get

We need you help to enhance the final result! And to do a proper Version for Raspberry Pi (this baby is the lowest common denominator (CPU vise)

We are no graphic designers and everything like coffee costs money. 

With your pledge, we will:

Do additional server programming.

Buy additional Hardware to port, test and fix INDIEGO!-OS.

We will be able to ensure that INDIEGO!-OS will work on as many devices as possible. 

Pay Web-design and more.

Also licensing media codecs for media playback cost money.

But even without a pledge, we are looking for help. Tell the world about us. Help us to set up a nice and friendly community or be our speaker man in your country. Help to find distributors.. Maybe you are system seller?

Our status, specs and how we plan to sell the INDIEGO!-OS

THE OS will be freely downloadable at www.indiego-gaming.com . But there will be INDIEGO!-USB-sticks and SD-cards for sale.

We need some funding for optimizing the Marketplace as well to do some design and PR.

You can already download a client to access the pre-release INDIEGO!-Marketplace. 

System sellers can become part via a referral system to build their own INDIEGO consoles based on PC or Raspberry Pi.  Basically what has be done for the 3DO in the past. Feel free to ask about details. This is the chance to jump on the train ; )

The Design of the Logo is done by Andre Noltè who made also the Ares Logo in the past (www.aros-braodway.de). 

We support devices as USB-Joypads such as Microsoft’s XBOX360 for Windows Joypad, mouse and Keyboard... we won't fight the battle about "First-person games are played better with joypad than with Keyboard-mouse".. use your favorite input! Use your favorite device from your favorite vendor. Use a Wii-mote... use a Competition Pro Joystick.. use whatever you like to use. No barriers. Your choice. Your individuality.  

Help us to serve ever gamer wish. 

Let's build the one4all system together!

Remember! Even without a pledge you can help us:

Just speak about it, help us to gain some kudos from the gaming world. Share your thoughts. Offer your help for web design and or volunteer jobs.

INDIEGO! the Video Gaming Console- Operating system funded on indiegogo

Q: Is this like steamOS? Copycat?

A: No, just slow developing gives the impression that the others came first : ) Oh and on ARM devices there is no SteamOS so we fill a gap there. Also not so rich countries could have fun re-enjoying thousands of games from DOS, AMIGA, C64 era.  

Q: Debian based? What is the difference to a "normal" PC running Ubuntu with a bunch of emulators?

You get a easy to use interface which allows to manage, run, buy or freely browse a huge library

You get a highly optimized OS which works on PC's with only 500MHZ and 64MR RAM. Ubuntu who?

And on a Raspberry Pi... Common... Ubuntu who?

A: We don't use "just" debian as it is. See www.aeros-os.org and www.aros.org for details. We are running a mixture of operating systems to have the best from both sides. Compatibility of Linux and the speed of AROS. Minus the overhead resulting from an normally bloated Linux environment. 

Q: Amiga Kickstart isn't free, how do you provide compatibility to old consoles?

A: We use AROS which is an open source reimplementation of AmigaOS 3.1. So it is legal. During the development Jason McMullan already improved the compatibility to run ECS/OCS/AGA and CD32 based games. AEROS is a hybrid and run anything a developer could ask for.

With one click a developer can make an .igo package of his game for one of the supported Platforms. 

Q: Is my money lost if I donate and you don't reach the target?

A: No, you will be automatically be refunded. 

This fundraising is mainly to collect money in advance and to show potential resellers the public interest. Sure if it would be successful "money wise" it would speed up development. But getting Facebook followers is nice too. 

Q: Will it have parental controls

A: Fore sure, that sure hat we didn't thought to announce it : ) Yes of course.

It will be a multiuser system. Every person in your home will get its own account and parents can take care about software being allowed. 

Q: What about educational apps?

A: Oh yes! There are already some educational games available on our App Store. 

Q: Can I use Windows application on a Raspberry Pi running INDIEGO!-OS

A:Yes you can... you can run some Windows 8 ARM applications when using wine.  But it is in no way perfect.

Performance wise the EFIKA MX53 is better suited for i386 emulation.

Q: What if I buy a App using the Amiga IndieGO!-Client, can I download it on my PC as well?

A: Yes, purchases are bound to your user profile. When you log into another machine you have still access to your paid software. 

Q: What are indieCoins? Something like light coins/bitcoins?

A: No. It is a kind of bonus system to strengthen our small niche eco-system.

Where can i get those indieCoins? You can:

•  get them as a gift

•  get them as cash back from partners

•  get them from partners in exchange for real money

•  you can get them as donation (requires additional membership in a club)

•  you can earn them with voluntary jobs

Q: Can I play Steam Games on my Pi? 

A: Yes, but only in combination with a Nvidia powered PC. You can stream them using limelight.

State of development:

We already released a Text based BBS-style client for testing purposes.

Actually we are in testing phase for the stand alone Clients for Windows, OS X, AROS, AmigaOS, MorphOS and Linux. 

Find the latest Amiga relate News announcement here, giving additional details:

http://amigaworld.net/modules/news/article.php?storyid=7085

First alpha build running on old Macbook (screen recording in OSX 10.9 became jerky)

 

First alpha on AmigaOS4.x

Here is another try at 1080p on a SAM733 with a window (borderless). With all effects "on" as previously shown:


Pandora XXL anyone ? ; ) Here is the same running on a 667MHZ EEEPC and Broadway EEEPC Edition:


We are still optimizing and we will show a new version for lowend-machines in a few days.

Our targets (and stretch goals):

First target is a small one:

Creating a version of AEROS for EfikaMX53 and a INDIEGO!- Client for which works on existing ARM Linux distributions. Enhancing server api to allow user reviews and more. Let design icons and website.

Stretch goal I at 1000€:

Make a SteamOS-like Distribution based around INDIEGO!-Appstore for EfikaMX53 and Raspberry Pi

Includes port of AEROS for EfikaMX53 as well

---------------

Stretch goal II at 1500€:

Make a SteamOS-like Distribution for Odroid U3

includes AEROS for Odroid as well

Make a SteamOS-like Distribution for SAM440/460

includes AEROS for SAM as well (SAM version will include lx command even if the last stretch goal is not reached)

---------------

Stretch goal III at 1800€:

Make a SteamOS-like Distribution for Cubieboard2 ,G3,G4 G5 Macs, Pegasos2 and Nintendo Wii

Includes AEROS for Cubie , G3, G4 and G5 Macs as well

Update: And for Peg2 and Nintendo Wii

--------------

Stretch goal IV at 2500€:

Port the client (INDIEGO!-Fullscreen (joypad, Keyboard, Mousecontrol) to android

--------------

Stretch goal V at 3000€

Release AEROS including lx command on all platforms for free.

Create a deb for debian so you can add a login option into AEROS(and don't need to download all the linux stuff from the iso)

Add AEROS Plus to noobs project for Raspberry Pi.

This
fundraising is mainly to collect money in advance and to show potential
resellers the public interest. Sure if it would be successful "money
wise" it would speed up development. But getting Facebook followers is
nice too. 
Q: Will
it have parental controls
A: Fore
sure, that sure hat we didn't thought to announce it : ) Yes of course.
It will
be a multiuser system. Every person in your home will get its own account and
parents can take care about software being allowed. 
Q: What
about educational apps?
A: Oh
yes! There are already some educational games available on our App Store. 
Q: Can I
use Windows application on a Raspberry Pi running INDIEGO!-OS
A:Yes you
can... you can run some Windows 8 ARM applications when using wine.  But
it is in no way perfect.
Performance
wise the EFIKA MX53 is better suited for i386 emulation.
Q: What if I buy a App using
the Amiga IndieGO!-Client, can I
download it on my PC as well?
A: Yes,
purchases are bound to your user profile. When you log into another machine you
have still access to your paid software. 
Q: What
are indieCoins? Something like light coins/bitcoins?
A: No. It
is a kind of bonus system to strengthen our small niche eco-system.
Where can i get those indieCoins? You can:
• 
get them as a gift
• 
get them as cash back from partners
• 
get them from partners in exchange for real money
• 
you can get them as donation (requires additional membership in a club)
• 
you can earn them with voluntary jobs
Q: Can I
play Steam Games on my Pi? 
A: Yes,
but only in combination with a Nvidia powered PC. You can stream them using
limelight.State of development:We already released a Text based BBS-style client for testing purposes.Actually we are in testing phase for the stand alone Clients for Windows, OS X, AROS, AmigaOS, MorphOS and Linux. Find the latest Amiga relate News announcement here, giving additional details:http://amigaworld.net/modules/news/article.php?storyid=7085First alpha build running on old Macbook (screen recording in OSX 10.9 became jerky) First alpha on AmigaOS4.xHere is another try at 1080p on a SAM733 with a window (borderless). With all effects "on" as previously shown:Pandora XXL anyone ? ; ) Here is the same running on a 667MHZ EEEPC and Broadway EEEPC Edition:We are still optimizing and we will show a new version for lowend-machines in a few days.Our targets (and stretch goals):First target is a small one:Creating a version of AEROS for EfikaMX53 and a INDIEGO!- Client for which works on existing ARM Linux distributions. Enhancing server api to allow user reviews and more. Let design icons and website.Stretch goal I at 1000€:Make a SteamOS-like Distribution based around INDIEGO!-Appstore for EfikaMX53 and Raspberry PiIncludes port of AEROS for EfikaMX53 as well---------------Stretch goal II at 1500€:Make a SteamOS-like Distribution for Odroid U3includes AEROS for Odroid as wellMake a SteamOS-like Distribution for SAM440/460includes AEROS for SAM as well (SAM version will include lx command even if the last stretch goal is not reached)---------------Stretch goal III at 1800€:Make a SteamOS-like Distribution for Cubieboard2 ,G3,G4 G5 Macs, Pegasos2 and Nintendo WiiIncludes AEROS for Cubie , G3, G4 and G5 Macs as wellUpdate: And for Peg2 and Nintendo Wii--------------Stretch goal IV at 2500€:Port the client (INDIEGO!-Fullscreen (joypad, Keyboard, Mousecontrol) to android--------------Stretch goal V at 3000€Release AEROS including lx command on all platforms for free.Create a deb for debian so you can add a login option into AEROS(and don't need to download all the linux stuff from the iso)Add AEROS Plus to noobs project for Raspberry Pi.

story:
The world’s first affordable stylish in-wall docking and charging iPad Mini device.

iMid (iPad Mini in-wall dock) is an innovative designed vertical drywall surface in wall docking and charging device for the iPad Mini. The iPad Mini slides easily into the iMid sleek designed wall shell, instantly transforming it into a stationary wall mount touch screen. With a gentle finger pull, the iPad Mini can be removed just as easily for portable use. Its sleek design achieves flush like (1mm) installation blending with the wall surface, secured by magnetic power.

A designed-driven device

We believe that all iPad Mini owners should enjoy a docking and charging solution designed to complement the stylish look of the iPad Mini.

Key Features

  • A stylish in-wall flush like (1mm) docking station for iPad Mini.
  • Transforms the iPad Mini into a stationary touch screen.
  • Provides a convenient iPad Mini charging solution when power source is provided.
  • Includes pre-construction drywall mounting kit suitable for wood, concrete, brick and plaster construction material.
  • Powered via standard iPad Mini charger (not included).
  • Available in smooth white finishing.

Note: iPad Mini not included.

{assembly photo}

Tech Specs

Enclosure

Chassis

ABS, flush-mountable

Faceplate

Polished ABS plastic, white

Dimensions

Height

9.65 in (245 mm)

Width

6.5 in (165 mm)

Depth

1.77 in (45 mm)

Weight

1 lb (0.45 kg)

Where we are with the iMid

We are currently supplying the iMid to smart home owners who use the iPad Mini as their management and control device. For the cutting edge design we joined forces with a leading product design group. We then completed the mechanical design optimizing the magnet power solution and testing convenience and durability for several months.

Why we need your support

We have been working on iMid for the past year, modifying and improving the solution without losing sight of the flush appearance of the device. Your support is primarily needed to scale-up production and thus lower costs. Cost savings in turn are translated to affordable product price for you.

Additionally we want to design and secure the supply chain process; design and produce packaging; procure material and secure quality assembly.

So why should you support us?

·  Become an early bird user.

·  Enjoy the cutting edge designed Ipad Mini in-wall solution for docking and charging.

·  Enjoy the versatile use of the iPad Mini both as an iPad and as a stationary touch screen.

What’s in the package you will receive?

  • 1 Box Mount: ABS material + 4 magnets and spacers, assembled).
  • 1 Bracket: ABS material + 2 screws.
  • 1 iPad Mini shell: polished ABS painted white.
  • 4 disk magnets.

Meet the iMid Team:

Eytan Oppenheim, M.Sc. Chairman

Eytan leads the business development program and the strategic planning of Contec. Eytan brings more than 20 years of extensive experience in founding and managing technology based companies both in Israel and internationally. Formerly Eytan served as Managing Director in scientific equipment companies and prior to that as General Manager of medical diagnostic equipment subsidiaries (Europe, Australia) of an Israeli based medical imaging multinational.

For a number of years now Eytan teaches Entrepreneurship to graduate Economics students at Haifa University.

Eytan holds a B.A. degree in Economics from the Hebrew University of Jerusalem and a M.Sc. degree in Industrial Management from the Technion - Israel's Institute of Technology. 

Giora Kohavi, CEO, founder

While renovating his home Giora encountered high priced solutions for intelligent housing. Convinced that alternative innovative solutions can be developed Giora began designing affordable user friendly solutions for home and business automation. Giora’s leadership and determination during the past 10 years brought about the iCon product series for home and business.

Giora holds an engineering degree in software engineering from the Technion - Israel's Institute of Technology. 

Yaron Miller, COO, founder

Yaron leads the electronics R&D, production and customer support activities of Contec.

Previously Yaron lead high level electronics systems maintenance and training programs. Yaron compliments the required production and customer support skills for the company.

Yaron holds an engineering degree in electronics and software engineering.
