story:
Hello, my name is Jim and I am here to tell you about Guardian Key.  As you can probably relate, we were tired of seeing bulky inefficient options on the market for self-protection. Not only were they inconvenient but also we don’t believe they would keep you safe. That is why we have created The Guardian Key and now anyone can feel safe and protected with ease.  The Guardian Key is a lightweight, easy to use protection tool.  The Guardian Key can inflict mass amounts of pain in three ways against your assailant; you can slash, jab and twist the key with minimal effort to cause immense pain.  We feel we have revolutionized the way we can defend ourselves, no matter what your size or strength. 

The goal of this campaign is to reach like-minded people for collaboration, raise money in exchange for early access and rewards, and we also want to spread the word.  The more people we can get using The Guardian Key the more functional and successful it will be.  So this campaign will give you the basics on our efforts and progress.  Beyond that we encourage you to ask us questions, donate and get involved.  We developed “The Guardian Key” for your benefit, so enjoy!  We believe we are really onto an easier way to protect ourselves with maximum efficiency.

  • Do you ever think about what you would do if you were attacked?
  • Do you want to learn how to better protect yourself but don’t know how?
  • Are you interested in learning more about self-defense but don’t have the time?
  • If you answered, “Yes” to any of these questions, you may want to keep reading…

Crime is on the rise:

With our economy in the tank some people are finding themselves becoming desperate.  And as we all know desperate people resort to desperate crimes.   A crime takes place every 5 seconds in the United States.  Crimes like Rape, Assault and Robbery are happening around us every day.  There is no need for anyone to become a horrible statistic anymore. 

                     


We are here to introduce the solution!!



              

             

  
            



The Guardian Key: From the Secret Service to Your Pocket!

Welcome to the new and improved way to protect yourself! A simple flick or twist of your wrist with the guardian key and you will be inflicting enormous pain on your assailant. These precious seconds will help you escape a dangerous situation and seek safety.  We developed our patented designed device to make defending yourself a breeze. The Guardian Key comes packed with scientific evidence that backs up our methods of inflicting pain using the least amount of effort.  The current options are heavy, bulky and therefore not accessible in times of need, well not anymore. With our device you can make self-defense a seamless reaction. Guardian Keys allow people to take advantage of our education from the secret service along with years of experience as a design engineer that we have poured into our product design.



Overview

Our popular culture reinforces the idea that finding proper protection for yourself is hard, time consuming to utilize and sometimes not reachable in times of need. We're out to change that one “The Guardian Key” at a time! Help us establish this initiative to serve people in need of a solution. As little as $10 gets  “The Guardian Key” to an individual and can change their ideas and their personal safety for the rest of their life. Finding out you can take care of yourself and feel protected against crime will be life changing. Empower us to make this vision a reality with a donation to this project today!

More about the Project

If your neighborhood is not as safe as it used to be, then you have something in common with the rest of the country.  All over America, crime is on the rise.  According to a government survey that was just released, violent crime in the United States increased by 15 percent last year, and property crime was up by 12 percent.  If violent crime keeps increasing at this rate, it will approximately double in just six years.– This fact prompted us to dig deeper into a solution.  This is where we started to envision “The Guardian Key” and all the possible benefits we could bring to people:

  • Efficient protective measures
  • Increased sense of safety
  • Ability for smaller or weaker people to protect without force

When reviewing these benefits, features and much more, it inspired and assured us that this is a product that needs to be created. We feel if executed properly we can reach a large market of people in need of an easier way to gain confidence in their safety and security in uncertain times.  Our features will make us incredibly qualified to succeed in the self-security industry.  This paired with attention to detail and quality service will make us a key player if not leader in the industry. Our mission is to take care of every funder, supporter and customer with the utmost respect and care.  We feel this will be the key to our growth.



About Us

We are a Trio -- Our inventor Michel created the first version of the Guardian key over 20 years ago, and now acts as our business lead. Next, Fred Salaff is a cinematic pro with over 30 years behind the camera as a director and now our marketing lead. And I'm Jim Story our spokesperson and engineer. I have been a design engineer for over the last 15 years and have been the lead engineer on several multi-million dollar products. For this product I'm responsible for engineering design and manufacturing.  Collaboratively we will be utilizing all of our strengths to push Guardian Key onto the market and into your homes, pockets and purses. We truly believe no one should be leaving the house without their Guardian Key in reach.

Our company is passionate with creating an unmatched solution that’s efficient and effective for your safety needs. Our company will run the business based on our mission statement of bringing safety and peace of mind to every person that leaves their home.

As we always say:  “It is better to HAVE a Guardian Key and not need it, than to NEED a Guardian Key and not have it”


How you can help

For us to bring the “The Guardian Key” to life, we need your support!

Your generous funding will help us get things started in order to realize our concept. It will assist us with the cost of further development, manufacturing and production. More importantly you get the chance to be one of the first users of the “The Guardian Key”.  We will also use our funding to test our concept to make it better.  We are committed to continuous improvement so we are always giving people the best possible solutions.

We will also be using the funding to:

  • Expand the possibilities for the usage for consumers as well as enterprise solutions of the “The Guardian Key”
  • Further customize the first version of the “The Guardian Key”
  • Create additional products and services that will compliment “The Guardian Key”

The “The Guardian Key” needs pledging but above all it needs your attention and interest! If you love this product as much as we do then please take a moment to click on one of our social media buttons (Facebook, Twitter and YouTube at the bottom of the page). Help us spread the word and get things started!


Breakdown of the funds Contributed:

We need about $62K in order to break “The Guardian Key” onto the market. This is a product that needs to be introduced at a national level.  Below is a breakdown of the funds.

  • $2K for final design changes.
  • $20K for Manufacturing and Production setup. 
  • $4K Legal costs.
  • $20K One week of a National Ad campaign. 
  • $3K for Filming costs (Actors etc)
  • $13.2K Fulfillment and Funding costs

Reaching our goal justifies a national ad campaign because it says that people want this product.  The first week will generate the funds needed to continue with other weeks, and increase production.  The first week is the hardest. We are leveraging the experience and industry contacts to pull off this much work with these little funds. 

Final thanks and links

We feel so grateful to everyone who has taken the time to read out campaign and for those who contributed what they could to make a difference and helping us spread the word.  We have spent the last few months working hard to bring our vision to life in this campaign and it was worth every minute thanks to all our generous supporters.  Please know your efforts, even the smallest, don’t go unnoticed.  We will continue to keep you posted on what your donation helped us achieve.  You are part of our “The Guardian Key” family.

If you cannot donate but you are interested in helping, please contact us so we can set you up with a referral program! You might even be able to earn perks, just by spreading the word!

Contributions…..

Your generosity and support could make all the difference in the fruition of “The Guardian Key”. 


If you wish to contact us:

Website: http://www.myguardiankey.com

Our Social Media Connections:

https://twitter.com/MyKeyGuardian

https://www.facebook.com/MyGuardianKey2015

Contact Information

E Mail: info@myguardiankey.com

If you have thoughts or would like to discuss a collaboration or sponsorship, we would love to hear from you, please feel free to contact us at info@myguardiankey.com.
story_txt:
Hello, my name is Jim and I am here to
tell you about Guardian Key.  As you can
probably relate, we were tired of seeing bulky inefficient options on the
market for self-protection. Not only
were they inconvenient but also we don’t believe they would keep you safe. That is why we have created The Guardian Key and
now anyone can feel safe and protected with ease.  The Guardian Key is a lightweight, easy to
use protection tool.  The Guardian Key
can inflict mass amounts of pain in three ways against your assailant; you can
slash, jab and twist the key with minimal effort to cause immense pain.  We feel we have revolutionized the way we can
defend ourselves, no matter what your size or strength.  
The goal of this campaign is to reach
like-minded people for collaboration, raise money in exchange for early access
and rewards, and we also want to spread the word.  The more people we can get using The Guardian
Key the more functional and successful it will be.  So this campaign will give you the basics on
our efforts and progress.  Beyond that we
encourage you to ask us questions, donate and get involved.  We developed “The Guardian Key” for your
benefit, so enjoy!  We believe we are
really onto an easier way to protect ourselves with maximum efficiency.


Do you ever think about what you would do if
you were attacked?


Do you want to learn how to better protect
yourself but don’t know how?


Are you interested in learning more about self-defense
but don’t have the time?


If you answered, “Yes” to any of these
questions, you may want to keep reading…

Crime is on the rise:
With our economy in the tank some people are finding themselves becoming desperate.  And as we all know desperate people resort to desperate crimes.   A crime takes place every 5 seconds in the United States.  Crimes like Rape, Assault and Robbery are happening around us every day.  There is no need for anyone to become a horrible statistic anymore.                       We are here to introduce the solution!!
                                              
The Guardian Key: From the Secret Service to Your Pocket!
Welcome
to the new and improved way to protect yourself! A simple flick or twist of your
wrist with the guardian key and you will be inflicting enormous pain on your
assailant. These precious seconds will help you escape a dangerous situation
and seek safety.  We developed our patented designed device to make defending
yourself a breeze. The Guardian Key comes packed with scientific evidence that
backs up our methods of inflicting pain using the least amount of effort.  The current options are heavy, bulky and
therefore not accessible in times of need, well not anymore. With our device
you can make self-defense a seamless reaction. Guardian Keys allow people to take advantage
of our education from the secret service along with years of experience as a
design engineer that we have poured into our product design. 



Overview

Our popular culture reinforces the idea
that finding proper protection for yourself is hard, time consuming to utilize
and sometimes not reachable in times of need. We're out to change that one “The
Guardian Key” at a time! Help us establish this initiative to serve people in
need of a solution. As
little as $10 gets  “The Guardian Key” to
an individual and can change their ideas and their personal safety for the rest
of their life. Finding out
you can take care of yourself and feel protected against crime will be life
changing. Empower us to make this vision a reality with a donation to this
project today!
More about the Project
If your neighborhood is not as safe as it used
to be, then you have something in common with the rest of the country.  All over America, crime is on the rise.  According to a government survey that was
just released, violent crime in the United States increased by 15 percent last
year, and property crime was up by 12 percent. 
If violent crime keeps increasing at this rate, it will approximately
double in just six years.– This
fact prompted us to dig deeper into a solution. 
This is where we started to envision “The Guardian Key” and all the
possible benefits we could bring to people:


Efficient protective
measures

Increased sense of safety

Ability for smaller or
weaker people to protect without force

When
reviewing these benefits, features and much more, it inspired and assured us
that this is a product that needs to be created. We feel if executed properly
we can reach a large market of people in need of an easier way to gain
confidence in their safety and security in uncertain times.  Our features will make us incredibly
qualified to succeed in the self-security industry.  This paired with attention to detail and
quality service will make us a key player if not leader in the industry. Our
mission is to take care of every funder, supporter and customer with the utmost
respect and care.  We feel this will be
the key to our growth.

About Us
We are a Trio -- Our inventor Michel created
the first version of the Guardian key over 20 years ago, and now acts as our
business lead. Next, Fred Salaff is a cinematic pro with over 30 years behind
the camera as a director and now our marketing lead. And I'm Jim Story our spokesperson
and engineer. I have been a design engineer for over the last 15 years and have
been the lead engineer on several multi-million dollar products. For this
product I'm responsible for engineering design and manufacturing.  Collaboratively we will be utilizing all of
our strengths to push Guardian Key onto the market and into your homes, pockets
and purses. We truly believe no one should be leaving the house without their
Guardian Key in reach.
Our company is passionate with creating an unmatched
solution that’s
efficient and effective for your safety needs. Our company will run the
business based on our mission statement of bringing
safety and peace of mind to every person that leaves their home.
As we always say:  “It is better to HAVE a Guardian Key
and not need it, than to NEED a Guardian Key and not have it”
How you can help
For us to bring the “The Guardian Key”
to life, we need your support!
Your generous funding will help us get
things started in order to realize our concept. It will assist us with the cost
of further development, manufacturing and production. More importantly you get
the chance to be one of the first users of the “The Guardian Key”.  We will also use our funding to test our
concept to make it better.  We are
committed to continuous improvement so we are always giving people the best
possible solutions.
We will also be using the funding to: 


Expand
the possibilities for the usage for consumers as well as enterprise solutions
of the “The Guardian Key”

Further
customize the first version of the “The Guardian Key” 

Create
additional products and services that will compliment “The Guardian Key”

The “The Guardian Key” needs pledging
but above all it needs your attention and interest! If you love this product as
much as we do then please take a moment to click on one of our social media
buttons (Facebook, Twitter and YouTube at the bottom of the page). Help us
spread the word and get things started!

Breakdown of the funds Contributed:

We need about $62K in order to break “The Guardian Key” onto the market. This is
a product that needs to be introduced at a national level.  Below is a breakdown of the funds. 


$2K
for final design changes.

$20K
for Manufacturing and Production setup.  


$4K
Legal costs. 

$20K
One week of a National Ad campaign.  

$3K for Filming costs (Actors etc)

$13.2K
Fulfillment and Funding costs

Reaching our goal justifies a national
ad campaign because it says that people want this product.  The first week will generate the funds needed
to continue with other weeks, and increase production.  The first week is the hardest. We are leveraging the experience and industry contacts to pull off this much work with these little funds.  
Final thanks and links
We feel so grateful to everyone who has
taken the time to read out campaign and for those who contributed what they
could to make a difference and helping us spread the word.  We have spent the last few months working
hard to bring our vision to life in this campaign and it was worth every minute
thanks to all our generous supporters. 
Please know your efforts, even the smallest, don’t go unnoticed.  We will continue to keep you posted on what
your donation helped us achieve.  You are
part of our “The Guardian Key” family.
If you cannot donate but you are
interested in helping, please contact us so we can set you up with a referral
program! You might even be able to earn perks, just by spreading the word!
Contributions…..
Your generosity and support could make
all the difference in the fruition of “The Guardian Key”.  If you wish to contact us:
Website: http://www.myguardiankey.com
Our Social Media Connections:
https://twitter.com/MyKeyGuardianhttps://www.facebook.com/MyGuardianKey2015
Contact
Information

If you have thoughts or would like to discuss
a collaboration or sponsorship, we would love to hear from you, please feel
free to contact us at info@myguardiankey.com.

story:
Hi !

technology has changed !

computer screen technology has changed from crt- cathode Ray tube to led/lcd technology and magnets dont affect anymore lcd computer screens (magnetic flux),  cellular phones are made from non metalic materials (aluminium) for not rusting, phone memory is on board or on chip and dont affected by magnets because they work on non magnetic storage madia.


what is trapez ?

 The first portable double sided magnetic holder for holding phones anywhere

see tv handless anywhere. and at your cafe.


The trapezoid shape enable supporting and adjusting the smart-phone on the table.





choose your color from 9 colors, compatible with your skin cover color.



The trapezoid shape enable adjusting the phone angle on the table.

 Trapez for selfie-anywhere, no need to hold  the monopod stick.

the most innovative unit device for attaching a cellular phones to any metal surface for doing selfie, up to 10 meters - the bluetooth maximum range, with bluetooth remote shutter, forget the monopod stick for up to 1 meter.


just attach Trapez to any metal surface, with any metal shape, almost at any difficult angle that you choose, and the trapez will mount the phone easily on the metal surface.



  shutter on Trapez    attach simultaneously  Trapez on any metal       ust picture




Trapez- the mirror trapezoid magetic holder attach the remote shutter and cellular phone simultaneouesly and enable carrying them togther, and removably take the shutter and mount the phone with trapez on any metal surface and picture.

do selfie with the bluetooh remote shutter, make a selfie-film, now you can pictuter animals easy.
                          
 Trapez on your laptop carrying phone and gadgets in front of your eyes.
                                     

Trapez is the most innovative solution for mounting your mobile phone and gadgets anywhere like on computer screen frame/laptop frame easily without hiding the screen, at your eye level, in front of your eyes, while working on the computer at office or home.

now you wont have to concentrate twice, at the phone screen that is on the the table, and computer screen,that are far away from each other.

Trapez on laptop.

Trapez mount on top of laptop, at the computer screen frame at left.
A cellular phone charged  at usb point and attached vertically to Trapez .
Keys mounted on the right side on Trapez removably easily and smoothly.

dont miss any more calendar alerts, notifications, or breaking news.

 you will never miss again your calendar alerts, any notifications, and breaking news, such as facebook notifications, whatsapp meesseges, or Bloomberg financial alerts and live charts, and other important online push notifications.

Why Trapez?

The Trapez unit is named after its patented mirror trapezoid shape magnet holder.

 When removably attached to the computer screen frame, the Trapez forms  a virtual Trapezoid gap under the back of the smart-phone, parallel along to the computer screen. This shape enables you operating with your fingers the main control button of the cellular phone, while the cellular phone is attach to the computer screen.

It enable you to remove the phone from the computer screen frame, and grab Trapez from any metal surface, ergonomically, easily and smoothly because of its mirror trapezoid shape.

                                                   

because shape metters


Thanks to its clever patented magnetic holding system you can attach Trapez vertically to the screen frame, and mount your smart phone In a vertical manner at eye level to trapez, such that phone stands vertically to the computer screen, or you can hold your phone and other gadgets on the computer screen frame.

 



thanks to the Trapez compactic size ( just the size of a match-box ) ,you can put it in your pocket, and attach it anywhere you want. Attach trapez to a metal surface on your way, and attach it simulaneously to your cellular phone to garden pole/street light and like, for making selfie or self-Film up to 10 meters range. dock your phone for charging anywhere .

Because size matters 

                                                                         

             NO OTHER PRODUCT LIKE THIS  IN THE MARKET, UNTIL TODAY!       

 we've opened the door for a whole new industry . 

                                      
   Trapez is colorful. Pick your favorite colors from the  9 colors availble!

     pink  * yellow *  white *  black * green * orange * blue * red * purple


Don't worry if you didn't get to pick your color, we will contact you via e-mail at the end of  the campaign!

Until today, there was no product like Trapez in the market. That is why We are serious when we say that Trapez is the most compact mount system for the computer screen around.

Features


We spend over half of our day next to a computer screen, but we don’t want to miss our cellular phone calendar alerts, and breaking news and notifications.

All your push data alerts comes "near to you" from 4000 miles, but you don’t have to miss it, while concentrating in two screens, not at your eyes level

                                  

                  TRAPEZ designed to be Carried in your Pocket for fast use


Packaging

Packing with plastics and metals makes product costs higher,  with no actual benefits. That is why we developed a surprising carton packing especially for our product.

                                  


we decided instead of expensive packing, to give a free world wide shipping !!! 

by that, we will minimize our impact on the environment, by avoiding unnecessary waste from packing materials.


What is the trapez-anywhere concept ?

Trapez-anywhere is a concept of using a multi task unit devices anywhere

 at your home, office and travel as your third hand a and as a little helper.

Trapez - anywhere  usage

the clever box that hold as many accessories for you, whenever you need a third hand.

     on computer screen                   on eading lamp                    park on fridge

 

                 

just remove the phone from the metal attachment, and put trapez in your pocket for his next mission. 

                                                                        

       make selfie-anywhere                                     see tv and talk video- anywhere 




park the phone on fridge - see tv, get calls handless, remove the phone and put trapez in your pocket .



        


                                 

    the ultimate docking point - charge the phone anywhere  at home-the phone removably attach to the docking unit on the wall with trapez.  grab the phone and put trapez in your pocket.                                                                      
 

                    The most advanced mounting system ever developed.

                                         Install in 10- 20 seconds


The Trapez set built for use simultaneously on metal and wall surface.

  attach a small thin metal plate less than 1 mm wide under your mobile skin cover. 

                    much thinner than iphone silicon thin skin cover width .

                                   FOR metal attachment =  10 sec install .

         selfie, fridge, lamp, door, garden pole,trafic signes or any metal surface

  Cover skin + thin metal plate under + Trapez  +  any metal ( garden pole, road

signs, window frames metal tables and chairs any metal surface etc.



                                                                                 

  just click on the remote shutter to picture up to 10 meters.


                              For computer screen/wall attachment

                                               install in 20 seconds

skin cover+ metal plate +Trapez + adhesive docking unit on computer screen/wall 

    


 

                                                  
docking metal + adhesive = docking unit to attach to wall or computer screen frame, or any surface  -  you get 3 units for your trapez wall/computer use .         


                                       see t.v anywhere - handless

see t.v anywhere, talk video or do face time or get your calls - anywhere.

see t.v, mouvies, films, any-where, in your bed, your kitchen your garden, or at traveling, where there is any metal surface - handless.


WHAT INSIDE THE BOX?

1  Trapez-anywhere  for double use simulatneouesly, on computer screen and    wall mount, and for doing selfie or making selfie films any where, or use on any metal surface for anything.

3 altenative docking units for screen or wall anywhere at your home, office, or travel for docking trapez to non metal surface.

Specifications

Name : Trapez-anywhere 

Lenth  :  4.9  cm 

Width :  3.3  cm 

Depth :  1.4  cm 

Weight : 45 g

Material: durable plastic 

Shape: mirror trapezoid 

*Designed to hold any type of phone : Apple, HTC, LG, plus1, Microsoft, Nokia, Samsung, Sony, google)

 regular  skin cover- plastic or silicon cover.


                                        up to 9 cm width of  phone screen


                                                          Free shipping world wide

Early adopters          x  1                                                                              10

The Trapez classic    x 1                                                                              15

The couple  deal       X 2                                                                             28

The friends pack      x  3                                                                             38

The Family pack      x  4                                                                              48


                  We're already in prototype pre machined production. 

We've worked hard to make Trapez a reality. we are already most of the way through the production process with our manufacturers, with hardware design finalized and all tests completed, pre machined prototype samples all ready prepared and are tested .

Timeline

june  2013  the idea was formed.

sep   2013  the first sketches.

oct  2013  first prototype developed.

nov  2013  the Trapezoid shape selected.

jan    2014  ergonomic size and shape selected.

aug  2014  material selected.

sep  2014  manufacturer chosen.

oct   2014  prototype production tests begun.

nov   2014  3 patent pending issued.

dec  2014  prototype production tests succeded.

jan   2014  pre-order indiegogo campaign launch.

feb   2015  the start of Trapez anywhere classic manufacturing.

mar 2015 the delivery of Trapez classic.


Why we need you?

Your help is neccsary !

We are really excited about this, and we hope you are too. Now we need your help to bring Trapez Anywhere and into your pocket, on your computer screen frame, your smartphone back, your blootooth shutter, and other gadgets.

As a supporter you will get your Trapez -anywhere at a very special price! So please consider backing our project, and share it with your friends. Every perk  includes shipping  free world wide! 

*Reminder: if we don't reach our goal 30,000 $ usd you will get automatically a full refund.

we believe in Trapez.

Status of the project & next steps

We've spent the last 12 months designing Trapez and testing  prototypes, now we are finally ready to start the production, but we need your help.

As of today, all the manufacturers are ready to begin production and your support on our campaign will help us to:

  • Order the moulds for plastic injection for the Trapez box.
  • Order production materials.
  • Assemble the product.
  • Quality test and inspection.
  • Shipping to our warehouse.
  • packing the Trapez sets.
  • Shipping to you.
  • free International shipping to your home (price is included in every perk!).

We are optimistic about delivering Trapez-anywhere to your pocket- before time.


             No Similar other products at the market! – a new product !!

We don’t know about other products like Trapez -anywhere at the market, but we believe in innovation. We tried to do our best for you and designed Trapez-anywhere to have the most affordable price possible while keeping a great quality,  we started from nothing and we are proud that we succeeded to bring a dream into reality.

                                   We brought our dream into working reality. 

we need you!!

We need you to help bring the Trapez idea to the world !

We want to bring ergonomic and comfort to the working place and to home,and to the world and we need your help to spread the world. by joining us not only u become the first to get Trapez, you become a part of a community of users with ideas to share with us and community for using Trapez,  helping us to shape the future of comfort at working place, home, and travel .

Other Ways You Can Help

If you like our project but you can't contribute, please consider sharing it with your friends and family using the share buttons under the video . This will help us a lot to spread the word!

Thank you,!

Questions?

If you have any question or concern, please shoot us an email at info@trapez-anywhere.com  and we will answer as soon as possible!

          www.trapez-anywhere.com 

            Find This Campaign On

FACEBOOK   TWITTER  WEBSITE   G+

                                                  

the team


Avi zelinger, Co-Founder & CEO, inventor, maker, designer, works in the financial market, and entrepreneur. learned at the artour rupin academic center, thermoplastic materials production, processing and designing . 

ADI ARBEL CO FOUNDER, Ceo of sight-vision technology ltd, expert in 3d air vision technology, Expert in intelligent air spy systems, Learned Computer science and  mba at richman university idc herzelia .

Arbel ziva community manager, in charge of product design and development, ergonomic mentor, marketing survey and distribution, customer relations, pr communication . 

Arbel dana, media manager, marketing manger in charge of internet campaign, technical campaign . 

HAVE A GREATE IDEA? We're actively looking for people to join us in creating amazing products and bringing it to the world. Drop us a line at idea@trapez-anywhere.com and tell us why you want to work with us, and join a good family .

story:
This is not the first product that bike mount as a phonecase.
But rugged design and boring color case is only for people who need a phonecase.
Refined bike riders are not interested in that type of phonecase.
I'd like to introduce you Slim5.
Design and functions, all aspects were developed smartphone bike mount case.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This iPhone 6 case design concept is inspired by Col du Galibier hill climbing profile. You can use it in daily life as a case, using back side of case rail mount let you allow mount on bike handlebar.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This iPhone 6 Plus case design concept is inspired by Passo dello Stelvio hill climbing profile.You can use it in daily life as a case, using back side of case rail mount let you allow mount on bike handlebar.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Universal adhesive mount comes with a 3M VHB™.On the backside, there is 1 card slide slot.Using back side of case rail mount let you allow mount on bike handlebar. 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Able to mount on bike handlebar, using EZ mount kit.
Easy to mount and no tools needed, support for 25.4~31.8mm handle bar.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Able to mount Slim5 on bike handle bar, using Speed Extender2.
Changeable bracket system let you allow mount action cam or flashlight on the bottom of the Speed Extender2.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


1x Base Mount , 1 x Band, 1x Band Dial, 1 x Slim Rubber Pad, 1 x 10mm Rubber Pad 
Not for Individual Sale. Only for person who need extra mount.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


1 x Speed Extender2
1 x Multy Clamp(with Rubber Band)
Not for Individual Sale. Only for person who need extra Extender
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Include shipping $10
1 x Slim5 Sticky (with a 3M VHB™)
1 x EZ Mount Kit 
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Include shipping $10
Slim5 i6 case (1 x top case, 1 x bottom case)
1 x EZ Mount Kit 
Choose a Color
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Include shipping $10
Slim5 i6 Plus case (1 x top case, 1 x bottom case)
1 x EZ Mount Kit
Choose a Color
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Include shipping $10
1 x Slim5 Sticky (with a 3M VHB™)
1 x Speed Extender2 (2 x Thick Rubber pad, 2 x Slim Rubber pad, 1 x Screw bolt)
1 x Multy Clamp(with Rubber Band)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Include shipping $10
1 x Slim5 i6 case (1 x top case, 1 x  bottom case)
1 x Speed Extender2
1 x Multy Clamp(with Rubber Band)
Choose a Color
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Include shipping $10
1 x Slim5 i6 Plus case (1 x top case, 1 x  bottom case)
1 x Speed Extender2
1 x Multy Clamp(with Rubber Band)
Choose a Color
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------






------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Q:How to assemble a phonecase?
A:There are 2 screw bolts and 1 screwdriver include in package. Top and bottom case, two parts are bolted together.

Q:Are there any other case?
A:Case only for iPhone 6 or iPhone 6 Plus.

Q:I don't have a iPhone 6,but I want use Speed Extender2.
A:Attaching Slim5 Sticky on your phone case and Slim5 Sticky which allows you to use almost any smartphone with the Speed Extender2.

Q: What types of surface or material can I stick the Slim5 Sticky to?
A:We recommend you to attach flat plastic surface.

Q. Can the 3M VHB adhesive tape be removed and re-used?
A:3M VHB adhesive tape is extremely hard to tear off and impossible to use again.

Q. How strong is the Slim3 Sticky?
A:We use one of the strongest 3M VHB adhesive tape.

Q:Will Speed Extender2 work on my handle bar?
A:Speed Extender2 work on 25.4mm and 31.8mm handle bar.
Package includes 2 thick rubber pads for 25.4mm handle bar and 2 slim rubber pads for 31.8mm handle bar.

Q:What kind of action cam can mount?
A:Compatible with GoPro housing or similar housing shape can be mounted.

Q:What kind of colors are available?
A:Slim5 i6 have 5 colors- Yellow, White, Gray, Red, Celeste
Slim5 i6 Plus have 5 colors- Pink, White, Gray, Red, Celeste

Q:What kind of light are available to mount?
A: We recommend round shape flash light that diameter is about 27mm.

Q:Can I install the EZ Mount Kit on motorcycle or baby carriage?
A:Yes, you can install EZ Mount Kit every 25.4~31.8mm pipe shape.

Q:Is the case waterproof?
A:No, case doesn’t supply any waterproof.

Q:How much is shipping?
A:All international shipping price is $10.

Q:Is Speed Extender2 suitable for mountain biking or rough road?
A:We do not recommend you riding on the mountain or rough road with Speed Extender2.
The Speed Extender2 has been designed for Road Cycling.

Q:Is Speed Extender2 suitable for mountain biking or rough road?
A:We do not recommend you riding on the mountain or rough road with Speed Extender2.
The Speed Extender2 has been designed for Road Cycling.

Q:How long does delivery take?
A:When campaign is over,delivery will take around 10 ~15 Days.

If we still haven't answered your question we suggest you ask us a question.
Thanks

story:
The enclosure. A must for makers.

Do you hide your electronics in a simple box or in a “personal” DIY enclosure? Can you — or are you allowed — to bring your enclosure into broad daylight? Even make it an elegant and functional fixture in your living room?

i-ntroducing: the DEL-i enclosure

DEL-i is a new elegant and highly functional enclosure for single-board computers, such as Raspberry Pi and Arduino. It is designed by the renowned Finnish lighting, interior and industrial designer, Jukka Korpihete.

The DEL-i does more than just enclose the hardware and hide the cable connectors and wiring. It is also an elegant piece of design, much more than your average box.


An early 3D print of the DEL-i enclosure.  The slight banding you see here is an artifact of the 3D printing process, and will not be present in the final product.


Natural design of sustainable material

“When drawing sketches, I got the idea of a mammoth’s tusk”, explains Jukka Korpihete. “Then I found the composite material, the color of which resembled that of a tusk. Voilá!” 

Through printing a couple of 3D-proofs, the shape and size were optimized and finalized. 

For innovative solutions

The DEL-i enclosure can house up to 5 stacked boards, enabling innovative designs and solutions. The boards are easy to fit in and stack. There is ample room for hiding the ugly cable connectors and cables as well.

The enclosure comes with magnets that attach snugly to a robust, metallic base, leaving room for wiring and ventilation. No more visible cabling or other clutter! 

The metallic base has an acrylic plate attached. When the enclosure is equipped with LED lights, the acrylic plate will light up, creating an enchanting atmosphere.

With precision manufacturing

Injection moulding. Non-slip rubber feet. Fully tested with several single-board computers.  Made of robust, drop resistant composite.

Out of the Finnish forest

The DEL-i enclosure is made out of recyclable, sustainable composite that combines clean polymers and pulp out of Finnish wood. The material is non-toxic and durable.  It has been road tested in thousands of floor boards in all parts of the world.  The material can be safely drilled, sawed and carved, if necessary.

From an interior design view, the elegant bone white enclosure fits even the most stylish of homes, yours included.


What Is Included


This photo above of a 3D printed prototype shows the major parts: The precision moulded enclosure itself, a laser cut steel base plate, and a laser cut acrylic disc to raise the enclosure a bit above the table surface. The steel base plate attaches to the enclosure body with small neodymium magnets, inserted into the enclosure. The magnets make it easy to lift the plastic main enclosure for accessing your stuff inside, while keeping the whole thing together tightly enough so that nothing falls out, even if you carry the enclosure around.

The steel base plate is attached to the acrylic disc with small screws. Note that the prototype base plate above does not have these mounting holes for this — the final product will have them.

We will also provide an L-shaped mounting bracket for mounting your RasPi/Arduino/or other SBC vertically. While there is enough space for mounting many of these boards horizontally, vertical placement allows more room for easy routing and twisting of cables. 

Mounting magnets, screws, and adhesive rubber feet are naturally included. The enclosure will be provided as a kit, meaning that you need to press the three magnets in their preformed holes in bottom edge of the enclosure, and screw the mounting bracket, base plate and acrylic disc together. Whew!


Size

The enclosure is 18 cm high. The inner diameter at the bottom is 15 cm measured from the side walls, and about 14 cm if you measure from the inner edges of the three protrusions that hold the magnets in place. Inner diameter at top is about 10 cm.

Yes, that is quite large compared to the usual rectangular boxes for Raspberry Pis, Arduinos and such - and that's the point. We wanted an enclosure that has room for any stack and shape of boards, and has room to cover all cables, allowing them to be arranged inside the enclosure to a neat single tail that comes out.


Cable Management

Speaking of cables: see the three flaps on the base plate? They are there for mating with the neodymium magnets with the enclosure. These flaps also leave three longish spaces between the bottom edge of the enclosure and the base plate for cables. The acrylic disc also raises the bottom edge so that the cables can be neatly arranged out of the enclosure.

So, no matter how hairy is the rat's nest of cables you need to take from your beloved creation — power, RJ45, HDMI, USB, etc — our enclosure is large enough to house cable connectors, while leaving enough turn radius even for thicker HDMI cables. 


Hmm, that cool lightning in this shot really brings out the artifacts from 3D printing. But no worry, the final product will be smooth.


What Can You Make With It

Well — use it for whatever you cannot or do not want to hide behind your TV, books, or in a drawer. For anything you need or want to remain in view. The enclosure is large enough for a RasPi, or an Arduino with four to five shields on the top, for example. A MythTV box maybe? Internet radio? Speaking weather station? Speaking clock? Theremin?

While the enclosure material is too opaque to be used as a lamp, you can place a LED in a hole in the base plate to illuminate the acrylic disc for a cool effect light, or just to have a neat way of displaying indicator lights.


Who We Are

We are a group of experienced hackers and makers. We are the Ell-i open source co-operative. Some of us — like Jukka the designer — do at Ell-i the same sort of things they do professionally, while for most of us Ell-i is just a serious hobby. 

The Indiegogo campaign team below includes just a few of us — see more faces (and better photos) at www.ell-i.org/about/team/.

We at Ell-i are developing hardware and software for a series of ARM Cortex-M-based, Power-over-Ethernet (PoE) powered Arduino compatible boards. We already have prototypes, and will run another crowd funding campaign for those later, hopefully some time next fall. See more at www.ell-i.org. 

We also want to bring our shiny, blinking electronics into the living room. This is why the DEL-i enclosure was born.


What Do We Need

The most expensive part of manufacturing plastic enclosures is the the injection mould. While injection moulds can be bought from China at just a few thousand dollars, our experience is that their quality varies and you cannot be sure of the result. With such a beautiful piece of furniture such as DEL-i, we don't want to make any compromises. Hence, we will purchase a precision mould, from an European manufacturer, most probably from Finland. Here locally we already have a couple of tentative manufacturers, but we will naturally also search wider, to get the best price without compromising the quality. 

Hence, the high precision, quality mould is a large one-off expense, which requires that we must initially make and sell hundreds of these enclosures. About a third of the funding goal is estimated to go just to the mould and associated costs. Hence, while it would be incredibly stylish to have a couple dozen enclosures in the living room of each of us, this is where we need you to claim your part of the designed goodness. Apart from shipping and VAT (where applicable), most of the rest will go to the actual manufacturing of the various parts. For example, the neodymium magnets and the steel plate are not free, either. 


Timeline

We prefer to be realistic in our estimations, and keep our timelines rough. We'd rather deliver earlier than promised rather than slip. Hence, our estimated timeline is as follows:

June – mid-July: campaign period

mid-July – August: Final design and manufacturing of the injection mould,  manufacturing of the metal base plate and acrylic plate, sourcing of the rest.

September: Manufacturing the main plastic part, final testing, and bagging the pieces to sets for shipping.

October: Shipping.


Risks

The main risks is that the injection mould may be faulty. However, through selecting a high quality European manufacturer, the manufacturer will carry the cost of any manufacturing faults. We are minimising the risks involved in potential design faults through 3D printing the final enclosure prototype from the same CAD files than the mould will be manufactured from. 


FAQ

We completely made up the first few of these, but the rest are from you, dear readers, honest!

Q: I want mine in pink, pretty please?

A: The first run will be in bone white, sorry. But don't be sad, it's easy to make further production runs once we have the mould. Please vote for your color by emailing us at indie(at)ell-i.org or starting a discussion at our forums! If enough of people want other colours, we'll organise another campaign or something. 

Q: A real designer?

A: Yes, one professional designer among us nerds! See more of his work at www.korpihete.com.

Q: I want to order an enclosure, and I have VAT-registered company in Europe outside Finland.  May I select a non-VAT perk?

A: Yes, you may, but your company must be registered at VIES. The law requires that we check your VIES status at the time of payment and shipment. If your company is not listed at VIES and the shipping address is within the European Union, we must charge the VAT from you. 

Q: Shall I need to pay any customs or other taxes?

A: If you are outside of the European Union, you have to take care of the customs clearance  yourself, and pay any local taxes or other duties. When shipping, we will list the perk mount as the value of the shipment in the pro-forma invoice.  However, if we exceed our funding goal by a large enough margin and if there are enough of orders from a single country, say the U.S.A., we will  see if we can arrange bulk shipment and local delivery.


Questions?

Please email us at indie(at)ell-i.org!

Or join or start a discussion at the DEL-i forum.

Voilá!” Through printing a couple of 3D-proofs, the shape and size were optimized and finalized. For innovative solutionsThe DEL-i enclosure can house up to 5 stacked boards, enabling innovative designs and solutions. The boards are easy to fit in and stack. There is ample room for hiding the ugly cable connectors and cables as well.The enclosure comes with magnets that attach snugly to a robust, metallic base, leaving room for wiring and ventilation. No more visible cabling or other clutter! The metallic base has an acrylic plate attached. When the enclosure is equipped with LED lights, the acrylic plate will light up, creating an enchanting atmosphere.With precision manufacturingInjection moulding. Non-slip rubber feet. Fully tested with several single-board computers.  Made of robust, drop resistant composite.Out of the Finnish forestThe DEL-i enclosure is made out of recyclable, sustainable composite that combines clean polymers and pulp out of Finnish wood. The material is non-toxic and durable.  It has been road tested in thousands of floor boards in all parts of the world.  The material can be safely drilled, sawed and carved, if necessary.From an interior design view, the elegant bone white enclosure fits even the most stylish of homes, yours included.What Is IncludedThis photo above of a 3D printed prototype shows the major parts: The precision moulded enclosure itself, a laser cut steel base plate, and a laser cut acrylic disc to raise the enclosure a bit above the table surface. The steel base plate attaches to the enclosure body with small neodymium magnets, inserted into the enclosure. The magnets make it easy to lift the plastic main enclosure for accessing your stuff inside, while keeping the whole thing together tightly enough so that nothing falls out, even if you carry the enclosure around.The steel base plate is attached to the acrylic disc with small screws. Note that the prototype base plate above does not have these mounting holes for this — the final product will have them.We will also provide an L-shaped mounting bracket for mounting your RasPi/Arduino/or other SBC vertically. While there is enough space for mounting many of these boards horizontally, vertical placement allows more room for easy routing and twisting of cables. Mounting magnets, screws, and adhesive rubber feet are naturally included. The enclosure will be provided as a kit, meaning that you need to press the three magnets in their preformed holes in bottom edge of the enclosure, and screw the mounting bracket, base plate and acrylic disc together. Whew!SizeThe enclosure is 18 cm high. The inner diameter at the bottom is 15 cm measured from the side walls, and about 14 cm if you measure from the inner edges of the three protrusions that hold the magnets in place. Inner diameter at top is about 10 cm.Yes, that is quite large compared to the usual rectangular boxes for Raspberry Pis, Arduinos and such - and that's the point. We wanted an enclosure that has room for any stack and shape of boards, and has room to cover all cables, allowing them to be arranged inside the enclosure to a neat single tail that comes out.Cable ManagementSpeaking of cables: see the three flaps on the base plate? They are there for mating with the neodymium magnets with the enclosure. These flaps also leave three longish spaces between the bottom edge of the enclosure and the base plate for cables. The acrylic disc also raises the bottom edge so that the cables can be neatly arranged out of the enclosure.So, no matter how hairy is the rat's nest of cables you need to take from your beloved creation — power, RJ45, HDMI, USB, etc — our enclosure is large enough to house cable connectors, while leaving enough turn radius even for thicker HDMI cables. Hmm, that cool lightning in this shot really brings out the artifacts from 3D printing. But no worry, the final product will be smooth.What Can You Make With ItWell — use it for whatever you cannot or do not want to hide behind your TV, books, or in a drawer. For anything you need or want to remain in view. The enclosure is large enough for a RasPi, or an Arduino with four to five shields on the top, for example. A MythTV box maybe? Internet radio? Speaking weather station? Speaking clock? Theremin?While the enclosure material is too opaque to be used as a lamp, you can place a LED in a hole in the base plate to illuminate the acrylic disc for a cool effect light, or just to have a neat way of displaying indicator lights.Who We AreWe are a group of experienced hackers and makers. We are the Ell-i open source co-operative. Some of us — like Jukka the designer — do at Ell-i the same sort of things they do professionally, while for most of us Ell-i is just a serious hobby. The Indiegogo campaign team below includes just a few of us — see more faces (and better photos) at www.ell-i.org/about/team/.We at Ell-i are developing hardware and software for a series of ARM Cortex-M-based, Power-over-Ethernet (PoE) powered Arduino compatible boards. We already have prototypes, and will run another crowd funding campaign for those later, hopefully some time next fall. See more at www.ell-i.org. We also want to bring our shiny, blinking electronics into the living room. This is why the DEL-i enclosure was born.What Do We NeedThe most expensive part of manufacturing plastic enclosures is the the injection mould. While injection moulds can be bought from China at just a few thousand dollars, our experience is that their quality varies and you cannot be sure of the result. With such a beautiful piece of furniture such as DEL-i, we don't want to make any compromises. Hence, we will purchase a precision mould, from an European manufacturer, most probably from Finland. Here locally we already have a couple of tentative manufacturers, but we will naturally also search wider, to get the best price without compromising the quality. Hence, the high precision, quality mould is a large one-off expense, which requires that we must initially make and sell hundreds of these enclosures. About a third of the funding goal is estimated to go just to the mould and associated costs. Hence, while it would be incredibly stylish to have a couple dozen enclosures in the living room of each of us, this is where we need you to claim your part of the designed goodness. Apart from shipping and VAT (where applicable), most of the rest will go to the actual manufacturing of the various parts. For example, the neodymium magnets and the steel plate are not free, either. TimelineWe prefer to be realistic in our estimations, and keep our timelines rough. We'd rather deliver earlier than promised rather than slip. Hence, our estimated timeline is as follows:June – mid-July: campaign periodmid-July – August: Final design and manufacturing of the injection mould,  manufacturing of the metal base plate and acrylic plate, sourcing of the rest.September: Manufacturing the main plastic part, final testing, and bagging the pieces to sets for shipping.October: Shipping.RisksThe main risks is that the injection mould may be faulty. However, through selecting a high quality European manufacturer, the manufacturer will carry the cost of any manufacturing faults. We are minimising the risks involved in potential design faults through 3D printing the final enclosure prototype from the same CAD files than the mould will be manufactured from. FAQWe completely made up the first few of these, but the rest are from you, dear readers, honest!Q: I want mine in pink, pretty please?A: The first run will be in bone white, sorry. But don't be sad, it's easy to make further production runs once we have the mould. Please vote for your color by emailing us at indie(at)ell-i.org or starting a discussion at our forums! If enough of people want other colours, we'll organise another campaign or something. Q: A real designer?A: Yes, one professional designer among us nerds! See more of his work at www.korpihete.com.Q: I want to order an enclosure, and I have VAT-registered company in Europe outside Finland.  May I select a non-VAT perk?A: Yes, you may, but your company must be registered at VIES. The law requires that we check your VIES status at the time of payment and shipment. If your company is not listed at VIES and the shipping address is within the European Union, we must charge the VAT from you. Q: Shall I need to pay any customs or other taxes?A: If you are outside of the European Union, you have to take care of the customs clearance  yourself, and pay any local taxes or other duties. When shipping, we will list the perk mount as the value of the shipment in the pro-forma invoice.  However, if we exceed our funding goal by a large enough margin and if there are enough of orders from a single country, say the U.S.A., we will  see if we can arrange bulk shipment and local delivery.Questions?Please email us at indie(at)ell-i.org!Or join or start a discussion at the DEL-i forum.

story:
The Idea

We live in the 21 century with the amazing smartphones; capable of doing almost everything. Sometimes even keep your coffee warm. But there is still one task it’s not able to perform. That is to gather the control of every piece of remote-controlled electronic in the palm of your hand. We still have a ton of old plastic remote controls for our TV's and Sterios and other devices, but that time is at an end. With INOO you will gain back the control of all your devices.


The project

INOO IR removes the need separate remote controls for your TV, Audio players  and other electronic solutions based on infrared technology. With this elegant solution, you will not have to go look for lost remotes and such. With your phone you have the same options as you have on a normal remote, just with a few improvements and a ton of awesome.

IR is still the operating standard on the market, so for old and new devices there will be a 100 % compatibility.

Since the screen of the phone acts as control surface, you automatically have a backlit keyboard and it will be no problem to find the right button in the dark, nor will you ever loose your remote. Just phone it! The ringing should pinpoint the location  


Control from anywhere

The box is placed in the desired room and is connected through wifi. So as long as you are on your own network, you will be able to control all the INOO devices you own. No more running down the stairs to turn off the television or stereo. 


How it works

It’s quite simple. When you use the INOO application your phone sends a WIFI signal to the INOO box. The box then decodes the signal and transfers it as a standard IR signal to your appliances. Easy peacy! 

Even if your remote isn't to be found in our database which ha remotes for products from over 200 different brands, we have built in a feature which let your teach the application your remote control. So no matter what device you have, it will be supported.

If you get a new phone you don't have to go through learning all the remotes again, you can store your settings and remotes on the INOO Box and just retrieve them from the box. 


Setting up the device

Just power on the INOO type in your WIFI password into our app and that's it.


Our app


Design

“Less is more” - Van der Rohe 

The INOO electronic will be fitted in a nice black slim box, no more than a centimeter thick. Nice to see and easy to hide. We quote “A delecious little device”. Simplicity and functionality in perfect harmony.


Devices

We will natively support iPhone and Android Phones. Based on our goals we will support tablets as well. But remember this project is entirely open platform so even if your device isn't support, 3rd party developers will easily be able to create their own apps.


Stretch goals


Rewards


Open Source

We strive to deliver a product that is open and free to use so we will release all of our schematics and code under open source licenses, so people are free to improve upon our work and able to add support to different devices.

The INOO so far

Our first prototype was based on a PIC microcontroller and a wired Ethernet interface but we thought that the limitation of an Ethernet wire was too big of a hassle so we developed our second prototype which uses WIFI and ARM chip for some extra power when needed. So now we have a fully functioning prototype all we need is to shrink it down a bit in size.


Help spread the word


The budget

Time Schedule


Who are we?

Simon G

The software hero. I am twenty years old and live in Denmark. Currently i am taking my AP degree in computer science at a Danish university, along with the development of our INOO project. I know Gustav from high school and that is where the original idea started.  

Gustav V

The Hardware hero. I am nineteen years old and i also live in Denmark. I am working full-time on the hardware and firmware of the INOO. I have been developing hardware for the past four years.    

We have worked together in an earlier project, ecoin, where we were funded by Scandinavians biggest Bank. We got the 2nd second place in the category of Denmark's most innovative product. 


Risk and challenges

The fundamentals of the project already works, the hardware is very straightforward and so is the software. At this point we are just gathering our resources to get the tools we need to build the project, and create the best possible user experience we can. There is still a long way to go, but now we are interested in how many people like this product. In projects like these there are always a chance of delays, unforeseen problems and production issues. We have made a solid time schedule and are confident that our included padding is enough time to solve the problems.

Based on our goal, further platform support will be added after the final release of the phone version.


If we by any chance don't reach our funding goal you don't have to worry about the money. They will automatically be refunded to you when the time period of the campaign has run out.

story:
Smart People Smart Technology Smart Inovation

Hello every one! Greetings from Viorel Manoila and Steve Smith,

My name is Viorel Manoila, designer and co-producer of "DANMANN" SmartPhone stand. Well, like my partner Steve Smith said, after a long way of tryings and errors finally we designed a minimalistic and elegant Smartphone Stand that uses NanoTechnology Suction pads to hold your phone in place.


The DANMANN stand is affordable, functional, and simple. It’s extremely lightweight and is really useful. The best part about this stand is that it will not work only with your present SmartPhone, it will work with your past and future SmartPhones as well, given they have a flat back cover.

  • Materials- aircraft grade aluminum + 2 NanoSuction pads.
  • NanoSuction- grips the phone and grips the stand to surface but is not sticky to the touch.

  • Universal- works with all SmartPhones and most hard cases.
  • Cord Management- Laser Triangle/Heart shape cut is compatible with all OEM SmartPhone charging cables.
Timeless Design- works with past, present and future SmartPhones and cords.


The DANMANN Stand comes in Black, White, Silver, Pink and few Blue and two types of cord management: Triangle shape and Heart Shape.

DANMANN stand was designed to perform better than traditional phone stands or docks. It will hold your phone at the perfect viewing angle at your desk, nightstand, counter or any smooth surface. And it perform this function with far less effort then other  stands or dock stations. Simply push your phone to attach then pull or twist to remove. It also hold your cord in place while plugged or unplugged.


In its simple terms, nano-suction is the power of millions of miniature suction cups packed as tightly as the cells of your skin that it fills like a smooth plastic surface to your hand.

When a vacuum is present between a smooth non-porous surface and a suction cup, the higher atmospheric pressure outside of the cup enables the suction cup to maintain its grip.
Hence when the NanoSuction Pad is pressed against a nonporous surface, the millions of nano-sized suction cups create a big vacuum, generating a strong  suction force that can hold a tremendous amount of weight. Due to its suction nature, it is easy removable with out residue and reusable over and over. If the surface gets soiled, a simple wash and dry will allow it to work as new again.


We need your help!
Your pledge will help bring "DANMANN" Stand to the next level. With your support we can purchase a CO2 Laser Cutting System and a Powder Coating line for larger production runs. Our next goal is to redesign the Phone Stand and to produce a larger stand too, one exclusive for tablets. We have some good rewards for your pledge but if you are unable to help with funding you can still support our project by sharing this page with your friends on Faceboock. We have almost  finished 200 DANMANN Phone Stands in a variation of colors. We send them out on first come first served basis. Thank you for your time and your consideration!


Early Bird Pink-Heart Cut + 1 Stylus Touch Pen Gift / Pink-Heart Cut

Early Bird White-Triangle Cut + 1 Stylus Touch Pen Gift / White Triangle

Blue Triangle Laser Cut


Black Triangle Laser Cut


Silver Triangle Laser Cut

White Heart Laser Cut


Practical we don't see any risk on your part, mostly because we already have over 200 Stands ready for shipping, meaning that wen you pay for one or more stands we can ship them in the next working day. The only challenge is that if we sell first 200 stands in time we can add the second batch of improved SmartPhone Stand and Tablet Stand on a fraction of the retail price.

If can't contribute, you can still help us to meet our goal!

  • Spread the word out and make some noise about this campaign
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools

If you need any additional information or help please don't hesitate, i'm just an email away. I'll replay as soon as i can.

My email: mvimpex @ live.ie

  • Please feel free to comment
  • Ask any questions you may have regarding this project.

PLEASE SHARE THIS PAGE ON FACEBOOK
