story:
Key points

- Low cost phone encryption system
- Compatible with wired and cellular (GSM) phones
- Integrates with your existing telephone
- Can be activated at any time during a conversation 


In brief


 We have worked in security for over 15 years designing applications in physical secure access (high value production lines, nuclear plants, etc.) and secure data access (corporate intellectual property, bank client data, etc.).
While the concept of security is nowadays quite well established when it comes to protecting physical assets or data, voice conversations are largely forgotten and it is quite an easy task for anyone with basic electrical knowledge to tap a phone line.
With the recent headlines on phone conversation eavesdropping, we decided it was time something was done in this field because today, when you are chatting with a friend, or with a business partner, the question isn't if someone else is listening but how many others are listening.

In order to bring our concept to life, we decided to involve those who are concerned in the first line, that is YOU !
With your help, we will bring a device which secures voice conversations from end to end.
It already has a name : "HUSH" and we already developed a working prototype.
Thanks to the Indiegogo financing we will finalize the development and industrialize it.


The system

Telephone tapping can take place anywhere the signal travels along the path : in the telephone itself, in the wires which run to the wall, the home lines, the street lines and for well equipped individuals or governments, in the telephone centrals, antennas or major communication axis. For this reason, it was clear to us that the voice data should be encrypted as soon as possible : right off the microphone.

HUSH is put into action between the telephone handset and the telephone body. This way, the voice data is already encrypted before it even enters the telephone.
In case of a cell phone, it can be used by acting as a relay between a bluetooth headset and the phone.
This way, even if someone is able to hack the phone itself, for example with a malicious software installed on your smartphone, the voice data already is protected.

The encryption is based on a proprietary variation of the SSL protocol which is used for protecting internet secure transactions.
The data not only is encrypted but also the system makes sure that your correspondent is indeed the person you expect.

For now, we have developed and assembled two prototypes which we successfully put to work on a 500 km conversation between Switzerland and France.


Use of your contribution

We have set the financing goal to 50'000 USD.

The first 25'000 $ will allow us to complete the development and produce the 10 first prototypes for field testing.
The next 18'000 $ will be invested for the industrialization of the device and the manufacturing of a small series of 50 pieces for further field testing.
The rest will allow us to correct the bugs detected during the field testing and be ready for mass production.

Because this project only makes sense if it is completed, we opted for the full financing option.
We believe that it does answer a real need and that many people will support it.

If the fundraising goes over the limit, the money will be invested in reducing the manufacturing cost as well as extending the capabilities of HUSH  to DECT phones (which is otherwise planned for version 2).


What's in for you ?

Check the contributions section.

And on top of that you will help us giving back its true meaning to "private" conversations.


Wanna know more ?

Recent news have taken a toll on many persons' confidence that nobody is spying on their conversation.
For many, it is now a fact and nobody can do anything about it.

We don't agree. While it is indeed a fact that spying equipment is easily available on the internet and that criminal or government data collection is virtually impossible to dismantle, it is possible to make sure that the information collected is useless.
With HUSH in action, people will be able to exchange information, either casual or valuable, being certain that a nosy neighbour, a competitor or any other ill intentioned individual will only collect garbage.

And HUSH is taking things one step further in protecting you by making sure that you are talking to the right person.
In companies, especially large and/or international ones, individuals don't always know each other very well.
Social engineering has been increasingly used by scammers against such companies to obtain information or money.
While it is easy to pretend to be someone or mandated by someone if you know the right information, it is virtually impossible to do so if you, or at least your telephone, is signed by a certificate.
This same principle is used in banking transactions to insure the bank that you are the client you pretend to be and that you are indeed connected to the bank and not on a fraudulent third-party website. HUSH is based on a powerful processor which allows complex online encryption.

Once a clear communication is established, the two speakers activate their HUSH device. A certificate is exchanged and validates the encryption key.
The data from the microphone is then digitized and compressed. After encryption, a modem transforms the encrypted data into signals compatible with the telephone line requirements.
On the receiving end, the data is decoded and the clear signal is sent to the receiver's handset.

If a cell phone is used, HUSH will use the bluetooth interface.

DECT phones will be included in a future version of HUSH unless the project gets financed well over the goal, in which case we will include it in version 1.

Many current projects propose a specific phone with multiple locks so that no hacking of the phone is possible. But this means you have to buy a new phone, learn how to use it, transfer all your data, contacts, etc.
We decided to add a function to your existing installation. You dont' change your habits, Hush is plug and play and you can activate it at any time, right in the middle of a conversation.


How can you help ?

First, of course, you can help this project by participating in the funding.
Check the rewards section to see what each level of funding entitles you to get.

You can also help us by funding a ‘beta-test’ level.

If you cannot afford to support us financially but you do think that the project is cool, talk about it around you, tweet it, write in local newspapers, on blogs or wherever else you will get mode people interested.
There are some tools right here on IndieGoGo. The more you talk about it, the better chance we have!

----------------------------------- FRENCH TEXT -----------------------------------

Points clefs

- Système de cryptage de conversations téléphoniques à bas prix
- Compatible avec les téléphones filaires et cellulaires (GSM)
- S'intègre à votre installation téléphonique existante
- Peut ête activé à tout moment durant une conversation

En bref

Nous avons travaillé dans le domaine de la sécurité pendant plus de 15 ans dans des projets tels que la sécurisation d'accès physique (centres de production de produits de valeur, centrales nucléaires, etc.) et la sécurisation d'accès aux données (données bancaires, propriété intellectuelle, etc.)

Si le concept de sécurité est à présent relativement bien établi lorsqu'il s'agit d'éléments physiques ou de données, les conversations téléphoniques sont par contre largement oubliées. Il est pourtant facile, pour une personne possédant des connaissances techniques de base, de se connecter à une ligne téléphonique tierce.

Avec les récents développements concernant des programmes d'écoute systématiques, nous avons décidé qu'il était temps d'agir. Car aujourd'hui, lorsque vous conversez avec un ami ou un partenaire commercial, la question n'est pas de savoir si quelqu'un vous écoute mais combien de personnes le font.

Pour donner vie à notre idée, nous avons décidé d'inclure dans notre projet les personnes les plus concernées, c'est-à-dire VOUS !

Avec votre aide, nous mettrons sur le marché un appareil capable de sécuriser un conversation téléphonique de bout en bout.

Notre produit a déjà un nom : "HUSH" et nous avons déjà développé un prototype fonctionnel.

Grâce au financement Indiegogo, nous pourrons finaliser son  développement et son industrialisation.

Le système

L'écoute téléphonique peut prendre place en tout point du cheminement de l'information : dans le téléphone lui-même, le câble qui le relie à la prise murale, les câbles de l'immeuble ou de liaison au central de quartier et, pour des individus bien équipés ou un gouvernement, au niveau des centraux, des antennes ou des axes de transmission internationaux. Pour cette raison, il nous est clairement apparu que les données devaient être cryptées le plus tôt possible: dès la sortie du microphone.

HUSH se place entre le combiné et le téléphone lui-même. De cette manière, le signal vocal est déjà crypté lorsqu'il atteint le téléphone.

Dans le cas d'un téléphone cellulaire (téléphone portable), l'appareil agit comme un relais entre une oreillette bluetooth et le téléphone.

De cette manière, même si une personne est en mesure de hacker le téléphone, par exemple avec une application malveillante, les données vocales sont déjà protégées.

Le cryptage est basé sur une variante propriétaire du protocole SSL utilisé pour la protection des transactions sécurisées sur Internet. De plus, non seulement les données sont chiffrées mais en plus le système s'assure que votre correspondant est bien la bonne personne.

Pour le moment, nous avons mis en oeuvre deux prototypes et testé le fonctionnement sur une conversation entre deux interlocuteurs situées à 500km l'une de l'autre entre la Suisse et la France.

Votre contribution

Nous avons fixé le but du financement à 50'000 dollars qui se décomposent ainsi :

25'000 $ pour terminer le développement et produire les 10 premiers prototypes pour des tests de terrain.

18'000 $ pour l'industrialisation et la production d'une présérie de 50 pièces pour des tests de terrain complémentaires.

Le reste sera investi pour la correction des bugs détectés durant les tests de terrain pour le démarrage de la production de masse.

Comme ce projet n'a de sens que s'il est mené à terme, nous avons opté pour l'option de financement complet.

Nous croyons fermement qu'il répond à un véritable besoin et que de nombreuses personnes le soutiendront.

Si la levée de fonds devait dépasser la limite fixée, le montant supplémentaire sera investi dans l'extension des fonctionnalités de l'appareil, notamment la compatibilité avec le système de téléphones sans fil DECT (qui, sinon, est prévu pour la version 2).

Quel est votre intérêt ?

Consultez la section "contrepartie" pour voir quel retour nous vous offrons en fonction de votre investissement.

Et en plus, vous nous aiderez à redonner sa véritable signification à une conversation "privée".

Vous voulez en savoir plus ?

Les actualités récentes ont sérieusement entamé la confiance du public sur le fait que personne n'épie leurs conversations. Pour beaucoup, cela est une fatalité et personne n'y peut rien.

Nous ne sommes pas d'accord. Bien qu'effectivement du matériel d'écoute soit facilement disponible sur Internet et que les organisations criminelles ou gouvernementales soient virtuellement instoppables, il est possible de s'assurer que les données récoltées soient inutilisables.

Avec HUSH en action, les interlocuteurs pourront échanger des informations, qu'elles soient triviales ou de grande valeur, en s'assurant que le voisin curieux, l’entrepreneur concurrent ou tout autre personne aux intentions discutables ne collecte que du bruit.

Et HUSH va plus loin dans la protection en s'assurant que vous parlez effectivement à la bonne personne.

Dans les entreprises de taille importante ou d'étendue internationale, les individus ne se connaissent pas nécessairement personnellement. L'ingénierie sociale est utilisée de plus en plus fréquemment lors d'activités de fraude contre de telles entreprises pour obtenir des informations de valeur ou de l'argent. Il est en effet possible de prétendre être une certaine personne ou un mandataire de celle-ci si l'on dispose de suffisamment d'informations personnelles.

En utilisant un système de certificat pour identifier les terminaux HUSH de chaque interlocuteur, on s'assure de leur identité. C'est le même principe qui est utilisé, par exemple, lors de transactions bancaires par Internet pour certifier à la banque que vous être bien le client prétendu et vous assurer que vous êtes bien connecté au site de votre banque et non pas un site de phishing.

Le puissant processeur de HUSH permet toutes ces opérations de chiffrage en temps réel.

L'établissement d'une communication sécurisée est la suivante : la conversation débute en clair puis les interlocuteurs décident d'activer leur système HUSH. L'échange des certificats a lieu entre les appareils et valide la clé de cryptage. Les données vocales du microphone sont numérisée et comprimées. Après chiffrage, un model les transforme en signaux compatibles avec les spécifications du réseau téléphonique. A l'autre bout, les données sont décodées et envoyées en clair sur l'écouteur du partenaire.

Si un téléphone cellulaire est utilisé, le même principe est utilisé en passant par l'interface bluetooth.

Les téléphones sans fil DECT seront supportés dans une version ultérieure du système. Selon le succès du financement, nous pourrons l'inclure dans la version 1.

Beaucoup de projets de téléphonie sécurisée sont en train de voir le jour. La majeure partie s'appuie sur un téléphone spécial fortement protégé contre le hacking. Mais cela signifie qu'il faut faire l'acquisition d'un nouveau téléphone, apprendre à s'en servir, transférer ses contacts, données, etc.

Nous avons décidé de développer notre système en s'intégrant à l'existant. Vous n'avez pas à changer vos habitudes, HUSH doit simplement être connecté à votre installation et peut être activé à tout moment, au cours d'une conversation.

Comment nous aider ?

Bien entendu, la première manière de nous aider consiste à participer au financement.

Consultez la section contrepartie pour déterminer ce que nous vous proposons en fonction de votre investissement.

Vous pouvez aussi nous aider en finançant un beta-test.

Si vous ne pouvez pas investir dans notre projet mais que vous pensez qu'il est intéressant, parlez-en autour de vous, sur les réseaux sociaux, dans les journaux locaux, les blogs ou tout autre endroit où d'autres personnes pourront en entendre parler. Plus vous en parlez, plus nous saurons de chance de voir aboutir notre financement.
story_txt:
Key points
- Low cost phone encryption system
- Compatible with wired and cellular (GSM) phones
- Integrates with your existing telephone
- Can be activated at any time during a conversation 

In brief
We have worked in security for over 15 years designing applications in physical
secure access (high value production lines, nuclear plants, etc.) and secure
data access (corporate intellectual property, bank client data, etc.).
While the concept of security is nowadays quite well established when it comes
to protecting physical assets or data, voice conversations are largely
forgotten and it is quite an easy task for anyone with basic electrical
knowledge to tap a phone line.
With the recent headlines on phone conversation eavesdropping, we decided it
was time something was done in this field because today, when you are chatting
with a friend, or with a business partner, the question isn't if someone else
is listening but how many others are listening.
In order to bring our concept to life, we decided to involve those who are
concerned in the first line, that is YOU !
With your help, we will bring a device which secures voice conversations from
end to end.
It already has a name : "HUSH" and we already developed
a working prototype. 
Thanks to the Indiegogo financing we will finalize the development and
industrialize it.
The system
Telephone tapping can take place anywhere the signal travels along the path :
in the telephone itself, in the wires which run to the wall, the home lines,
the street lines and for well equipped individuals or governments, in the
telephone centrals, antennas or major communication axis. For this reason, it
was clear to us that the voice data should be encrypted as soon as possible : right
off the microphone. HUSH is put into action between the telephone handset and the
telephone body. This way, the voice data is already encrypted before it even
enters the telephone.
In case of a cell phone, it can be used by acting as a relay between a
bluetooth headset and the phone.
This way, even if someone is able to hack the phone itself, for example with a
malicious software installed on your smartphone, the voice data already is
protected.
The encryption is based on a proprietary variation of the SSL protocol which is
used for protecting internet secure transactions.
The data not only is encrypted but also the system makes sure that your correspondent
is indeed the person you expect. 
For now, we have developed and assembled two prototypes which we successfully
put to work on a 500 km conversation between Switzerland and France.Use of your contribution
We have set the financing goal to 50'000 USD.
The first 25'000 $ will allow us to complete the development and produce the 10
first prototypes for field testing.
The next 18'000 $ will be invested for the industrialization of the device and
the manufacturing of a small series of 50 pieces for further field testing.
The rest will allow us to correct the bugs detected during the field testing
and be ready for mass production.
Because this project only makes sense if it is completed, we opted for the full
financing option.
We believe that it does answer a real need and that many people will support
it.
If the fundraising goes over the limit, the money will be invested in reducing
the manufacturing cost as well as extending the capabilities of HUSH
 to DECT phones (which is otherwise
planned for version 2).



What's in for you ?
Check the contributions section.
And on top of that you will help us giving back its true meaning to
"private" conversations.Wanna know more ?
Recent news have taken a toll on many persons' confidence that nobody is spying
on their conversation.
For many, it is now a fact and nobody can do anything about it. 
We don't agree. While it is indeed a fact that spying equipment is easily
available on the internet and that criminal or government data collection is
virtually impossible to dismantle, it is possible to make sure that the
information collected is useless.
With HUSH in action, people will be able to exchange information, either casual
or valuable, being certain that a nosy neighbour, a competitor or any other ill
intentioned individual will only collect garbage.
And HUSH is taking things one step further in protecting you by
making sure that you are talking to the right person. 
In companies, especially large and/or international ones, individuals don't
always know each other very well.
Social engineering has been increasingly used by scammers against such
companies to obtain information or money.
While it is easy to pretend to be someone or mandated by someone if you know
the right information, it is virtually impossible to do so if you, or at least
your telephone, is signed by a certificate.
This same principle is used in banking transactions to insure the bank that you
are the client you pretend to be and that you are indeed connected to the bank
and not on a fraudulent third-party website. HUSH is based on a powerful processor which allows complex online encryption.
Once a clear communication is established, the two speakers activate their HUSH
device. A certificate is exchanged and validates the encryption key.
The data from the microphone is then digitized and compressed. After
encryption, a modem transforms the encrypted data into signals compatible with
the telephone line requirements.
On the receiving end, the data is decoded and the clear signal is sent to the
receiver's handset.
If a cell phone is used, HUSH will use the bluetooth interface. 
DECT phones will be included in a future version of HUSH unless
the project gets financed well over the goal, in which case we will include it
in version 1.
Many current projects propose a specific phone with multiple locks so that no
hacking of the phone is possible. But this means you have to buy a new phone,
learn how to use it, transfer all your data, contacts, etc.
We decided to add a function to your existing installation. You dont' change
your habits, Hush is plug and play and you can activate it at any time, right
in the middle of a conversation.
How can you help ?
First, of course, you can help this project by participating in the funding.
Check the rewards section to see what each level of funding entitles you to
get.
You can also help us by funding a ‘beta-test’ level.
If you cannot afford to support us financially but you do think that the
project is cool, talk about it around you, tweet it, write in local newspapers,
on blogs or wherever else you will get mode people interested.
There are some tools right here on IndieGoGo. The more you talk about it, the
better chance we have!----------------------------------- FRENCH TEXT -----------------------------------
Points clefs
- Système de cryptage de conversations téléphoniques à bas prix 
- Compatible avec les téléphones filaires et cellulaires (GSM) 
- S'intègre à votre installation téléphonique existante 
- Peut ête activé à tout moment durant une conversation 


En bref
Nous avons travaillé dans le domaine de la
sécurité pendant plus de 15 ans dans des projets tels que la sécurisation
d'accès physique (centres de production de produits de valeur, centrales
nucléaires, etc.) et la sécurisation d'accès aux données (données bancaires,
propriété intellectuelle, etc.)
Si le concept de sécurité est à présent
relativement bien établi lorsqu'il s'agit d'éléments physiques ou de données,

masse.

story:
About me

My name is Sergey Faldin, I am a student from Higher School of Economics in Moscow. I love doing startups and my dream is to make this world a better place. I hope, you'll help me achieve it.
My project name is motive+ (Motivation+). I love sports, fitness. I think that the main problem why so many people still don't have the body of their dream is because they have no trust in themselves. I believe that my project will help them reconsider their life and their habits. 

What problem am I solving?
There are 2 problems that Motivation+ will be solving:
1) Motivation + is a marketplace for coaches. This means that mv+ solves the problem of finding clients for these coaches.

2)No motivation. Mv+ will help you go through developing yourself by tracking your calories, steps, goals. Every progress you make on your goal will be possible to upload on other social networks. This way users will be motivated by the fact that they are doing this with their friends. 

What We Need & What You Get

Our team consists of 6 people. Me, as a CEO, 1 designer, 1 code-writer, 2 PR-managers (they look after our website and our social activity) and 1 analyst. 

Our website: onemotivate.com 
VK page: vk.com/onemotivate

Our app will have 

1) Profile - where all your stuff, progress, goals, level will be displayed. Our users will be gaining level through time (after completing their goals). By the time they get to level 10 - they will be able to become coaches. 
2) Goal - this is where the journey begins. You choose your category (Ex: Sport), add a deadline, pick a name for your goal and GO. You will be asked to upload a photograph ("before") and a photograph of your dream-body. Also, you will be asked to type down your height, weight, diet principles (the amount of fast-food during the week, etc.) and frequency of push-notifications(reminders to upload your progress).
3)Dialogs - Dialogs with your coaches, consulters, other users.
4)Comments - this is where motivation is. I bet everybody wants to hear(see) comments like "cool!" or "what a great body!".
5)Search - search for coaches, users and hashtags.
6)Rating - coach-center. A list of coaches from Best to Worst.

  


As you can see Motivation+ will have a swipe-menu, which is very cool nowadays.


The Impact

I believe, that this project can change the world. I have plans to create more applications for iOS with our logo "Motivation+" that will help people organize their time-schedules, meetings. 
I hope, that Motivation+ LLC will change the world. 

Revenue model:

How are we going to gain revenue? 
Of course this is more about people, than money. But here are some ways how we'll try to gain revenue from this project:
1)Advertisement. As you can see from the picture above, we will have an ad block. We also want to gain revenue from coaches that want to be on the top of the Rating table. 
2)Commision from coaches. Users will sometimes be offered to have an offline-practice. This is where money goes to us via commision.
3)Don't like ads? Turn them off for 0,99$!
4)Level. If you are too lazy to gain level, pay 4,99$ and get to LEVEL 10! (We will have to check your certification in case you want to be a coach).

Every level the user makes gives them more possibility to hire a better coach.


Risks & Challenges

We are having big risks and challenges. We are trying to raise money in order to upload our application on the appstore. 
We need money for the servers, where all user-information will be kept. We also need money for a code-writer, to help us.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute us a little money, you can help us otherwise! 

Write about us on your social network page and don't forget to subscribe at 
onemotivate.com! 

And that's all there is to it. :)

(We will have to check your certification in case you want to be a coach).Every level the user makes gives them more possibility to hire a better coach.
    
Risks & Challenges We are having big risks and challenges. We are trying to raise money in order to upload our application on the appstore. We need money for the servers, where all user-information will be kept. We also need money for a code-writer, to help us.

    Other Ways You Can Help If you can't contribute us a little money, you can help us otherwise! 
Write about us on your social network page and don't forget to subscribe at onemotivate.com! 
   And that's all there is to it. :)

story:
Why You Should Choose GOTCHA! 

Encounter a rare Pokémon while playing Pokémon Go isn't easy, ending up with an escape because of a bad throw/ toss of Poké ball only because of the misjudged distance is a total disaster for any trainer. Luckily, GOTCHA! project now offer the aiming system for trainers to capture their favorite Pokémon by throwing a better, even great toss at the first time to avoid any possible escape. 

As Pokémon Go trainers, we realize that throw/ toss spin ball to a nice, great or even excellent grade will give you extra experience points while successful capturing your Pokémon and eventually higher level leads to better chance of capture, in a nutshell, it all starts with a good toss!  that's why we invent the system to help you having a better overall gaming experience.


How 

GOTCHA! 

wor

ks?

We know Pokémon go uses augmented reality (AR)  to make a blend of your surroundings and the world of Pokémon, after hundreds of trial, we figure out that the best way to increase your rate of success is to see the AR /green background as a box with depth, not just a plain 2D display. Therefore, you will need a systematic way to judge the distance between your Pokéball  and your prize, Pokémon,  in the mid of your screen. The reference line of GOTCHA! helps you to toss your Pokéball  into a higher stage.

Instruction

Pokémon go using augmented reality feature is fun, but it also makes the capture harder than it needed to be, here is a free tip! By turning the AR off, the background will be replaced with a generic green environment that makes the Pokémon to remain focused, land on the center line of the screen. However, knowing that the Pokémon sitting on the middle is one thing, capturing it need a little extra miles to go with GOTCHA! 

First thing first, you will have to discover a Pokémon, than you can judge the distance by the reference lines we provide in the middle of the screen to tell the depth of the green/AR background, in other word, the optimized distance that's best for your chance of capture. 




Next to come, the spiral shaped aiming spots on both side of the screen reminds you of checking your spin ball direction before you toss (clockwise spin for the left-sided toss, and counter clockwise spin for the right-sided toss) to decrease the chance of carelessness. 






The last step, observe the motion of Pokémon, while it's static, confidently slide your finger toward the spiral shaped aiming spot according to the distance you found out and release the Pokéball simple as 1,2,3, you should see a rather good toss on your screen.


Select your favorite color according to your team

As Pokémon Go trainers, we all have our side to pick. Either you are Team Valor, Team Instinct or Team Mystic, GOTCHA!  targeting system prepared Valor Red, Instinct Yellow and Mystic Blue for you to match your team and style. 


What You’ll Receive



  • GOTCHA! aiming screen protector ( 3 colors, Valor Red, Instinct Yellow Mystic Blue) for iPhone 6, 6S and iPhone 6S plus
  • Clean cloth  
  • LOTs of fun playing Pokémon Go with GOTCHA! 

Perks

  • TAIWAN NO.1 PACKAGE                                     1X set of GOTCHA!       
  • INDIVIDUAL PACKAGE                                        1X set of GOTCHA!  
  • BUDDY2 PACKAGE                                               2X set of GOTCHA!     
  • GOTCHA!  FAMILY PACKAGE                            5X set of GOTCHA!
  • GOTCHA! TEAM LEADERS  PACKAGE           10X set of GOTCHA!

We Love Your Help

This is the first time we launch a fund raising campaign via indiegogo, and we will be more than  grateful if we can be funded and more importantly, gaining experience and energy for many other projects to come. Please tell us how you like the ideas we provide and if possible, get perks that we offered would be great! Once we have achieved our campaign goal amount, we would start the production process immediately.

story:
Texto de la campaña en ESP  -  Texte de la campanya en CAT



Lampp is a smart light


that uses your phone screen as its light source.


It comes with an app to let you choose the adequate atmosphere for each situation.


Lampp started with a unique approach to light sources, a smart light that uses the light of our smart phones. LAMPP is a lamp shade and an app that allows you to control the color and the intensity of the light, play music or define the connectivity on your device. With LAMPP you can choose the adequate atmosphere for each situation.

We’ve designed a durable, economic and beautiful product to accompany your intimate moments. This versatile product allows you to instantly create a great atmosphere while covering your phone when you don’t want to be disturbed. It is made in silicon so you can easily take it with you anywhere you go.

We need your support to be able to produce the first ever LAMPPs. With your support, we will be able to start up programming the app and investing in tooling to manufacture the first batch. With our goal we are making sure we can deliver the best quality product at an affordable price.


SIZES; WILL THE LAMPP FIT MY PHONE?

Yes! the design suits ALL STANDARD PHONE SIZES up to the new iPhone6 or Samsung Gallaxy (not suitable for iPhone6+ or Samsung Note).


Give LAMPP as a gift this Christmas!
Get a nice Letterpress postcard, if you orther before Monday Dec 18th.



    PLEDGES

    You will receive a HAND-WRITTEN THANK YOU POSTCARD made in letterpress with Happy Christmas wishes for all the backers.

    Make sure you get yours!


    $5 - The LAMPP APP.

    $40 - The LAMPP APP + Silicon SHADE - Regular International shipping included.
    We have saved the first 300 units for early bird backers! 

    $50 - The LAMPP APP + Silicon SHADE - Regular International shipping included.

    $155 - Pack of 4 units: Each one has The LAMPP APP + Silicon SHADE
    Packed individually and regular International shipping included.

    $190 - First 100 units in Blown GLASS: The LAMPP APP + blown Glass SHADE. A unique hand made blown glass piece (Borosilicate). International shipping included. Another option for Early Birds backers!

    $230 - Blown GLASS LAMPP - The LAMPP APP + blown Glass SHADE. A unique hand made blown glass piece (Borosilicate). International shipping included. 

    $380 - Pack of 12 units: Each one has The LAMPP APP + Silicon SHADE
    Packed individually and regular International shipping included.


    "The candle-lit votive gets a moden day makeover.

    Lampp becomes a portable and easily adaptable mood light. As a modern day version of placing a candle in a colored glass votive, the Lampp offers a wide range of color options—whether you want to wake up to a bright orange-yellow sunrise or visually explore the entire rainbow spectrum at a party."
    by Nara Shin, Cool Hunting.

    "The LAMPP is a globe-like accessory that redirects the light that shines from your phone, channeling the playful nature of an inflated balloon."
    by Nanette Wong, Design Milk.

    "Using technology to do more than make virtual efficiencies, Lampp utilizes your smartphone to create something that one can enjoy in the physical world: a cheap mood light."
    by Liam Roberts, Liam Thinks

    As Featured In ...


    SCHEDULE

    With regard to the production we have partnered with our friends Andrew and David @ Haythotnthwaite Design in China, known for their exquisite quality standards. They have extensive experience producing different types of products, some of them with silicon parts. So we are confident that production will be carried out to perfection.

    We’ve been working with them and everything is set to start production immediately when we reach our goal.

    Here are the steps we’ll take:

    January: End of the campaign. Set up to start manufacturing. Make tooling and organise manufacturing. The app will be fully programmed and running by the end of January.

    February: Lampp manufacturing, quality control and packaging + Shiping Lampps;
    Backers that have chosen the Direct Courier Service (extra cost of $10) will receive their LAMPP.

    March: Backers that have chosen the Standard Courier Service -sea shipping takes up to 5 weeks, will receive their LAMPP.


    HOW IT WORKS

    Lampp is a combination of an APP and a silicon SHADE that addapts to your smartphone, to instantly create a Smart mood light.

    Below we explain in more detail how we’ve designed each element.


    Choose the appropriate atmosphere for each situation.

    The app comes with 6 preset modes, which can also be used on plane mode if you wish to totally disconnect your phone and use it only as a light source.

    Get in touch and let us know how you’d like LAMPP to change the atmospheres in your own life! We propose:

    — Sunrise: Set your alarm and the light will dimm up before your alarm goes off
    — Light: Choose the desired color
    — Relax: Harmonious warm rainbow coloured light + jazz
    — Party: Music reactive
    — Romantic: Warm-reddish steady or fading light
    — Night: Intimate, slow fading rainbow
    *To be developed for Android and IOS.


    Stretch goal $100.000

    Imagine you can define the lighting and colour effects for each mood, play your favourite tunes and control the connectivity of your device when you don't want to be disturbed.

    If we reach $100.000 we will be able to develop the app that we envision. It would come with extensive software to let you edit and pre-set your very own atmospheres.

    Light and colour effects
    — Choose a specific light tone.
    — Have the color and the intensity of the light changing at the desirable speed.
    — Preset movement effects such as shading, flashing or blinking.
    — Let it react to the rhythm of your music

    Music
    — It connects to your music library.
    — Preset your own playlists for each mood.

    Disconnect
    — Control the connectivity of your device and get notified by light instead of sound when you get a call or a message.
    — Less intrusive; it silences your phone and alerts you with light instead of sound.
    — For Android only, for iOS simply silent your phone or set plane mode.


    The LAMPP shade was designed to optimise and redirect the light emitted by the

    screens of our devices, like if we could physically inflate the flat screen of our phones.

    Our goal was how to better optimise and redirect the light coming from the screen. We searched for the perfect form by making prototypes across a range of materials from blown glass to casting plaster in balloons. 

    The final form balances the joyful, organic inflation of a “light balloon” with a proportioned junction between LAMPP and your device.


    Material: Injected Silicon.

    We tested different materials and found that injection moulded silicon has the ideal properties for our purposes.


    We've chosen Silicon for the following reasons.

    — It is the material that best glows under most circumstances.
    — We are able to control its rigidity.
    — It is a very tough and durable material.
    — It is easy to move around, pack up and take with you everywhere you go.






             

    Product application



    Each LAMPP will be packed and ship individually in their own packaging.

    We also supply in boxes of 4 and 12 units, each one in their own packaging.

    Please do get in touch if you are interested in larger quantities.


    Production is our main challenge. We have partnered with our friends Andrew and David @ Haythornthwaite Design in China. They have a flawless track record; we know them and their quality standards and we are confident that production will be carried out to perfection.

    Our experience tells us that even the best laid plans can go astray and that's why we allowed ourselves extra contingency time. Our goal is to get our envisioned and ideal products to you as we envision them to be. We will always prioritise quality over time.

    Another challenge is finding the very best way of getting our product from China to your home. We are still looking at different options to reduce shipping costs, and are committed to  passing on any saving we make to YOU. Please let us know if you can help!


    Does LAMPP fits my phone?
    The Lampp shade fits all standard phones measuring under 72x142mm.

    Does the app works when my phone is on Plane Mode?
    The Lampp app works perfectly when your phone is on plane mode.

    Battery life
    When unplugged, the lampp app has a battery life up to 9 hours*
    *tested on iPhone 6 -emitting only light (not sound). 

    Whole Sale
    We currently supply boxes of one, four and twelve units. Each Lampp is individually packed. Please contact us directly if you would like to preorder larger quantities.


    — Jordi Canudas is a product designer (MA RCA), founder of Jordi Canudas Studio and leader of this project

    — Andrew and David Haythornthwaite are in charge of all the manufacturing of the Lampp shades from their facilities in China. 

    — InQBarna is an app development company based in Barcelona. They have a great deal of experience developing and programming apps and will be responsible for programing of the Lampp app.

    — O-D-D (Oficina De Disseny) is a new communication office based in Barcelona. They are responsible for the design of our identity.

    — KiwiBravo is Raúl & Gonzalo is a formidable design duo starting up in Barcelona. They’ve done the campaign video and most of the photography. They are not only good designers but also good with the camera.

    — Victor Viña (MA RCA) is an Interaction Designer and lecturer, currently teaching at the Pratt Institute, NY. He has been advising us on the app's interactive design.

    — Andrea Ordax is a freelance journalist who is passionate about the ever-growing evolution of the digital world and the new technologies. She loves social media and  is our PR person.

    — Julia Mariscal is working with the PR team and will reply to your questions and comments.


    First of all, massive thanks to all the people in the team for believing in the project and supported and helped my vision come true. We'll try to name you all and please let me know if we've missed you!

    To Roberto and Rosario and Laboral to Ferran Collado, Elisava, Alex Añó, Robert Thompson, Marc Morro, Albert Bres, Yaio, Diego Díaz, Clara Boj, la Selva, Jordi Puy, Eric Jordi, Oscar Lhermitte, Rodolf castellsagué, Ana Huerta, Octavi Serra, Berta Julià, Marina Troyano, Nikolaj Astrup, Maggie and Guille, Diego Córdoba, Andrea Gomez, Ron Arad, Antoni Arola, Shai Akram, Lalo Harris, Paula Mariscal, Lola Errando, Clara Faura, Julia Faura, Maria Faura, Galo, Jaume and Anna, Maria Canudas, my mum Angi, my bro Guillem and off course to Cal Visó for all the shooting. To my dad Lluis and specially to Julia for being there. And to many more that have somehow been involved in this long and exciting adventure.


      Jordi Canudas Studio 2014

story:
Spanish version


Introducing Gamer Cover


Android controller wherever you go!!

Game Cover is a game and multimedia controller with bluetooth conectivity, that adapts to any Android phone so you can wear it whenever you want.


                                                                                    

It is a device that will make playing with your Android so much more comfortable. 


Easy...

Because of its design you can always take it with you or detach it from your phone simply sliding it.

    


More than a simple Gamepad!


                     

 You´ll be able to comfortably play many Android games...


Emulators...

   

The list of games is increasing ..!


You'll be able to download our app via Play Store of Google and check the compatible games list.


You can play alone or with your friends.


But that's not everything!!

Gamecover is also a multimedia remote which you could use to watch your favorite videos, listen to your music or control other kind of apps (Youtube, Music, Pictures,...) 



You can even take pictures using your Game Cover as remote controler.

                 Me taking a remote picture...                              ... this is the result


Confortable design.

We have designed Gamecover with an eye on confort. Thanks to its 8mm thickness you won't notice you're carrying it.


We have made several prototypes, you can see some below.


Perks for our Indiegogo contributors

Price in US$





Why we need your support

Here is where we need your help. The production involves to make the plastic injection molds, and these molds are expensive. Your support will allow us to initiate tooling and manufacturing. 

With your help :

- We can spread of this campaign by different media.

- Start the production.

- Create a community together and continue to develop new and better products according to your opinions.

"Just dream and let us make it real"


Special thanks to:

Jose V. Deaño for your 3D emulations.

Daniel Vázquez (Aka. Kritik) for your voice in videos.

Isa Fontán, Tonio y Pitusa, Loli, Laura Casal, Miriam Chamorro, Mark Meyle, Friederike Sofksy, for your translations help and your amazing support.

We would like to take this opportunity to thank the many friends, supporters and donors of our campaign who have contributed to helping us achieve our dream.

Spanish version
Introducing Gamer Cover

Android controller wherever you go!!
Game Cover is a game and multimedia controller with bluetooth conectivity, that adapts to any Android phone so you can wear it whenever you want.                                                                                    It is a device that will make playing with your Android so much more comfortable. Easy...Because of its design you can always take it with you or detach it from your phone simply sliding it.    More than a simple Gamepad!                      You´ll be able to comfortably play many Android games...Emulators...   The list of games is increasing ..!You'll be able to download our app via Play Store of Google and check the compatible games list.You can play alone or with your friends.But that's not everything!!Gamecover is also a multimedia remote which you could use to watch your favorite videos, listen to your music or control other kind of apps (Youtube, Music, Pictures,...) You can even take pictures using your Game Cover as remote controler.                 Me taking a remote picture...                              ... this is the resultConfortable design.We have designed Gamecover with an eye on confort. story:
For press inquiries, please contact SD@vampeo.com. Follow Vamepo on Twitter@vampeo and for more specification, please visit our blog!

Compatibility:

Works with every Apple iPhone, iPad & iPod with a Lightning connector. This includes the iPhone 5, 5C & 5S, iPad 4, iPad Mini, iPod Touch, iPod Nano and all new iOS devices. For an updated compatibility list, click here.

Remarkable lighting & Smart Features:

There are 6 bright white LED lights inside that connector that give a luminous intensity of 270 lux from an 18" distance. It is perfect for reading and writing in a low light environment. There is also one blue LED light that turns on as soon as the device is connected to the cord. This light is intended to help you locate your device in the dark and doubles as a great night light.

USB Powered:

FiLUX can be powered by any laptop computer (or universal charger) with a USB jack. As LEDs have become more and more efficient, it is now possible to provide excellent levels of task lighting by connecting the FiLUX to a standard 5V USB charger.

Refined Design, Beautiful Materials & Finishes:

It was important for the final product to not only look good, but feel good from the very first touch. That’s why we used high quality materials to build a cord that matches your high-end devices. The top part of the connector is designed using a laser cut plexiglass sheet that allows light to pass through the connector and give the right amount of light. The connector head itself is constructed out of a beautiful anodized aluminum with hair lining treatment to match your other Apple products. The cord is made of a durable and flexible gooseneck material that gives you the ability to bend it in many different shapes with enough strength to hold the weight of your iPhone5/5S in any position. By engineering the smallest possible structure, we were able to use these fine materials and still bring FiLUX to you at an affordable price. Great things do come in small packages.

After I upgraded to the iPhone 5, I automatically lost the ability to use all of my previously purchased accessories that were compatible with the older iPhones. Apple changed the old connector that was around for more than a decade and replaced it with a thin reversible lightning connector. In fact, Apple changed all of their devices to work only with the new connector. For an Apple geek who tries to stay within one platform, this was devastating.  Long hours of FaceTime, watching movies, and surfing the web seemed to be impossible without my previous docks and accessories. At the same time, my major problem has always been plugging my phone into the charger at night. With the new smaller connector, this task seemed even harder in the dark.

My initial step towards creating FiLUX was to sketch the design. The intent was to create a product that would work as a dock, be portable, be strong and also be a solution to my long-lasting issue of plugging the phone to the connector in the dark. After months of trial and error, my final idea was to create a flexible cord that would not only charge the phone, but also sync it and work as a flashlight. That’s how FiLUX was born. You can view some pictures of my initial sketches in the Prototype Process section.

We went through three prototype stages before we finalized our design and basic functionalities. Our first prototype was designed and handmade using a plexiglass tube as the complete head of the connector. It took a couple of tries to come up with the perfect thickness for the gooseneck material to be able to hold the phone in different positions. The microcontroller chip hardware and software design was the hardest part of the project. We've managed to position enough LED lights that fit within the connector and give the user enough light to be able to carry on with normal tasks in complete darkness. 

Here is a video of our first prototype stage:


After the first prototype stage, we started redesigning the head of the connector. The finalized design is now using a beautiful anodized aluminum with a hair lining treatment to match other Apple products and provide a more reliable hold for the cord. We increased the number of LEDs from the previous prototypes to provide more intense light, which is useful for reading and writing. We have also added a blue indicator light that lights up after connecting the device to FiLUX. The indicator light is a great way to make sure the cable is charging, and it works as a night light. 

Design - We finalized our design, component's materials, microcontroller chip software, hardware design, and gooseneck material's ideal thickness.

Manufacturer – We have established a great working relationship with our licensed contract manufacturer and have scheduled manufacturing of the parts right after project's successful funding.

Process – We have already tried out various production processes and are figuring out what works best.

Costs – We set up a financial calculation based on the experience from our previous project and have addressed hidden costs.

Samples – We now have working samples and are testing the effect of its long term use. We are ready to go to the next step.

Why We Need You?

Lightning connector, Male USB - The components that make up the cord connectors.

Tooling – We have to create custom tools for every part. (Very expensive!)

Manufacturing - The FiLUX look and feel is very important to us, so the actual production is a specialized series of steps.

Packaging – Concepts for packaging are in progress. You will be able to help us with this!

Shipping - Getting your FiLUX to you, wherever you are in the world.

Stretch Goal

Our goal is to improve the design and functionality of FiLUX to its maximum capacity. Therefore, we have set ourselves a milestone with a precise calculated budget in order to add these new innovative features to FiLUX. To keep the excitement active, we will unlock each feature once we hit or get very close to the intended goal. These features and options will be available to all of our backers.

Vampeo was founded by Shahriar Darafsheh to create exceptional products for today's electronic devices. Utilizing a rigorous design and development methodology, Vampeo was created to design innovative solutions for today's demanding consumers.

Shahriar received his B.S. in computer science and biology. He also has an extensive background in electronic engineering. His first idea was the Vampeo V1 headphone amplifier, which was made to enhance an innovative audio experience for all audiophiles. V1 was launched in Spring 2012 on Kickstarter. Since 2012, Shahriar has spent most of his time designing and developing the new Vampeo FiLUX, a lighting cord for all Apple lighting products.

story:
Our Indiegogo campaign is over, but you can still get a Voltmaker. Head over to www.thevoltmakers.com for more info and to place a pre-order or click directly here.


The Volt Makers' team thanks you a lot for your support. Even if we didn't achieve our goal on Indiegogo, we are still working to produce the Voltmaker before Christmas!

Want to help The Volt Makers? Follow us on Facebook or Twitter or contact us at contact@thevoltmakers.com!


We invented, designed and tested this awesome tool and our partners are ready to industrialize the production and make it available for everyone! All we need is a kick-start. Thank you so much for making it all happen!

Power your electronic devices wherever and whenever you need to!

Are you sick of your batteries dying at the very moment you need them to make an urgent call, use a torch to change a blown fuse or find your position on a GPS when you are lost in the outdoors?

Let us introduce the Voltmaker, designed to save the day in such situations. An innovative universal device which can be operated with one single hand in case of emergency but which can also be  charged up at home to offer you security.

This innovation provides the security of charging up a device immediately and also acts as a second battery. This is definitely a endless source of power for your smartphone, using renewable energy.

The Voltmaker is ideal for hikers, travellers and urbanites whether in the city or in the countryside and in particular in places where electricity is scarce. Being small and compact, this device tucks away nicely in your backpack, handbag, glove box or even your jacket pocket ready to save the day.

Pour en savoir plus: http://www.thevoltmakers.com/fr/

Mas sobre Voltmaker: http://www.thevoltmakers.com/es/

Aprenda mais sobre o Voltmaker: http://www.thevoltmakers.com/pt/

Learn more about the Voltmaker: http://www.thevoltmakers.com/en/

 

How does it work?

1/ At home: fully charge the Voltmaker with your standard USB wall charger.

2/ Is your phone's battery dead? Plug the Voltmaker into your phone. You can fully charge it with the energy contained in your Voltmaker's battery.

3/ Are your phone AND your Voltmaker's batteries dead?

With a unique, simple, fast, and fun charging system, anyone can generate energy for all kinds of portable electronics including cell phones, smartphones, iPods, among others.

With a few twists of the wrist this hand-held device is capable of generating a few extra minutes of power for your telephone or other small appliances that demand lower power levels (MP3 players, torches, GPS devices, cameras, etc.). This system uses kinetic energy.

4/ Need some light? a clever USB system transforms the Voltmaker into a torch, making the device multi-purpose.

Specifications

Battery: 2,000mAh Lithium
Output: 5V USB (standard A)
Input: 5V USB (micro)
Weight: Approximately 300 grams / 10.6 ounces
Size: 15,5cm/6.1'' (length), 3,6 cm/1.4'' (diameter)

Accessories: flashlight module

Design

We have decided to develop a high-end dynamo product with high performance by focusing on details. We wanted the Voltmaker to be cool. We made it! We gave it a pure and uncluttered aspect.

We have gone above and beyond all the existing autonomous charging solutions to develop a unique product presenting outstanding features: playful use, robustness, multipurposeness and smartness.

Its tubular form makes it perfectly ergonomic, the simple impulse of the ratchet being enough for the generator to work.

What we have thought up and designed requires very few efforts - it can be operated using only one hand and it's actually very fun to use. The innovation lies in the gesture itself.

A scalable product

The Voltmaker is designed to be scalable. Additional modules can be plugged into it thanks to its ingenious USB interconnection system (a standard Type A female connector). As of today, we have developed a flashlight module and our engineers are currently designing the modules of tomorrow: a radio, a fan, an emergency stroboscopic module, a water sterilizer….

 

Security at all times

We wanted a high-performing charger built with the most recent technology. You can charge the Voltmaker with your standard USB wall charger. The Voltmaker then acts as a backup power source for your USB-powered devices. You can charge your phone, and other devices simply by plugging your standard charging cable into to the standard USB port on the Voltmaker.

The Voltmaker contains a battery which can fully recharge a smartphone under all circumstances. Its smart electronic system manages the charging process in a way that increases the battery life cycles, allowing years of use.

 

What they say about us:

Christophe Bricout (Embedded Electronic System’s Advisor at Cap'Tronic, a French government-funded program): "an innovative project mixing a smart and optimized power solution"

Watt Consulting: " We have been working months to optimize the electronic system and ensure the best efficiency compared with what exists on the market."

 

The Voltmaker: a smart charger

 

Keyfeatures

  • Elegant: a bold design
  • A fast and entertaining recharging system
  • An eco-friendly technology
  • Apps for Android
  • An ingenious USB Connection
  • Smart with the use of microcontroller (for use of GPL, check our website)
  • Robust

 

 

 

Smartcharge on open source software (GNU GPL license)

The Voltmaker contains a microcontroller that ensures the communication with other devices plugged into it via USB.

The microcontrollers will provide endless opportunities: detection of the modules plugged in via USB, assessment of the amount of generated power, etc. Thanks to the microcontrollers, the process of charging up a device becomes smart. For example, they can modify the resistance of the generator.

The Voltmaker thus adapts itself to its user's strength, whether he or she is an adult or a child.

All our code will be released as free software, licensed under the GNU GPL, so that everyone can study and adapt the code according to his or her own needs.

Play with apps

The Volt Makers is composed of smart electronic devices which will enable you to:

- Play with apps during the charging up process and to use your Voltmaker as a video game controller

- Know the exact quantity of remaining energy

- And if you like, they'll enable you to join the Voltmakers’ community in order to know when and where the Voltmakers have been used by others: lost in the Sahara, on mount Kilimanjaro, etc…

If you're an app developer, big or small, please keep The Volt Makers in mind! Contact us.

Apps will be developed for Android phones.

Use of Funds

The Voltmaker has been designed, developed, tested and is operational. We need your help to take the next step. With you contribution we will put the Voltmaker into production.

We are an experienced team supported by highly professional partners.
We’ve been working on The Volt Makers for more than 2 years now. Your contribution will help fund:

  • Production tooling
  • Large component order
  • Launch sales
  • Development of apps

 

FAQ

What's the money for?

Backers of this project will be helping create the first production run of the Voltmakers.

What makes the Voltmaker so cool?

The Volt Makers will enable you to experience true independence. You will be able to charge your phones quickly and 

  • Use it as a lighting device
  • Play games on your phone
  • Power any low voltage electronic device

The Voltmaker is perfect for camping, performing any outdoor activities, travelling, making a gift, etc… and soon it will be a solution for the off-grid population which needs both reliable phone charging and lighting systems.

Will there be future The Volt Makers products?

We have designed a unique system which is able to charge any extra low voltage device. We are already developing new products which you'll be able to connect to your Voltmaker: radios, lighting security systems, lighters … 

Send us a Twitter or Facebook message if you have an idea about a module you'd particularly like to add to your Voltmaker!

What is The Volt Makers?

It's just us, Christophe, Alexandre, Tristan and Bertrand and many people that have volunteered tons of time toward the company. The Volt Makers is based in Paris, France. Alex loves long trips on the back of a horse or on a bike, Christophe, an electronic engineer is fond of innovation, the third one is an expert in green products and a keen surfer and Bertrand is a talented designer. The Volt Makers came out of these four mindsets.

Is the Voltmaker patented?

Yes. Our product has been proudly patented since shortly after having being invented in April 2012.

How big is the Voltmaker?

It's 3.6 cm (1.4 '') in diameter and 15.5 cm (6.1 '') long. It weighs around 300 grams (10.6 ounces). It's actually smaller than the one you can see in the movie which is not the latest version. 

How are the Voltmakers made?

The Voltmakers will be produced by our industrial partner whose offices and production units are located in Europe and China.

When will the Voltmakers shipped exactly?

The product will be available before Christmas 2013. Most probably on October / November.

Which devices can I charge with the Voltmaker?

You can charge any very low voltage electronic device that has a USB port, such as your phone, your MP3 player, your camera, your GPS device….

Will I be able to order replacement parts?

Yes, please contact customer service at customer@thevoltmakers.com.

Will The Volt Makers affect my phone?

No, the product we develop won’t affect your phone. The 5V regulated output guaranties security of your devices. The USB output is exactly the same as your computer, laptop…

Can I choose the color of my Voltmaker?

Yes, you can choose between the following colors: pink, blue, green and aluminum. You will receive an email before the shipping so you can confirm the color you want. Buy now, choose later!

How long should I spin the ratchet to be able to make a phone call?

Basically, the ratio is between 1:1 and 1:4 depending on the way you turn the ratchet, the strength of the gesture and the type of phone you have. On average, 2 minutes of spinning will give you enough battery power to make a few minutes long urgent call.

How long should I spin the ratchet to be able to use the flashlight?

Two minutes of spinning will give you around 20 minutes of lighting.

How long should I generate energy to be able to fully charge the battery?

Due to the fact that the Voltmaker is equipped with a very powerful battery (2,000mAh - able to fully charge your iPhone), fully recharging the battery by spinning the ratchet would take you about 2-3 hours! This is why we recommend that you should recharge your Voltmaker using your standard USB wall charger at home. You should only use the manual generator in case of emergency in order to give a few minutes long phone call.

Is the cable included with the Voltmaker?

Yes. Each Voltmaker will be delivered with a USB cable (standard type A/micro USB).

 

 

Press Coverage

NEW !!! Gizmag: It's all in the wrist: The Voltmaker kinetic smartphone charger

NEW !!! Dvice: Voltmaker can charge your phone, even without a power source

NEW !!!  Mashable: Charge Your Phone — With a Flick of the Wrist

NEW !!! PSFK: Smartphone Charger Uses Wrist Movements To Power Up

NEW !!! Blackberry Cool: The Voltmaker: A Smart Charger for a Smartphone World

NEW !!! Inhabitat: Voltmaker Kinetic Charger Powers Your Smartphone With a Flick of the Wrist

NEW !!! Gizmo Tech News: Phone out of juice? Just twirl this tube charge

NEW !!! Canoe.ca: Voltmaker charges with the flick of your wrist

Urban Daddy: Honorable Charge - Giving Your Phone Eternal Life

Inhabitat: The Voltmaker Charges Your Gadgets Off-Grid With Kinetic Energy

Eco Chunk: The Voltmaker harnesses kinetic energy to give your gadgets a clean charge

Braun Publishing: Voltmaker

Fubiz: THE VOLT MAKERS : pour recharger vos appareils électroniques à tout moment

Balsas: „Voltmaker“ – kinetinės energijos kroviklis elektroniniams prietaisams

Bizion: 회전력으로 스마트폰을 충전시키는 신개념 충전기

RUM: RUM

Bokraonline: اختراع جهاز Voltmaker يمكنك من شحن جوالك دون مصدر كهربى ثابت

Décisions Durables: THE VOLT MAKERS, coup de cœur du jury

E-cology: Voltmaker ricarica i tuoi dispositivi elettronici grazie all’energia cinetica

Eco Seven: Ecoinvenzioni: il generatore tascabile di energia rinnovabile

Eko idėjos: „Voltmaker“ – kinetinės energijos įkroviklis elektroniniams prietaisams

Energy Saving Media: บริษัทผลิตอุปกรณ์อิเล็กทรอนิกส์แดนน้ำหอมสร้างเครื่องชาร์จไฟฟ้าพลังงานจลน์

Натур Продукт: Эспандер, заряжающий смартфон

Green News Techno: Mention spéciale pour The Volt Makers

Green Packs: Voltmaker is a Kinetic Energy Charger For Gadgets

New Smart Traveller: How To Make Your Favorite Gadgets Survive in the Wilderness

Ouest-France: 4L Trophy (The Volt Makers' car): les étudiants entre sport et bénévolat

L'Indépendant: 4L Trophy (The Volt Makers' car): une Cabestanyenque s'engage sur les pistes du Maroc

Enovamag: THE VOLT MAKERS une source d’énergie autonome à portée de main pour les appareils très basse tension.

3/ Are your phone AND your Voltmaker's batteries dead?

With a unique, simple, fast, and fun charging system, anyone can generate energy for all kinds of portable electronics including cell phones, smartphones, iPods, among others.
With a few twists of the wrist this hand-held device is capable of generating a few extra minutes of power for your telephone or other small appliances that demand lower power levels (MP3 players, torches, GPS devices, cameras, etc.). This system uses kinetic energy.
4/ Need some light? a clever USB system transforms the Voltmaker into a torch, making the device multi-purpose.

Specifications
Battery: 2,000mAh Lithium Output: 5V USB (standard A) Input: 5V USB (micro)  Weight: Approximately 300 grams / 10.6 ounces Size: 15,5cm/6.1'' (length), 3,6 cm/1.4'' (diameter)
Accessories: flashlight module

Design
We have decided to develop a high-end dynamo product with high performance by focusing on details. We wanted the Voltmaker to be cool. We made it! We gave it a pure and uncluttered aspect.
We have gone above and beyond all the existing autonomous charging solutions to develop a unique product presenting outstanding features: playful use, robustness, multipurposeness and smartness.
Its tubular form makes it perfectly ergonomic, the simple impulse of the ratchet being enough for the generator to work.
What we have thought up and designed requires very few efforts - it can be operated using only one hand and it's actually very fun to use. The innovation lies in the gesture itself.


A scalable product

The Voltmaker is designed to be scalable. Additional modules can be plugged into it thanks to its ingenious USB interconnection system (a standard Type A female connector). As of today, we have developed a flashlight module and our engineers are currently designing the modules of tomorrow: a radio, a fan, an emergency stroboscopic module, a water sterilizer….

 
Security at all times
We wanted a high-performing charger built with the most recent technology. You can charge the Voltmaker with your standard USB wall charger. The Voltmaker then acts as a backup power source for your USB-powered devices. You can charge your phone, and other devices simply by plugging your standard charging cable into to the standard USB port on the Voltmaker.

The Voltmaker contains a battery which can fully recharge a smartphone under all circumstances. Its smart electronic system manages the charging process in a way that increases the battery life cycles, allowing years of use.
 
What they say about us:
Christophe Bricout (Embedded Electronic System’s Advisor at Cap'Tronic, a French government-funded program): "an innovative project mixing a smart and optimized power solution"
Watt Consulting: " We have been working months to optimize the electronic system and ensure the best efficiency compared with what exists on the market."
 
The Voltmaker: a smart charger

 

Keyfeatures


Elegant: a bold design
A fast and entertaining recharging system
An eco-friendly technology
Apps for Android
An ingenious USB Connection
Smart with the use of microcontroller (for use of GPL, check our website)
Robust

 
 
 
Smartcharge on open source software (GNU GPL license)
The Voltmaker contains a microcontroller that ensures the communication with other devices plugged into it via USB.

The microcontrollers will provide endless opportunities: detection of the modules plugged in via USB, assessment of the amount of generated power, etc. Thanks to the microcontrollers, the process of charging up a device becomes smart. For example, they can modify the resistance of the generator.
The Voltmaker thus adapts itself to its user's strength, whether he or she is an adult or a child.

All our code will be released as free software, licensed under the GNU GPL, so that everyone can study and adapt the code according to his or her own needs.
Play with apps
The Volt Makers is composed of smart electronic devices which will enable you to:
- Play with apps during the charging up process and to use your Voltmaker as a video game controller
- Know the exact quantity of remaining energy
- And if you like, they'll enable you to join the Voltmakers’ community in order to know when and where the Voltmakers have been used by others: lost in the Sahara, on mount Kilimanjaro, etc…
If you're an app developer, big or small, please keep The Volt Makers in mind! Contact us.

Apps will be developed for Android phones.
Use of Funds
The Voltmaker has been designed, developed, tested and is operational. We need your help to take the next step. With you contribution we will put the Voltmaker into production.
We are an experienced team supported by highly professional partners. We’ve been working on The Volt Makers for more than 2 years now. Your contribution will help fund:

Production tooling
Large component order
Launch sales
Development of apps
 

FAQ
What's the money for?
Backers of this project will be helping create the first production run of the Voltmakers.
What makes the Voltmaker so cool?
The Volt Makers will enable you to experience true independence. You will be able to charge your phones quickly and 

Use it as a lighting device
Play games on your phone
Power any low voltage electronic device
The Voltmaker is perfect for camping, performing any outdoor activities, travelling, making a gift, etc… and soon it will be a solution for the off-grid population which needs both reliable phone charging and lighting systems.
Will there be future The Volt Makers products?
We have designed a unique system which is able to charge any extra low voltage device. We are already developing new products which you'll be able to connect to your Voltmaker: radios, lighting security systems, lighters … 
Send us a Twitter or Facebook message if you have an idea about a module you'd particularly like to add to your Voltmaker!
What is The Volt Makers?
It's just us, Christophe, Alexandre, Tristan and Bertrand and many people that have volunteered tons of time toward the company. The Volt Makers is based in Paris, France. Alex loves long trips on the back of a horse or on a bike, Christophe, an electronic engineer is fond of innovation, the third one is an expert in green products and a keen surfer and Bertrand is a talented designer. The Volt Makers came out of these four mindsets.
Is the Voltmaker patented?
Yes. Our product has been proudly patented since shortly after having being invented in April 2012.
How big is the Voltmaker?
It's 3.6 cm (1.4 '') in diameter and 15.5 cm (6.1 '') long. It weighs around 300 grams (10.6 ounces). It's actually smaller than the one you can see in the movie which is not the latest version. 
How are the Voltmakers made?
The Voltmakers will be produced by our industrial partner whose offices and production units are located in Europe and China.
When will the Voltmakers shipped exactly?
The product will be available before Christmas 2013. Most probably on October / November.
Which devices can I charge with the Voltmaker?
You can charge any very low voltage electronic device that has a USB port, such as your phone, your MP3 player, your camera, your GPS device….
Will I be able to order replacement parts?
Yes, please contact customer service at customer@thevoltmakers.com.
Will The Volt Makers affect my phone?
No, the product we develop won’t affect your phone. The 5V regulated output guaranties security of your devices. The USB output is exactly the same as your computer, laptop…
Can I choose the color of my Voltmaker?
Yes, you can choose between the following colors: pink, blue, green and aluminum. You will receive an email before the shipping so you can confirm the color you want. Buy now, choose later!
How long should I spin the ratchet to be able to make a phone call?
Basically, the ratio is between 1:1 and 1:4 depending on the way you turn the ratchet, the strength of the gesture and the type of phone you have. On average, 2 minutes of spinning will give you enough battery power to make a few minutes long urgent call.
How long should I spin the ratchet to be able to use the flashlight?
Two minutes of spinning will give you around 20 minutes of lighting.
How long should I generate energy to be able to fully charge the battery?
Due to the fact that the Voltmaker is equipped with a very powerful battery (2,000mAh - able to fully charge your iPhone), fully recharging the battery by spinning the ratchet would take you about 2-3 hours! This is why we recommend that you should recharge your Voltmaker using your standard USB wall charger at home. You should only use the manual generator in case of emergency in order to give a few minutes long phone call.
Is the cable included with the Voltmaker?
Yes. Each Voltmaker will be delivered with a USB cable (standard type A/micro USB).
 
 

Press Coverage
