story:
The First Multifunctional Woolet Magnetic Wireless Charging Pad with Anti-Gravity Phone Case


Your phone will always stick to the charger in ANY conditions.
Charge your phone on the go in a car, office or at home. 
ONE DEVICE. OVER 20 FEATURES.

Meet the Woolet Magnetic Wireless Charging Pad, the most multifunctional charging device ever!

“The Woolet Magnetic Wireless Charging Pad combines utility, technology and elegant corporate design.  We set out to create the ultimate charging pad, that will change and simplify the way we charge our smartphones at work, home or while commuting and running errands. We think we came up with the perfect solution!” – Marek Cieśla, CEO

 

Over 20 features in a single Charging Pad!



Whether you work at a desk, drive all day in your car, or hang with your kiddos all day and have a lot of errands to run – the Woolet Magnetic Wireless Charging Pad is for you!

You can use it in your office as a corporate-style Mousepad and charging station combined, ending the need to carry your charger or power bank around. Your Wireless Mousepad will always be there waiting for you and your smartphone, ready to pump some energy!

 


 

 

 

Car companion

Spend a lot of time in the car, either driving around or standing in traffic? Don’t worry. We can make your life a bit easier! The Magnetic Wireless Charging Pad with the car mount will make your phone accessible at all time. The built-in magnets keep your phone stuck to the pad with a little help from the Woolet Wooden case, putting everything you need – from GPS navigation to your favourite music or podcasts, all within reach.
But remember – don’t text and drive!

 

 

 

Sidekick in the kitchen

You’re cooking a tasty meal for your family. You need to check the recipe and your phone is lost somewhere in the house? Yeah, we know that scenario all too well. You can easily organize everything with the Magnetic Wireless Charging pad. Set it on the kitchen table with the dedicated stand or even stick it to the fridge. It won’t fall down and you will always have your eyes on the recipe you need. Or just enjoy the nest exciting of whatever series you are binge-watching right now!

 

 

 

Guardian of your rest

After a long and tiring day, it’s finally time to go to bed. The phone is almost dead, so you’d better charge it during the night. But where is the charger? Left at work? Maybe in another room? No, it has to be here somewhere, but where is that darn cable? You were already comfy, tucked in like a human burrito, and now you need to get up on a mission to find a charger. Don’t let this happen again! Use the Magnetic Charging Pad by your bed or on your nightstand and stay cozy and warm in bed.

 

 

Our time is valuable, that’s why our Magnetic Pad keeps it simple.

Just connect it to an energy source, put the device on the top and the charging will start in the blink of an eye. Simple.

 

 

 

Three inductive coils

What makes the Magnetic Pad special are its THREE inductive coils. Most ordinary charging pads are equipped with just one, which makes it impossible to quickly connect them the smartphone. With three, you will always hit the right spot, because the inductive field is much stronger. It doesn’t matter where you put your device, it will ALWAYS work.

 

 

 

 

Suitable for iPhones!

Some of you gadget geeks might say: that it’s impossible to wirelessly charge iPhones. IMPOSSIBLE IS NOTHING! We wouldn’t abandon Apple users, so we thought of a way to connect your phones too.

It’s the Wireless Charging iPhone Cover, equipped with the inductive technology transmitter, designed especially for Apple devices. Available for iPhones models  5S, 5SE, 6, 6S, 6 Plus, 6S Plus. Just put the phone inside the cover, then on the top of the pad. It’s that simple!
 

The Wireless Charging Mousepad
Size: 305 x 220 mm / 12 x 8.7 inches

The Magnetic Wireless Charging Pad
Size: 170 x 100 mm / 6.69 x 3.94 inches

Wireless Charging iPhone Cover – 4.0” (iPhone 5s/SE)
Size: 145 x 75 x 5,08 mm / 2,8 x 1,2 x 0,2 inches

Wireless Charging iPhone Cover – 4.7” (iPhone 6/6s)
Size: 40 x 80 x 5mm / 5,5 x 3,1 x 0,2 inch

Wireless Charging iPhone Cover – 5,5” (iPhone 6 Plus/6s Plus)
Size: 163 x 97 x 5mm / 6,4 x 3,8 x 0,2 inch

 

 

 

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES:

Production:
We want to make it clear that we are not going to compromise with the quality of our products. Since every one of them is 100% hand-crafted it takes more time to produce a piece. Any manufacturing project could face unforeseen slowdowns and unforeseen delays. We are aware of that, but taking our team’s experience into the consideration, we think we can minimize the risk.  We will do everything we can to meet the projected shipment dates.

Communication:
In the past, we’ve learnt that communication is the key and it is our priority to take care of every one of you, our Backers!
We offer you 24/7/365 on-line support. If you would like to ask a question regarding our campaign, product details or company or you would  simply like to say hi, just write to support@woolet.co. Our support team will be happy to assist you with anything! We would like every backer to be informed about the project, so if you have any questions, please don’t hesitate to ask!

INDIEGOGO CAMPAIGN

When will my order be shipped?
Early Birds orders will be shipped by the end of October 2016 and the rest in December 2016.

Do you ship worldwide?
Yes, your charger can be send anywhere in the world!

How will my order be shipped?
We use the national postal services of each country.

How much is shipping?
Shipment costs are already included.

Can I get a refund?
Please check out Indiegogo's policy:
https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles...

Does your product come with a warranty?
Yes, Woolet chargers come with a one-year warranty, starting from the day of shipment.
Warranty covers all defects of electronics and materials except:

  • damages caused by accident, misuse, abuse, unauthorized modifications, etc.
  • damages caused by contact with liquids
  • damages caused by not following the instructions included in the manual
  • damages caused by interference/repairs caused by third party, unauthorized by our company
                  

Who will be responsible for any additional taxes, VAT or duties?
Any additional taxes, duties or VAT that may be applied to your order will be your responsibility. Please check your country's import duties before purchasing as it varies internationally.

I have a question for your team. Whom do I contact?
We are waiting for your inquires 24/7/365 here: support@woolet.co
Don’t hesitate to ask if you have any doubts. Our team will assist you with anything!

 

FEATURES AND TECHNICAL

Is the charging pad waterproof?
The charging pad is tough and resistant but it’s not completely waterproof. We do not recommend getting it wet, because the electronics inside may get damaged.

How should I clean the pad when it gets dirty?
Just like any other leather/suede item. Just be careful not to get it too wet, as this might damage the electronics.

Which smartphones are Qi-compatible?
A list of all Qi-compatible smartphones can be found in the campaign description in the “COMPATIBLE WITH” section.

Will using the charging pad damage my battery?
Of course, not! This is the safest method of charging.

How does the wireless iPhone cover work?
It has a built-in inductive transmitter, which allows your phone to be charged wirelessly.

 

Meet the Woolet Team

Our team has already created Woolet Smart Wallet, which raised $330k. We are providing 24H support through our web. Woolet Wireless Charging has no risk to become a scam project. We would love to deliver another great product that reached people all over the world. We already shipped more than 4 000 products including basic wireless chargers.

story:
The NANO-EQ system (wireless controlled Digital Audio Equalizer 24bit/96KHz)

The NANO-EQ system is a Digital Audio Equalizer. But ... What is an Audio Equalizer?

An Audio Equalizer is a typical component of a Hi-Fi system for listening to music (but can also be used in Home Cinema systems, if specifically designed), and its purpose is to make the sound more pleasing to the listener according to his musical tastes.

To achieve this goal, an Audio Equalizer divides the sound into several bands (audio components) and enables the listener to give more or less emphasis (through the equalization parameters) to these audio bands, according to his tastes. For example, it allows:

  • to emphasize some treble to better listen to the voice of the singers;
  • to emphasize some bass to better listen the sound produced by a guitar or a bass instrument;
  • and so on ...

In any typical equalizer, the equalization parameters can be changed only on the instrument itself, via buttons or levers to slide.

High-quality equalizers with low distortions may cost hundreds of dollars, while having not very small dimensions.

 

So, What is the NANO-EQ system goal?

The NANO-EQ system goal is to give you:
  • a high quality Digital Audio Equalizer with 7 bands, or more (so, 7 equalization parameters that can be adjusted independently);
  • a reasonable low cost;
  • the feature to be connected to virtually any audio source type (turntables, CD players, DVD players, Blu-Ray players) thanks to the presence of the most common analog and digital connections;
  • a nice-looking and small packages;
  • easiness to transport thanks to its small size;
  • the feature to be able to use it both at home or in a car, thanks to the standard 12V input power connector;
  • the feature to control your equalization parameters via a simple iPhone or Android App, wireless;
  • the feature to use it in a Home Cinema system (systems up to 8 channels);
  • linearize the acoustics of the listening environment, to have a better listening experience.

Why NANO-EQ system?

The NANO-EQ is unique in the world because is designed following a "get-only-what-you-need" thought: the NANO-EQ system is composed of many small modules each of which gives you a specific feature; these modules can be connected togheter to compose your personal NANO-EQ system.

In this way, you can drastically reduce the overall size of your equalizations system and save your money if you don't need optional features.

What Are The Advantages Of NANO-EQ system?

There are many advatnages versus the traditional equalizer:

  • the size: the target is to be able to offer a NANO-EQ 2 channel system (typical for audio stereo applications) by using only two modules in a very small space, estimated in 12x4x4 cm;
  • the cost: the target is to make available to all consumers a simple NANO-EQ 2 channels system for around 150$, and we hope less (obviously our funders will receive their gifts first, and only some time later will be available a worldwide sale through a web site);
  • the quality: best in class digital components will be used for the Analog-to-Digital and Digital-to-Analog Audio conversions with 24bit/96KHz sampling rate and Signal-to-Noise-Ratio >120db; a powerful Signal Processor with >1200MFLOPs computational power will be used for Audio filtering and equalization process;
  • the flexibility: with our extremely modular design, you can get only the modules (so, the features) that you really want, saving your money;
  • the portability: the NANO-EQ system is powered by a simple 12V adapter, which makes it easy to use at home or in car;
  • the available input and output connections: the presence of RCA analog connections, 3.5mm jack connections and S/PDIF digital connections, allows it to be connected to virtually any audio source type and audio amplifiers / speakers system;
  • the environment equalization feature: by using the specific modules and a microphone, you can linearize the acoustisc of the listening environment to have a listen close to perfection (this feature will be available by reaching the higher level goals, please see below);
  • the home theater sorround feature: by using the specific modules, you can compose an 8 channels NANO-EQ system capable to decode some Dolby and DTS multi-channel codecs (such as Dolby 5.1 and DTS 5.1) without external decoder equipments (this feature will be available by reaching the higher goals, please see below);
  • the graphic display feature (bonus): by using the specific module, you can have a real-time graphic-style display, which displays in real-time the audio levels with a series of led bars (this feature will be available by reaching the higher level goals, please see below);

Why We Need Your Funds?

It is simply: We need your funds to make our idea and our studies reality!! We want to offer to you the NANO-EQ system because we believe it is a great new piece of technology for audio applications,

BUT

we need your help:

we have developed the idea and selected most of the components with our funds, but now to complete the development process we need to:

  • continue the development process for other 3 to 6 months;
  • enlarge the development team;
  • buy all the components needed;
  • builds the prototype boards for each step of the development process;
  • builds all the NANO-EQ gifts for our funders;

So, if you believe in this idea and you like it, please fund us!

How To Make A Contribution?

  1. Click on the Contribute button and click 'continue' to be taken to the PayPal payment page;
  • Log in to PayPal with your account to complete your contribution with your PayPal account

          OR

  • click on "Pay with a credit or debit card" to pay with a credit or debit card (Visa, MasterCard, Discover, American Express) without a PayPal account;

The Shipping Cost For The Perks Will Be Required To You Only Before The Shipping. Why? 

Currently, we cannot accurately estimate the shipping cost for each type of perk because these costs depends on weight, dimension and country.

We will provide you all the information to pay your shipping cost for the perks just before the shipping, in the same way with wich you have already contributed to the campaign (so, with your paypal account or credit or debit card).

We will not add any additional cost other than the bare minimum for shipping the perks to you.

Other Ways You Can Help

We know some of you just can’t contribute, but this dosn’t mean you can’t help:

  • use the Indiegogo share tools;
  • ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about this campaign;
  • remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

 

The NANO-EQ system in details

The NANO-EQ system is composed of 5 modules plus 1 bonus module (in case all the goals are successfully achieved), each of which gives you a spcific feature: in the followings lines are described all the modules and the goal needed to fully develop them.

The basic modules needed for all: NANO-POWER and NANO-EQ modules

NANO-POWER module

The NANO-POWER module is a basic module with which you can turn on/off the NANO-EQ system and turn on/off the wireless communication feature to save power (or to reduce the RF interferences) when there is no need to change equalization parameters.

This module has a standard connector for receiving the 12V input power needed by the NANO-EQ system to work: the other modules receive the input power by this NANO-POWER module by connecting to the connectors on the left and right panel (see the images above).

Through a simple iPhone or Android application it is possible to communicate with the NANO-POWER module to control and edit the equalization parameters of each audio band available, for each channel of the NANO-EQ system.

Only 1 NANO-POWER module is needed for each NANO-EQ system to work.

Estimated size: 4(w)x4(h)x4(d) cm (without connectors);   estimated material: plastic

GOAL TO REACH FOR DEVELOPMENT OF THIS MODULE: $110.000

 

NANO-EQ module

The NANO-EQ module is a basic module which is responsible to execute the real-time audio filtering and equalization process (7 or more bands equalization, 20Hz - 20KHz range); this module can perform audio equalization for 2 audio channels simultaneously.

To create a 2 channel NANO-EQ system (typical audio stereo application) the NANO-EQ module must be connected to the NANO-POWER module by using the connector on the left panel (see the images above); it is also possible to create a multi-channel NANO-EQ system by connecting in a cascade fashion more than one NANO-EQ modules for up to 4 NANO-EQ modules (8 channel NANO-EQ system) by using the same connector.

This module accommodates plenty of connections: there are one pair of RCA analog input and output connectors for analog audio, one input and output 3.5mm jack for analog audio and one S/PDIF  input and output connector for digital audio; it is also possible to use a digital input with an analog output and vice versa, or use digital input and output or analog input and ouput.

The NANO-EQ module input connections can manage only uncompressed audio. For compressed audio (such as Dolby or DTS), see the other modules below.

The front expansion connector will be used to connect the bonus module, if the higher goals will be achieved (see below).

Heart of NANO-EQ is a powerful SHARC signal processor with >1200MFLOPs computational power, assisted by best-in-class A/D and D/A converters with Signal-to-Noise-Ratio > 120db.

Estimated size: 8(w)x4(h)x4(d) cm (without connectors);   estimated material: plastic

GOAL TO REACH FOR DEVELOPMENT OF THIS MODULE: $110.000

Below you can see a simple 2 channel NANO-EQ system for stereo application, compared to an iPhone:

 

Below you can see an 8 channel NANO-EQ system for sorround application (7.1 typical), compared to an iPhone:

 

 

The pro modules for who needs environment equalization feature: NANO-PLAYER and NANO-MIC modules

The NANO-PLAYER and NANO-MIC are two modules needed for the environment equalization feature: this feature allows you to equalize the sound from your desired listening position, considering the surrounding environment. For this feature, it is  needed an external microphone to be connected to one of these modules; further improvements could eliminate the need for an external microphone, integrating one directly into one of the modules.

NANO-PLAYER module

The NANO-PLAYER module is needed only to run the environment equalization feature; it has a power led on the front panel to indicate normal operation, and has to be connected to the NANO-POWER module by using the male connector on the right panel (on left side of the back view image, see above); the digital S/PDIF out connector has to be connected to the digital S/PDIF input  connector of the NANO-EQ module, using a cable (in this case, your normal audio source must be disconnected from the NANO-EQ modules).

By using the iPhone or Android App, it is possible to run the environment equalization feature: the NANO-PLAYER will replace your normal audio source to play a predefined audio track for a few seconds while simultaneously the NANO-MIC module will capture the audio signals, to allow the computation of correct audio equalization.

If your NANO-EQ system has more than 2 channels (so, more than one NANO-EQ modules) the environment equalization feature must be executed one time for each NANO-EQ module present in the system, each time connecting the S/PDIF out of the NANO-PLAYER module to the S/PDIF in of the desired NANO-EQ module (just follows the on-screen advices of the iPhone or Android app).

When the operations are ended, the NANO-PLAYER module can be disconnected from NANO-POWER and NANO-EQ modules and your normal audio source can be reconnected to the NANO-EQ module.

Estimated size: 4(w)x4(h)x4(d) cm (without connectors);   estimated material: plastic

GOAL TO REACH FOR DEVELOPMENT OF THIS MODULE: $160.000

 

The NANO-MIC module

The NANO-MIC module is needed only to run the environment equalization feature, togheter with the NANO-PLAYER module; it has a replaceable battery pack as power source, with a Power/led button to turn on/off the module on the front panel and a standard input connector on the right panel (left side of the back view image, see above) to connect an external microphone (further improvements could eliminate the need for an external microphone).

This module integrates a wirelss communication feature, needed to further synchronize all operations with the iPhone or Android app for the environment equalization feature.

When the operations are started, the NANO-MIC module will captures the audio signals, which will be after sent to the iPhone or Android app to get the correct equalization parameters.

When the operations are ended, the NANO-MIC module can be turned off.

Estimated size: 4(w)x4(h)x4(d) cm (without connectors);   estimated material: plastic

GOAL TO REACH FOR DEVELOPMENT OF THIS MODULE: $160.000

 

 

The advanced module for who has a Home Cinema system: NANO-DECODER module

The NANO-DECODER module is specifically designed to be used in a NANO-EQ system for Home Cinema applications: this module has the feature to decode some Dolby Digital and DTS audio codec (used in DVD and Blu-Ray discs).

The NANO-DECODER module must be connected to the NANO-POWER module with the connector on the left panel (using a cable); on the front panel it has a power led to indicate normal operation, and at least three S/PDIF out connectors; on the back panel it has one S/PDIF IN connector.

This module can decode the most common Home Cinema Sorround codecs, the Dolby Digital 5.1 and DTS 5.1, by connecting the audio source (typical a DVD or Blu-Ray player) to the S/PDIF IN connector: in this case the S/PDIF OUT connector for channels 1/2 must be connected to the S/PDIF IN connector of the first NANO-EQ module, the S/PDIF OUT connector for channels 3/4 must be connected to the S/PDIF IN connector of the second NANO-EQ module, and the S/PDIF OUT connector for channels 5/6 must be connected to the S/PDIF IN connector of the third NANO-EQ module (because one NANO-EQ module can manage 2 channels, to create a 6 channels NANO-EQ system three NANO-EQ modules must be used in a cascade fashion).

Our target is to include also one HDMI IN and OUT connectors (see the image above) to allow the NANO-DECODER module to decode the High Definition audio codecs Dolby TrueHD and DTS HD Master Audio 7.1 channels for a perfect Home Cinema Entertainment (a fourth S/PDIF OUT connector will be used to transmit channels 7 and 8 to a fourth NANO-EQ module). Anyway, HDMI with HDCP connections are subject to high costs of annual license: approximately 25.000$ for year, so the HDMI connections will be included only if will be collected many extra funds higher than the last goal: help us!!

Heart of NANO-DECODER is a powerful SHARC signal processor with >1200MFLOPs computational power.

Estimated size: 8(w)x4(h)x4(d) cm (without connectors);   estimated material: plastic

GOAL TO REACH FOR DEVELOPMENT OF THIS MODULE: $200.000 (plus great extra funds for licensing costs of HDMI and HD Audio Codecs)

 

 

The bonus module: NANO-EQ-GRAPHIC module

The NANO-EQ-GRAPHIC module is a bonus module developed by collecting extra funds over $200.000 threshold.

This module provides you the feature to graphically display the audio levels of each channel, by using a series of led bars. Using the connector present on the back panel, it can be connected to the expansion connector on the front panel of NANO-EQ module.

Estimated size: 8(w)x4(h)x1.5(d) cm (without connectors);   estimated material: plastic

GOAL TO REACH FOR DEVELOPMENT OF THIS MODULE:  >$200.000

 

Below you can see a simple 2 channel NANO-EQ system for stereo application with NANO-EQ-GRAPHIC module, compared to an iPhone:

 

 

What Are The Difficulties?

Our target is to pack in these small sizes, a high level of audio quality and flexibility; we will evaluates thermal heating problems or audio interferences and the best solutions to solve them.

Due to these possibilities, the size or external layout may slightly change for the final products: please come back here to know the latest updates of our NANO-EQ system!

The GOALS: Why $110.000 minimum?

This is the minimum goal we have calculated to allow us to develop the NANO-EQ basic system and ensure the production of all the NANO-EQ gifts for our funders: so, for you!

The PERKS: Why $350 minimum for a NANO-EQ system gift?

The 350$ requested as minimum contribution for a NANO-EQ gift are calculated in order to obtain enough funds for us to develop the project and have enough money remaining to produce the NANO-EQ gifts for you!

Who We Are?

We are a team of Techical Experts and Engineers, with a solid background in the development of Software Systems and Solutions for the Aerospace Industry, with recent experiences in mobile applications;

We have worked on Personal Computers, Notebooks and Embedded Platforms with x86 and Arm processors types for various targets, from simple graphic applications to Real-Time Aeronautic equipments.

We are excited with our NANO-EQ system and we have an endless desire to make it come true!

 

 

THANK YOU ALL FOR VISITING THIS PAGE ... and SHARE IT !!!
story_txt:
The NANO-EQ system (wireless controlled Digital Audio Equalizer 24bit/96KHz)

The NANO-EQ system is a Digital Audio Equalizer. But ... What is an Audio Equalizer?

An Audio Equalizer is a typical component of a Hi-Fi system for listening to music (but can also be used in Home Cinema systems, if specifically designed), and its purpose is to make the sound more pleasing to the listener according to his musical tastes.
To achieve this goal, an Audio Equalizer divides the sound into several bands (audio components) and enables the listener to give more or less emphasis (through the equalization parameters) to these audio bands, according to his tastes. For example, it allows:

to emphasize some treble to better listen to the voice of the singers;
to emphasize some bass to better listen the sound produced by a guitar or a bass instrument;
and so on ...

In any typical equalizer, the equalization parameters can be changed only on the instrument itself, via buttons or levers to slide.
High-quality equalizers with low distortions may cost hundreds of dollars, while having not very small dimensions.

 
So, What is the NANO-EQ system goal?

The NANO-EQ system goal is to give you:

a high quality Digital Audio Equalizer with 7 bands, or more (so, 7 equalization parameters that can be adjusted independently);
a reasonable low cost;
the feature to be connected to virtually any audio source type (turntables, CD players, DVD players, Blu-Ray players) thanks to the presence of the most common analog and digital connections;
a nice-looking and small packages;
easiness to transport thanks to its small size;
the feature to be able to use it both at home or in a car, thanks to the standard 12V input power connector;
the feature to control your equalization parameters via a simple iPhone or Android App, wireless;
the feature to use it in a Home Cinema system (systems up to 8 channels);
linearize the acoustics of the listening environment, to have a better listening experience.


Why NANO-EQ system?
The NANO-EQ is unique in the world because is designed following a "get-only-what-you-need" thought: the NANO-EQ system is composed of many small modules each of which gives you a specific feature; these modules can be connected togheter to compose your personal NANO-EQ system.
In this way, you can drastically reduce the overall size of your equalizations system and save your money if you don't need optional features.
What Are The Advantages Of NANO-EQ system?
There are many advatnages versus the traditional equalizer:


the size: the target is to be able to offer a NANO-EQ 2 channel system (typical for audio stereo applications) by using only two modules in a very small space, estimated in 12x4x4 cm;

the cost: the target is to make available to all consumers a simple NANO-EQ 2 channels system for around 150$, and we hope less (obviously our funders will receive their gifts first, and only some time later will be available a worldwide sale through a web site);

the quality: best in class digital components will be used for the Analog-to-Digital and Digital-to-Analog Audio conversions with 24bit/96KHz sampling rate and Signal-to-Noise-Ratio >120db; a powerful Signal Processor with >1200MFLOPs computational power will be used for Audio filtering and equalization process;

the flexibility: with our extremely modular design, you can get only the modules (so, the features) that you really want, saving your money;

the portability: the NANO-EQ system is powered by a simple 12V adapter, which makes it easy to use at home or in car;

the available input and output connections: the presence of RCA analog connections, 3.5mm jack connections and S/PDIF digital connections, allows it to be connected to virtually any audio source type and audio amplifiers / speakers system;

the environment equalization feature: by using the specific modules and a microphone, you can linearize the acoustisc of the listening environment to have a listen close to perfection (this feature will be available by reaching the higher level goals, please see below);

the home theater sorround feature: by using the specific modules, you can compose an 8 channels NANO-EQ system capable to decode some Dolby and DTS multi-channel codecs (such as Dolby 5.1 and DTS 5.1) without external decoder equipments (this feature will be available by reaching the higher goals, please see below);

the graphic display feature (bonus): by using the specific module, you can have a real-time graphic-style display, which displays in real-time the audio levels with a series of led bars (this feature will be available by reaching the higher level goals, please see below);



Why We Need Your Funds?
It is simply: We need your funds to make our idea and our studies reality!! We want to offer to you the NANO-EQ system because we believe it is a great new piece of technology for audio applications,
BUT
we need your help:
we have developed the idea and selected most of the components with our funds, but now to complete the development process we need to:

continue the development process for other 3 to 6 months;
enlarge the development team;
buy all the components needed;
builds the prototype boards for each step of the development process;
builds all the NANO-EQ gifts for our funders;

So, if you believe in this idea and you like it, please fund us!
How To Make A Contribution?



Click on the Contribute button and click 'continue' to be taken to the PayPal payment page;


Log in to PayPal with your account to complete your contribution with your PayPal account

          OR

click on "Pay with a credit or debit card" to pay with a credit or debit card (Visa, MasterCard, Discover, American Express) without a PayPal account;

The Shipping Cost For The Perks Will Be Required To You Only Before The Shipping. Why? 
Currently, we cannot accurately estimate the shipping cost for each type of perk because these costs depends on weight, dimension and country.
We will provide you all the information to pay your shipping cost for the perks just before the shipping, in the same way with wich you have already contributed to the campaign (so, with your paypal account or credit or debit card).
We will not add any additional cost other than the bare minimum for shipping the perks to you.


Other Ways You Can Help
We know some of you just can’t contribute, but this dosn’t mean you can’t help:

use the Indiegogo share tools;
ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about this campaign;
remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
DECON “X1”

INCREDIBLE SMARTPHONE A INCREDIBLE PRICE

Decon x1 is best quality price smartphone that could have existed.
With the X1 You can enjoy power, fluidity, amazing features and essential for daily use at work, school, home or where you should be. From the idea to the prototype, Decon has wanted to make clear what it is to be a solvent smartphone without having to increase prices.

CAMERA

Take and record high quality images with their 13mp Samsung + 13mp cameras, with autofocus for a better experience, do not waste your moments, capture them.

Better selfies with the 13 MP camera, for a best detail, where the protagonist is you.

Screen

5.5 inches, 1920*1080P IPS screen, The low resolution is prohibited.

PROCESSOR

Octacore processor for maximum power accompanied by 4GB RAM plus 64GB of ROM you will never get a lag, close an application or run out of memory, don´t uninstall applications, install them, never stop watching your movies, download them.

NFC

NFC, indispensable for business, compatible with google pay, payments are safe and fast. Can there be something better? The answer is no.

Proffesional Sensors

G-sensor P-sensor L-sensor E-compass Gyroscope.

GLOBAL BANDS

In a world where the people move around the world, you need a smartphone that does it too.

BATTERY

Powerful battery of 4000 mAh, incredible capacity for incredible persons.

Wireless Charge

Made for who hate cables, never will be a problem to charge it.

Quick Charge 3.0

The best charge in the best smartphone, best than 2.0, have more power in less time.

Do you want more?

✔Fingerprint

✔Gorilla Glass 5

✔Android 8.1

✔Ready for start the life...

       Let´s Go!

 

Full Specifications

THE TIMELINE

                                       

DECON

Company: Decon founded in 2018 is a company dedicated to the development of hardware, internet and everything to which it refers to the electronic landscape, we are known for offering the best at affordable prices. We have a team with great values, in love with their work, willing to sacrifice high profit margins for the benefit of our customers.

ATTENTION!

story:
Welcome to Vmed - the world's only smartphone case to accurately measure your body's vital statistics and report data in real time.

Compatible with the latest Apple & Android devices, Vmed helps you better understand your health -- everywhere you go!


The Vmed phone case teams with the Vmed app to accurately measure your body's vital statistics and allows you to see the data in real time. Your data can be saved for later review and comparison. It can also be recorded and sent to your healthcare professional.

Tracking 10 different measurements, the Vmed measures more vitals than any device on the market today. Vmed also features Covid-19 specific analysis and results to help keep family and associates safe.

Vmed can be used on your personal device to assure your own personal health, at public schools to screen for COVID19, outside of businesses before admitting entry and much more...



WHAT IT DOES


Note: The normal range of a person's vital signs vary depending on age, weight, gender, and overall health.
 
Most of these statistics are determined (using patented technology) by placing middle fingers on the two sensors on the back of the Vmed phone case.

THE CASE

Features:

  • Provides Immediate Accurate Personal Data
  • Measures 8 different Body Vitals (see "What It Does" above) & renders 2 body analysis results
  • Non-Invasive (No blood or saliva required)
  • Thin and Extremely Lightweight
  • Dr. Approved and Validated

 
The Vmed case has multiple patented technologies, assuring that our device remains the absolute best at what it does!


THE BATTERY



DIMENSIONS

 

 

THE APP



The Vmed app syncs up with the Vmed smartphone case to give you data quickly and efficiently.  Our app is a free download and it can also be used to send your body's vital measurements to your doctor for a more accurate assessment of your health history allowing your healthcare provider to better advise and treat you!

Check out a video below with more details on what the Vmed can do:

The Vmed phone case is compatible with the most popular devices in the market today. Check out a list of our starting devices below:

Please note that as each compatible phone above is slightly different in design and dimensions, there will be small changes in the Vmed device, depending on your phone.

The Vmed case is available in Gunmetal Black, sure to fit any phone beautifully. If we raise enough money, we'll be able to develop the Vmed phone case in additional colors. Check out Stretch Goals below to see the possible colors!

Please choose your reward based on the amount of phone cases you want - you'll choose your color(s) after the campaign ends!

 


With enough backers, we can unlock additional colors for the Vmed phone case. Check out the available colors below, and be sure to share the campaign across your social media accounts to help us unlock the colors below & much more!

As entrepreneurs, and more importantly, Indiegogo enthusiasts ourselves, we understand how important a timeline is. We've put a lot of work into the Vmed phone case over the last several years, assuring that it is as close to production as possible before hitting "launch" on our campaign.

We are confident with the timeline detailed below. Of course, if anything changes, we promise that our backers will be the first to know. If delays are required, we'll be sure to update our backers accordingly with details & an updated timeline!


In order to make the Vmed phone case as accessible as possible, we're charging a flat rate of just $5 throughout the United States. Likewise, international shipping is a flat rate of just $15.
Please note that this shipping charge is added as you make your pledge - it's not an extra surprise charge you'll get at the end of the campaign.

The Vmed Team consists of a group of technology experts and doctors who have collaborated to create a world’s first by integrating the ability to provide a non-invasive healthcare body monitoring solution to address many of the standard health concerns of today into a smartphone case for ease of use and simple recording of vital data and confidential transfer to doctors as needed. This Vmed measured data assists the user in monitoring their own vitals and are designed to help watch for signs of heart murmurs, heart attacks and other circulatory system and heart anomalies, the monitoring of post-operative body vitals, the notification of a downturn in health as defined by a degradation in vital numbers for health concerns such as flus, cancers, aging or emerging physical health conditions like high blood pressure, low oxygen levels, rest analysis and even stress level review, any of which could have a significant and certainly detrimental impact.

The Vmed team has been developing the Vmed for more than 3 years and is very excited to be able to present this cutting edge technology in a smartphone case to the market for the world to use.

Connect with our team on social media to stay up to date on news, new developments & much more!

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

We are excited to make our Indiegogo debut! As avid backers, we understand the importance of fulfilling rewards and, perhaps most importantly, keeping backers up to date. While we've done a huge amount of work to assure the Vmed is ready for production, there may be unexpected delays due to manufacturing processes & procedures. If delays occur, our backers will be the first to know. We promise to be transparent and upfront about any and all delays, changes (design or otherwise) & anything else in order to minimize risk and provide the absolute best product possible.

PRIVACY POLICY:

Policy:

At Vmedical, accessible from vmedical.com, one of our main priorities is the privacy of our visitors. This Privacy Policy document contains types of information that is collected and recorded by Vmedical and how we use it.

If you have additional questions or require more information about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us.

This Privacy Policy applies only to our online activities and is valid for visitors to our website with regards to the information that they shared and/or collect in Vmedical.

Consent:

By using our website or signing in a a Vmedical application, you hereby consent to our Privacy Policy and agree to its terms.

Information We Collect:

The personal information that you are asked to provide, and the reasons why you are asked to provide it, will be made clear to you at the point we ask you to provide your personal information.
While using our Vmed App, an electronic assessment your personal health and vital statistics data will be taken. This data will provide you with information to assist you and your health professional(s) to determine your body’s current health status and allow you to view your health numbers. These health numbers include your temperature, blood oxygen level, blood pressure, heart rate, ECG (Electrocardiogram), breathing rate and may also include other measurements such as your blood sugar level.

This information is calculated and estimated by the Vmed and is designed to provide you with a snapshot of an overall body status of your health for you to assess.

If you contact us directly, we may receive additional information about you such as your name, email address, phone number, the contents of the message and/or attachments you may send us, and any other information you may choose to provide.

When you register for an Account we do ask you for your gender, age, weight, height and may ask if you are on a variety of medications that could influence the outcome of your body’s health numbers.  We may also ask for your contact information, including items such as name, company name, address, email address, and telephone number.

You may also set up an online personal username and password that will preserve your personal health data in the cloud at our server and that is only accessable by you using your username and password. Any sharing of that data is soley authorized by you and may be used to provide your personal health data to your health care professional(s) should you desire to provide it to them.

How We Use Your Information:

We use the information we collect in various ways, including to:

  • Provide, operate, and maintain our website and for your health care use
  • Improve, personalize, and expand our Vmed app or website
  • Understand and analyze how you use our app and/or website
  • Develop new products, services, features, and functionality
  • Communicate with you, either directly or through one of our partners, including for customer service, to provide you with updates and other information relating to the app or website, and for marketing and promotional purposes
  • Send you emails
  • Send you relative personal healthcare data
  • Find and prevent
  • Log Files

Vmedical follows a standard procedure of using log files. These files log visitors when they visit websites or their apps. All hosting companies do this and a part of hosting services’ analytics. The information collected by log files include internet protocol (IP) addresses, browser type, Internet Service Provider (ISP), date and time stamp, referring/exit pages, and possibly the number of clicks. These are not linked to any information that is personally identifiable. The purpose of the information is for analyzing trends, administering the site, tracking users’ movement on the website, and gathering demographic information.

Advertising Partners Privacy Policies:

You may consult this list to find the Privacy Policy for each of the advertising partners of Vmedical.
Third-party ad servers or ad networks uses technologies like cookies, JavaScript, or Web Beacons that are used in their respective advertisements and links that appear on Vmedical, which are sent directly to users’ browser. They automatically receive your IP address when this occurs. These technologies are used to measure the effectiveness of their advertising campaigns and/or to personalize the advertising content that you see on websites that you visit.

Note that Vmedical has no access to or control over these cookies that are used by third-party advertisers.

Third Party Privacy Policies:

Vmedical’s Privacy Policy does not apply to other advertisers or websites. Thus, we are advising you to consult the respective Privacy Policies of these third-party ad servers for more detailed information. It may include their practices and instructions about how to opt-out of certain options.

You can choose to disable cookies through your individual browser options. To know more detailed information about cookie management with specific web browsers, it can be found at the browsers’ respective websites.

CCPA Privacy Rights (Do Not Sell My Personal Information):

Under the CCPA, among other rights, California consumers have the right to:

  • Request that a business that collects a consumer’s personal data disclose the categories and specific pieces of personal data that a business has collected about consumers.
  • Request that a business delete any personal data about the consumer that a business has collected.
  • Request that a business that sells a consumer’s personal data, not sell the consumer’s personal data.

If you make a request, we have one month to respond to you. If you would like to exercise any of these rights, please contact us.

Please note that none of your personal health data will be sold or provided to any third party. It is only for your personal use.

Vmedical adheres to all HIPPA regulations. This does not mean that your data will not be provided to any third party party associate in an aggregate form that would not include your name or other personal identifying characteristics. The use of such aggregated data would be for the providing of additional information to you as a potential benefit to you individually.It is your insurance.

GDPR Data Protection Rights:

We would like to make sure you are fully aware of all of your data protection rights. Every user is entitled to the following:

  • The right to access – You have the right to request copies of your personal data. We may charge you a small fee for this service.
  • The right to rectification – You have the right to request that we correct any information you believe is inaccurate. You also have the right to request that we complete the information you believe is incomplete.
  • The right to erasure – You have the right to request that we erase your personal data, under certain conditions.
  • The right to restrict processing – You have the right to request that we restrict the processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.
  • The right to object to processing – You have the right to object to our processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.
  • The right to data portability – You have the right to request that we transfer the data that we have collected to another organization, or directly to you, under certain conditions.

If you make a request, we have one month to respond to you. If you would like to exercise any of these rights, please contact us.

Children’s Information:

Another part of our priority is adding protection for children while using the internet. We encourage parents and guardians to observe, participate in, and/or monitor and guide their online activity.

Vmedical does not knowingly collect any Personal Identifiable Information from children under the age of 13. If you think that your child provided this kind of information on our Vmed app or website, we strongly encourage you to contact us immediately and we will do our best efforts to promptly remove such information from our records.

story:
The Tola Library is a free computer use and training service for the residents of Limon-Dos, Nicaragua and the surrounding region.  The Limon-Dos (Tola) is a local school of 108 students and the adjacent library serves the greater community.   Many people come from quite a distance for the opportunity of using their first computer, a skill the can then market for a job in one of the major cities.  Even with no Internet, the kids simply loved the old iMacs and the training we gave to them.

With the help of your donation, we intend to buy 10 used computers from the Universidad Americana in Managua, install all open-source programs - Linux OS, Libreoffice, graphics, social media, games, training in typing, English/Spanish, Math, and computer maintenance programs for long-distance maintenance in both Spanish and English.   This is a zero-cost and zero program update cost for the project, an important consideration for sustainability.

Here’s our cost estimate:

10 used computers @ $85/PC = $850
10 DVD’s with all the programs listed above, one for each computer = $450
Clean, refurbish, load and configure each computer @ 25/computer = $250
Rent van, gas, travel from Managua to Tola = $225
3 University students to replace computers, train teaching staff, remove old computers @ $25/day, for two days = $150
Two hotel rooms for 2 nights @$30/night for 3 students = $60 (share rooms)
Food for 4 days (includes preparation, return journey, and disposal of old computers) for 3 students, @ $20/day = $240
Internet service for 2 months for 4 computers @ $20/month = $160
Computer maintenance for 6 months @$20/month = $120

Sub-total = $2,505

Indiego, transfer and bank fees,  12% = $300
Shipping & handling of DVD’s & USB sticks to Nicaragua = $45

Total cost = $2,850

We intend to remove and recycle the iMacs that were installed by our partner organization (INNERChange Works) and replace them with locally sourced PCs running Ubuntu.  Software and Hardware configuration will be handled by local nationals (furthering the education of many) and provide basic software and computer training with these machines.

Many other challenges exist and were identified by an exploratory committee sent by Colorado Technical University doctoral candidates. (Elson et al., 2012).  To view this report, go to http://www.editlib.org/p/40946

 

Team

INNERChange Works.  http://www.innerchangeworks.org/
Janet Forester, President
janetjfoerster@gmail.com

They will manage the project, to include collect all donations and ensure program funds are spend in accordance with the above plan.

Universidad Americana in Managua.  http://www.uam.edu.ni/
Raquel Hurtado
Resp. De Educación Continua de Ingeniería
Tel +505 2278-3800 ext.5415/5334
raquel.hurtado@uam.edu.ni

They have the old computers, the lab, and the students who will re-furbish the computers, install software, configure, transport to Tola Region, install, train, and dispose of old computers.

Vincent and Anthony Barbera.

Vincent is a researcher at Colorado Technical University in Computer Science, and has visited the Tola region last year to initiate the Tola School and Library project in Limon-Dos in conjunction with INNERChange Works. 

Anthony is a computer technician, son of Vincent Barbera, who is tasked to source all the operating system and drivers, programs, and specifications for all of the computers to include a distant maintenance program over the Internet for the University students.

Questions, contact either of us at barbera.vincent@gmail.com or barbera.anthony@gmail.com

With the help of your donation, we intend to buy 10 used computers from the Universidad Americana in Managua, install all open-source programs - Linux OS, Libreoffice, graphics, social media, games, training in typing, English/Spanish, Math, and computer maintenance programs for long-distance maintenance in both Spanish and English.   This is a zero-cost and zero program update cost for the project, an important consideration for sustainability.
Here’s our cost estimate:
10 used computers @ $85/PC = $85010 DVD’s with all the programs listed above, one for each computer = $450Clean, refurbish, load and configure each computer @ 25/computer = $250Rent van, gas, travel from Managua to Tola = $2253 University students to replace computers, train teaching staff, remove old computers @ $25/day, for two days = $150Two hotel rooms for 2 nights @$30/night for 3 students = $60 (share rooms)Food for 4 days (includes preparation, return journey, and disposal of old computers) for 3 students, @ $20/day = $240Internet service for 2 months for 4 computers @ $20/month = $160Computer maintenance for 6 months @$20/month = $120
Sub-total = $2,505
Indiego, transfer and bank fees,  12% = $300Shipping & handling of DVD’s & USB sticks to Nicaragua = $45
Total cost = $2,850
We intend to remove and recycle the iMacs that were installed by our partner organization (INNERChange Works) and replace them with locally sourced PCs running Ubuntu.  Software and Hardware configuration will be handled by local nationals (furthering the education of many) and provide basic software and computer training with these machines.
Many other challenges exist and were identified by an exploratory committee sent by Colorado Technical University doctoral candidates. (Elson et al., 2012).  To view this report, go to http://www.editlib.org/p/40946
 
Team
INNERChange Works.  http://www.innerchangeworks.org/Janet Forester, Presidentjanetjfoerster@gmail.com
They will manage the project, to include collect all donations and ensure program funds are spend in accordance with the above plan.
Universidad Americana in Managua.  http://www.uam.edu.ni/Raquel HurtadoResp. De Educación Continua de IngenieríaTel +505 2278-3800 ext.5415/5334raquel.hurtado@uam.edu.ni
They have the old computers, the lab, and the students who will re-furbish the computers, install software, configure, transport to Tola Region, install, train, and dispose of old computers.
Vincent and Anthony Barbera.
Vincent is a researcher at Colorado Technical University in Computer Science, and has visited the Tola region last year to initiate the Tola School and Library project in Limon-Dos in conjunction with INNERChange Works. 
Anthony is a computer technician, son of Vincent Barbera, who is tasked to source all the operating system and drivers, programs, and specifications for all of the computers to include a distant maintenance program over the Internet for the University students.
Questions, contact either of us at barbera.vincent@gmail.com or barbera.anthony@gmail.com

story:
Why Pipes?

Pipes is the language that teaches programming.  Pipes is the language that you learn before you learn:

Programming is big business.  We know that.  But did you know that:

  • Enrolment in software courses will increase by 29% this year.
  • Software Development student enrolment would need to triple just to meet current job demand in the United States alone.
  • And still there is no suitable way to learn programming! (watch Why Pipes?)

After two years of research, we are confident we have discovered the missing link.  As passionate educators we are desperate to introduce the world to Pipes.  We are looking for $32200 (Fixed Funding, if we don't reach our goal, you are refunded  ) to take our prototype from a "Proof of Concept" to a complete, full-on, web-application for all to use.  


What We Need & What You Get



So we need a few things to make Pipes a reality. What are they?

  • We need funds for technology infrastructure.  We need to pay for our first year of "Infrastructure as a Service" or IaaS (Login services, Content Distribution Networks, Hosting Costs).
  • We need to pay administrative costs (Creating an educational tool involves lots of third party work - Design, Legal, Education Board Comms)
  • Technology costs - At this point we need to purchase over $2000 in computer supplies - hey developers need the right gear!
  • Oh and we're going to buy a nice chair for the office - we need one!

What we're not asking for? Wages, rent, op-ex, business costs, etc.  We are just funding what we need to get our project done.  Our team is working for free, our office is covered and our business costs are our responsibility.  So what do you get?



First off, you get Pipes.  Unless you are contributing to our "Virtual High Five!!!!!" package, you will get access to Pipes (see the Perks section for details).  At fees less than our post-launch offers you will have access to Pipes (Maybe even lifetime access :D ).  In addition we are offering sticker packs, for you to show your support for Pipes.  We are also offering a funky TShirt with our prototype logo on the front.  For those wanting to contribute a bit more, we are going to develop a simple android app with your picture in it.  That's right, you, Pipes related items and simple gaming fun.  Show your ultimate support with your own personal Android App.


Finally, for most packages we are listing your name right on our website.  We know that Pipes is going to make quite an impact and now you can get your name listed as someone who helped make that happen.  For three very special individuals (or companies) we are going to place your name as a Pipes Backer right on our Splash screen.  Each time Pipes is run, we'll see your name.


The Impact

It is easy to see how Pipes is a force for good.  Google promised to do no evil.  Pipes wants to do only good.  We have decided to benefit students.  In a world which demands technology jobs, we feel it is our job (not just our desire) to make programming available to everyone.  No longer is a career in development only available to the privileged or the fortunate, we are here to make our new technology landscape open to all.

  • Pipes isn't about making technology available to all, it is about making the opportunities within technology available for all.
  • Pipes is the only programming teaching tool that does not require instruction from someone with a computer science degree.
  • 98% of Computer Science students have sought out independent study prior to formal education.   Pipes makes independent study possible for all, allowing more people a leg up in college enrolment.
  • Our research shows that Pipes is peerless.  We want to take this tool and revolutionise the way programming is taught.  This is a one time opportunity to be a part of real change.
  • Pipes is the only suite to directly teach foundational programming techniques (modules)



Other Ways You Can Help

We want you to contribute.  Our needs are real; as we have shown above.  But if you can't contribute, or if you have already contributed, here are some ways you can help:

  • Make some noise (Pipe up!).  The more people that hear about our campaign, the better.  Send a link to this page to all of your friends.
  • Get in touch with us!  If you have any ideas for our fundraising campaign, we want to hear about.  Have contacts?  Have institutional connections? Drop us a line.

And remember, if 5 or more of your friends contribute to Pipes (excluding High Five), we'll send you our "Pipe Dream Team" pack.  One super special "Pipe Dream Team" Shirt, our sticker pack and a special mention on our website as a "Pipe Dream Team" member! Oooooo....Exclusive!



Legal Info

Pipes has two patent applications for didactic software components.  We have begun the process of filing design patents in the US and registering the design in the UK.  Prior art has been establish back to 2011.






Bonus Goal!!!!

If we reach our $32,200 goal we're going to add this awesome bonus feature to Pipes.  We are going to add 4 modules and one free-from coding option to allow output of code to C++ for Arduino projects.  That's right, a set of Arduino functions will be programmable using Pipes' visual syntax.  Pipes to C++ to Arduino if we reach $32,200

story:
Our product for working with touchscreen gadgets in low temperature conditions.

 

The group of young scientists “IFactory” is developing a new innovative product for working with modern gadgets.

Hands are the main working tool of a person, and even a slight disturbance of their functioning can cause significant consequences for any person.

Consequences of hands hypothermia can lead to chronic diseases such as Raynaud's disease, polyneuropathy, hyperkeratosis and all kinds of arthritis. Severe hands cold can cause inflammation of the joints, manifested by pain as they move.

To solve the problem of hands hypothermia while working with modern gadgets, we have developed an innovative product WarmTouch.

The product is a self-adhesive stickers, coated with an innovative composition. Stickers are placed on any surface and in contact with the smartphone's touchscreen cause its reaction. Stickers can be placed, for example, on the fingertips of any kind of gloves used to warm hands.

We ask backers to support the first product batch manufacturing. The contract with the chemical company (producing the composition according to our technology requirements) needs an investment for the first production.

The public benefit of the project will be:

lowering people's diseases caused by hands hypothermia;

the creation of additional industrial facilities and jobs (our production will be implemented in the United States).

Difficulties in the implementation of the project are associated with the problem of entering a new product on the market. The lack of customs demand at the first stage of the project will be due to the limited advertising budget. We will solve this problem by using such modern means of communication as social networks in an advertising campaign. We believe that social networks will help promote such a healthy and necessary product for all people who live permanently or travel to regions of the planet with a cold climate.

We appeal to everyone who is ready to support our project with a request to place links to this page on their social networks.

Together we will warm the hands of millions!

 

"Ifactory" Group

story:
Ez Hold is World's 1st Compact, Self-Adjustable Mobile holder. It is durable and as the name says it is portable.

EZ Hold is perfectly designed to hold Smart Devices like Mobiles, Phablets and Kindles.


You can have your device placed in Portrait & Landscape Position with EZ Hold.

The advantage of EZ Hold is, its Self-Adjustment Technique, that helps it to hold any smart phones.

Position your device conveniently with EZ HOLD.


Ez Hold is first of its kind in mobile holders  which is compact and portable.


Ez Hold is designed to relieve end users from discomforts in holding their devices. Form factor of Ez Hold combined with its carry anywhere design is its major advantage and attracts mobile users to use it.

Use Cases of Ez Hold : 

Video Streaming

Social Networking

Video calling.

Adds Comfort while you are Multi tasking

Ez Hold lets you charge your device while you are streaming a video or listening to music or when you are over a Video Call or when you are on Social Networking.

The Advantages of using this Ez Hold is 

  1. Gives you a Hands Free experience.
  2. Reduces Strain while handling smart phones.
  3. Reduces the effect of harmful radiation.
  4. Makes multi-tasking easy.

One Holder Many advantages.

A Must Have product.

Ez hold is designed for everyone, lets you experience convenience while handling smart phones.

Help us - Spread the word to your family and friends. We are sure that, they will be benefited by Ez Hold.

Look at some illustrations below.

AT HOME

You can use Ez Hold to make your mobile stand while you are cooking your recipe.It helps you feed your kids, while they are watching their favorite videos.

Ez Hold lets you Enjoy Music, Movie and other Entertainment sitting at any corner in your home

AT OFFICE

Let Ez Hold take the strain of holding your device while you are at office or in meetings. Ez Hold lets you manage your device with One Touch. Place Video calls or Voice Calls with a single touch. Enables a comfortable multi-tasking experience.

 

RADIATION FREE

By using Ez Hold you can keep mobiles at a fair distance and answer your video/voice calls.

TRAVELLERS

Most of the times journey can be boring and frustrating. Ez Hold helps you fill this gap by letting you watch videos or have fun on the social network.

Fix Ez Hold to your Smart Phone -  watch a movie, stream videos, go Social to make your journey interesting and fun.


KINDLE USERS

Ez Hold is best answer for your kindle reading experience. It holds your device and gives you a stress free reading experience.

Enjoy your favorite videos or memorable videos among your friends and family with Ez Hold


Buy it, to Believe and Experience Ez Hold for $8

  1. High Quality Plastic
  2. Self Adjustment Technique
  3. Compact Design
  4. Aluminum Carabineer
  5. Anti Skid Pad
  6. 90 Degree Locking

Two Versions of Ez Hold

Ez hold is designed in two versions for customer convenience.

Version one: Supports mobile devices with thickness 4.5 mm to 7.5 mm

Version two: Supports mobile devices with thickness 7.5 mm to 11.5 mm

Pricing is same for both the Versions.

Ez Hold comes in 6 color variants, with color code. 

White 01, Blue 02, Pink 03, Gold 04, yellow 05, Green 06.  

While placing your orders,please mention your Mobile Brand ,Model number and color code. so that we can send a suitable Ez Hold Version for you. 

We are proud to say that there is no comparison for our product in its design.

JOURNEY OF DESIGNING Ez Hold

Our journey in designing Ez Hold started in December 2014.

Having experienced discomfort while using mobiles and feeling the need of having a utility that hold mobile devices, we have come up with Ez Hold. Our experience in Engineering and Rubber industries helped us to design and build Ez Hold.

In March 2015, first Design was completed, after working for many days. And by April 2015 our first Prototype was ready. We have achieved success in our first step and started to re-design to fine tune the way the device stands.

During May 2015, after making changes to the earlier design, we made a second prototype to finalize the size, design and outer look of Ez Hold. This has given us confidence that, we can now work for a more refined product.

June 2015 was the time when we tested our first self-adjustment technique of this holder. We finalized this technique right after the first trial and got the rubber designed for self adjustment. This is where we achieved a major milestone in materializing the design into a product.

July 2015 was when we decided the product should have a 90 degree locking position for a better hold of a mobile device. 

September 2015, saw the completion of a completely designed product and that is how the device got its name Ez Hold. We decided to enhance Ez Hold by adding an Aluminum Caribiner for easy carrying.

A Look at Ez Hold prototypes after 3D Printing

In October 2015 We started promotions, in that process we made videos exhibiting Uses and Advantages of Ez Hold. We successfully Completed trials with various devices and few surveys to check how the response would be. And we were glad to see a very positive response.

All the PrePromotional activities were completed by November 2015, including our website www.ezhold.in

Now We are ready to Promote and Launch Ez Hold through 

Indiegogo campaign in December 2015.

Starting Massive production and shipment in January & February 2016.

We are ready with a very useful product, designed based on an individual's everyday requirement.

Now, its time for you to join our journey, as a most valuable customer. 

OUR TEAM

Ez Hold has two core Team Members

G.V.Krishna

He is an MBA Graduate and has 11 years of Experience in Engineering Industry, 4 years Experience in rubber industries and has handled various roles in other manufacturing industries. His experience has helped him achieve a Prefect design and bring all his industrial experiences into the designing and making of Ez Hold

Bussa Pavan Kumar

Having Mastered Business Administration in Ireland, Pavan carries Core Experience in Technology and Marketing, and understands requirements of People from Globe which helped to launch Ez Hold globally.

Where will your pledge go? 


Risks and Challenges

Ez Hold has been designed Without Electronics which is free from repairs .

High Quality Plastic, makes Ez Hold durable.

Self-Adjustment Technique enables Ez Hold to hold a device as per user's convenience.

Specialized Rubber material  used in Ez Hold ensures it doesn't leave any Marks or Scratches on your mobiles while you use Ez Hold. 

An aluminum carabiner  has been added for  portability.

We appointed Skilled and Experienced Personnel  available in the industry place to give our customers a High Quality Product.

We are proud to say that Ez Hold has been designed by Indian and has been Manufactured in India.

This helped us deliver a Quality product with appropriate testing at every stage.

We are absolutely confident that we can ship Ez Hold on promised time.

We understand that risks are always associated while launching a brand or a 

new Product into the market.

We have identified the areas of risk and We are confident that Risk has been reduced to minimal.

We already have a complete functional product in our hand and we just need bring this into mass production.

We believe in a transparent project management approach and we have decided to inform all our backers on a regular basis about the progress made during the production phase.

FAQs

1. Does Ez Hold support my Smart Phone?

Yes, It supports most of Smart phones.

Testing has been done on Apple, Samsung, Sony, htc, mi, OnePlus and many other models available globally.

This is possible because, mobile thickness will be varying from 4.5 mm to 11mm.

We have takes this into consideration while designing Ez Hold and used our Self-Adjustment Technique for this regard

2. Is self adjustment technique durable? 

Yes it will be durable. We have used high quality rubber material  that makes Ez Hold durable.

3. Can I use Ez Hold anywere ?

Ez Hold fits any mobile and you can use it any where,All you need is a flat surface to make it stand.

4. Can I carry my Ez Hold with me while traveling ?

Ez Hold is compact in size and it occupies very little space in your bag . Carry anywhere.

5. What about maintenance Ez Hold? 

No Electronics have been involved in its design so there is no chance of repair and maintenance.

6. Ez Hold Leaves any marks on screen?

Specialized rubber material has been used in the manufacturing of Ez Hold.

This rubber material ensures no marks are left.

For any enquiries or unanswered questions, please drop in a mail to info@ezhold.in

We will get back to you earliest possible .

In March 2015, first Design was completed, after working for many days. And by April 2015 our first Prototype was ready. We have achieved success in our first step and started to re-design to fine tune the way the device stands.
During May 2015, after making changes to the earlier design, we made a second prototype to finalize the size, design and outer look of Ez Hold. This has given us confidence that, we can now work for a more refined product.
June 2015 was the time when we tested our first self-adjustment technique of this holder. We finalized this technique right after the first trial and got the rubber designed for self adjustment. This is where we achieved a major milestone in materializing the design into a product.
July 2015 was when we decided the product should have a 90 degree locking position for a better hold of a mobile device. 
September 2015, saw the completion of a completely designed product and that is how the device got its name Ez Hold. We decided to enhance Ez Hold by adding an Aluminum Caribiner for easy carrying.
A Look at Ez Hold prototypes after 3D Printing



In October 2015 We started promotions, in that process we made videos exhibiting Uses and Advantages of Ez Hold. We successfully Completed trials with various devices and few surveys to check how the response would be. And we were glad to see a very positive response.

All the PrePromotional activities were completed by November 2015, including our website www.ezhold.in

Now We are ready to Promote and Launch Ez Hold through 
Indiegogo campaign in December 2015.
Starting Massive production and shipment in January & February 2016.
We are ready with a very useful product, designed based on an individual's everyday requirement.
Now, its time for you to join our journey, as a most valuable customer. 
OUR TEAM
Ez Hold has two core Team Members
G.V.Krishna
He is an MBA Graduate and has 11 years of Experience in Engineering Industry, 4 years Experience in rubber industries and has handled various roles in other manufacturing industries. His experience has helped him achieve a Prefect design and bring all his industrial experiences into the designing and making of Ez Hold

Bussa Pavan Kumar


Having Mastered Business Administration in Ireland, Pavan carries Core Experience in Technology and Marketing, and understands requirements of People from Globe which helped to launch Ez Hold globally.
Where will your pledge go? 




Risks and Challenges

Ez Hold has been designed Without Electronics which is free from repairs .

High Quality Plastic, makes Ez Hold durable.

Self-Adjustment Technique enables Ez Hold to hold a device as per user's convenience.
Specialized Rubber material  used in Ez Hold ensures it doesn't leave any Marks or Scratches on your mobiles while you use Ez Hold. 

An aluminum carabiner  has been added for  portability. 
We appointed Skilled and Experienced Personnel  available in the industry place to give our customers a High Quality Product.

We are proud to say that Ez Hold has been designed by Indian and has been Manufactured in India.
This helped us deliver a Quality product with appropriate testing at every stage.

We are absolutely confident that we can ship Ez Hold on promised time. 
We understand that risks are always associated while launching a brand or a 
new Product into the market.
We have identified the areas of risk and We are confident that Risk has been reduced to minimal.
We already have a complete functional product in our hand and we just need bring this into mass production.

We believe in a transparent project management approach and we have decided to inform all our backers on a regular basis about the progress made during the production phase.
FAQs

1. Does Ez Hold support my Smart Phone?
Yes, It supports most of Smart phones.
Testing has been done on Apple, Samsung, Sony, htc, mi, OnePlus and many other models available globally.
This is possible because, mobile thickness will be varying from 4.5 mm to 11mm.
We have takes this into consideration while designing Ez Hold and used our Self-Adjustment Technique for this regard

2. Is self adjustment technique durable? 
Yes it will be durable. We have used high quality rubber material  that makes Ez Hold durable.

3. Can I use Ez Hold anywere ?
Ez Hold fits any mobile and you can use it any where,All you need is a flat surface to make it stand. 

4. Can I carry my Ez Hold with me while traveling ?
Ez Hold is compact in size and it occupies very little space in your bag . Carry anywhere.

5. What about maintenance Ez Hold? 
No Electronics have been involved in its design so there is no chance of repair and maintenance.

6. Ez Hold Leaves any marks on screen?
Specialized rubber material has been used in the manufacturing of Ez Hold.
This rubber material ensures no marks are left.

For any enquiries or unanswered questions, please drop in a mail to info@ezhold.in 
We will get back to you earliest possible .

story:
Short Summary

NeuroChat is a text messaging application that will make both men and women better at understanding relationships. NeuroChat has many components:

  • NeuroChat is a text messaging app that can connect to any user even if they are not a user of NeuroChat.
  • NeuroChat will use word analysis to create a personality profile for both people involved in the chat conversation. NeuroChat offers a 3rd party view on who you are talking about.
  • NeuroChat sends daily excerpts of psychology from experts explaining why woman behave a certain way and why men behave a certain way. This is all an effort to better understand each other and develop meaningful relationships.
  • NeuroChat allows users to disable their ability to contact a new phone number from someone they have just met for a pre-determined set of days in order to not be clingy or desperate (users can also select to disable the feature for each person).


What We Need & What You Get


  • I'm interested in making today's world of dating more personable through knowledge of our instinctual habits and what has been imprinted in our DNA.
  • I need 10K to fund app development.


The Impact

  •  Donations will move us towards app development which we know is plausible.
  • Donations will create more understanding from both sexes towards each other.
  • With technology people are becoming dehumanized. I hope to use technology to reverse that as technology is here to stay.


Risks & Challenges

 

  • Once the app is created marketing will be the obvious challenge. I plan to allow dating site access to the application to spread the word.

NeuroChat sends daily excerpts of psychology from experts explaining why woman behave a certain way and why men behave a certain way. This is all an effort to better understand each other and develop meaningful relationships. 
NeuroChat allows users to disable their ability to contact a new phone number from someone they have just met for a pre-determined set of days in order to not be clingy or desperate (users can also select to disable the feature for each person).
