story:
TOCA

Have you ever thought that our devices could have a negative effect on our lives? 
We have been asking this question and decided to develop a product that can protect you in many ways. Find yours.

FEATURES:

 

This is possible because TOCA is coated with a metal fabric inside:

POCKETS:

 

Use the Online Pocket to protect your body while being reachable, or the Faraday Pocket to be fully disconnected. 

 

ROLL IT UP:

We are the only FLEXIBLE FARADAY CAGE in the market.

Health starts with awareness

Stay informed with articles and studies related to the use of your smartphone:

 

 

Radiation:

- Smartphone radiation can lead to fertility damages. 

- Your phone shouldn´t be in direct contact with your skin.  Read the instructions in the manual of your phone.

- Smartphone radiation can also contribute to insomnia. 

Distraction:

TOCA won´t let your phone distract you! 

Once you place your phone inside of the Faraday Pocket, you'll be present in the moment, focused on what truly matters, and you'll be able to choose when you want to use your device.

- Distracted driving is one of the main reasons for car accidents. 

- Smartphone apps make us addicted! 

Privacy: (intrusion)

Most people don't know - even on airplane mode, your GPS location is still easily trackable. When you put your phone inside of TOCA, the electromagnetic signals are blocked, which ensures your safety from any third-party intrusion.

In the age of big data, corporations are buying, analyzing, and selling our location information for marketing purposes. With TOCA you neutralize yourself from appearing in these transactions.  

- When GPS tracking Violates Privacy Rights.

- How companies are selling your data, even to yourself.

- If you have a "keyless ignition,” your key can be easily copied. Placing the key in the Faraday Pocket will prevent this from happening. 

FAQs:

What is a Faraday Pocket? 

The Faraday Pocket is made of a textile technology (EMF blocker) named after an experiment called Faraday Cage. In 1836, English scientist Michael Faraday demonstrated that it is possible to block electromagnetic fields by coating a cage in metal foil. He then discharged a high voltage signal from an electrostatic generator on the outside of the cage. With an electroscope, he measured that there was no electric charge present inside.

Ok. And why do I need a Faraday Pocket? 

Our Faraday Pocket protects you from radiation up to 99%. 

Activating Airplane mode is not enough:

When activating airplane mode, your phone is just not sending information to the server anymore, but is still receiving. You are being tracked by GPS, for example.

Turning off your phone is not enough:

Even when you turn off your phone, it can still send and receive information. For example: in a recent BBC interview, Edward Snowden talks about Dreamy Smurf. This technology is capable of “turning your phone on and off without you knowing.”

A Faraday Cage will never guarantee 100% of blockage:

It always depends on the strength, frequency, and distance between the receiver and the transmitter. The same works for the Faraday Pocket of TOCA. Depending on where you are in the city and which kind of antenna(s) you are connected with, the signal can be stronger than the blockage level* of the metal fabric.

Will my phone fit?

Most likely yes. There will be two different sleeve sizes, one for the smaller and one for the bigger phones. We will ask you about your phone size once the campaign succeeds. The following extremely large devices won´t fit inside the TOCA sleeve:

 - Samsung Galaxy Tab A 7.0;

- Huawei Honor Note 8;

- Sony Xperia Z Ultra; Sony Tablet P 3G;

- LG Optimus L3 E400; HTC Nexus 9;

- Samsung Galaxy C9 Pro or any bigger than (165mm x 82mm).

 Our suggestion so far: 

To have a real offline experience with your smartphone - besides taking the battery out - we suggest you activate the Airplane Mode, put inside the Faraday Pocket of your TOCA and fold twice until the magnets closed it. In this way, the smartphone not only stops sending information but also stops receiving information, because the metal fabric blocks* the signals coming from the antennas around you.

If our project grows, we want to be able to invest in our own researchers to give you more detailed information about this kind of subject.

Thanks for your support!

Toca Team!

Delivery Timeframes:

Orders will begin shipping in December via a fully tracked door-to-door service.

story:
What is scopePi50M?


scopePi50M is a USB oscilloscope for signal up to 50MHz bandwidth.
It is especially useful for circuit analysis, including FFT transform.
the project is fully open source. It means that each backer will receive all information about project, including software. 


What can you do with scopePi50M?

* Analyze signals with 20nS time resolution up to 500V;

* Analyze frequency, harmonic and distortions with Fast Fourier Transform;

* Decodes ModBus, RS485 and RS422 signals;

* Sniffer for CAN protocol;

* Compare signals;

* Measure time, voltage, rise and fall time, frequency and more;

* Memorize signals;

* Analyze digital signals;

* etc

Specifications

The goal is a low-cost equipment but with high performance to be used by students and professionals.

The main features of scopePi50M are:

USB port oscilloscope;

Number of Channels : 2 input channels + 1 external trigger channel;

Input Impedance: 1 M ohms;

scopePi20M sampling rate: 40 Msamples/s;

scopePi50M sampling rate: 100 Msamples/s;

Vertical resolution : 8 bits;

Analog channel bandwidth : 50 MHz;

Trigger modes: auto , normal and single, with level adjustment;

Voltage and time cursors;

AC and DC coupling;

FFT function for frequency analysis;


How it Works?

The scopePi50M works connected to the USB port of a PC , tablet or notebook and do not need extra power since it is powered by the USB port itself . This feature is excellent for field measurements such as signal check on vehicles or in any other place where we have no power supply.Another feature is the possibility of store the measured waveform and subsequently being able to use the results in reports. Connect to your PC, tablet, IPhone or Android:




Compatibility

ScopePi20M and scopePi50M are compatible with Windows, Android and IOS.
 The dates for versions release are:
Windows: April/16;
Android: May/16;
IOS: June/16;
The hardware is the same for three versions!



Time and Frequency Domains

The scopePi50M comes with  FFT function. This powerful feature is typically only found in high-end equipment and allows the signal decomposition into its harmonics .

The FFT allows, among other measurements verify distortion signals in amplifiers , predictive maintenance by vibration analysis , intermodulation distortion , analysis of electrical noise , etc



Special Digital Functions

ScopePi50M comes with Special Digital Functions allowing useful measurements like decoding serial communications protocol, including RS232, RS485, RS422, CAN and others.

What We Need & What You Get

  • The funds will be used to buy the material to initial units, acessories to serial production, including stencil, SMD assembly program and PCB soldering supports.
  • scopePi50M has unique functions that normally are present in high-end equipments. The interface is open source, allowing customization!


A Valuable Equipment

ScopePi50M help you to analyse your circuits with precision and powerful functions.

The scope is powered directly by USB port, greatly easing field mesurements. Furthermore all waveforms can be stored on the computer, enabling the issue of future reports.

Another amazing feature of scopepi50m are fully upgradable firmware and software. Simply connect the scope to the USB port and the computer to the web and download the update from scopePi50M page!

The first building operating system (bOS) for your home

ComfortClick bOS is the first building operating system that features building automation plugins market - ComfortClick Bridge.  ComfortClick bOS is the easiest way to set-up a smart home. Select your supported devices from our growing device library in the ComfortClick Bridge plugins market and control everything in your home from a single app on your favorite mobile device.

Try bOS (User name: User, Password: Pass)


What is ComfortClick bOS? 



1. The first building operating system

Over the years we have watched the number of home devices increasing almost exponentially. However these devices are operating independently. You have to get a separate app for each device, meaning different user experience each time. Now imagine the future, if this trend continues – you’ll have to switch between 20 or even 50 different apps in order to control your home and still, these apps won’t work together. This doesn’t sound like the future form the Sci-Fi movies. The solution is one universal platform, one operating system, where all devices are working together, in short ComfortClick bOS – the first building operating system.


2. One app to rule them all

With ComfortClick bOS there is no need for switching between apps to control various devices. Our refined and stylish GUI ensures a unique user experience that makes control of your environment simple, intuitive and fun.

We speak a lot of languages and are eager to learn more. Choose between a range of supported devices, systems, standards and manufacturers. Our plugins library keeps growing rapidly and with the help of our 3rd party developer community we plan to speed-up the process. The library already features an array of supported devices  and protocols to choose from (KNX, Modbus, S BUS, etc.). We really mean it when we say you’ll be able to control and monitor any electronic device in your environment via one app from virtually any location.


3. The first home automation plugins market  - ComfortClick Bridge

ComfortClick Bridge

ComfortClick bOS is the first building automation platform to feature a plugins market – ComfortClick Bridge, where you’ll be able to get plugins for your home devices. ComfortClick Bridge is a device ready one-stop-shop. It makes smart device set-up and configuration as simple as plug-and-play.


4. Use it with any mobile device

Choose your favorite smart phone or tablet to control your system. If you’re an Apple fan use iOS application and if you prefer Android use the Android app. The same GUI fits all controlling devices and gives you the same user experience on every platform.


5. Developer community

We are aware one single company can never cover all the devices that are out there. We’ll offer a playground for 3rd party developer community and give the developers a chance to earn money for their work by selling their plugins in ComfortClick Bridge.

Example: integrate your existing Arduino project into bOS and use the advanced logic that ComfortClick bOS offers (schedules, scenes, etc.).

6. No monthly fees

No monthly fees. Pay only for what you need. ComfortClick doesn’t charge a monthly fee, you pay only for devices you want to control. Upgrade or downgrade your existing configuration whenever you want.
 

Many, many practical applications

One universal platform where all devices are working together offers a limitless number of different features. Below are just a few examples:


bOS helps you reduce your energy consumption up to 30 %

ComfortClick bOS enables you to save energy and reduce the carbon footprint of your home by:
  • Automating various everyday tasks, (e.g. when you leave home bOS will turn off the lights, electrical sockets and the reduce the heating)
  • Monitoring energy consumption.  Accurate information on how much electricity, water or gas gets consumed at any given time leads to energy efficient habits.

Control all devices in your home

Heating / cooling / air-conditioning

Alarm

Energy consumption monitoring

Lighting

Audio / video

Irrigation


Try bOS (User name: User, Password: Pass)

ComfortClick bOS can be used also for commercial buildings (hotels, office buildings, etc.)

We think big – hotels, office buildings, hospitals, etc. We don’t want to limit ourselves to only residential buildings. Automation system offers numerous benefits also for commercial buildings such as office buildings, hotels and hospitals. Imagine coming into a hotel, you already have ComfortClick bOS on your phone, by entering hotel’s ComfortClick bOS username and password you’ll be able to control your room.

ComfortClick bOS for hotels

How it works?



  1. Install ComfortClick bOS on your computer or get a ComfortClick Hub with pre-installed bOS from us. We'll sent you ComfortClick Hub, if you get bOS & hub perk.
  2. Set-up a configuration of how you want to control your devices. The process is simple, intuitive and fun. Define multiple devices scenes, schedules, logical operations (if this, then that). Design your own GUI, use your own backgrounds, colors and icons or choose from our icons library and different skins. Upload your configuration and start enjoying the comfort of your smart home control.
  3. Simply add new devices whenever you want. No matter how many devices you’ll add to your ComfortClick bOS , you will still be able to control them all from just one application on your smartphone or tablet.


Developers corner - Have fun and earn some money on the way

Anyone who knows a little bit about programming can start developing plugins for ComfortClick bOS using the bOS software development kit (SDK). The bOS SDK provides a rich application framework that allows you to build plugins for any device, develop custom logical functions and user interface controls. The SDK is based on C# programming language for .NET and Mono framework. Development can be done in Microsoft Visual Studio or MonoDevelop environment. SDK includes examples to easily implement any communication protocol or to create additional logical functions. Plugins can use existing UI controls or include a custom user interface based on HTML5 and JavaScript.

 For some developers the final results is the prize by itself, but why not make some money on the way. After you’ll be done developing and testing your plugin, you’ll be able to submit it to the ComfortClick Bridge plugins library. We’ll review the driver and if it will be in compliance with our standards, will publish it. With each purchase of this driver you’ll be making money.

Big-players join us

As participants in developer community we see enthusiasts who will decide to develop plugins because they won’t be able to find it on the ComfortClick Bridge. We would also like to invite all hardware manufacturers to join our developer community and have ComfortClick bOS in mind when they’ll be launching their next great product.

Roll-out plan

We already have a fully functional software platform, which we have successfully implemented in building automation projects all over the globe. After Indiegogo campaign we’ll finalize ComfortClick Bridge, publish the SDK and offer the Linux version of ComfortClick software platform. We’ll also add a few new plugins (Z-Wave, Hue). By the end of 2014 we plan to expand ComfortClick Bridge plugins library with a number of new plugins  (ZigBee, Nest, Sonos, etc.).


Tech Specs

ComfortClick bOS Features

  • Enables comfortable and efficient building management.
  • Integrates different devices, protocols and systems and enables data exchange between them.
  • Executes logic operations and task.
  • Enables user access through mobile phones, tablets, PCs.
  • Supports multiple users with different access privileges and unlimited number of client devices.
  • Enables configuration with a powerful configuration environment.
  • Connects to ComfortClick Bridge for updates, plugin and remote support access.
  • Contains rich plugin library for communication with different protocols and devices (KNX/EIB, Modbus, DSC, Global Caché, IRTrans, XBMC, SMA Solar Technologies, IP video cameras etc.)
  • Contains logic operation and task library (logical operations, mathematical operations, data logging, schedules, scenes, timers, bit conversions)
  • Provides SDK for software developers.
  • Runs on Windows and Linux.

bOS Server

You can use bOS with your own hardware. Requirements:

  • Minimum: 400 MHz CPU, 512 MB RAM,
  • Recommended: 1.0 GHz or higher CPU, 512 MB or more RAM.
  • Up to 500 MB of hard disk space may be required.

Supported Architectures:

  • x86
  • x64
  • ARM

Supported Operating Systems:

  • Microsoft Windows XP, 7, 8 (with NET Framework).
  • Linux (with Mono Framework).

bOS Configurator

  • Configuration environment for project development.
  • Manage building configurations.
  • Create logic function.
  • Design your custom GUI, use your own backgrounds, icons, etc.

bOS Client applications

  • bOS Client for Windows.
  • bOS Client for Android.
  • bOS Client for iOS.
  • Web access:
  • Gecko browsers: Mozilla Firefox and others.
  • WebKit browsers: Safari (Mac and iOS), Android browser, Google Chrome, Palm webOS browser, Symbian S60 browser, and others.
  • Internet Explorer versions 10 and higher.
  • Other browsers supporting JavaScript and HTML5.

ComfortClick Hub Specs



ComfortClick Panel Specs


Perks

Try bOS (User name: User, Password: Pass)



Why we need your help?

Company ComfortClick (www.comfortclick.com) was founded in 2008. We are a system integrator and software developer operating in the area of building automation. By offering the complete spectrum of services related with building automation, we gained extensive know-how on home devices, systems and automation logic of a smart building. Our knowledge includes also market and business understanding of the industry. We are a member of the KNX organization (www.knx.org) which is the creator and owner of the KNX technology – the worldwide standard for all applications in home and building control.

Together with our partners we have successfully implemented ComfortClick software platform in projects all over the globe: EU, Russia, Qatar, Kazakhstan, India, Thailand, Malaysia, USA and Latin America.

Now we want to take our software platform one step further. We need to upgrade ComfortClick software so that you’ll be able to install it on any computer, develop ComfortClick Bridge with the cloud service and publish SDK. To do that we need to hire additional developers to finish production in the shortest possible time and provide for functionality and bug testing - both in our studio and live environment.

By introducing ComfortClick bOS with ComfortClick Bridge we’ll rewrite the concept of home automation. We’ll create an open platform and with the help of our developer community ComfortClick Bridge will continuously grow.
We believe ComfortClick bOS is the future of building automation and we’ll make it a reality. With your help we can speed up the process. We ask you to support our project and let’s build the future of building automation together.


FAQ

Will you have an Android app?

Yes. We already have an Android application available on Google play.

Will you have an iOS app?

Yes. We already have an iOS application available on App store.

Can I install bOS on my own hardware?

Yes. You can use your own hardware or buy ComfortClick Hub with preinstalled ComfortClick bOS.

Which systems and devices do you currently support?

Currently we support:

  • KNX
  • Modbus®
  • S-BUS
  • DSC® alarm system
  • Global Caché®
  • IRTrans®
  • XBMC®
  • IP video cameras
  • SMA Solar Technologies®

We plan to add a number of new systems and devices very soon.

Which plugins do you plan to add in the future?

Our vision is to develop the most advanced building automation platform which will support all systems and devices installed in any building. Below are the plugins we plan to offer by the end of 2014:

  • Z-Wave®
  • ZigBee®
  • Philips Hue®
  • Nest®
  • Belkin WeMo®
  • Sonos®
  • Arduino®

Will there be a monthly fee?

No. We want to be fair and charge you only for the individual plugins that you need to control your devices. If you will have more devices you will have to pay more, if you will have only a few, the costs will be minimal. If you will want to upgrade your system in the future you will again pay only for the new devices you will add.

How many tablets and smartphones can I use to connect with my bOS and control my devices?

You will be able to use limitless number of tablets and smartphones. We will not charge you anything more if you use 5, 10 or 20 mobile devices. 

What about security?

The bOS server application enables secure HTTPS access for client applications. Users authenticate with username and password. Different access privileges can be assigned to each user. Individual functions on the user interface can be protected via additional PIN code.

Will I be able to connect to multiple bOSs with my mobile application?

Yes. You will be able to install multiple ComfortClick bOS on different locations (e.g. your place and your weekend house) and control it from a single mobile application.

Will bOS work in my country?

Yes. There are no limitations.
story_txt:
The first building operating system (bOS) for your homeComfortClick
bOS is the first building operating system that features building
automation plugins market - ComfortClick
Bridge.  ComfortClick bOS is the
easiest way to set-up a smart home. Select your supported devices from our
growing device library in the ComfortClick Bridge plugins market and control
everything in your home from a single
app on your favorite mobile device. 


Try bOS (User name: User, Password: Pass)
What is ComfortClick bOS? 1. The first building operating system 
Over the years we
have watched the number of home devices increasing almost exponentially. However these
devices are operating independently. You have to get a separate app for each device,
meaning different user experience each time. Now imagine the future, if this
trend continues – you’ll have to switch between 20 or even 50 different apps in
order to control your home and still, these apps won’t work together. This
doesn’t sound like the future form the Sci-Fi movies. The solution is one universal platform, one operating
system, where all devices are working together, in short ComfortClick bOS – the first building operating system.2. One app to rule them all 
With ComfortClick bOS there is no need for switching between
apps to control various devices. Our refined and stylish GUI ensures a unique
user experience that makes control of your environment simple, intuitive and
fun. 
We speak a lot of
languages and are eager to learn more. Choose between a range of supported
devices, systems, standards and manufacturers. Our plugins library keeps
growing rapidly and with the help of our 3rd party developer community we plan
to speed-up the process. The library already features an array of supported
devices  and protocols to choose from
(KNX, Modbus, S BUS, etc.). We really mean it
when we say you’ll be able to control and monitor any electronic device in your
environment via one app from virtually any location.3. The first home automation plugins market  - ComfortClick Bridge 
ComfortClick Bridge

ComfortClick bOS is the first building automation platform
to feature a plugins market – ComfortClick Bridge, where you’ll be able to get plugins for your home devices. ComfortClick Bridge is a device
ready one-stop-shop. It makes smart device set-up and configuration as simple
as plug-and-play.4. Use it with any mobile deviceChoose your favorite smart phone or tablet to control your system. If you’re an Apple fan use iOS application and if you prefer Android use the Android app. The same GUI fits all controlling devices and gives you the same user experience on every platform. 5. Developer communityWe are aware one single company can never cover all the devices that are out there. We’ll offer a playground for 3rd party developer community and give the developers a chance to earn money for their work by selling their plugins in ComfortClick Bridge. Example: integrate your existing Arduino project into bOS and use the advanced logic that ComfortClick bOS offers (schedules, scenes, etc.). 6. No monthly feesNo monthly fees. Pay only for what you need. ComfortClick doesn’t charge a monthly fee, you pay only for devices you want to control. Upgrade or downgrade your existing configuration whenever you want.  Many, many practical applicationsOne universal platform where all devices are working together offers a limitless number of different features. Below are just a few examples:bOS helps you reduce your energy consumption up to 30 %ComfortClick bOS enables you to save energy and reduce the carbon footprint of your home by: 
Automating various everyday tasks, (e.g. when you leave home bOS will turn off the lights, electrical sockets and the reduce the heating)
Monitoring energy consumption.  Accurate information on how much electricity, water or gas gets consumed at any given time leads to energy efficient habits.

Control all devices in your home

Heating / cooling / air-conditioning Alarm

Energy consumption monitoring

Lighting

Audio / video Irrigation
Try bOS (User name: User, Password: Pass)

ComfortClick bOS can be used also for commercial buildings (hotels, office buildings, etc.)
We think big – hotels, office buildings, hospitals, etc. We don’t want to limit ourselves to only residential buildings. Automation system offers numerous benefits also for commercial buildings such as office buildings, hotels and hospitals. Imagine coming into a hotel, you already have ComfortClick bOS
on your phone, by entering hotel’s ComfortClick bOS
username and password you’ll be able to control your room. 
ComfortClick bOS for
hotels

How it works?


Install ComfortClick bOS on your computer or get a ComfortClick Hub with
pre-installed bOS
from us. We'll sent you ComfortClick Hub, if you get bOS & hub perk. 


Set-up a configuration of how you want to control your
devices. The process is simple, intuitive and fun. Define multiple devices
scenes, schedules, logical operations (if this, then that). Design your own GUI, use
your own backgrounds, colors and icons or choose from our icons library
and different skins. Upload your configuration and start
enjoying the comfort of your smart home control. 

Simply add new devices whenever you
want. No matter how many devices you’ll add to your ComfortClick bOS
, you
will still be able to control them all from just one application on your
smartphone or tablet.
Developers corner - Have fun and earn some money on the way
Anyone who knows a little bit about programming can start developing plugins for ComfortClick bOS using the bOS software development kit (SDK). The bOS SDK provides a rich application framework that allows you to build plugins for any device, develop custom logical functions and user interface controls. The SDK is based on C# programming language for .NET and Mono framework. Development can be done in Microsoft Visual Studio or MonoDevelop environment. SDK includes examples to easily implement any communication protocol or to create additional logical functions. Plugins can use existing UI controls or include a custom user interface based on HTML5 and JavaScript.  For some developers the final results is the prize by itself, but why not make some money on the way. After you’ll be done developing and testing your plugin, you’ll be able to submit it to the ComfortClick Bridge plugins library. We’ll review the driver and if it will be in compliance with our standards, will publish it. With each purchase of this driver you’ll be making money.Big-players join usAs participants in developer community we see enthusiasts who will decide to develop plugins because they won’t be able to find it on the ComfortClick Bridge. We would also like to invite all hardware manufacturers to join our developer community and have ComfortClick bOS
in mind when they’ll be launching their next great product.Roll-out planWe already have a fully functional software platform, which we have successfully implemented in building automation projects all over the globe. After Indiegogo campaign we’ll finalize ComfortClick Bridge, publish the SDK and offer the Linux version of ComfortClick software platform. We’ll also add a few new plugins (Z-Wave, Hue). By the end of 2014 we plan to expand ComfortClick Bridge plugins library with a number of new plugins  (ZigBee, Nest, Sonos, etc.).Tech Specs 
ComfortClick bOS Features

Enables comfortable and efficient building management.
Integrates different devices, protocols and systems and enables data exchange between them.
Executes logic operations and task.
Enables user access through mobile phones, tablets, PCs.
Supports multiple users with different access privileges and unlimited number of client devices.
Enables configuration with a powerful configuration environment.
Connects to ComfortClick Bridge for updates, plugin and remote support access.
Contains rich plugin library for communication with different protocols and devices (KNX/EIB, Modbus, DSC, Global Caché, IRTrans, XBMC, SMA Solar Technologies, IP video cameras etc.)
Contains logic operation and task library (logical operations, mathematical operations, data logging, schedules, scenes, timers, bit conversions)
Provides SDK for software developers.
Runs on Windows and Linux.

bOS Server
You can use bOS with your own hardware. Requirements:
Minimum: 400 MHz CPU, 512 MB RAM,
Recommended: 1.0 GHz or higher CPU, 512 MB or more RAM.
Up to 500 MB of hard disk space may be required.
Supported Architectures:
x86
x64
ARM

Supported Operating Systems:
Microsoft Windows XP, 7, 8 (with NET Framework).
Linux (with Mono Framework).

bOS Configurator

Configuration environment for project development.
Manage building configurations.
Create logic function.
Design your custom GUI, use your own backgrounds, icons, etc.

bOS Client applications

bOS Client for Windows.

bOS Client for Android.

bOS Client for iOS.
Web access:
Gecko browsers: Mozilla Firefox and others.
WebKit browsers: Safari (Mac and iOS), Android browser, Google Chrome, Palm webOS browser, Symbian S60 browser, and others.
Internet Explorer versions 10 and higher.
Other browsers supporting JavaScript and HTML5.
ComfortClick Hub SpecsComfortClick Panel SpecsPerks
Try bOS (User name: User, Password: Pass)
Why we need your help?Company ComfortClick (www.comfortclick.com) was founded in 2008. We are a system integrator and software developer operating in the area of building automation. By offering the complete spectrum of services related with building automation, we gained extensive know-how on home devices, systems and automation logic of a smart building. Our knowledge includes also market and business understanding of the industry. We are a member of the KNX organization (www.knx.org) which is the creator and owner of the KNX technology – the worldwide standard for all applications in home and building control. Together with our partners we have successfully implemented ComfortClick software platform in projects all over the globe: EU, Russia, Qatar, Kazakhstan, India, Thailand, Malaysia, USA and Latin America.Now we want to take our software platform one step further. We need to upgrade ComfortClick software so that you’ll be able to install it on any computer, develop ComfortClick Bridge with the cloud service and publish SDK. To do that we need to hire additional developers to finish production in the shortest possible time and provide for functionality and bug testing - both in our studio and live environment. By introducing ComfortClick bOS with ComfortClick Bridge we’ll rewrite the concept of home automation. We’ll create an open platform and with the help of our developer community ComfortClick Bridge will continuously grow.We believe ComfortClick bOS is the future of building automation and we’ll make it a reality. With your help we can speed up the process. We ask you to support our project and let’s build the future of building automation together.
FAQWill you have an Android app? Yes. We already have an Android application available on Google play.Will you have an iOS app? Yes. We already have an iOS application available on App store.Can I install bOS on my own hardware?Yes. You can use your own hardware or buy ComfortClick Hub with preinstalled ComfortClick bOS.Which systems and devices do you currently support?Currently we support:
KNX
Modbus®
S-BUS
DSC® alarm system
Global Caché®
IRTrans®
XBMC®
IP video cameras
SMA Solar Technologies®

We plan to add a number of new systems and devices very soon.Which plugins do you plan to add in the future?Our vision is to develop the most advanced building automation platform which will support all systems and devices installed in any building. Below are the plugins we plan to offer by the end of 2014:
Z-Wave®
ZigBee®
Philips Hue®
Nest®
Belkin WeMo®
Sonos®
Arduino®
Will there be a monthly fee?No. We want to be fair and charge you only for the individual plugins that you need to control your devices. If you will have more devices you will have to pay more, if you will have only a few, the costs will be minimal. If you will want to upgrade your system in the future you will again pay only for the new devices you will add. How many tablets and smartphones can I use to connect with my bOS and control my devices?You will be able to use limitless number of tablets and smartphones. We will not charge you anything more if you use 5, 10 or 20 mobile devices.  What about security?The bOS server application enables secure HTTPS access for client applications. Users authenticate with username and password. Different access privileges can be assigned to each user. Individual functions on the user interface can be protected via additional PIN code.Will I be able to connect to multiple bOSs with my mobile application?Yes. You will be able to install multiple ComfortClick bOS on different locations (e.g. your place and your weekend house) and control it from a single mobile application.Will bOS work in my country?Yes. There are no limitations.

story:
Story

When I was a child, I dreamed to become a hero with super natural power and fight for justice. I love to play hero role-play game with my neighbors. One of my favorite “power tools” is Slap Band. When it is straight, it will become a magic sword to fight against bad guys. When it slaps on my wrist, it will become a magic bracelet acting like a walkie-talkie to communicate with my ally or a power tool to give me strength.

Nowadays, technology makes everything come true. You can always get on line to communicate with people and declare war with your friends in the online game world with a smart phone.

Once Apple announced to launch their smart watch products, an idea came into my mind. My “Power Tool” in childhood can finally come true!

Concept

I create a Protective Case for Apple Watch by integrating the slap band as Watch Band!

Named as ABCase, you can wear and protect your Apple Watch as easy as ABC.

Draft Drawing

In Feb 2015, we started thinking how to combine the Slap Band with the Protective case into one unit. Since there was lack of information about Apple Watch dimension, we could only create the product drawing in our estimation.

There were two main difficulties that we encountered with:

1)  How to make holes for Apple Watch sensor and make sure the Slap Band is still workable

2)  How to secure and protect the Apple Watch

So, we went ahead for making prototype ABCase “Zero” for evaluation.


The Birth of ABCase "Zero"

We started having:

1)  Metal Stamping Tool for slap band

2)  Prototype Tool for ABCase

3)  3D printing of Apple Watch mockup for testing (Apple Watch was still not yet launched at that moment)

Finally, ABCase “Zero” came to this world!



Demonstration

Easy to Install

You can install Apple Watch into ABCase within 10 sec!

Easy to Wear

Comparsion: You may need to spend over 20 sec to wear Apple Watch with Original Watch Band.

It is easy to slap and go when using ABCase!


Give Protection

Silicon is a kind of very tough and durable material.

It is secure and your Apple Watch can be well protected!

One meter Drop Test


No barrier between Apple Watch and your wrist

The lighting sensor still works with ABCase!


Specification

-  Material: Food Grade Silicon rubber 

                    (Brand: Xiameter RBB2003)

-  Size (32mm & 42mm Apple Watch)

-  Color: Black, White, Yellow, Orange, Purple, Pink

-  If the fund raising amount is over USD5,000, special perk for Color: Fluorescence & Camouflage will be unlocked.


New Design is Coming

Besides "Zero", we have other designs for ABCase:

"ONE" ~ Draft Drawing

-  If the fund raising amount is over USD5,000, Perk for  "ONE"  will be unlocked.

"Angel"~ Draft Drawing

- If the fund raising amount is over USD10,000, Perk for  "Angel"  will be unlocked.

"Devil"~ Draft Drawing

- If the fund raising amount is over USD10,000, Perk for  "Devil"  will be unlocked.

  

Patent Authorized by The State Intellectual Property Office of the People's Republic of China 

ABCase Patent no: 201520310033.6 & 201530142536.2


Schedule

February 2015 – Concept drawing and 3D model

March 2015 – Prototype of Slap band metal plate

April & May 2015 – Prototype of Silicon overmold with metal plate

June 2015 – Funding on indiegogo

August 2015 – Funding gained and start mass production tooling fabrication

End of August 2015 – Start the shipment


Perks



These Perks will only be unlocked when fund raises over USD5,000

PERK for Color: Fluorescence & Camouflage

PERK for ABCase "ONE"

Bonus PERK -- USD8 for protective screen for Apple Watch (3pcs)

These Perks will only be unlocked when fund raises over USD10,000

PERK for ABCase "Angel" & "Devil"


Risk and Challenge

During the Prototype stage, Apple Watch was still not yet launched. We could only estimate the size of the Apple Watch and had the 3D print model as prototype testing.

It might spend much time on fine tuning the product 3D drawing after Apple Watch was launched in the market.

Now, we have already got the Apple Watch and have modified 3D model accordingly, we can start the mass production tooling after fund raised. 


Your HELP and SUPPORT will be appreciated

Once this project has been successfully funded, we promise to deliver the ABCase to all funders by the end of August 2015.


If you have any question or suggestion about this project, you may contact us by

Email: indiegogo@advancebonding.com


Team

Naughty Pudding Co. Ltd Team - Design & Brand team of Advance Bonding Co. Ltd 

Members: 

         P.L. Li -- Day Dreamer

        Keith Li -- Make your life living

Advance Bonding Co. Ltd Team - Technical and Production Support

Members:  W.B. Li – Project Manager
                     W.Y. Li – Quality Assurance

                     John Hu - Production Manager

story:
What's the Deal?

My name is Aaron Hendon and I have the great idea for an app.

Ever think "Hey, why isn't there an app for "this"?  Me too.  So I am doing something about it.  And I need your help. 

As much as I want this app to exist, as much as I would love for it to take off and be the next BIG THING, I also really think it would be cool if a whole lot of people could walk around and say that they helped make it happen.

But What Is It?

It's a game I have played (in analog) for years - in fact, if you know me then the odds are good that we've played some version of it together (in fact, I got a buck that says we've played it together).  When I show people how to play they continue to play long after I leave.  It is popular for kids and adults, men and women. 

It lends itself perfectly to the addictive nature of mobile - and frankly, I am more than happy to exploit this aspect of human nature.  Read about this phenomenon here. 

It is a social networking game.  You play it with your own community much the way you play Words With Friends.  It is highly customizable, addictive and there is nothing like it on the market.

There are multiple ways to monetize it - there will be a free and a paid version, with the free version being ad supported, there is an in game currency that can be replenished by buying additional funds and there are multiple add-ons that can be purchased.  

Plus there will be swag you can win commensurate with the level you attain, the highest of which is BACON.  Yes, I said it.  This game will have a BACON LEVEL.  For many of you that is probably all you need to know.  

So You Really Aren't Going To Tell Us?

Unfortunately one cannot protect a cool thought - one cannot patent an idea - and the technological hurdles of building it are tiny for anybody who is already set up to do such a thing.  It is for that reason that I am hesitant to divulge more details here (more about how you can get around this later).  

Also unfortunate is the fact that I am not set up to do anything about this.  I know as much about coding an app as Sarah Palin does about foreign policy (i.e. I can see apps from my phone).

Do The Math

Great idea + Easy for someone else to make + Impossible for me to make on my own = I need to raise money to pay someone to code this while not divulging the details until a prototype is rolled out.

Help Me Help You

The coders I have spoken with pretty much agree that I can expect to get a good quality prototype for about $20K.  So then the question is can I find enough people to give enough money, sight unseen, to get this rolling?  

I don't know - can I?  Can I get 1,000 people to give $20?  2,000 people to give $10?

I think I can!  And with your generous help I am sure to get this rolling.

Be The First Kid On Your Block

How cool would it be to actually be a material part of making the next Words with Friends?  And to do so for a mere $10?  Fuggedaboudit!

Not only do you get to make a real and profound difference bringing something into existence that people all over the world will use but you get perks like these:

Everyone who contributes will be part of the beta roll out.  Not only will you get the prototype to play with but everyone who contributes will get a lifetime supply of the paid version of every itereation forever. You will never have to buy the paid version.  Never.

At higher contributions you will get significant bonuses of the currency used in the game.  

Still higher contributions will warrant automatic advances to the highest level of the game.  All contributuions of $500 or more will get a LIFETIME BACON LEVEL STATUS.  

There are other REALLY REALLY GREAT perks.  

REALLY REALLY GREAT ones.  

REALLY.  

Just check them out to the right.

If you are interested in contributing more that $500 you are welcome to contact me directly and we can talk about off menu perks.

Do You Need More Information?

Listen, if you must know the details, or you are out to contribute a larger sum, I am happy to send you a Mutual Non Disclosure Agreement and share with you anything you want to know.

However, I really do think that for a $10 investment we can both sleep well knowing you will be DELIGHTED with the outcome of your blind faith.

The Bottom Line

I want your money.  I want you to stop right now and give me at least $10.  More if you feel like it.  And maybe later down the road when you see someone playing the game you can say "Hey I am one of the founders.  Buy me a drink."

TELL EVERYONE YOU KNOW about this campaign with everyone.  Tell everyone you know that some crazy guy is asking for money but not telling anybody exacty what for. For $10 you get to be a part of someone's dream.  

For the record, the initial money will go directly to the programmers.  Any money raised above what is required to develop a working prototype will be set aside for debugging, revisions and marketing.

THANK YOU!

I can't thank you enough for even considering such a bizzaro request.  Whether you actually contribute or not, whether you pass this on or just pass on it, the fact that you are still reading is pretty darn flattering and I appreciate your time and interest.

The coders I have spoken with pretty much agree that I can expect to get a good quality prototype for about $20K.  So then the question is can I find enough people to give enough money, sight unseen, to get this rolling?  
I don't know - can I?  Can I get 1,000 people to give $20?  2,000 people to give $10?
I think I can!  And with your generous help I am sure to get this rolling.
Be The First Kid On Your Block
How cool would it be to actually be a material part of making the next Words with Friends?  And to do so for a mere $10?  Fuggedaboudit!
Not only do you get to make a real and profound difference bringing something into existence that people all over the world will use but you get perks like these:
Everyone who contributes will be part of the beta roll out.  Not only will you get the prototype to play with but everyone who contributes will get a lifetime supply of the paid version of every itereation forever. You will never have to buy the paid version.  Never.
At higher contributions you will get significant bonuses of the currency used in the game.  
Still higher contributions will warrant automatic advances to the highest level of the game.  All contributuions of $500 or more will get a LIFETIME BACON LEVEL STATUS.  
There are other REALLY REALLY GREAT perks.  
REALLY REALLY GREAT ones.  
REALLY.  
Just check them out to the right.
If you are interested in contributing more that $500 you are welcome to contact me directly and we can talk about off menu perks.
Do You Need More Information?
Listen, if you must know the details, or you are out to contribute a larger sum, I am happy to send you a Mutual Non Disclosure Agreement and share with you anything you want to know.
However, I really do think that for a $10 investment we can both sleep well knowing you will be DELIGHTED with the outcome of your blind faith.
The Bottom Line
I want your money.  I want you to stop right now and give me at least $10.  More if you feel like it.  And maybe later down the road when you see someone playing the game you can say "Hey I am one of the founders.  Buy me a drink."
TELL EVERYONE YOU KNOW about this campaign with everyone.  Tell everyone you know that some crazy guy is asking for money but not telling anybody exacty what for. For $10 you get to be a part of someone's dream.  
For the record, the initial money will go directly to the programmers.  Any money raised above what is required to develop a working prototype will be set aside for debugging, revisions and marketing.
THANK YOU!
I can't thank you enough for even considering such a bizzaro request.  Whether you actually contribute or not, whether you pass this on or just pass on it, the fact that you are still reading is pretty darn flattering and I appreciate your time and interest.

story:
We are seeking your help to overhaul the look and usability of our App, To make it user-friendlier and to add a function.


App Store: https://itunes.apple.com/app/id820178011 and Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.soopermeal.tabit


6 month ago we created and patented TAB IT , A really cool and new debt and credit tracking system (full description below). However we made some mistakes in the UI leading to a bit of userfriendliness issues (sign up process annoying). Also a tight budget did not allow a thorough marketing strategy so people did not get how amazing this app is, how it simplifies your life and relations, how it puts you in a condition where you do not need to think about any money interactions with your friends but only enjoy their company. TAB IT works in the background to have everything clear, precise and honest.


TAB IT puts annoying cash cash interaction in a well organized limbo!!!


We would like to fix this few flaws add a cool extra function to make it perfect.


           


Here is what TAB IT does as of now:

TAB IT automatically keeps track of all tabs within your social circle, it keeps all entries with a description, a geolocation, pictures and other comments, if you want. 

Once the tab is entered TAB IT will ask the counterpart for approval (Alex claims you owe him 10 dollars for drinks at Lolla) he can now accept the entry or reject with a message. 

If accepted it will update the balance with your friend (or group of friends if you are using the Multitab function) and this balance, being certified by the other party, can now be used to pay for other things within your social circle. 

You can also sell your friends credit to other friends and even offer a discount on it ( I ll sell you the credit I have with Mike at a 20% discount). 

Tab It automatically creates entries for all of this so you wont ever have to worry and even care again on who’s turn to pay the bill it is or what is the correct share of an expense is.

What we want to achieve is a cashless social circle where what goes around comes around.

Check out the current version of the application for free on App Store:https://itunes.apple.com/app/id820178011 and Google Play:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.soopermeal.tabit


What we need your help for:


  • Improve graphics : Make the whole user experience more attractive and intuitive.

  • Re-design the profile set up flow: Easier and more captivating step-by-step procedure.  

  • Add a meet up at venue function to facilitate dinners and other outings: Input time and place and invite your friends; TAB IT will inform them show who is invited and ask for acceptance, so in seconds you will know who is in.

  • Add the ability to reject a tab with an amount counter-proposal: As of now when you reject a tab you can only add a message with motivations but you cannot counter propose an amount, we want to and a function for which the amount can go back and forth until is agreed upon.

  • Add a multicurrency sub profile: Currently you need different profile for different currencies, we would like to enable users to switch between currencies without having to log in and out.




What we'll do for your support:


  • For 2 USD the ability of downloading the new app 1 month before launch (with special codes to allow your friends too).


  • For 10 dollars : your own 20 character message inbuilt in the app shout out section. A section will be added inside the app where you can see all the backers thoughts, your mark in history?;).

   from           to 
     

Further App description

Keep track of IOUs from your friends, colleagues and family members with TAB IT, the innovative app that allows you to track and verify, beyond doubts and arguments, what you owe and what is owed to you.

TAB IT (patent pending) can be used to track any IOU and split bills automatically, without ever having to take out your wallet.  Whether you’re hitting the town with friends, on a business trip with colleagues, or planning a family vacation TAB IT allows you to easily keep track of your debts so that you always know what is owed to you (or what you owe).

The uses for this app are endless!  The user interface allows you to keep track of  what you owe and what others owe you.  Simply enter an amount into the dashboard where you can provide a geotag and photo to help you remember what the IOU is for - add a description and send it to the other party for approval.  When an IOU is approved, the app updates your running balance and you can track what you owe and what is owed you. This not only allows you to reconcile debts easily among yourself and other parties, but it also allows you to track IOU's over time to get a robust picture of your financial behavior.  Because your TABIT credits are verified, you can “Sell Credit” between parties. (This is a great way to reconcile debts you have in-app without having to trade cash back and forth).  The TAB IT Multi-tab function allows you to effortlessly split a bill amongst a group of friends while still providing the opportunity for modifications if there are differences in what each party owes.

All TAB IT transactions are kept in individual, itemized and chronological log histories so you can see exactly where you stand financially. 


TAB IT allows users to confirm or deny debts sent to them via in­app verification system, thusly certifying each debt as accurate and legitimate. Further, TAB IT allows users to “sell” debts owed them to other users in order to settle debts between parties. Users can add additional incentives to “sweeten” the debt sale. For example: If Party A agrees that he/she owes Party B $10, Party B can then trade Party A’s $10 debt to Party C to pay off a debt between Party B and Party C.

This innovative, social debt calculating app makes keeping track of what you owe and what is owed to you easy, mobile and fun! It’s a great way to keep track of all those little debts within a social circle ­that add up to hundreds of lost dollars every year ­ without having to keep track of paper receipts or debate back and forth with your friends who paid for what, when. It’s also a great tool to help teach teenagers and young adults how credit and debt works and to help them become responsible spenders as they enter the financial world.

TAB IT allows users to:

●  Interact with an easy to use, clean looking user interface

●  Add notes and photos of receipts to your TAB IT tabs

●  Connect to Facebook and share TAB IT with friends

●  Invite friends to TAB IT

●  Use TAB IT to teach teenagers and young adults how credit and debt works

●  Send and receive “tabs” from anyone via data services built into the app

●  Accept or reject “tabs”

●  Choose amongst different world currencies when setting up their account (not just for the US!)

●  Use the MULTI TAB function to easily split checks amongst many parties

●  See where your money is going and who owes you the most via user log histories

●  Sell credit between users

All transactions are kept in individual, itemized log histories so you can see exactly where you stand ­ financially, speaking ­ with your family, friends, colleagues and anyone else using TAB IT.

No need to connect your to bank accounts, credit cards, PayPal or iPhone 6 wallet.


iOS App Store:https://itunes.apple.com/app/id820178011

Google Play:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.soopermeal.tabit

Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/tabitapp





THANK YOU, TAB IT+
